column5: >Dymotics: the FIRST and ONLY system that turns your smartphone into a universal domotic remote. Control all lights and appliances in your home from anywhere in the world.

column8: >TO WIN NEW DEVICES AND SEE OUR UPDATES CLICK HERE

column6: >Get your hands on it. Shipping begins Winter 2013

column5: >We want you to have it as soon as possible. Your funding will increase the number of integrated brands and start the production of our Universal HUB.
>It’s a device that easily connects to your router. It will automatically scan the compatible domotic devices on your home network and allows our APP to control them.
>Dymotics is very simple, anyone can use it. With regular use it will learn to automate your daily tasks for you.
>You will quickly notice reductions in your energy bills.

column6: >Automate your lights, entry phones, washing machine or thermostat via WIFI from the same APP

column5: >Have your breakfast ready at the same hour every day or whenever you want, turn the heater on before you arrive home or set your music to wake you up every morning.
>The distance will no longer stop you from having your clothes washed for you by the time you arrive from work, or from opening the door for your guests before you get home.
>Enter a default room on the APP or create a new one and arrange your devices. For example: put the toaster in the kitchen space and add a photo to identify it.
>We will warn you if your kids turn on the TV when they shouldn’t or if the lights have been kept on too many hours. Create as many alerts as you like.

column6: >Why we are different? We are COMPATIBLE.

column5: >Dymotic allows you to control any domotic device from just ONE app. Our list of compatible brands will increase continuously to make your life easier.

>Help us to get the Universal HUB into production and integrate as many brands as possible. We want to grow the team to create new applications to give you more features to continue making your life easier.
>We have the passion, we have the application, we have the technology, we've just gotta make it real.
>Dymotics is comparably the cheapest system on the market and the easiest to acquire for people without a huge starting budget.
>We offer this app FREE. You will get advanced features and IA for a monthly fee of 1€ per device. We also offer a one-charge plan.
>You don’t need to make a big investment to enjoy a simple, comfortable and modern domotic system.
>Also save up to 30 euros per device a year and up to 300 euros a year in heating.

column6: >Meet the TEAM: Effort, enthusiasm and friendly faces

column5: >Dymotics is a startup born in 2012 in Madrid by 6 young enthusiasts. We are a small team with big ideas who wants to revolutionize the traditional concept of home automation and make it more affordable, intuitive and accessible to everybody.
>The work and talent of engineers, designers, journalists and the many friends, who have helped, are key to the success of this project.

>Miriam has worked as a Frontend Engineer for the biggest social network in Europe and more startups. Founder of several e-commerce businesses with 7+ years’ experience in the industry and is an expert in user experience.

>Alex’s curriculum includes such companies as a video on demand startup and a telecommunication company where he worked as Backend Engineer. He also has a entrepreneurial spirit and in 2012 founded a online payments startup.
>Francisco set up his own HW Company several years ago and has worked as an Backend Engineer in the Intelligence Center of the Armed Forces and the Ministry of Finance.
>Paula is an Industrial Designer and a graphic designer. Her main experience over the last two years has been in London where she worked in startups such as Huddlebuy and TechHub.

>Journalist with a degree in Marketing from Berkeley in San Fran- cisco, where she worked for Siemens, two years at Philip Morris in Mexico City, Elecmol (a leader in electricity / electronics in Spain) and some startups from Wayra Global Incubator.

>Publicist and Public Relations. Founder of her own advertising agency, Cromedia. Her creativity has led her to work with re- nowned artist Franc Aleu for El Celler de Can Roca (considered to be the best restaurant in the world).
>Thanks to a Developer API, anyone can add new functionality, sell and / or share features which gives added value to the product.
>We want you to grow and make money with our help. With our development kits you will be able to create some awesome new stuff. We will be with you every step of the way.

column6: >If there is a technical problem with any appliances, will Dymotics warn me about it?

column5: >You can create alerts in case you want to know if a device is turned off or on without your permission

column6: >Can I use Dymotics system in any country?

column5: >Yes, Dymotic´s  app will work worldwide. Note the country where you reside and electrical requirements before buying your device.

>Yes, we ship to any country. For international shipment please add 20$ for packs, or 10$ for the T-Shirt / Fanboy pack

>Dymotics: el PRIMER Y ÚNICO sistema que convierte tu smartphone en un mando a distancia universal domótico. Controla todas las luces y electrodomésticos de tu hogar desde cualquier lugar del mundo.

column8: >PARA GANAR DISPOSITIVOS Y VER NUESTRAS ACTUALIZACIONES PULSA AQUÍ

column6: >Sé el primero en tenerlo. Envío estimado Invierno 2013

column5: >Queremos ponerlo en tus manos lo antes posible. Con tu financiación incrementaremos el número de marcas compatibles y empezará la producción del HUB Universal.
>Es un dispositivo que se conecta fácilmente al router de tu casa. Automáticamente escaneará los dispositivos domóticos compatibles conectados a tu red y permitirá a nuestra APP controlarlos.
>Dymotics es muy simple, cualquier persona podrá usarlo. Además, con el uso regular, aprenderá de tus costumbres y las automatizará por tí.
>Pronto notarás una considerable reducción del gasto en tus facturas de gas y electricidad.

column6: >Automatiza tus luces, telefonillos, lavadora o termostato vía WIFI desde la misma APLICACIÓN

column5: >Ten tu desayuno listo a la misma hora todos los días o cuando tú quieras, enciende la calefacción antes de llegar a casa o haz que la música te despierte cada mañana.
>La distancia no te parará a la hora de tener tu ropa lavada antes de llegar del trabajo o de abrir la puerta a tus invitados antes de llegar a casa.
>Entra en una habitación ya creada en la APP o crea una nueva y organiza tus dispositivos. Por ejemplo: pon el tostador dentro de la cocina y añade una foto para identificarlo.
>Te avisaremos si los niños encienden la tele cuando no deben o si las luces permanecen encendidas demasiadas horas. Tú decides, crea tantas alertas como gustes.

column6: >¿Por qué somos diferentes? Porque somos COMPATIBLES.

column5: >Dymotics te permite controlar cualquier dispositivo domótico desde una ÚNICA aplicación. La lista de marcas compatibles se irá incrementando para darte un mayor abanico de posibilidades.

>Ayúdanos a poner en producción el HUB Universal e integrar tantas marcas como nos sea posible. Queremos hacer crecer el equipo para crear nuevas aplicaciones y ofrecerte más features para seguir haciéndote la vida más fácil.
>Tenemos pasión, tenemos la aplicación, tenemos la tecnología, sólo necesitamos hacerlo realidad.
>Dymotics es comparablemente el sistema más barato del mercado y el más fácil de adquirir para personas sin un gran presupuesto para empezar.

>Ofrecemos esta aplicación GRATIS. Por una cuota mensual1€ por dispositivo disfrutarás de funciones avanzadas e Inteligencia artificial. Además también tenemos plan de único pago para los que lo deseen.
>No necesitas hacer una gran inversión para disfrutar de un sistema domótico simple, cómodo y moderno.
>También ahorrarás hasta 30 euros de electricidad por dispositivo al año y hasta 300 euros en calefacción.

column6: >Conoce al EQUIPO: Esfuerzo, ilusión y caras amigables

column5: >Dymotics es una startup tecnológica Española nacida en 2012 en Madrid y formada por 6 jóvenes apasionados. Somos un pequeño equipo con grandes ideas que quiere revolucionar el concepto tradicional de domótica y convertirlo en uno más asequible, intuitivo y al alcance de todos.
>El trabajo de ingenieros, diseñadores, periodistas y muchos amigos que han ayudado con su talento, son la clave del éxito de este proyecto.

>Ha trabajado como Frontend Engineer para Tuenti, Emtrics (Ganador 1º Edición de Wayra) y el grupo Prisa. Fundadora de negocios e-commerce. Tiene +7 años de experiencia en el sector y es experta en experiencia del usuario.
>En su currículum aparecen empresas como Jazztel, Yunait y Youzee como Backend Engineer. Además, tiene un gran carácter emprendedor ya que en 2012 fundó una startup, Funddy.
>Montó su propia empresa de HW personalizado hace varios años y ha trabajado como ingeniero en el Centro de Inteligencia de las Fuerzas Armadas y en el ministerio de Hacienda.

>Diseñadora Industrial por la Universidad de Antonio de Nebrija y diseñadora gráfica. Su principal experiencia durante los últimos 2 años ha sido en Londres donde ha trabajado en startups como Huddlebuy y Techhub.

>Periodista y licenciada en Marketing en Berkeley en San Francisco, donde trabajó para Siemens, 2 años en Philip Morris en México DF, Elecmol (líder en el sector de la electrónica/electricidad) y en eMe Sound (Ganadora 2º Edición de Wayra).

>Publicista y Relaciones Públicas. Fundadora de su propia agencia de publicidad, Cromedia. Su creatividad la ha llevado a trabajar con el reconocido artista Franc Aleu para El Celler de Can Roca (considerado el mejor restaurante del mundo).
>Gracias a nuestra API para desarrolladores, cualquiera puede añadir nueva funcionalidad, venderla y/o compartir features que den mayor valor al producto.
>Crecerás y ganarás dinero con nuestra ayuda. Nuestros kits para desarrolladores te permitirán crear nuevas e interesantes aplicaciones. Te daremos soporte en cada paso que necesites.

column6: >¿Necesito estar siempre conectado a Internet para que funcione?

column1: ","PARA VER ESTA INFORMACIÓN EN ESPAÑOL PULSA AQUÍ
Dymotics: the FIRST and ONLY system that turns your smartphone into a universal domotic remote. Control all lights and appliances in your home from anywhere in the world.
TO WIN NEW DEVICES AND SEE OUR UPDATES CLICK HERE
Get your hands on it. Shipping begins Winter 2013
We want you to have it as soon as possible. Your funding will increase the number of integrated brands and start the production of our Universal HUB.
It’s a device that easily connects to your router. It will automatically scan the compatible domotic devices on your home network and allows our APP to control them.
Dymotics is very simple, anyone can use it. With regular use it will learn to automate your daily tasks for you.
You will quickly notice reductions in your energy bills.
Automate your lights, entry phones, washing machine or thermostat via WIFI from the same APP
Have your breakfast ready at the same hour every day or whenever you want, turn the heater on before you arrive home or set your music to wake you up every morning.
The distance will no longer stop you from having your clothes washed for you by the time you arrive from work, or from opening the door for your guests before you get home.
Enter a default room on the APP or create a new one and arrange your devices. For example: put the toaster in the kitchen space and add a photo to identify it.
We will warn you if your kids turn on the TV when they shouldn’t or if the lights have been kept on too many hours. Create as many alerts as you like.
Why we are different? We are COMPATIBLE.
Dymotic allows you to control any domotic device from just ONE app. Our list of compatible brands will increase continuously to make your life easier.
Why we need you? We want to illuminate many more!

Help us to get the Universal HUB into production and integrate as many brands as possible. We want to grow the team to create new applications to give you more features to continue making your life easier.
We have the passion, we have the application, we have the technology, we've just gotta make it real.
Dymotics is comparably the cheapest system on the market and the easiest to acquire for people without a huge starting budget.
We offer this app FREE. You will get advanced features and IA for a monthly fee of 1€ per device. We also offer a one-charge plan.
You don’t need to make a big investment to enjoy a simple, comfortable and modern domotic system.
Also save up to 30 euros per device a year and up to 300 euros a year in heating.
Meet the TEAM: Effort, enthusiasm and friendly faces

Dymotics is a startup born in 2012 in Madrid by 6 young enthusiasts. We are a small team with big ideas who wants to revolutionize the traditional concept of home automation and make it more affordable, intuitive and accessible to everybody.
The work and talent of engineers, designers, journalists and the many friends, who have helped, are key to the success of this project.

Miriam has worked as a Frontend Engineer for the biggest social network in Europe and more startups. Founder of several e-commerce businesses with 7+ years’ experience in the industry and is an expert in user experience.

Alex’s curriculum includes such companies as a video on demand startup and a telecommunication company where he worked as Backend Engineer. He also has a entrepreneurial spirit and in 2012 founded a online payments startup.
Francisco set up his own HW Company several years ago and has worked as an Backend Engineer in the Intelligence Center of the Armed Forces and the Ministry of Finance.
Paula is an Industrial Designer and a graphic designer. Her main experience over the last two years has been in London where she worked in startups such as Huddlebuy and TechHub.

Journalist with a degree in Marketing from Berkeley in San Fran- cisco, where she worked for Siemens, two years at Philip Morris in Mexico City, Elecmol (a leader in electricity / electronics in Spain) and some startups from Wayra Global Incubator.

Publicist and Public Relations. Founder of her own advertising agency, Cromedia. Her creativity has led her to work with re- nowned artist Franc Aleu for El Celler de Can Roca (considered to be the best restaurant in the world).
Thanks to a Developer API, anyone can add new functionality, sell and / or share features which gives added value to the product.
We want you to grow and make money with our help. With our development kits you will be able to create some awesome new stuff. We will be with you every step of the way.
Click here to be a SUPERHERO
FAQ (if you have any question please, click here)
Which devices work with your platform?
Being a web platform it can be used from any device with Internet access.
The app does not need installation. Only some devices need a manual installation which you can do easily yourself.
When it's available you can download it from our Website, AppStore or Play Store.
Do I always need to be connected to the internet for it to function
You need to be connected unless you are at home, in which case you can use your home’s local network.
Dymotics implements security layers as well as several keys for use of the application. You can find more details in the detailed information for developers.
Can I preset the use and consumption of my appliances or devices connected to the app?
Yes, the application will let you automate daily tasks and set it up to turn on / turn off at a specific time.
How can I update the app?
The platform will update itself automatically without you needing to do anything.
If there is a technical problem with any appliances, will Dymotics warn me about it?
You can create alerts in case you want to know if a device is turned off or on without your permission
Can I use Dymotics system in any country?
Yes, Dymotic´s  app will work worldwide. Note the country where you reside and electrical requirements before buying your device.
You can check a device list on our web. We will gradually integrate new ones. If you have one not on the list, contact us and we will do it for you
Yes, we ship to any country. For international shipment please add 20$ for packs, or 10$ for the T-Shirt / Fanboy pack
When will the rewards  be sent?
Your order  is estimated to be dispatched for December 2013 although there may be slight delays
Dymotics: el PRIMER Y ÚNICO sistema que convierte tu smartphone en un mando a distancia universal domótico. Controla todas las luces y electrodomésticos de tu hogar desde cualquier lugar del mundo.
PARA GANAR DISPOSITIVOS Y VER NUESTRAS ACTUALIZACIONES PULSA AQUÍ
Sé el primero en tenerlo. Envío estimado Invierno 2013
Queremos ponerlo en tus manos lo antes posible. Con tu financiación incrementaremos el número de marcas compatibles y empezará la producción del HUB Universal.
Es un dispositivo que se conecta fácilmente al router de tu casa. Automáticamente escaneará los dispositivos domóticos compatibles conectados a tu red y permitirá a nuestra APP controlarlos.
Dymotics es muy simple, cualquier persona podrá usarlo. Además, con el uso regular, aprenderá de tus costumbres y las automatizará por tí.
Pronto notarás una considerable reducción del gasto en tus facturas de gas y electricidad.
Automatiza tus luces, telefonillos, lavadora o termostato vía WIFI desde la misma APLICACIÓN
Ten tu desayuno listo a la misma hora todos los días o cuando tú quieras, enciende la calefacción antes de llegar a casa o haz que la música te despierte cada mañana.
La distancia no te parará a la hora de tener tu ropa lavada antes de llegar del trabajo o de abrir la puerta a tus invitados antes de llegar a casa.
Entra en una habitación ya creada en la APP o crea una nueva y organiza tus dispositivos. Por ejemplo: pon el tostador dentro de la cocina y añade una foto para identificarlo.
Te avisaremos si los niños encienden la tele cuando no deben o si las luces permanecen encendidas demasiadas horas. Tú decides, crea tantas alertas como gustes.
¿Por qué somos diferentes? Porque somos COMPATIBLES.
Dymotics te permite controlar cualquier dispositivo domótico desde una ÚNICA aplicación. La lista de marcas compatibles se irá incrementando para darte un mayor abanico de posibilidades.
¿Por qué te necesitamos? ¡Queremos iluminar muchas marcas más!

Ayúdanos a poner en producción el HUB Universal e integrar tantas marcas como nos sea posible. Queremos hacer crecer el equipo para crear nuevas aplicaciones y ofrecerte más features para seguir haciéndote la vida más fácil.
Tenemos pasión, tenemos la aplicación, tenemos la tecnología, sólo necesitamos hacerlo realidad.
Dymotics es comparablemente el sistema más barato del mercado y el más fácil de adquirir para personas sin un gran presupuesto para empezar.

Ofrecemos esta aplicación GRATIS. Por una cuota mensual1€ por dispositivo disfrutarás de funciones avanzadas e Inteligencia artificial. Además también tenemos plan de único pago para los que lo deseen.
No necesitas hacer una gran inversión para disfrutar de un sistema domótico simple, cómodo y moderno.
También ahorrarás hasta 30 euros de electricidad por dispositivo al año y hasta 300 euros en calefacción.
Conoce al EQUIPO: Esfuerzo, ilusión y caras amigables

Dymotics es una startup tecnológica Española nacida en 2012 en Madrid y formada por 6 jóvenes apasionados. Somos un pequeño equipo con grandes ideas que quiere revolucionar el concepto tradicional de domótica y convertirlo en uno más asequible, intuitivo y al alcance de todos.
El trabajo de ingenieros, diseñadores, periodistas y muchos amigos que han ayudado con su talento, son la clave del éxito de este proyecto.

Ha trabajado como Frontend Engineer para Tuenti, Emtrics (Ganador 1º Edición de Wayra) y el grupo Prisa. Fundadora de negocios e-commerce. Tiene +7 años de experiencia en el sector y es experta en experiencia del usuario.
En su currículum aparecen empresas como Jazztel, Yunait y Youzee como Backend Engineer. Además, tiene un gran carácter emprendedor ya que en 2012 fundó una startup, Funddy.
Montó su propia empresa de HW personalizado hace varios años y ha trabajado como ingeniero en el Centro de Inteligencia de las Fuerzas Armadas y en el ministerio de Hacienda.

Diseñadora Industrial por la Universidad de Antonio de Nebrija y diseñadora gráfica. Su principal experiencia durante los últimos 2 años ha sido en Londres donde ha trabajado en startups como Huddlebuy y Techhub.

Periodista y licenciada en Marketing en Berkeley en San Francisco, donde trabajó para Siemens, 2 años en Philip Morris en México DF, Elecmol (líder en el sector de la electrónica/electricidad) y en eMe Sound (Ganadora 2º Edición de Wayra).

Publicista y Relaciones Públicas. Fundadora de su propia agencia de publicidad, Cromedia. Su creatividad la ha llevado a trabajar con el reconocido artista Franc Aleu para El Celler de Can Roca (considerado el mejor restaurante del mundo).
Gracias a nuestra API para desarrolladores, cualquiera puede añadir nueva funcionalidad, venderla y/o compartir features que den mayor valor al producto.
Crecerás y ganarás dinero con nuestra ayuda. Nuestros kits para desarrolladores te permitirán crear nuevas e interesantes aplicaciones. Te daremos soporte en cada paso que necesites.
Haz click aquí para ser un SUPERHEROE
FAQ (Si tienes preguntas, haz click aquí)
Al ser una plataforma web podrá ser utilizado desde cualquier dispositivo que tenga acceso a Internet.
La aplicación no necesita ninguna instalación. Algunos de los  dispositivos necesitan una instalación manual que podrás hacer tú mismo de manera muy sencilla.
Cuando esté activa podrás descargarla desde nuestra web, App Store o Play Store.
¿Necesito estar siempre conectado a Internet para que funcione?
Necesitas estar conectado a no ser que estés en casa, en ese caso puedes utilizar la red local de tu hogar.
¿Cómo es la seguridad de la plataforma?
Dymotics implementa diferentes capas de seguridad además de claves para el uso de la aplicación. Podrás consultar más detalles al respecto en la información detallada para desarrolladores.
¿Se puede programar el uso y consumo de los aparatos vinculados a la plataforma?
Sí, dentro de la aplicación podrás automatizar tareas cotidianas, o programarlas para que se enciendan/apaguen a una hora concreta.
La plataforma se actualizará automáticamente sin necesidad de que realices ninguna acción.
Si hay algún problema técnico de funcionamiento de algún dispositivo/aparato/electrodoméstico, ¿la plataforma dymotics me avisa de ello?
Podrás crear alertas en el caso de que quieras saber si un dispositivo se ha apagado o encendido sin que tu realices ninguna acción.
Sí, la app de Dymotics funcionará en todo el mundo. Cuando adquieras tus dispositivos ten en cuenta el país en el que resides y sus exigencias eléctricas.
Podrás consultar el listado de dispositivos en la web. Iremos integrando nuevos poco a poco. Si tienes alguno que no aparezca en el listado escríbenos y lo haremos para ti.
Sí, enviamos a cualquier país. Añade 10$ a tu contribución en caso de envio internacional.
El envío está estimado para Diciembre del 2013 aunque puede haber pequeños retrasos.",33.0,0,"1 Campaign

column5: >

column1:
Which phones are compatible with popSLATE 2?
popSLATE 2 will be compatible with the iPhone 6, 6S, 6+, and 6S+. We are currently working on prototypes to work with other devices.

Will popSLATE 2 provide my phone extra battery?
With normal use, popSLATE’s onboard battery will provide up to 9 hours extra talk time and 5 hours extra internet time on the iPhone 6S+ and 6 hours extra talk time and 4 hours extra internet time on the iPhone 6S. Additionally, by offloading tasks to popSLATE’s ultra-low-power e-ink display rather than unlocking and using your iPhone’s power-hungry screen, we anticipate significant additional power savings to further extend your iPhone’s battery life.

How do you charge popSLATE?
There is a single point of charge for your popSLATE and your iPhone, so you can charge both simultaneously using with your normal Lightning cord.

How long will the battery last on a charge?
You never need to worry about the charging of your popSLATE, since the battery lasts far longer than the iPhone battery, and you charge both devices at the same time.

Will popSLATE interfere with my phone reception or my NFC transmissions?
No, popSLATE has been designed to meet Apple Made for iPhone (MFI) requirements to ensure that it does not interfere with reception or transmissions whatsoever. 

Is popSLATE fragile? How can it protect my phone?
Despite its sleek design, popSLATE is very robust. The second screen consists of special plastic materials (not glass), making it shatter-proof. Its unique slider design pays close attention to protection, from the Apple-mandated bumpers to protect your phone’s screen to the impact-resistant materials used to encase the rest of your phone, while still allowing the beauty of your iPhone to shine through.

How thin is popSLATE?
popSLATE only adds only 4 mm (0.16"") to your phone at its thickest part and nearly no added thickness on the edges. This is nearly 40% thinner than our original popSLATE. The elegantly curved screen and cover glass further enhance the thinness.

Does popSLATE display color?
No. The popSLATE second screen uses a 200 dpi, B&
column2:
W/16-bit greyscale e-ink display, which enables sharp, rich rendering of text, photographs, and other images to complement front-side color experience. 

Does the popSLATE screen use touch interactions?
Yes. We intentionally designed popSLATE to require minimal interaction. There are three capacitive-touch buttons just below the screen to switch modes and navigate content. The user experience is optimized to take advantage of the unique complementary second-screen.

How do I use popSLATE?
1. Attach popSLATE to your phone by sliding the cover on and connecting it to your iPhone’s Lightning connector. 
2. Download the popSLATE app from the App Store, which will provide you with directions on how to set your device up. 
3. Once your popSLATE set up is complete, you will be able to use the app to find, create and personalize content to display on your second screen.

Does popSLATE show the same thing on the front side as the back? In other words, does popSLATE support ‘mirroring’ on the second screen?
No, and for a very good reason. We want popSLATE to complement, not replace your frontside experience on your iPhone. The popSLATE backside offers ambient images and information at a glance, and the frontside of your iPhone is where you go for more interactive tasks.

column1:
What is the size of the popSLATE ePaper screen?
The iPhone 6+/6S+ will have a 4.7"" ePaper display and the 6/6S will leverage a 4.3"" display.

What new sources will I be able to access on my popSLATE?
popSLATE leverages content through providers’ interfaces (APIs) to access content for your feed and dashboard. We have access to the most popular content integrations (including ESPN, NYT, Weather, and Stocks) based on user demand. We will continuously roll out new content streams in the coming months.

Does popSLATE have an open API and SDK?
We currently have a private API. Developers who are interested in creating extensions of their content or entirely new applications on the popSLATE platform should reach out to us at 

support@popslate.com
column3:
'>.


Can I read my Kindle books on popSLATE?
No. popSLATE is designed for use as an e-reader, including its high-resolution, anti-glare e-paper display and ergonomic navigation keys. At the time of product launch, we will support e-reading from Project Gutenberg, which offers 50,000 e-books and growing. We anticipate additional e-book and other content sources in the coming months after we distribute our product.

Can you make purchases with Apple Wallet?
popSLATE’s e-ink screen is fully scannable, so it is ideal for bar-code and QR-code based interactions. Some locations enable scan-based purchases (eg. Starbucks).

What color options are available?
The main part of the popSLATE device (screen and frame) is available in black and white. The side trim is available in clear and translucent smoke. We will be developing more color options in the future. 

Does popSLATE have a warranty? 
We will provide a one (1) year limited warranty. 

Can I change or cancel my perk?
Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. See more information on how to do this here:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections nor are we obliged to cancel or refund a perk. Such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis. 

How is shipping handled? 
We will be shipping via the USPS First Class. International shipments will be sent via USPS International First Class. 

How much is shipping and handling?
FREE in the United States (including Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Alaska)
$10 for Canada
$25 for International orders

When will my popSLATE be delivered?
We anticipate fulfilling orders in July 2016.

How does popSLATE 2 differ from popSLATE 1?
Our original popSLATE established a new category of mobile accessories--the always-on second screen. popSLATE 1’s functionality focused mainly on the ability to instantly customize your phone from a variety of great image sources (camera, photo library, Instagram, and other members of the popSLATE community). Having the product in thousands of people’s hands provided a fantastic learning opportunity, and feedback from the popSLATE community helped us understand additional use scenarios and features that resonate with people and provide substantial value. As a result, popSLATE 2 has been radically redesigned, inside and out, to greatly expand popSLATE’s capabilities. 

Notable hardware changes
Larger, higher-resolution screen
Capacitive touch navigation buttons
40% reduction in thickness (vs. popSLATE 1)
Single point of charge (iPhone and popSLATE 2 both charged simultaneously through a single Lightning connector)
Ability to provide extra juice to your iPhone from your popSLATE
Refined industrial design to complement the beauty of the iPhone

Notable feature additions
The ability to run and navigate between multiple apps on popSLATE simultaneously
Fully-configurable dashboards
Popular news &
column4:
information feeds delivering enhanced, at-a-glance content 
Eye-catching, full-size clock faces
E-reader capabilities
Digital wallet for boarding passes, tickets, and membership cards, scannable on popSLATE
List builder for creating and displaying glanceable groceries lists, to-dos lists, and more
Plus a few more surprises to come!","Which phones are compatible with popSLATE 2?popSLATE 2 will be compatible with the iPhone 6, 6S, 6+, and 6S+. We are currently working on prototypes to work with other devices.

column1: Will popSLATE 2 provide my phone extra battery?With normal use, popSLATE’s onboard battery will provide up to 9 hours extra talk time and 5 hours extra internet time on the iPhone 6S+ and 6 hours extra talk time and 4 hours extra internet time on the iPhone 6S. Additionally, by offloading tasks to popSLATE’s ultra-low-power e-ink display rather than unlocking and using your iPhone’s power-hungry screen, we anticipate significant additional power savings to further extend your iPhone’s battery life.

How do you charge popSLATE?There is a single point of charge for your popSLATE and your iPhone, so you can charge both simultaneously using with your normal Lightning cord.How long will the battery last on a charge?You never need to worry about the charging of your popSLATE, since the battery lasts far longer than the iPhone battery, and you charge both devices at the same time.Will popSLATE interfere with my phone reception or my NFC transmissions?No, popSLATE has been designed to meet Apple Made for iPhone (MFI) requirements to ensure that it does not interfere with reception or transmissions whatsoever. Is popSLATE fragile? How can it protect my phone?Despite its sleek design, popSLATE is very robust. The second screen consists of special plastic materials (not glass), making it shatter-proof. Its unique slider design pays close attention to protection, from the Apple-mandated bumpers to protect your phone’s screen to the impact-resistant materials used to encase the rest of your phone, while still allowing the beauty of your iPhone to shine through.How thin is popSLATE?popSLATE only adds only 4 mm (0.16"") to your phone at its thickest part and nearly no added thickness on the edges. This is nearly 40% thinner than our original popSLATE. The elegantly curved screen and cover glass further enhance the thinness.Does popSLATE display color?No. The popSLATE second screen uses a 200 dpi, B&W/16-bit greyscale e-ink display, which enables sharp, rich rendering of text, photographs, and other images to complement front-side color experience. Does the popSLATE screen use touch interactions?Yes. What is KUDOS PowerMusic?
Pocket-sized all-in-one smartphone battery charger, portable hands-free speaker and Bluetooth HiFi stereo

While Bluetooth speakers and power banks are growing bulkier, we chose to integrate hands-free and HiFi Bluetooth in a compact housing with maximized battery capacity-- making it a portable all-in-one device.
5200mAH high-capacity smartphone battery charger.  Digital battery capacity display.
1000mA fast charging (in/out), volume adjustment, high-gain noise cancellation microphone

column2: >HiFi Bluetooth stereo.  Two 2-watt speakers.  Solid aluminum casing.

column1: We have completed FCC, CE, Bluetooth and battery safety certifications.  This campaign is to help us gauge market demand and refine our product development plan.  We will also determine whether to roll out our retail packaging.
CE, FCC, UN38.3, WEEE, RoHS and Bluetooth certified
Besides PowerMusic, KUDOS plan to release Portable Wireless Charger, Wireless Charging Lamp and PowerMouse.  Please visit KUDOS website for details and support our other campaigns.
Contents in PowerMusic e-Coommerce box: PowerMusic x1, USB charger x1, micro USB cable x1 and user manual x1.  Bunny is not included.
Rewards are limited to mainland US supporters:
PowerMusic contains lithium polymer battery.  Due to regulations, we won't be able to ship PowerMusic to overseas supporters.
KUDOS TECH develops mobile power and wireless charging accessories with a focus on the integration of power and advanced industrial applications.
Our Experience in Power Device Development and Manufacturing
Our members have been in the engineering of power development since 2007, building engineering, manufacturing, project management and product management departments
column2: created product development procedures and quality standards from scratch. Successful power projects include:

column1: • Mophie Juicepack series for iPhone 3, iPhone 4. and iPad Touch.
• Mophie Reserve, Boost and PowerStation series for iPhones, iPods, and iPads.
With strong engineering and manufacturing connections and your support, Kudos will be able to deliver more innovative power accessories in the future.
Max Tseng
Spencer Johnson
Jerry Escobar
Please help us get the word out and make some noise about PowerMusic campaign.

AHHHH What a nightmare....... have you been in an area where there is no outlet like when hiking, camping, In your car traveling or how about the worse case you are at the airport and your flight has been delayed and YOUR PHONE DIES!!!, there are only a couple outlets and a line of people waiting to charge their phones..... well now you now have the ability to charge your phone or I pad or I pod  as GENX PWR is here for you!

 Have you had one of the portable power chargers that only had enough power to charge your device once and then you had to plug it in to charge before you could use it again? But what if you need to charge your device more then once? Then What? ... What if you had a device that would charge your device several times before it needed to be recharged but then could  recharge itself with no outlet needed?!

With GENX PWR you always have the power you need for whatever you need powered. With 13800 MAH of true storage power, 2 usb ports, Light weight at only about 9oz and only about 6 and 1/4 inches long 4 inches wide and   3/4ths of an inch thick
column2: With Built in Solar charging you will never be without power and GENX PWR  fits in your pocket. Plus it only takes from 2 to 4 hours to fully charge in a strong sunlight.

column1: WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU AND WHAT WILL WILL DO WITH THE FUNDS WE RAISE:

The funds we raise here will be used to manufacture GENX PWR and order in bulk as well as advertising in other publications and build our web site for GENX PWR as well as companion products that can be used with GENX PWR such as LED Lighting, fans, and other devices to make your life easier!!

We Need you now to get this project off the ground and get this awesome product to the masses. We need you to help in any way you can even if it is to just tell all your friends.  Please help us now and in advance Thank You...Oh and as a special Thank you to everyone who contribute to this campaign once we reach our goal we will also in addition to the perks listed send everyone a $5.00 gift certificate that can be redemed at our web site once we get it upand running and published.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not help please tell all your friends about us and in advance Thank You

Specifications of the this TFT are:

        Touch Screen:                capacitive
        Display construction:    800 * 480 dots
        Display Color:                  Multicolor, 24 bits colors
        Display Frame rate:       60 fps
        TFT interface:                 24 bits RGB888 parallel interface

All instructions and support for CubieScreen can be found at:
ybmaker.org

Is your tablet dying to get out of your home or office...

A growing number of client requests combined with my market research suggested that there needs to be a better way of carrying your tablet to and from work, on holidays, or just a day trip. You can now own the first case to provide light mobility, full coverage, and protection with some style for your tablet, cell phone, and other hand held devices with the accessories that support them.

""Typically, bags currently on the market provide minimal protection
for the laptop or tablet or if adequate protection is provided it makes the bag
thick, heavy and bulky, the Fox Case Co. case offered improved protection for my laptop or tablet while maintaining their lightweight, slim design which was a
welcomed innovation.""  Larry Glauser - President OMPC

My focus is to make life a bit easier for all of us...that focus went into every aspect of the case design from the external and internal pockets, to the wheeled luggage strap, and to the weight of the case. I have kept my cases as light as possible with a small to large range from less than 1 pound to just over 2 pounds.

Take your cell phone, other handheld devices, and the accessories to support them along with you in one clean simple case. Individual pockets for all the extras that you need to take along. The back pocket in the large case is sized for legal file folders and letter file folders in the medium case.
I have chosen high quality, durable, and stylish hardware to ensure my cases stand the test of time. From metal zipper tabs to metal D rings and snap hooks.

""I enjoy style and color with pop and Greg’s red faux leather case matched my mini tablet cover perfectly and provided full coverage and protection, that my cover doesn’t, along with extra space for my cell and accessories…not to mention my lip gloss and…

On the sales side there is no question Greg’s cases will fill a need. I recently had to settle for a less than perfect product for a client that needed a large tablet case. I would love to present Greg’s cases to them.
Congratulations Greg all those years helping to make our clients life easier has brought you here.
Hurry up and get these cases to market.
Best wishes for continued success.""
Sandy Halstead - Account Manager/Business Solutions Advisor
16 years Office Products Industry sales experience

""For me personally Greg’s small case will eliminate the need to carry a bulky back pack on trips and holidays to house any number of carryon items, along with tickets, passports and of course my tablet with accessories. I really enjoyed the spacious exterior pockets on the canvas case.
From my office product industry perspective Greg’s cases fill a very obvious void and provide a high quality solution that I would recommend to my clients with the utmost confidence.
Congrats Greg you have a created a tremendous product.
Kelly Metz - Key Account Manager/Business Solutions Advisor (Retired)           24 years Office Products Industry sales experience

I recently had the opportunity to test some of the new Fox Case Co.
tablet and laptop cases and was very pleased with the newly designed travel
cases. I found them to be of high quality construction with superior hardware and
zippers, they offered more than adequate storage for all of my travel case
requirements in a slim, lightweight case which was a nice change from my current
laptop bag. Typically, bags currently on the market provide minimal protection
for the laptop or tablet or if adequate protection is provided it makes the bag
thick, heavy and bulky, the Fox Case Co. case offered improved protection for my
laptop or tablet while maintaining their lightweight, slim design which was a
welcomed innovation.

The designer colors were a big hit with our female associates and
I heard comments like ""with the Fox Case Co. tablet case I can eliminate my
purse when I travel and have everything I need in one case…..finally!""

We will be supplying a Fox Case Co. case to all of our Associates as
soon as they become available!""

“I was really impressed with just how spacious the case is. I was easily able to carry my laptop, tablet, cords, mouse, blackberry and portfolio! It was great. The case is very light weight and easy to maneuver with. The way that it opens makes accessing
and finding things much easier than conventional “zipper” cases. Esthetically I
think the design is fabulous. It looks really classy and contemporary!  I
also love the logo. I think offering it in different colors is a great idea.""
Alyssa Daku, MPA, CIPP/C - Director Information Governance - EHealth Saskatchewan

""The Fox Case Co. case that I used is ergonomically smart and functional. Having gone through a number of briefcases, I always look at how practical a case will be to carry around my things moving around from meeting to meeting. It is lightweight and not bulky and it seems to be able to handle the wear and tear of my hectic lifestyle.

With design clearly in mind, the compartments inside allow you to open your case in a meeting and not be embarrassed by what may be floating around, at least for me. The concealed storage compartments inside neatly tucks away all of your loose items. This allows you to know exactly where everything is (Phone, lip chap, pens, papers, flash drive, etc.).
My engineer boyfriend has used my case and said it was very durable and he was very impressed with how accessible the zippers and compartments were.
Overall, happy with the case and have trust in the brand.
Choose the case to meet your needs for size and style...

The large case will protect up to 13.3"" display size for tablets or thin laptops and ultra books. The device pocket is 10"" x 15"" x .75"". The medium Case will protect up to 11.6"" display size with attached folio/keyboard. The device pocket is 9"" x 13"" x .75"". The small case is great for mini-tablets up to a full sized Ipad. The device pocket is 7"" x 11"" x.75""
Please include your email address on your order so we may contact you to ensure you get your choice of exterior color. We will be in touch!!
Deep grain faux leather in red, white, or black with black cotton twill lining.
Cotton duck canvas in black with beige cotton twill lining or natural with black cotton twill lining.
Super tough 600D Poly/Nylon in black with red vinyl lining.
Your support will provide the infrastructure to move forward...
Logistics - We will need a small warehouse and an infrastructure for shipping &
Inventory- In addition to your perks we will need some stock for future orders
Admin Support - Candace and I are mighty but may need some help
Sales Support - Someone has to provide immediate information and the ultimate in customer service
Web Support - The website has to be functionally fantastic

Thanks for taking the time to look at my campaign. If my cases are not for you please tell your friends that may need a good case for their travels. We have lots of ways to share the campaign.... see the social media links.
Thank you so much for your consideration.

To add shipping use the option Contribute Now. Add 15.00 Canada, 20.00 USA and, 60.00 International. There are some rural or distant locations, like Alaska, that may require additional shipping charges. It is our intention to keep this cost as low as possible, however, we may need to contact you with this information. Please don't hesitate to drop me a note if you have questions greg@foxcaseco.com

Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is of the highest priority as it is to our manufacturing partners. One year warranty from date of delivery. Please contact me personally greg@foxcaseco.com should you have questions.
Contact us at anytime should you have any questions. We will get back to you promptly.  Info@foxcaseco.com
Special thanks to those people and companies that have worked very hard to get us to this launch point and continue to provide exceptional professional support.

Not only is this computer case novel, it's very functional.  This E-ATX computer case will be capable of handling any size motherboard, and any combination of a myriad of components.  The ""wings"" of the computer case will be capable of flipping out, enabling the computer to turn on its side.  You can attach a monitor to it, allowing the computer to be an all-in-one, or you can carry it on your back like a back pack.

We already have the computer case designed.  We are selecting an American-based manufacturer, and as soon as we have enough funds commited to this project we will be developing a prototype, then a production run of 50 computer cases.
We have several gifts to offer you in exchange for your support.  From a t-shirt to this limited edition computer case, there are lots gifts to choose from!

Stealth Machines https://www.stealthmachines.com has been manufacturing customer gaming computers since 2004.  Our customer satisfaction is the highest in the industry.  We've never really been able to call ourselves a unique company, however.  That's because we have to use other people's cases to build our computers.  That's all going to change when we release the NightHawk.  The NightHawk represents eight years of hard work.

We need all the help we can get!  You can help us the most buy donating on this page, especially if you pre-order the computer case.  Other ways to help include sharing this page and our website ( https://www.stealthmachines.com ) on your Facebook page.  Thank you so much for your support!

Not only is this computer case novel, it's very functional.  This E-ATX computer case will be capable of handling any size motherboard, and any combination of a myriad of components.  The ""wings"" of the computer case will be capable of flipping out, enabling the computer to turn on its side.  You can attach a monitor to it, allowing the computer to be an all-in-one, or you can carry it on your back like a back pack.
What We Need & What You Get

We already have the computer case designed.  We are selecting an American-based manufacturer, and as soon as we have enough funds commited to this project we will be developing a prototype, then a production run of 50 computer cases.
We have several gifts to offer you in exchange for your support.  From a t-shirt to this limited edition computer case, there are lots gifts to choose from!

Stealth Machines https://www.stealthmachines.com has been manufacturing customer gaming computers since 2004.  Our customer satisfaction is the highest in the industry.  We've never really been able to call ourselves a unique company, however.  That's because we have to use other people's cases to build our computers.  That's all going to change when we release the NightHawk.  The NightHawk represents eight years of hard work.

We need all the help we can get!  You can help us the most buy donating on this page, especially if you pre-order the computer case.  Other ways to help include sharing this page and our website ( https://www.stealthmachines.com ) on your Facebook page.  Thank you so much for your support!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >People who don't want conservative speech on the internet have been running a campaign of legal harassment against us for eight years and counting.
>When ""human rights"" suits were not successful, they have turned to copyright and defamation suits.
>Please visit our archives containing the history of this campaign against us so far, including detailed documentation.

>This year Free Dominion, and we as individuals, must struggle with three trials. The precedents set in those trials will make or break the freedom of speech and open discourse on issues on the internet. We will be fighting:
>against Richard Warman and the National Post over whether quotes from a news article can be posted without violating copyright.
>the assertion by Warman and the NP that internet posts should not be subject to the same civil litigation time limitations that apply to publications in other media.
> the Baglow defamation case, which is important because the court asked us to  bring in expert witnesses to educate them on how defamation law should be applied to the internet.

>Finally, the long-awaited defamation case Warman vs. Free Dominion and John Does next September. The jury trial is set to last three weeks. We will incur many expenses including flying David Icke from the UK to address the truth of the allegations of Richard Warman’s campaign against him.
>There is a lot riding on these court cases

>The outcomes will have profound effects on anyone using the Internet or engaged in the new media whether as a forum participant, blogger, site operator, news aggregator or an e-mail forums operator. Many other institutions and people are involved - schools, universities, libraries, teachers, students, researchers and anyone else who uses the internet to access information and articles for use in their discipline.
>Good decisions will mean the end of frivolous defamation suits and relief from the “libel chill” that has stifled discussion on blogs and forums over the past several years.

>We are eagerly anticipating a full trial on all of the issues of Richard Warman’s reputation in front of a jury of our peers. Since he has sued or threatened to sue over eighty people for discussing these issues, a ruling in our favour will be extremely important to our freedom of political discourse and speech.
>This year will cost us tens of thousands of dollars, but we are confident that we can represent your interests in court and we can win! This will be our most expensive year to date.

column3: >Our lawfare opponents have been bragging that we will not be able to raise enough money to get these cases to trial.

column2: >We think that they are wrong about our support and further, that they are afraid that their legal actions will not stand up in a court of law.

>
Please help us by donating what you are able and, even if you can't donate, please pass this around to everyone you know who has an interest in issues of internet freedom.

>
If you have any ideas for increasing our reach, we would love to hear from you! E-mail defence@freedominion.ca.

column3: >PS If you prefer to pay by cheque, you can make it out to ""FD Internet Defence Fund"" and mail it to:
>Connie Fournier 2000 Unity Rd. Elginburg, ON  K0H 1M0
>Or, at any CIBC Branch, you can make a deposit to Transit: 05342 Acct: 2611635
>We can also accept Interac Emali Money Transfers at defence@freedominion.ca.
>All of these donations will be added to the Indiegogo campaign site so we can watch the total rise together!

column1: ","People who don't want conservative speech on the internet have been running a campaign of legal harassment against us for eight years and counting.
When ""human rights"" suits were not successful, they have turned to copyright and defamation suits.
Please visit our archives containing the history of this campaign against us so far, including detailed documentation.

This year Free Dominion, and we as individuals, must struggle with three trials. The precedents set in those trials will make or break the freedom of speech and open discourse on issues on the internet. We will be fighting:
against Richard Warman and the National Post over whether quotes from a news article can be posted without violating copyright.
the assertion by Warman and the NP that internet posts should not be subject to the same civil litigation time limitations that apply to publications in other media.
the Baglow defamation case, which is important because the court asked us to  bring in expert witnesses to educate them on how defamation law should be applied to the internet.

Finally, the long-awaited defamation case Warman vs. Free Dominion and John Does next September. The jury trial is set to last three weeks. We will incur many expenses including flying David Icke from the UK to address the truth of the allegations of Richard Warman’s campaign against him.
There is a lot riding on these court cases

The outcomes will have profound effects on anyone using the Internet or engaged in the new media whether as a forum participant, blogger, site operator, news aggregator or an e-mail forums operator. Many other institutions and people are involved - schools, universities, libraries, teachers, students, researchers and anyone else who uses the internet to access information and articles for use in their discipline.
Good decisions will mean the end of frivolous defamation suits and relief from the “libel chill” that has stifled discussion on blogs and forums over the past several years.

We are eagerly anticipating a full trial on all of the issues of Richard Warman’s reputation in front of a jury of our peers. Since he has sued or threatened to sue over eighty people for discussing these issues, a ruling in our favour will be extremely important to our freedom of political discourse and speech.
How you can join the fight
This year will cost us tens of thousands of dollars, but we are confident that we can represent your interests in court and we can win! This will be our most expensive year to date.
Our lawfare opponents have been bragging that we will not be able to raise enough money to get these cases to trial.
We think that they are wrong about our support and further, that they are afraid that their legal actions will not stand up in a court of law.
Please help us by donating what you are able and, even if you can't donate, please pass this around to everyone you know who has an interest in issues of internet freedom.
If you have any ideas for increasing our reach, we would love to hear from you! E-mail defence@freedominion.ca.
PS If you prefer to pay by cheque, you can make it out to ""FD Internet Defence Fund"" and mail it to:
Connie Fournier 2000 Unity Rd. Elginburg, ON  K0H 1M0
Or, at any CIBC Branch, you can make a deposit to Transit: 05342 Acct: 2611635
We can also accept Interac Emali Money Transfers at defence@freedominion.ca.
All of these donations will be added to the Indiegogo campaign site so we can watch the total rise together!",0.0,0,"5 Campaigns

column3: >Hello everyone. My name is Sergiu and my campaign is about important dates in everybody's life.

>Remembering someone's birthday or anniversary is a very polite thing to do, especially when it comes to friends and family. Birthday Lab (still working on the name) is an application which will remind you of your birthdays and things you can/usually forget. It will work on your computer, your smartphone or tablet, can be installed on your web server to send notifications by email or SMS and synchronize data between them.

>This is going to be a great pack of “forget-me-not” applications running on any platform and extremely useful for busy people, old people, people who forget, people who don't want to bother their mind with additional information, companies which want to automatically congratulate their customers by email, but also for people who just want to manage their life events in an easier way. I invite you to read below and find out more about this set of applications.
>Did you ever forget the birthday of your mother (father, sister, aunt, etc.)?

column4: >Did you ever forget the wedding anniversary or the first meeting date with your soul mate?
>Did you ever forget to pay the debt to the bank for previous months?
>Did you ever forget to pass technical inspection of the car and now you get a penalty?
>Did you ever forget to make the annual consultations at the dentist?

column3: >Human brain tends to forget things (sometimes this process is even beneficial), but what to do with those things you don't need to keep in mind right now, but will need them later?

>As a solution I got the idea of making a universal application that will run on any device that is used in the everyday life and will help people to manage the birthdays, anniversaries and important events. If you answered YES to any of the questions above, then this application is for you too.

>There are a lot of similar applications out there, but Birthday Lab will be the best option because there is no universal and cross-platform application which runs on any device you use. It will be easy to use by everybody and you will be always informed no matter where you are.

>This app can be used as birthday and anniversary reminder tool for you and your family, as an appointment internal service for a company or as reminder tool for a community members. People will be able to use our dedicated server to store their contacts and set up reminders or will be able to install the web application on their personal server to use it privately.

>I developed my first similar application back in 2007, when I made a Desktop application designed to remind people of their birthdays. About 2 years ago I launched a Web-based application that sends an email to the people with important information they don't want to forget. However as the application grows, people are sending letters demanding more features and some of the requirements that would be useful need time and investment. Unfortunately, at the moment the development can be done only in my free time that's why the progress is slow, but if the project will be successfully funded I will be able to devote all my time to the application development.

>As I previously said at the moment we have already made a basic version of the Desktop Application, which can be downloaded at: http://www.ss-birthdayreminder.com. Unfortunately, this application version is not free and it doesn't include many features that need to be integrated. But based on the existing code will be written a new application that will be free and open source.
>Even though it's still a light app, it was featured on popular websites like: Quixey, FindMySoft, CNET Download, Brothersoft, Softpedia, Softonic, Download 3000, Windows 7 Download and others.

>Also a basic version of the Web Application is available at http://www.birthdaylab.com which is free for all users, but unfortunately it doesn't contain all the advantages that need to be integrated, such as SMS notifications, notifications sharing, automatic sending of congratulation emails, birthday wishes list, and much more. It's going to be a very complex and feature rich application.
>This app was mentioned too on popular websites like: MakeUseOf, MadrasGeek, Quixey, CNET Download and others.
>In the end, this application will be a pack of other 3 applications:

column4: ><em><span>Desktop version. This version will be a handy application that will allow you to store people's birthdays in a sort of database and inform you of upcoming events a few days in advance. The program comes with two tools: Birthday Manager and Checker. The manager is where you store people's data, including as much information as you want
column5: and the checker is the one that informs you of upcoming birthdays displaying a little message from the system tray. You can customize the visible fields and have the ability to generate reports on the latest birthdays whenever you want.

column4: >In addition to this, the program features a nice and intuitive user interface that anyone can use. So if you don't have such a good memory and are always disappointing people because you never remember their birthdays, this is going to be a useful tool for you to have. Desktop version will be available for the following platforms: Windows, Linux and MacOS.

>Web version. This application will run on a web server and will send alerts via email and/or SMS to users, who will be able to manage the birthdays, anniversaries and events from the web interface and a cronjob which will run every hour will send notifications in the respective day at the desired hour, depending on the user's time zone.

column3: >These notifications can be shared with others, for example, wives will be able to share with their husbands the anniversaries that they always forget. In addition, this application will allow you to automatically send congrats using predefined templates, feature to be used by companies or individuals that would like to congratulate their customers automatically. The application will be nice-looking on mobile devices screens and easy to use at the same.

column4: >Mobile version. The app will work on your smartphone or tablet, thus you will be able to manage your important dates or sync them with those added in Desktop or Web version. You will get an internal notification directly on your phone no matter where you are, so you will be informed all the time. At the beginning we're planning to have support for iPhone and Android devices, but we plan to add support for other devices too in the near future.

>This set of applications will synchronize data online using a common database, allowing users to easily transfer the data from one application to another, keeping them up to date. Below you can find a visual diagram for a better understanding of how it will work:

column3: >Immediately after the successful funding we'll begin the work on the development in the following order:

>The total development process will take about 6 months and it will involve one designer, a developer and a tester to accomplish this. The amount necessary to complete this pack of applications is estimated at about 48,000 dollars. Each application will require the following amounts:

column4: >Desktop version [support on Windows, Linux and MacOS] – 9k USD
>Mobile version [support on Apple devices + Android] – 21k USD

>Even though the Desktop and Mobile versions will be able to run standalone, the Web version and synchronization feature will require a host server to be able to run. After we release the open source code, we will provide a paid hosted service to make it easy for people who want to use the web version and sync feature, but don’t want to deal with the wag of setting the server up. We will make it easy to export your data so if you decide to install the server on your host you are free to do so at anytime.

>Our goal is for everyone to be able to use the web version and sync feature and we think offering this service will be helpful to non-tech users who want to use them without setting up a host for this.

column3: >This is a massive project and like every software development project, careful planning and great development skills are needed. I have spent years on developing applications and also I have dedicated a lot of time in developing of similar applications before. Now I need some time and your help to make one big and multi-platform application. With your support we will deliver the biggest reminder kit of open source applications running on any platform and helping people to not forget birthdays and events.

column4:
>Thank You Very Much For Your Support.

","What's this campaign about?

column1: Hello everyone. My name is Sergiu and my campaign is about important dates in everybody's life.

Remembering someone's birthday or anniversary is a very polite thing to do, especially when it comes to friends and family. Birthday Lab (still working on the name) is an application which will remind you of your birthdays and things you can/usually forget. It will work on your computer, your smartphone or tablet, can be installed on your web server to send notifications by email or SMS and synchronize data between them.

This is going to be a great pack of “forget-me-not” applications running on any platform and extremely useful for busy people, old people, people who forget, people who don't want to bother their mind with additional information, companies which want to automatically congratulate their customers by email, but also for people who just want to manage their life events in an easier way. I invite you to read below and find out more about this set of applications.
Did you ever forget the birthday of your mother (father, sister, aunt, etc.)?
Did you ever forget the wedding anniversary or the first meeting date with your soul mate?
Did you ever forget to pay the debt to the bank for previous months?
Did you ever forget to pass technical inspection of the car and now you get a penalty?
Did you ever forget to make the annual consultations at the dentist?
Human brain tends to forget things (sometimes this process is even beneficial), but what to do with those things you don't need to keep in mind right now, but will need them later?

As a solution I got the idea of making a universal application that will run on any device that is used in the everyday life and will help people to manage the birthdays, anniversaries and important events. If you answered YES to any of the questions above, then this application is for you too.

There are a lot of similar applications out there, but Birthday Lab will be the best option because there is no universal and cross-platform application which runs on any device you use. It will be easy to use by everybody and you will be always informed no matter where you are.

This app can be used as birthday and anniversary reminder tool for you and your family, as an appointment internal service for a company or as reminder tool for a community members. People will be able to use our dedicated server to store their contacts and set up reminders or will be able to install the web application on their personal server to use it privately.
What we have at the moment?

I developed my first similar application back in 2007, when I made a Desktop application designed to remind people of their birthdays. About 2 years ago I launched a Web-based application that sends an email to the people with important information they don't want to forget. However as the application grows, people are sending letters demanding more features and some of the requirements that would be useful need time and investment. Unfortunately, at the moment the development can be done only in my free time that's why the progress is slow, but if the project will be successfully funded I will be able to devote all my time to the application development.

As I previously said at the moment we have already made a basic version of the Desktop Application, which can be downloaded at: http://www.ss-birthdayreminder.com. Unfortunately, this application version is not free and it doesn't include many features that need to be integrated. But based on the existing code will be written a new application that will be free and open source.
Even though it's still a light app, it was featured on popular websites like: Quixey, FindMySoft, CNET Download, Brothersoft, Softpedia, Softonic, Download 3000, Windows 7 Download and others.

Also a basic version of the Web Application is available at http://www.birthdaylab.com which is free for all users, but unfortunately it doesn't contain all the advantages that need to be integrated, such as SMS notifications, notifications sharing, automatic sending of congratulation emails, birthday wishes list, and much more. It's going to be a very complex and feature rich application.
This app was mentioned too on popular websites like: MakeUseOf, MadrasGeek, Quixey, CNET Download and others.
What we'll do in the end?
In the end, this application will be a pack of other 3 applications:

Desktop version. This version will be a handy application that will allow you to store people's birthdays in a sort of database and inform you of upcoming events a few days in advance. The program comes with two tools: Birthday Manager and Checker. The manager is where you store people's data, including as much information as you want
column2: and the checker is the one that informs you of upcoming birthdays displaying a little message from the system tray. You can customize the visible fields and have the ability to generate reports on the latest birthdays whenever you want.

column1: In addition to this, the program features a nice and intuitive user interface that anyone can use. So if you don't have such a good memory and are always disappointing people because you never remember their birthdays, this is going to be a useful tool for you to have. Desktop version will be available for the following platforms: Windows, Linux and MacOS.

Web version. This application will run on a web server and will send alerts via email and/or SMS to users, who will be able to manage the birthdays, anniversaries and events from the web interface and a cronjob which will run every hour will send notifications in the respective day at the desired hour, depending on the user's time zone.

These notifications can be shared with others, for example, wives will be able to share with their husbands the anniversaries that they always forget. In addition, this application will allow you to automatically send congrats using predefined templates, feature to be used by companies or individuals that would like to congratulate their customers automatically. The application will be nice-looking on mobile devices screens and easy to use at the same.

Mobile version. The app will work on your smartphone or tablet, thus you will be able to manage your important dates or sync them with those added in Desktop or Web version. You will get an internal notification directly on your phone no matter where you are, so you will be informed all the time. At the beginning we're planning to have support for iPhone and Android devices, but we plan to add support for other devices too in the near future.

This set of applications will synchronize data online using a common database, allowing users to easily transfer the data from one application to another, keeping them up to date. Below you can find a visual diagram for a better understanding of how it will work:
Immediately after the successful funding we'll begin the work on the development in the following order:
June – July = PC application development and pre-release
July – September = Web application development and pre-release
September – November = Mobile application development and pre-release
December = Final testing and final release

The total development process will take about 6 months and it will involve one designer, a developer and a tester to accomplish this. The amount necessary to complete this pack of applications is estimated at about 48,000 dollars. Each application will require the following amounts:
Desktop version [support on Windows, Linux and MacOS] – 9k USD
Mobile version [support on Apple devices + Android] – 21k USD

Even though the Desktop and Mobile versions will be able to run standalone, the Web version and synchronization feature will require a host server to be able to run. After we release the open source code, we will provide a paid hosted service to make it easy for people who want to use the web version and sync feature, but don’t want to deal with the wag of setting the server up. We will make it easy to export your data so if you decide to install the server on your host you are free to do so at anytime.

Our goal is for everyone to be able to use the web version and sync feature and we think offering this service will be helpful to non-tech users who want to use them without setting up a host for this.
What are the risks and challenges?

This is a massive project and like every software development project, careful planning and great development skills are needed. I have spent years on developing applications and also I have dedicated a lot of time in developing of similar applications before. Now I need some time and your help to make one big and multi-platform application. With your support we will deliver the biggest reminder kit of open source applications running on any platform and helping people to not forget birthdays and events.
Thank You Very Much For Your Support.",6.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: The project is incredibly important for us, as we firmly believe it’s an
opportunity to change the world for the better. In a world where so many
negative things are reported as news each day we want to bring more positivity
and happy emotions to peoples lives.
We created Avimoto because we enjoy seeing people smile!
Since we are working with a talented team of professionals who need
financial support, we decide to embrace the Indiegogo community to obtain
funding for development, to deploy the software on powerful servers and to
Then, shortly after launch in November-December 2013, we will push out free
mobile apps that add our desktop integration to mobile as well.
Furthermore, we'll be adding features by the day, and we will be providing
guaranteed user support 24 hours a day.
We’ve set a crowdfunding target because we want to move Avimoto forward. We
know our goals, specific needs and deadlines. We just need to meet the
We have tried to anticipate your questions
Any user will be able to upload, via the Web platform www.avimoto.com, their own captured
videos and photos. From that point our artificial intelligence mechanism
“AVIMOTO” will automatically analyze the video stream, recognize individual
items, edit, add sound and special effects, automatically remove noise,
stabilize the image and present the user with a completely finished video.
In the beginning it will be in Russian and English, and then within the
first year we will be adding Spanish and Chinese. To the extent that we'll have
achieved success in those markets, we'll then promote the site in the languages
in which we see potential interest and desire for our service.
Why will Internet users desire to purchase Avimoto services?
1. Entertainment. Users will have the ability to make a video, quickly and
affordably, without any special video editing knowledge and they will be able
to do so automatically, and then instantly upload it on the Internet and share it
2. Hobbies. With our Web service, videographers and amateur photographers
will be able to “breathe life” into their wonderful content.
3. Tourists. Millions of people make videos while travelling. Watching an
entire video of a vacation can become quite boring sometimes. The task of
Avimoto is to perfectly arrange content, leaving only the most interesting,
4. Holidays. Weddings. Birthdays ... How many tapes and CDs of captured
content are gathering dust on your shelves? Our technology reanimates these
wonderful memories and gives them a new feeling and personality!
5. Creative individuals. Future artists. You have a song, but you can’t
afford to make a video? All you’ll need to do is simply upload your sound and
your videos to our web service platform, and let Avimoto Intelligence do the
6. Business. The creation and production of a professional promotional
video clip can cost your company anywhere between 5 to 100 thousand dollars.
Our service offers professional automatic video editing for a monthly corporate
fee of $120 per month. Thereby saving your company  thousands of dollars per year.
Our future plans include gaining access to the global market through:
Development of the B2B model. Development of new tools for small, medium
and large businesses to create their own original content (automatic creation
of commercials, demo movies, etc). New additional types of monetization.
Development of B2C model. Development of new applications for connected TV
for video conferences with the ability to record online and to apply automatic
