Rodion S. - Partner, Senior software developer. Participated in
development and implementation of IT projects valued at different estimated levels
Within the past 12 months, our team has been working on complex technological challenges to make our lives brighter, so that our memories can be colorful ones and some businesses can grow faster!
Create a commercials in fully automatic mode with Avimoto
The project is incredibly important for us, as we firmly believe it’s an
opportunity to change the world for the better. In a world where so many
negative things are reported as news each day we want to bring more positivity
and happy emotions to peoples lives.
We created Avimoto because we enjoy seeing people smile!
Since we are working with a talented team of professionals who need
financial support, we decide to embrace the Indiegogo community to obtain
funding for development, to deploy the software on powerful servers and to
Then, shortly after launch in November-December 2013, we will push out free
mobile apps that add our desktop integration to mobile as well.
Furthermore, we'll be adding features by the day, and we will be providing
guaranteed user support 24 hours a day.
We’ve set a crowdfunding target because we want to move Avimoto forward. We
know our goals, specific needs and deadlines. We just need to meet the
We have tried to anticipate your questions
Any user will be able to upload, via the Web platform www.avimoto.com, their own captured
videos and photos. From that point our artificial intelligence mechanism
“AVIMOTO” will automatically analyze the video stream, recognize individual
items, edit, add sound and special effects, automatically remove noise,
stabilize the image and present the user with a completely finished video.
In the beginning it will be in Russian and English, and then within the
first year we will be adding Spanish and Chinese. To the extent that we'll have
achieved success in those markets, we'll then promote the site in the languages
in which we see potential interest and desire for our service.
Why will Internet users desire to purchase Avimoto services?
1. Entertainment. Users will have the ability to make a video, quickly and
affordably, without any special video editing knowledge and they will be able
to do so automatically, and then instantly upload it on the Internet and share it
2. Hobbies. With our Web service, videographers and amateur photographers
will be able to “breathe life” into their wonderful content.
3. Tourists. Millions of people make videos while travelling. Watching an
entire video of a vacation can become quite boring sometimes. The task of
Avimoto is to perfectly arrange content, leaving only the most interesting,
4. Holidays. Weddings. Birthdays ... How many tapes and CDs of captured
content are gathering dust on your shelves? Our technology reanimates these
wonderful memories and gives them a new feeling and personality!
5. Creative individuals. Future artists. You have a song, but you can’t
afford to make a video? All you’ll need to do is simply upload your sound and
your videos to our web service platform, and let Avimoto Intelligence do the
6. Business. The creation and production of a professional promotional
video clip can cost your company anywhere between 5 to 100 thousand dollars.
Our service offers professional automatic video editing for a monthly corporate
fee of $120 per month. Thereby saving your company  thousands of dollars per year.
How do you see the future
Our future plans include gaining access to the global market through:
Development of the B2B model. Development of new tools for small, medium
and large businesses to create their own original content (automatic creation
of commercials, demo movies, etc). New additional types of monetization.
Development of B2C model. Development of new applications for connected TV
Webinars, video conferences (presentations). Development of applications
for video conferences with the ability to record online and to apply automatic
Content Exchange. Digital Content Web Exchange in the Framework of the
What benefits will IndieGoGo contributors receive?
We try to consider all serious and fair options to provide you with the ""perks""
that we offer when investing in Avimoto. If you have an interest in helping us
implement our fantastic technology, we are ready to discuss it. Just email us
at avi@avimoto.ru or call us at +7 351
We will be happy to reply to any other queries about Avimoto, our company,
and our goals. Just email us at avi@avimoto.ru
Thank you in advance for all your support and we kindly ask
that you share this PAGE on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus and other social

column3: > rate of £2!  This Includes shipping to the USA
>The 7Seg display for Raspberry Pi is a simple kit for

column1: people of all ages.  It serves well as
both an introduction to soldering, and an introduction to using the GPIO on the
Raspberry Pi.  It enables you to output
numbers to a display on top of your Pi, this could be used to display anything,
from the number of emails in your inbox, to using it as a digital dice.  The kit includes all of the components, and
the PCB (Circuit Board), necessary to communicate with and drive the 7Seg display.  It also has a small form factor, which fits

neatly across the bottom of the Raspberry Pi.  The displays will be available in green or red LEDs, which we will confirm in an email after the project's completion.  There will also be a good selection of  comprehensive tutorials
The idea first came about when I was thinking about a new
project.  I wanted to be able to display
my score from a game which I was playing on the Pi onto a 7-Seg display.  I started using a breadboard to do this, but I
soon ended up with a rather large setup.
The 7Seg for Raspberry Pi makes this amazingly simple and compact, so
anyone, no matter how inexperienced can easily and neatly output numbers to an
The 7Seg for Raspberry Pi has been designed from the ground
up to be accessible to people of all ages and abilities.  The kit uses high quility components, and uses gold plated PCBs to help make soldering easy.  All you need to get started is the kit, a
soldering iron, a length of solder, and a Raspberry Pi.
YES! This kit uses components suitable for anyone to solder.  Here are some suitable soldering irons:

Soldering Iron (Iron only)

Instructions

What Goes Where

We are currently working on a neat, and easy to follow instruction set.  This will be available on-line before you receive your kits.  These will guide you through the soldering process, and some example projects.  

Using 7Seg

The 7Seg should be compatible with any program on the Raspberry Pi which can access the GPIO.  This means you can use absolutely anything, from Scratch, to a simple script with a web interface.  Again, we will try to make as many mini tutorials as possible, but as with anything, we are sure that the community will come up with loads more ideas.  Please take a look at a few tutorials we already have up over at http://7seg.co.uk

Photos
The design uses the 40110 driver IC to simplify
has several jumpers, which under the recommended setup would be closed.  However, when removed, this enables the user
to change the GPIOs which control the display.
The design has evolved though several iterations, and we are currently
Despite its apparent simplicity, there are tons of uses for
something like the 7Seg.  Here are just
some of the ones which I have managed to think up:
After receipt of the money from Indiegogo, we hope to have
the circuit boards produced, and received in approximately 3 weeks.  During this time, I will order and receive the
individual components, which I will then package in preparation for the arrival
of the circuit boards.  Once all of the
parts have arrived, I will complete the packaging and send the 7Segs
Well, I am a 16 year old student, who is currently studying Further
Maths, Physics and Electronics at A-Level.
Out of school, I have been interested in electronics for many years, I
have many small projects and a few larger ones including the toroCam (http://torocam.com).  I have also backed many projects on other crowd
funding websites such as Kickstarter, which I think gives me a good insight

into what backers want, and how to keep everyone up to date.

Shipping

Free shipping within the UK is included on all reward levels.  Outside of the UK we are happy to accept other backers, however I would appreciate it if you would please contact me first, in order to arrange the potential extra surcharge for shipping.  In most cases I am sure this will be very small, and I will endeavour to help you!

Share It!

Please share the project with friends and family - the more people that know about it the better!
All £10, £12, and £20 rewards, worldwide shipping now available at a flat rate of £2!  This Includes shipping to the USA

Our campaign is end, you can still order CASE Remote on our official website:
www.CASERemote.com

column1: As many indiegogoers request, we are starting this follow-up campaign. The purpose of this campaign is to give many of you who missed out on the first one the chance to hop in, and to give original backers a way to add funds for shipping or choose additional perks. You can find our great successful campaign here, more than 400 backers supported us! This is our first round campaign video:

Now it is the last chance to enjoy the great deal of CASE. The new version of CASE has been greatly upgraded! Also, we changed the name of CASE to CASE Remote!!! We will only send CASE Remote Kit to all backers, do not worry.
However, we still feel not good to let all first round backers wait for Aug 30 delivering. We made a very very tough decision:

CASE Remote will be online sale in September after second round indiegogo campaign. There will be two types of products: CASE Remote basic package ($99 as promised) and CASE Remote kit package ($129). We decided to ship all backers in the two round indiegogo campaign with CASE Remote kit package. We hope this decision can make everyone's waiting worthwhile
CASE Remote is a solid product. We have demonstrated this with our prototype. We also finished most of mass production. So the risk of this campaign is very low.
Here is a demo of time lapse photography by CASE Remote:
Here is a demo of HDR photography by CASE Remote (more HDR photography results are in gallery)

column5:
>What are Others Talking about CASE

Glenn Buys, our first distributor who contributed $10,000 in the first round indiegogo campaign, has visited our team:
column10:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

""Here’s a neat idea aiming to bridge the gap between older generation technology and today’s ubiquitous touchscreen smartphones. CASE Remote is a wireless remote controller for DSLR cameras which links to an Android or iOS smartphone, allowing the camera kit to be controlled via a mobile app""

--- Tech Crunch

""CASE Remote: smartphone remote for your DSLR""---DP Review

""sometimes, lugging around and controlling that massive camera can be a pain in the neck, especially when you’re trying to get a rather difficult shot. CASE Remote wants to help solve that problem by turning your Android device into a wireless remote controller for your DSLR""---Android Community

""CASE Remote brings smartphone convenience to your DSLR""---Stuff

""Offering remote live view, touch focus, full control over camera settings, time-lapse photography and wireless file transfer
column11:
the new CASE is a 2""x2"" device that slots into your camera's hot-shoe.""---Photography Blog

As seen on

Be the First to Feel CASE Remote Only @ Indiegogo
column13:

Quick Review

With CASE Remote’s help, you can wirelessly control your DSLR from your mobile devices. Supported devices include iPad, iPhone and Android smart phones and tablets.

Compare

This is NOT the completed list! Please feel free to comment us or send email to us about your camera model.
column18:
>

Who Are We

Our team is a group of young and innovative people that hold the full patent rights to CASE Remote technology. We have won awards in the Liaoning Province Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition.  Our team features experts in different fields with international education background in the USA, Italy, and China.

Why Indiegogo

All of our team members love photography, and we want to make photography much easier. That’s why we create CASE Remote. We want to share this wonderful tool with all photographers, and make it as cheap as possible. Indiegogo community has supported so many great projects. Unlike many big companies, we don't have huge funds to invest. Thanks to our hard working technique developers, we have used the limited funds to finish this CASE prototype. However, we are running out of money and cannot massive produce CASE Remote for photographers. With more backers’ help, we can decrease the cost further and move faster to release CASE Remote. For this reason, we hope to build a popular campaign and spread this wonderful device all over the world.

Be the first to get a CASE Remote.

Start enjoying easy photography.

Your contribution will not only help us, but also decrease the price of CASE Remote to help all others who love this smart device.

Time Line

CASE Remote developing timeline:

Rewards
column20:
/>

Risks and Challenges

CASE Remote is a solid product. We have demonstrated this with our prototype. However, as with all crowd-funding campaigns, there are risks and challenges:

(a)  Fewer units sold 

We are confident with CASE Remote. CASE Remote campaign has been great successful in its first round. But as what we claimed, this project motivation is our interest. We did not plan to earn money from this campaign, we just want to promote our CASE brand. That's why we offer so great deal! And we will keep working on it to bring more fancy CASE series products to this community. We believe we will have better future. CASE Remote is a wonderful device for photographers, and Cheering Tech is a trustworthy team.

(b)  Supply and production

We have some resources here to support mass production. The production is almost done. We will try our best to make it happen as soon as possible.

(c)  Shipping

We cannot control what will happen during the delivery. We will choose trustworthy shipping company like UPS, FedEx, DHL etc. However, there is still no guarantee that this will work in your country (most country will be no problem). 

FAQ

Unfortunately，CASE Remote doesn't work stably with most of Sony and Panasonic cameras. We will continue to update FAQ

column1:
• What are the shipping costs?
    It is free shipping for China mainland, Hong kong, Taiwan, Macau. $15 for shipping outside China.

• When can I receive my CASE Remote?
    We will start to deliver CASE Remote on August 30, 2014 (Maybe earlier).  We will start deliver CASE Remote in September after the second batch fabrication. And you can download the IOS and Android CASE App on Apple Store and Google Play for free.

• Can I choose any other colors?
    Now we only provide black and white CASE Remote. We will provide more colors if a lot of supports request.

• Can I use multiple smart devices with my CASE Remote?
    Yes. One CASE can be controlled by multiple Android and IOS devices.

• Is the hot shoe adapter included in the CASE Remote Kit package?
    Yes, of course. A strap wire is also included, so you can choose different attach methods to attach CASE Remote to your camera.

• Does CASE support Sony and Panasonic cameras?
    Unfortunately，CASE Remote doesn't work stably with most of Sony and Panasonic cameras. Please check with us for more details.

• Is Canon's zoom feature in live view to pull critical focus?
    Of course, CASE Remote can provide zoom feature in live view mode, that's very important feature of CASE App.

• What's the difference between CASE and CASE Remote?
    CASE is the old name. We changed CASE name to CASE Remote. It is just a name change, nothing to do with the product development.

• What's the difference between CASE Remote basic package and CASE Remote kit package?
    CASE Remote basic package can only have one CASE Remote. There is no any accessories, like mini USB charge cable, hot shoe adapter, strap wire etc. But we will provide the accessory list for you to use CASE Remote, since most of people have some electronic devices with these standard accessories. However, CASE Remote kit can have all these accessories.
column2:
>
For any further information about CASE Remote or if you wish to talk to us, you can contact us at email

MADICE™ minimalist Camera and Watch, the world’s first SMART PAIR! Truly standalone, water resistant, GPS, 3G, 320x320 screen-resolution watch, voice-call, vibration alert, 13-megapixel camera and much more all in one pair. 



Fourteen years ago while residing at E 57th street NYC, Stone first heard of wearable devices and got very excited. He wanted to figure out a way to wear his Bondi blue iMac.

Ten years ago while residing in Rye NY, he registered MADICE.com with a clear goal in mind
column2:
to build a wearable MADICE.    

Since then, the world has come a long way. The iPhone was so beautifully designed, he thought “why don’t we wear them?”


In the world of Smartwatches, MADICE’s “live life to the fullest” attitude pushes its SMART PAIR to the extreme in terms of style and functions! As a result, MADICE Smart Pair becomes the world’s first pair of smartwatch and smartcamera that functions as a smartphone with better camera resolution of 13 megapixels, sharper screen resolution of 320x320, both have a faster high speed Quad-Core, 32GB/64GB, plus 3G network connections.



We believe that a smartwatch should have all the functionalities of a smartphone and also be a fashion statement. That’s why we created MADICE smartwatch. To push the limit of minimalism in design, we developed watch and camera separately. It turned out we created the first SMART PAIR in the world. Together, they become a statement of their own.

column1: • 3G cellular network connection: MADICE Smartwatch can control the smartcamera via globally 3G cellular networks.

• World’s 1st Smartwatch and Smartcamera with 32GB or 64GB on-board storage space: MADICE SMART PAIR has a combination of 64GB or 128GB on-board storage space, so you don’t need to expand the storage with a Micro SD card.
• IP67 Water and dust resistant: watertight seal for metal body, micro SIM card slot, side button.

<li><strong>Quad Core processor: powered with 1.3GHz QUAD Core to ensure a faster speed and a smoother operation for both users and developers. It can operate twice as fast as most smartwatchs with a dual-core processor on the market and bring you a high speed experience when running multiple apps simultaneously
column2: especially android games with 3D graphics visuals and virtual reality.

column1: • Standalone and Companion: MADICE SMART PAIR is designed to be used as a standalone watch and camera, however, you can choose to use MADICE SMART PAIR as a companion to any of your smartphones. Both Android and IOS Smartphone are supported.
• World’s first Smartcamera with 13 megapixels resolution to take 1080p HD videos and photos.

column3:
/>


Global 3G connection: MADICE has revolutionized the smartcamera becoming the world’s only camera on the market with a 3G network connection. You can use it anywhere as long as there are cellular signals. It can be used as your eyes to watch out for your loved ones when you worry about their safety. You can stay connected with family and friends globally via video-chat or place it indoors or outdoors unobtrusively to take photos and videos while controlling it with MADICE Smartwatch or any other (Bluetooth or WIFI) 3G network enabled smart devices. 

13-megapixel: MADICE Smartcamera is small in size but high in quality with 13-megapixel that can take 1080p HD photos and videos. You can share your memorable moments with your family and friends globally via cloud or any social networking apps. 

Control Multiple MADICE Smartcamers with smart devices


Wearable CAMERA POSSIBILITIES: We welcome developers to join us to create accessories such as mounts, casing and straps for the MADICE Smartcamera. 




MADICE Smartwatch is truly a smartphone on your wrist. Voice/call, text, social media messaging, golf app, tracking, built-in GPS, voice control, music player, calendar alerts, voice notes, and more. 



With built in GPS, MADICE Smartwatch can work more accurately with any rangefinder apps. Also, it’s shockproof.



MADICE Smartwatch has a 320x320 screen resolution for a high quality viewing experience. You can enjoy watching videos on your wrist better and smoother. With up to 64GB of storage, MADICE Smartwatch can store up to 15,000 songs. When used with a wireless headphone, you will have the best listening experience. 




Comparison Charts: A lot of people have asked us about the difference between MADICE SMART PAIR and other smartwatches on the market. So, we have come up with a diagram to show the difference. 



MADICE SMART PAIR is designed in New York by a team of innovative artists and designers led by MADICE creator and founder Stone, an artist, musician, multimedia and technology entrepreneur. As a passionate artist and perfectionist, Stone devoted his expertise, knowledge and lifetime experience to the making of MADICE.
column8:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

From day one, MADICE teams have a single goal
column9:
to create the most powerful and most visually striking and functioning device. Our design team in New York and our engineering team and testing firm in Shenzhen China worked together as one. We pushed each other’s limits and went through many different designs and physical shapes from conception to actual product until we reached the point of epiphany.

Led by Jacky Pu, a very experienced industrial designer and developer of smart wearable devices, the engineering team started testing key components and working on the mockups and prototypes. Then a professional testing firm that specialized in testing of all smartphones and smartwatches for major brands took over to do the testing. They tested material and components that are used in the MADICE SMART PAIR as well as the working prototypes that are used for such testing. Then, the smartwatch manufacturer that we’ve selected assembled everything together for us to make the working prototype that can be eventually used for mass production. We paid for mockups, tooling, testing procedures and all different kinds of functional engineering prototypes to make sure that the working prototype we finally got can be used for mass production.
column14:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

We come to Indiegogo out of our respect for its community where people get together to support original, artistic and innovative projects. Together we can change the world.

We are committed to building up MADICE as a brand with a vision. We have long term goals and want to achieve that vision one project at a time starting with MADICE SMART PAIR. MADICE Smart Pair is not just a smartwatch and camera, it becomes the personal statement the minute you put it on your wrist. In order to achieve the minimalist style, we use the best materials available for smart wearable devices such as sapphire glass and titanium casing. We went through so many rounds of design, component testing, software comparisons and material selection with only one single goal in mind
column15:
which is to make the best smartwatch and smartcamera on the market. We want something so original that all of us would feel proud to wear it on our wrists.

We currently have a working prototype of the MADICE SMART PAIR that works as shown. Within the smart pair, the circuit boards for Power and Bluetooth have been completed and installed. However, we need to meet volume order requirements for the touch screen. The manufacturing of MADICE SMART PAIR will become feasible and the cost becomes much less expensive when we meet volume order requirements for the components and materials.  We have several engineering prototypes that we’ve carefully refined and we’re nearly ready to begin mass production. This means all we need is to have a certain number of SMART PAIR spoken for before we can begin the process of manufacturing.

The prototypes currently work with our early stage beta app that allows us to test our prototypes and make sure they work correctly. The MADICE official app for both Android and IOS are currently in the preliminary stages of development.

Our manufacturing partner (BO DAO Electronic Ltd. Co.) is based in Shenzhen, China, and is able to produce all of our components in house. With over 15 years of experience manufacturing electronic home appliances for fortune 500 companies and nearly eight years manufacturing smart devices including smartphones and smartwatches, they are proficient at producing high volume orders quickly, so they will be able to make as many units as we need.

We named MADICE SMART PAIR with a double meaning: we all are smart pairs for each other, and together we can make smart decisions and choices in life. Please pledge your support regardless of the amount. We are thrilled to be on Indiegogo to present you with the best product we have ever invested in and invented with the best of our knowledge, experience and talents.




MADICE T-SHIRT &
column16:
SPORTS CAP

Special Thanks

We would love to thank our family, friends, and everyone who has contributed their valuable time and work to our journey. Their feedback, support, encouragement and positivity have been incredibly inspiring.

Tom Barnes, Nolan Kuan, Rongjin Xie, Lan Zhang, Fanhai Tao, Jing Zhou, Nicole Price Fasig, William Rong, Zhinan Wu, Frank Hsu, Kathy Hsu, Hong Molitor Xu, Jamie Dolce, Fong Block, Jenifer C Lee, Ling Da, Qing Tian, Zuming Lee and everyone else who’s helped out along the way, especially those final-cut pro geeks in the Apple Store at White Plains, Westchester County.

column1:
Risks and Challenges

We have been working on tech related hardware and software development over the last ten years. One year ago, we dedicated our life to the MADICE project.

We took the risk to invest with our own money and time in our invention with the determination that we’ll overcome any difficulties to bring MADICE SMART PAIR into reality.

Making a smartwatch or a smartcamera is relatively easy. The hardest part is to balance the elements of art, fashion and innovation. It took us eight months to get the final prototype of the SMART PAIR from our first concept drawing. We spent another three months to test the hardware and start building software. We did it all by ourselves without any third party financing.

We want to make the best product we would feel proud to use, so we've decided to use sapphire glass and titanium casing for the SMART PAIR as we planned. However, the supplier of the materials needs a minimum order. So we have to set up stretch goals. If we are able to raise $100,000 on Indiegogo, we will be able to make the SMART PAIR with the materials we love.

Our quality control will be uncompromised. Each component will be tested to make sure it functions perfectly to be allowed to be part of MADICE. So, there could be unforeseen issues such as delays in delivery because high-end parts are from different major channels of suppliers and there will be a lot of coordination between manufactures, suppliers, and delivery companies.

We understand the risks and we’re confident that with your support here, we can meet the challenges because we believe in community, we believe in innovation and we believe in Indiegogo.

FAQ
1. How long does the battery last with the display turned
MADICE SMART PAIR has a 600mAh battery with up to 100 hours standby time.
2. Is it always on or will we have to click the button for
Time display is always on, but for other functions such as
making  phone calls and surf the web, you
need to turn the button on. The button is located on the side of the watch
3. What’s the estimated call and standby times?
MADICE smart watch can function like a smartphone with
standby time that could lasts for about 2-3 days. The estimated call time is up to 10 hours.
4. What type of charging cable does it use?
MADICE SMRT PAIR uses USB charging cable with data and power
pins for now (provided), In the near future, we plan to adopt a mobile wireless charging

dock for charging convenience. 

5. Can this be used in place of a phone if you have a bluetooth headset? or do you still need a phone?

MADICE Smartwatch is a truly standalone device which is independent from a smartphone, so you don't need a phone to use it. MADICE smart watch is a smartphone on your wrist and you can use it as a phone with or without a bluetooth headset (of course, it's better to use with a bluetooth headset).
Q: Can I connect Smartcamera with home wifi
like as home security camera? If yes, how to use the Smartwatch at outside to
connect the Smart camera at home?
A: MADICE Smart camera not only can be
connected with home WIFI as home security camera, but you can connect up to 6
cameras to one smart device. Through MADICE app, you can connect MADICE smart
camera with your MADICE Smartphone via Bluetooth or WIFI or 3G.
Q: How can I remote control the Smartcamera
smartwatch are controlled through MADICE app via Bluetooth, Wifi and 3G. You
can also control the smartcamera using other smart devices via MADICE app.
Q: Smartcamera and Watch both have Wi-Fi

including international shipping?

A: $309 Early Bird Special doesn’t include international shipping. All you need
is to add $25 for international shipping.
Q: Can I download all of mobile apps at
Q: Is it possible add NFC function to connect with Watch and Camera
Pair does not have NFC function yet, but in the near future, we will consider
to include it in our products.
Q: How long is the battery life? Is it
A: The standby time for the battery is 8
hours if you use it as a Smartphone. If you only use it as a watch, the standby
time can last up to 100 hours. Yes, it’s rechargeable via USB cable that is
included in the package with MADICE SMART PAIR.

Please feel free to ask questions and we will add them to our list of FAQ as we go along. 

","MADICE™ minimalist Camera and Watch, the world’s first SMART PAIR! Truly standalone, water resistant, GPS, 3G, 320x320 screen-resolution watch, voice-call, vibration alert, 13-megapixel camera and much more all in one pair. Fourteen years ago while residing at E 57th street NYC, Stone first heard of wearable devices and got very excited. He wanted to figure out a way to wear his Bondi blue iMac.Ten years ago while residing in Rye NY, he registered MADICE.com with a clear goal in mind
column2: to build a wearable MADICE.    Since then, the world has come a long way. The iPhone was so beautifully designed, he thought “why don’t we wear them?”In the world of Smartwatches, MADICE’s “live life to the fullest” attitude pushes its SMART PAIR to the extreme in terms of style and functions! As a result, MADICE Smart Pair becomes the world’s first pair of smartwatch and smartcamera that functions as a smartphone with better camera resolution of 13 megapixels, sharper screen resolution of 320x320, both have a faster high speed Quad-Core, 32GB/64GB, plus 3G network connections.We believe that a smartwatch should have all the functionalities of a smartphone and also be a fashion statement. That’s why we created MADICE smartwatch. To push the limit of minimalism in design, we developed watch and camera separately. It turned out we created the first SMART PAIR in the world. Together, they become a statement of their own.

column1: 3G cellular network connection: MADICE Smartwatch can control the smartcamera via globally 3G cellular networks.

World’s 1st Smartwatch and Smartcamera with 32GB or 64GB on-board storage space: MADICE SMART PAIR has a combination of 64GB or 128GB on-board storage space, so you don’t need to expand the storage with a Micro SD card.
IP67 Water and dust resistant: watertight seal for metal body, micro SIM card slot, side button.

Quad Core processor: powered with 1.3GHz QUAD Core to ensure a faster speed and a smoother operation for both users and developers. It can operate twice as fast as most smartwatchs with a dual-core processor on the market and bring you a high speed experience when running multiple apps simultaneously
column2: especially android games with 3D graphics visuals and virtual reality.

column1: Standalone and Companion: MADICE SMART PAIR is designed to be used as a standalone watch and camera, however, you can choose to use MADICE SMART PAIR as a companion to any of your smartphones. Both Android and IOS Smartphone are supported.
World’s first Smartcamera with 13 megapixels resolution to take 1080p HD videos and photos.

Global 3G connection: MADICE has revolutionized the smartcamera becoming the world’s only camera on the market with a 3G network connection. You can use it anywhere as long as there are cellular signals. It can be used as your eyes to watch out for your loved ones when you worry about their safety. You can stay connected with family and friends globally via video-chat or place it indoors or outdoors unobtrusively to take photos and videos while controlling it with MADICE Smartwatch or any other (Bluetooth or WIFI) 3G network enabled smart devices. 13-megapixel: MADICE Smartcamera is small in size but high in quality with 13-megapixel that can take 1080p HD photos and videos. You can share your memorable moments with your family and friends globally via cloud or any social networking apps. Control Multiple MADICE Smartcamers with smart devicesWearable CAMERA POSSIBILITIES: We welcome developers to join us to create accessories such as mounts, casing and straps for the MADICE Smartcamera. MADICE Smartwatch is truly a smartphone on your wrist. Voice/call, text, social media messaging, golf app, tracking, built-in GPS, voice control, music player, calendar alerts, voice notes, and more. With built in GPS, MADICE Smartwatch can work more accurately with any rangefinder apps. Also, it’s shockproof.MADICE Smartwatch has a 320x320 screen resolution for a high quality viewing experience. You can enjoy watching videos on your wrist better and smoother. With up to 64GB of storage, MADICE Smartwatch can store up to 15,000 songs. When used with a wireless headphone, you will have the best listening experience. Comparison Charts: A lot of people have asked us about the difference between MADICE SMART PAIR and other smartwatches on the market. So, we have come up with a diagram to show the difference. MADICE SMART PAIR is designed in New York by a team of innovative artists and designers led by MADICE creator and founder Stone, an artist, musician, multimedia and technology entrepreneur. As a passionate artist and perfectionist, Stone devoted his expertise, knowledge and lifetime experience to the making of MADICE. From day one, MADICE teams have a single goal
column2: to create the most powerful and most visually striking and functioning device. Our design team in New York and our engineering team and testing firm in Shenzhen China worked together as one. We pushed each other’s limits and went through many different designs and physical shapes from conception to actual product until we reached the point of epiphany.Led by Jacky Pu, a very experienced industrial designer and developer of smart wearable devices, the engineering team started testing key components and working on the mockups and prototypes. Then a professional testing firm that specialized in testing of all smartphones and smartwatches for major brands took over to do the testing. They tested material and components that are used in the MADICE SMART PAIR as well as the working prototypes that are used for such testing. Then, the smartwatch manufacturer that we’ve selected assembled everything together for us to make the working prototype that can be eventually used for mass production. We paid for mockups, tooling, testing procedures and all different kinds of functional engineering prototypes to make sure that the working prototype we finally got can be used for mass production.  We come to Indiegogo out of our respect for its community where people get together to support original, artistic and innovative projects. Together we can change the world.We are committed to building up MADICE as a brand with a vision. We have long term goals and want to achieve that vision one project at a time starting with MADICE SMART PAIR. MADICE Smart Pair is not just a smartwatch and camera, it becomes the personal statement the minute you put it on your wrist. In order to achieve the minimalist style, we use the best materials available for smart wearable devices such as sapphire glass and titanium casing. We went through so many rounds of design, component testing, software comparisons and material selection with only one single goal in mind

column4: >Are you tired of your phone falling victim to broken charging ports?
>Constantly looking for a better way to manage, and charge your mobile device?
column7: >Are you over dealing with the tangled mess of all your charging needs?

column2: >Qi (pronounced ""Chee"") is an interface developed by the Wireless Power Consortium (WPC) for inductive electrical power transfer over distances of up to 4 cm (1.6 inches). The Qi system comprises a power transmission pad and a compatible receiver in a portable device. To use the system, the mobile device is placed on top of the power transmission pad, which charges it via electromagnetic induction.
>The Titan Qi Charger is compatible with the following devices:

>The Technology has caught mainstream appeal, and has been implemented in the design of new mobile devices since 2008. The WPC is pushing to have this standardized in all new developing mobile devices, with eventual ""Qi"" Hot-spots being incorporated into every day life, and around recognizable businesses.

column3: >Titan Qi wire-less charging units will pave the road throughout the world, in utilizing design, and reliability when harnessing the potential of this technology.
column4: >Do not be fooled by all of the other Qi charging stations out there, most manufactures on the market have not committed to ensuring quality and reliability into their products, while the Titan Qi Chargers are sure to be the most sleek, rugged, and functional units out there.

column2: >Just plug the wireless charging base in once and then drop and charge.It's simple to use so your devices stay charged and you skip the constant hassle of plugging and unplugging as well as the angst of running on empty. A clutter-free solution that eliminates the tangle of wires and helps keep devices organized.

>Simply place an enabled device on TITAN surface and power is transferred wire-less quickly and efficiently. Our charging system has the speed and intelligence consumers expect, and can charge phone fully in as little as 3 hours!! TITAN Qi senses when your device is fully charged and stops sending power so that it not only saves energy, but also protects the device from overcharging.

>When you place a device on TITAN wireless charging base, you will feel a slight magnetic attraction when the device gets close to Power Access Point. The pull will guide device into perfect position, everytime for optimal charging.
>The TITAN activation sound will be played when a device is properly positioned and charging begins.

>The TITAN wireless charging base has LED light indicator that will illuminate when it is properly connected with power supply. Once the device is placed onto the base and aligned properly, the glow will turn brighter to show charging state.
>Now, for those who are constantly on the go, and need the convenience of wireless charging.. We've got that covered too..

>

The car charger is the perfect solution, when the base dock can't be utilized. You're on the go, constantly, why shouldn't you be able to have the same amazing wire-less charger in your car??
The TITAN Qi Car Charger also features a strong Magnet to hold your device in place while driving, without having to worry about it falling off during a bumpy ride!

>We are working very hard here at Titan Qi, and we need your help to make these incredible products available by August of 2014!
Please share this campaign with your family, friends, co-workers, neighbors, and the world! We want you to be apart of the future, today!

>Titan Qi Wire-less chargers are part of GURU electronics, and we've been busy trying to meet the needs of our consumers, we are dedicated to bringing quality, with out sacrificing the needs of reliability, and design. Become apart of history, as we step into the future.

column1: Are you tired of your phone falling victim to broken charging ports?
Constantly looking for a better way to manage, and charge your mobile device?Are you over dealing with the tangled mess of all your charging needs?The hassle ends here.

Qi (pronounced ""Chee"") is an interface developed by the Wireless Power Consortium (WPC) for inductive electrical power transfer over distances of up to 4 cm (1.6 inches). The Qi system comprises a power transmission pad and a compatible receiver in a portable device. To use the system, the mobile device is placed on top of the power transmission pad, which charges it via electromagnetic induction.
The Titan Qi Charger is compatible with the following devices:

The Technology has caught mainstream appeal, and has been implemented in the design of new mobile devices since 2008. The WPC is pushing to have this standardized in all new developing mobile devices, with eventual ""Qi"" Hot-spots being incorporated into every day life, and around recognizable businesses.

Titan Qi wire-less charging units will pave the road throughout the world, in utilizing design, and reliability when harnessing the potential of this technology.Do not be fooled by all of the other Qi charging stations out there, most manufactures on the market have not committed to ensuring quality and reliability into their products, while the Titan Qi Chargers are sure to be the most sleek, rugged, and functional units out there.

Just plug the wireless charging base in once and then drop and charge.It's simple to use so your devices stay charged and you skip the constant hassle of plugging and unplugging as well as the angst of running on empty. A clutter-free solution that eliminates the tangle of wires and helps keep devices organized.

Simply place an enabled device on TITAN surface and power is transferred wire-less quickly and efficiently. Our charging system has the speed and intelligence consumers expect, and can charge phone fully in as little as 3 hours!! TITAN Qi senses when your device is fully charged and stops sending power so that it not only saves energy, but also protects the device from overcharging.

FEELWhen you place a device on TITAN wireless charging base, you will feel a slight magnetic attraction when the device gets close to Power Access Point. The pull will guide device into perfect position, everytime for optimal charging.
The TITAN activation sound will be played when a device is properly positioned and charging begins.

The TITAN wireless charging base has LED light indicator that will illuminate when it is properly connected with power supply. Once the device is placed onto the base and aligned properly, the glow will turn brighter to show charging state.
Now, for those who are constantly on the go, and need the convenience of wireless charging.. We've got that covered too..

The car charger is the perfect solution, when the base dock can't be utilized. You're on the go, constantly, why shouldn't you be able to have the same amazing wire-less charger in your car??The TITAN Qi Car Charger also features a strong Magnet to hold your device in place while driving, without having to worry about it falling off during a bumpy ride!

We are working very hard here at Titan Qi, and we need your help to make these incredible products available by August of 2014!Please share this campaign with your family, friends, co-workers, neighbors, and the world! We want you to be apart of the future, today!

Titan Qi Wire-less chargers are part of GURU electronics, and we've been busy trying to meet the needs of our consumers, we are dedicated to bringing quality, with out sacrificing the needs of reliability, and design. Become apart of history, as we step into the future.",14.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: Earlier this year I started Voto Studios, a media production company, with my brother. Since then we have added more business partners into our team. One of us had an idea for a tablet stand in the round shape of a donut. We though it would be easy to market so we moved forward with the idea. This is my frist time taking part in the creation of a product like this. The work has been challenging because finding the right manufacture is tough work. The grooves in the Donut™ make it difficult to make. In the curing process we found that time and time again the model would deform and could not work as a practical stand. Luckily we have found great manufacturing partners here in Fresno that have put a lot of work into this product. With your help we can keep the Donut™ made here in the USA.
See more pics and our updates at: http://thevotoblog.com/category/the-donut/

","THE DONUT™: Making All Tablets Hands-Free

column1: The Donut™is an injected molded plastic model. This product took special tooling to create. Apart from being simple and easy to use it is undoubtably beautiful.
UPDATE: All international buyers please take note of our $8 shipping pledge. Thank you!
The Donut™ is a universal tablet stand that allows you to make you're tablets hands-free. It does not take up too much space, and when not in use looks beautiful in any environment.
The Donut™ on the road, or in the air.
The Donut™ holds your tablets horizontally or vertically and at three of angles.
With a diameter of only 4 inches the Donut™ fits snugly into any bag. Free your tablet wherever you go.
Asus - Nexus 7, VivoTab, Transformer, Tablet, Eee Tab

Earlier this year I started Voto Studios, a media production company, with my brother. Since then we have added more business partners into our team. One of us had an idea for a tablet stand in the round shape of a donut. We though it would be easy to market so we moved forward with the idea. This is my frist time taking part in the creation of a product like this. The work has been challenging because finding the right manufacture is tough work. The grooves in the Donut™ make it difficult to make. In the curing process we found that time and time again the model would deform and could not work as a practical stand. Luckily we have found great manufacturing partners here in Fresno that have put a lot of work into this product. With your help we can keep the Donut™ made here in the USA.
See more pics and our updates at: http://thevotoblog.com/category/the-donut/

Products touch our lives everyday. People are always coming across cool or just useful products at stores, in their homes, or out in the world. TrulyShare makes it easy to tell your friends products you love.

TrulyShare will help you quickly find the product online by taking an image and entering some text. Then we will find the best deal for you and give your friends deals for the product if they want to buy.
Launching a successful app is hard work. Here is how we are going to use the money:
• Hard-core iOS programming. High-powered algorithms to find products from images and on the web.

You can be involved in a project that, if successful, will change the way the world finds products. When TrulyShare is out, you and your friends can find the best deals and have stores begging you to come to their stores. Wouldn't it be nice to get something when you tell your friends about a product?

http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/trulyshare/id499885987

","TrulyShare - Share Product you Love

Products touch our lives everyday. People are always coming across cool or just useful products at stores, in their homes, or out in the world. TrulyShare makes it easy to tell your friends products you love.

TrulyShare will help you quickly find the product online by taking an image and entering some text. Then we will find the best deal for you and give your friends deals for the product if they want to buy.
Help us build & launch our iPhone app
Launching a successful app is hard work. Here is how we are going to use the money:
Hard-core iOS programming. High-powered algorithms to find products from images and on the web.

You can be involved in a project that, if successful, will change the way the world finds products. When TrulyShare is out, you and your friends can find the best deals and have stores begging you to come to their stores. Wouldn't it be nice to get something when you tell your friends about a product?

How awesome would it be to always have a tool to fix those glasses, open that box, clean and file your nails, get that food out of your teeth, remove a splinter for your child, cut-off that annoying little string from your shirt, check your make-up and even tighten those bolts on your office chair. Are you going camping? Then use SleeperCell to open that bottle or suds, open that can of food, start a fire with the flint, blow the whistle if you're in trouble or navigate with the compass.
The possibilities for what SleeperCell can do for you are truly endless - and with your help you can bring this versatile product to the market.

My name is Robert Pattison and I invented SleeperCell because I love the function of my multitool - but never had it around when I needed it. Not only will you be pre-ordering a strong and lightweight smartphone case - you will be ordering a product that's there whenever you need it.

Now that you've had a moment to think of all the useful applications that SleeperCell can do for you - now think of all the family members that would benefit from your generous pledges! Let's face it - accidents happen and SleeperCell will be there to help you or your family members out of those life changing circumstances. Twenty-five million Boy Scouts can't be wrong when they say...""Be Prepared."" What's the first thing anyone goes for when they're in an accident...their phone! It's one of very few items that will be close by when something happens.

Like most projects on this site, I need your help to cover the HUGE cost of manufacturing and production runs. I have manufacturers lined up and ready to begin as soon as I rally the community around this project. With your generous pledges - you'll be pre-ordering as many units as you like. There are several levels to show your support.

I realize that times are tough and people are saving as much as they can and whenever they can. Believe me - I can certainly appreciate that and hope that you will not only pledge what you can - but help me spread the word about this project. The faster I get this project - the faster I can send out your SleeperCells before the holidays.
I realize that I'm asking for a lot of money to fund my project and get SleeperCell off the ground but there are several components that build this hefty price tag.
Manufacturing Costs, Tooling, Minimum Order Quantities, Shipping, Import and Duty Fees, Storage, Taxes, Credit Card Processing Fess and Indiegogo gets a percentage too.
If you like this product and see the potential for future versions PLEASE help me get fund this business! Thank you for ALL your support!!!!

EPR Ninja is the first collaborative application that directly supports the

warfighter to produce the Enlisted Performance Report (EPR), Officer Performance Reports (OPR) and Civilian Appraisals annually.  Throughout history this task has plagued Airmen, NCO’s, Officers, and Civilians alike.
Now EPR ninja will not only resolve the stressors of last minute
deadlines to submit their EPR, but it will teach Airmen the proper structure
and syntax to create a bullet on their own.
EPR ninja will not only cut down the learning curve but will also allow junior
enlisted members to articulate their accomplishments into clear and concise
We will be launching EPR Ninja on July 4th 2015.

EPR Ninja’s Campaign goal is to raise $7,000.00

If we don't reach our goal we will put out a limited version for sale, if we reach our goal we will launch our EPR Ninja on the 4th of July.  If we surpass our set goal, the additional funding will go towards improving EPR Ninja to be the application we have all been waiting for.

The donations we raise will go towards:
Hiring additional developers to refine the application for final production
Rolling out the final product in time for SSgt’s EPR’s
• Calculates and minimizes white space at the end
We are crowdfunding this project for the opportunity to
hire additional skilled developers, and to take this proof of concept and turn it into a real-world application.
Currently there are over 622 thousand Air Force Personnel
serving.  This could benefit the entire workforce, and will make the lives of
supervisors and subordinates across the world a little easier.
The only risk we face is in not
trying.  The application is in the development phase but we need your
help to bring this to the marketplace. If we are unable to meet our crowdfunding
goal, we will release EPR Ninja for download to our supporters on July 4th.
help make our dream a reality.

Why:  Sick and tired of hearing her BF complain about the broken EPR

Born and raised in Ethiopia, where she always had a passion for business. After her father passed away when she was just a young girl, she learned the value of working hard by watching her mother work countless hours, turning her small clothing business into a means of supporting her family of four. Even though her mother had to leave home every other day and travel 8 hours by minibus on the dirt roads that lead to the capital city, Addis Ababa to purchase her inventory
column2: Rebecca discovered innovative ways to connect with her mother and learn what it takes to be successful. Now, she is ready to take what she has learned and create a business of her own, so that her mother can retire and finally rest and live the life that she deserves!

Based on the dynamics of neuroplasticity, our WizeWell team has been researching new psychological tools that actively relieve stress, stimulate innovative thinking, and encourage heartfelt relating. Drawing on insights from perceptual psychology, mindfulness meditation, and neurobiology, we’ve developed a cognitive process that enables people to step by step transform mental and emotional habits, and shift at will into preferred mindsets.

The human brain has four equally-important functions – but we tend to fixate overmuch on the mental deductive-thinking function. The WizeWell App provides a process for periodically shifting out of cognition mode into wholebody sensation mode, and then entering into optimum mindsets for accomplishing the goal at hand. After a bit of practice, this mindset shifting can happen in just 2 minutes.

The first week of our app program delivers training and daily reinforcement for temporarily quieting the mental chatter that usually dominates our minds. Then, in this quiet-mind state, the user is in optimum position to shift into whole-brain integrative mindsets and access new insights, trustworthy decisions, and deeper relating. This is a scientifically-grounded process for shifting confidently into ‘the zone’ whenever you want to.

During the 8-week WizeWell training period, users are guided through daily Breather Breaks where they use special Focus Phrases to elicit positive shifts in focus and experience. Via our WizeWell App, five new Focus Phrases are introduced each week related to a particular theme.

Traditionally the major difficulty in developing more rewarding mental and emotional habits has been the lack of periodic environmental reminders and 24/7 reinforcement strategies. The patent-pending WizeWell App resolves this dilemma using mobile platforms to deliver periodic cognitive guidance and self-regulated reinforcement schedules.
The basic schematic above includes the following elements:
1: Daily Program: For each of the 40 daily sessions, the app delivers the following: a Focus Phrase and picture, three short audio programs, and a text/discussion page.

2: Mood Management Scale: To be developed in round 2, this is an interactive system that, in just a minute or two, provides feedback and insight into your current mood, and gives suggestions on how best to modify your mood using our various programs.

3: Breath Modification Bar: Our app offers a visual bar that moves back and forth to simulate inhaling and exhaling. Click on the bar to speed up or slow down its ‘breathing’ speed – and effortlessly modify your breathing so that it’s more smooth, deep, rhythmic and enjoyable.

4: Random Reinforcement: In the spirit of synchronicity, spin the WizeWell Roulette wheel and instantly receive a randomly-chosen Focus Phrase card on your screen – or listen to the related audio experience.

5: WizeWell Videos: For each of our 8 weekly themes, we’ve produced a short video that guides you through that theme’s 5 Focus Phrases. Just click – and tap into this effortless audio-visual guidance.

6: Emotional First Aid: There are four negative emotions that we all sometimes get stuck in. This dimension of the WizeWell App offers audio and video guidance for shifting out of negative moods into a more positive emotional experience.
7: Archives: Whenever you want to, go to this menu and re-experience any of the written, audio, or video content you’ve encountered thusfar in the WizeWell Process.
8: Settings: This offers the standard set of user choices for this type of app.

9: Periodic Reminders: Enjoy full control of how you use this app to remind you to pause and take a short Breather Break – select how often you want a reminder, plus choose visual, audio, sound, or vibration reminder formats.
10:  Biofeedback Plugins: We offer a list of biofeedback programs that you might want to add to the WizeWell program. In future versions we’ll build some of these directly into the app.

11: Self-Monitoring Metrics: We’re currently researching a number of ways to help you self-monitor your progress on a number of cognitive, emotional and performance scales. In round 2 we’ll be introducing these helpful metrics.
12: Social Platforms: This is a link to our Facebook page or similar social media, where you can interact freely with others who’re also using this app.

Along with personal use, we’ve designed a dimension of the WizeWell App that fits smoothly into a company's at-work schedule to reduce stress and fatigue, and boost empathy and innovation. If you’re interested in how this program can be used on the job, here’s our at-work introductory video:

column2: feature=player_embedded"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" title=""At-Work Intro Video Link"">

column1: This Indiegogo approach to raising money is by far the most appealing way to manifest the WizeWell vision. Our ideal investors are people like yourself who offer both financial support, goodwill, and the desire to personally own something new and valuable.

As an original backer you'll be able to watch our development as we manifest our vision and bring the product to market – plus you can share your own ideas on how we might advance our long-term vision of building more and more sophisticated mindfulness training, reinforcement, and delivery systems.
Feel free to email us at info@wizewell.net if you have any questions.
Receive the first 5 days of the WizeWell Program via daily email
+ Receive week 1 Video of the WizeWell Program
+ Receive the new WizeWell App after completion
+ Receive the WizeWell novel: The Seventh Mindset
+ Receive the WizeWell Card Deck of 30 cards
+ Participate in a webinar with founder John Selby
+ Receive a personal phone-consultation with John Selby
+ Receive a corporate presentation of the WizeWell Program

All of the audio, text, and video content needed for this app has already been produced, as well as the screen designs and app flow. With Indiegogo funding we’ll advance our program into iOS and Android formats. If this campaign goes beyond our minimum funding, we’ll keep on adding new features.

Advancing through the WizeWell process is a private experience – but most of us also benefit from talking with people having similar experiences in the same process. The more you participate in our community of explorers, the more you’ll discover the full potential of the process. As soon as the app is ready, you can participate in whatever level of our community you prefer.

Learning to consciously shift into preferred mindsets whenever we want to is the most direct way to transform our lives for the better. This is an incremental process, and using advanced mobile technologies to regularly remind us to focus in beneficial directions is the key to generating valued mindsets. We want to manifest this app and make it available to everyone who needs it, and we are deeply thankful for your participation in making this vision a reality.

Because we've already completed the actual contents and design, we anticipate no major problems with the delivery of the app and the rewards. The only issue might be delays in app production, which would generate a 15 to 30 day lag in delivering the finished app to you. We'll be sure to notify you if this occurs.
If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to ask us at info@wizewell.net .

Based on the dynamics of neuroplasticity, our WizeWell team has been researching new psychological tools that actively relieve stress, stimulate innovative thinking, and encourage heartfelt relating. Drawing on insights from perceptual psychology, mindfulness meditation, and neurobiology, we’ve developed a cognitive process that enables people to step by step transform mental and emotional habits, and shift at will into preferred mindsets.

The human brain has four equally-important functions – but we tend to fixate overmuch on the mental deductive-thinking function. The WizeWell App provides a process for periodically shifting out of cognition mode into wholebody sensation mode, and then entering into optimum mindsets for accomplishing the goal at hand. After a bit of practice, this mindset shifting can happen in just 2 minutes.

The first week of our app program delivers training and daily reinforcement for temporarily quieting the mental chatter that usually dominates our minds. Then, in this quiet-mind state, the user is in optimum position to shift into whole-brain integrative mindsets and access new insights, trustworthy decisions, and deeper relating. This is a scientifically-grounded process for shifting confidently into ‘the zone’ whenever you want to.

During the 8-week WizeWell training period, users are guided through daily Breather Breaks where they use special Focus Phrases to elicit positive shifts in focus and experience. Via our WizeWell App, five new Focus Phrases are introduced each week related to a particular theme.

Traditionally the major difficulty in developing more rewarding mental and emotional habits has been the lack of periodic environmental reminders and 24/7 reinforcement strategies. The patent-pending WizeWell App resolves this dilemma using mobile platforms to deliver periodic cognitive guidance and self-regulated reinforcement schedules.
The basic schematic above includes the following elements:
1: Daily Program: For each of the 40 daily sessions, the app delivers the following: a Focus Phrase and picture, three short audio programs, and a text/discussion page.

2: Mood Management Scale: To be developed in round 2, this is an interactive system that, in just a minute or two, provides feedback and insight into your current mood, and gives suggestions on how best to modify your mood using our various programs.

3: Breath Modification Bar: Our app offers a visual bar that moves back and forth to simulate inhaling and exhaling. Click on the bar to speed up or slow down its ‘breathing’ speed – and effortlessly modify your breathing so that it’s more smooth, deep, rhythmic and enjoyable.

4: Random Reinforcement: In the spirit of synchronicity, spin the WizeWell Roulette wheel and instantly receive a randomly-chosen Focus Phrase card on your screen – or listen to the related audio experience.

5: WizeWell Videos: For each of our 8 weekly themes, we’ve produced a short video that guides you through that theme’s 5 Focus Phrases. Just click – and tap into this effortless audio-visual guidance.

6: Emotional First Aid: There are four negative emotions that we all sometimes get stuck in. This dimension of the WizeWell App offers audio and video guidance for shifting out of negative moods into a more positive emotional experience.
7: Archives: Whenever you want to, go to this menu and re-experience any of the written, audio, or video content you’ve encountered thusfar in the WizeWell Process.
8: Settings: This offers the standard set of user choices for this type of app.

9: Periodic Reminders: Enjoy full control of how you use this app to remind you to pause and take a short Breather Break – select how often you want a reminder, plus choose visual, audio, sound, or vibration reminder formats.
10:  Biofeedback Plugins: We offer a list of biofeedback programs that you might want to add to the WizeWell program. In future versions we’ll build some of these directly into the app.

11: Self-Monitoring Metrics: We’re currently researching a number of ways to help you self-monitor your progress on a number of cognitive, emotional and performance scales. In round 2 we’ll be introducing these helpful metrics.
12: Social Platforms: This is a link to our Facebook page or similar social media, where you can interact freely with others who’re also using this app.

Along with personal use, we’ve designed a dimension of the WizeWell App that fits smoothly into a company's at-work schedule to reduce stress and fatigue, and boost empathy and innovation. If you’re interested in how this program can be used on the job, here’s our at-work introductory video:

This Indiegogo approach to raising money is by far the most appealing way to manifest the WizeWell vision. Our ideal investors are people like yourself who offer both financial support, goodwill, and the desire to personally own something new and valuable.

As an original backer you'll be able to watch our development as we manifest our vision and bring the product to market – plus you can share your own ideas on how we might advance our long-term vision of building more and more sophisticated mindfulness training, reinforcement, and delivery systems.
Feel free to email us at info@wizewell.net if you have any questions.
Receive the first 5 days of the WizeWell Program via daily email
+ Receive week 1 Video of the WizeWell Program
+ Receive the new WizeWell App after completion
+ Receive the WizeWell novel: The Seventh Mindset
+ Receive the WizeWell Card Deck of 30 cards
+ Participate in a webinar with founder John Selby
+ Receive a personal phone-consultation with John Selby
+ Receive a corporate presentation of the WizeWell Program

All of the audio, text, and video content needed for this app has already been produced, as well as the screen designs and app flow. With Indiegogo funding we’ll advance our program into iOS and Android formats. If this campaign goes beyond our minimum funding, we’ll keep on adding new features.

Advancing through the WizeWell process is a private experience – but most of us also benefit from talking with people having similar experiences in the same process. The more you participate in our community of explorers, the more you’ll discover the full potential of the process. As soon as the app is ready, you can participate in whatever level of our community you prefer.

Learning to consciously shift into preferred mindsets whenever we want to is the most direct way to transform our lives for the better. This is an incremental process, and using advanced mobile technologies to regularly remind us to focus in beneficial directions is the key to generating valued mindsets. We want to manifest this app and make it available to everyone who needs it, and we are deeply thankful for your participation in making this vision a reality.

Because we've already completed the actual contents and design, we anticipate no major problems with the delivery of the app and the rewards. The only issue might be delays in app production, which would generate a 15 to 30 day lag in delivering the finished app to you. We'll be sure to notify you if this occurs.
If you have any more questions, please don't hesitate to ask us at info@wizewell.net .",5.0,0,"2 Campaigns
Hello, our names are JaBre' Jennings
and Juwan Nicholson and we are here to
tell you about our upcoming app “Closed Caption!”  As you
can probably relate, sometimes finding that perfect caption for your photo is
not as easy as it seems.  That is why we
have created “Closed Caption,” and now anyone can caption his or her photos with
to aid Instagram, Twitter and Facebook users with creating great captions for
their picture and posts. On occasions, a person will gain writers block when
uploading their photo onto social media. With that, our app will generate
captions they can use in their time of need.
The goal of this campaign is to reach
like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access
and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get using “Closed
Caption” the more functional and successful it will be.  So this campaign will give you the basics on
our efforts and progress.  Beyond that we
encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved.  We developed “Closed Caption” for your
benefit, so enjoy!  We believe we are
really onto an easier way to caption every photo with a fraction of the work.

I am a recent graduate from the University of
Maryland Eastern Shore with a degree in sociology. I chose to take up this
major to learn more about human behavior, more importantly human interaction
through communication. Upon graduation I chose to further my education by
pursuing a masters in IT/ Cyber Security. I wanted to combine the information
that I learned through sociology with IT to learn of communications through
technology. From the Eastern Shore I befriended my partner Juwan Nicholson who
was pursuing a degree in Journalism and Telecommunications. Upon noticing our
different paths of education we used it to our advantage to think of ways
together we could implement new ideas. With his concentration in writing, and
mine in human interaction we formulated the idea of Closed Caption. Noticing
the impact social media had on campus, we realized that beyond the classroom
there were other opportunities it could be effectively utilized. While out one
night we had a big problem social media users have today. After taking a really
great picture we realized we didn't have a caption for the picture. You may or
may not know but nowadays the caption determine if it gets the exposure the
user wanted. After asking other friends and social media users
would this invention be of any assistance we decided to put it into action.
For us to bring the “Closed Caption” to
Your generous funding will help us get
things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost
of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get
the chance to be one of the first users of the “Closed Caption.” We will also use our funding to test our
concept to make it better.  We are
committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best
above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as
much as we do then please take a moment to check out one of our social media

bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

This has proven to be one of the
