Appsner - The world’s first, truly affordable, native mobile app builder platform.
Appsner is a mobile application builder platform that allows you to create your own native and HTML5 mobile apps for iOS, Android and Kindle devices without coding.

Using Appsner is really easy. You don't need to be an Xcode expert or a  developer to build your own iPhone/iPad/Android/Kindle application. Appsner allows you to simultaneously create, edit, and manage native iPhone, iPad, Android, Kindle and HTML5 mobile apps online.

You can start creating your app by choosing a template and adding content, pictures, music, sounds, videos. No worries about coding, algorithms, performance, data structures, memory management, memory leaks, multithreading, bugs, fixes, compatibility, SDKs, API and so on.

Appsner provides a set of online tools that empowers you to build and design mobile applications using HTML and CSS. It's a WYSIWYG html editor which simplifies design and development of mobile applications.
Using Appsner doesn’t require any programming skills. We guarantee that anyone with zero knowledge of programming will be able to push all features provided to the max.

- Simply start by choosing a template for your application and edit it the way you want.
- Add content, artwork, media — all in intuitive and interactive way making app design an absolute joy.
- Experience feature-rich content editing system and instant live previews on devices.

- Once you're finished, we will review, test and submit  your app to the respective store.
- Businessmen, marketeers, designers, freelancers individuals — everyone is now able to develop mobile applications by themselves.

Appsner's goal is to help businesses and individuals succeed by taking advantage of cutting edge technologies. We believe iOS/Android devices are opening new opportunities for everyone. Mobile applications allow customers to interact with businesses in a whole new way. We are here to help you create professional mobile applications at affordable prices.

Having an app is kind of the ultimate in pull marketing. We are talking about the most intimate device in consumers’ lives. It’s always on. They carry it with them. When consumers put a branded app on their phone, they’re inviting you into an ongoing conversation and to have a presence on a device that’s so intimate. That’s one of the things that makes it attractive for any company, business and individual. It’s a great way to stay connected with the audience and to carry on a longer conversation.
According to Morgan Stanley Research, mobile users will surpass desktop users by 2014.
Push Notifications -  In a nutshell, push notifications allow you to send pop-up messages directly to users who have previously installed one of your apps, even when the app is closed.
Push notifications are the biggest driver of engagement in apps. Keep your users engaged with new content, news, offers and increase your awareness and app usage.
Sync - New content and updates are automatically sent through the cloud to every device that has your app.
In-app Purchases - Sell a variety of items directly within your free or paid app, including premium content, virtual goods, and subscriptions.

column2: PoIs– Display your business' location(s) and offer directions for your users. You can also display points of interest near your user’s current location.

column1: RSS Feed Reader - Deliver feeds to your users inside the app. Provide the information they need right at their fingertips.

column2: Editor – Multimedia PDF tools embedded into your app. Allow your users to open and edit PDF files.

column1: EPUB Reader - Native EPUB Reader for one of the most popular open e-books formats. Let your users read books using smart navigation and pleasant animation.
Document Scanner - Multipage scanner for documents, recipes, notes and text. Scan documents with camera and convert them to PDF file.

column2: Scanner - Create and scan QR codes inside your app. You can also organize them and share with Facebook or by email.

column1: App Share - Let users promote your app on their Social Network channels and by email inside your app.
Newsstand – Create and publish your magazine for Newsstand.
Login Page – Restrict access to certain app pages for dedicated users.
Image overlays – Create a funny app where users can  take pictures with camera and overlay custom images and artwork. They can share them on Facebook  or by email.
Search – Building an encyclopedia? Your users can find what they are looking for using the search tool.
Blog – Have a web page or a blog that you constantly update and want it bundled into your app? It’s done! The page will load from your server.
Ad-Networks – Monetize your app with admob, RevMob or iAd. We work hard to integrate more ad-networks with our platform.

Custom Menus – Build your app the way you want it. More than 10 menu layouts, including Image Menu, Button Menu, Magazine Menu, Side Bar Menu, Stripes Menu, Round Corner Menu. Whether you want to include thumbnails, description or just the title you can be sure your app will look professional. Style, font, color, icon - everything is customizable.

Custom Tabs – Whether you want a modern look and feel or a minimalistic one we’ve got you covered. You can have no tabs, standard tabs or design your own ones with custom icons, background and even custom click sound. You can also choose to use our Wheel Navigation instead of tabs.
Audio/Radio Stream – Let your users enjoy your music/radio within your app.
GPS Coupon – Prompt users to scan QR codes at your sales point and offer discounts.
Check-In – Allow users to check-in at your sales point and offer discounts based on their actions.
Loyalty – Offer a virtual stamp card to reward your customers for their loyalty when a certain number of stamps are aquired.
Video – Embed Youtube videos in to your app or allow users to download available videos.
Greeting Cards  - Allow users to fill in a custom message and overlay it on preset images to create greeting cards. They can send them by email or post on Facebook.
360 ° View – Create awesome panoramas for your users to enjoy.
Feedback Form – Accept detailed feedback from your users with location, date, time, message, email, phone number. Everything is sent directly to your email.

Calculator – Let your users solve predefined mathematical problems. There are many situations when you might want to use a predefined formula calculator. Some of the most popular are body fat percentage calculation, ingredient amount calculation for recipes and loan calculation.
Poll  – Keep users engaged with polls and research  new ideas you might implement.

column2: Shopping Cart – Allow users to place an order using your app. They can use the shopping cart if they plan to order more items.

column1: Notes – Allow users to write and save notes inside your app.
Objective-C – You can implement custom Objective-C code features inside your app.
Magazine – Add, organize and sell your magazines.
Voice Record – Let users share voice messages.
Wavefront Object  – Import 3d  .obj models into your app.
Photo Effects – Allow users to take photos inside your app and add effects like sepia, grey, b&
column2: w and many more to them.

column1: Camera Cover – Allow users to apply a magazine cover effect to pictures taken with camera. You can also create your own magazine covers.
Slideshow  – Create a beautiful slideshow for your users.
3D Layers – Display 3D Layers inside your app. Users can switch through all of them, zoom and even paint them.
Facebook Fan Page – Integrate your Facebook feeds into your app. Users can like and interact with your fan page.
Podcast – Allow users to listen and watch podcasts from a specific podcast feed.
Karaoke  – Add lyrics and songs then sync them together. Let your users have fun.
Memo – Upload your artwork and let users play a memory game.
Quiz – Create awesome quiz games . You can use our template and just add questions and answers or you can edit the layout aswell.
Puzzle  – Upload your artwork and let users solve a puzzle out of it.

You can always make an app from scratch, using a blank template. This is a sample app created with our platform, from scratch. It's composed of a header, containing the logo, an image menu and our standard 4 tabs with custom icons from our gallery.

We have lots of templates you can use to build your mobile application. Every template is customizable, so you can create your app the way you want it. You can also start from scratch, using a blank template and create a unique app. Our primary focus is to bring new templates based on your requirements and feedback. We are confident we can release atleast 2 new templates every month. You will be able to vote what new templates want to see in Appsner.
Our platform is almost ready, and everything we’ve presented until now is already developed.
We’ve put a lot of effort and passion into this so we look forward to finish what we’ve started!

$7000 is the amount we estimated we need in order to have a proper launch, provide a quality service and support. Most of the money will be spent on a powerful server to host the platform online and the apps. The rest will be used to finish our website integration that is currently under development.
We hope we can reach our goal!
UPDATE: We've managed to secure $3,000 in funds from local businesses, so our new goal is $4,000.
Appsner is co-founded by Marius Buibar and Costin Bafane. The idea came to life last year and since then we've been focused on making appsner a reality.

Marius Buibar: Even though I'm currently studying law at ""Titu Maiorescu"" University of Bucharest, I have a big passion for computers and technology. I have experience as a web developer and designer and used to offer my services as a part-time job in the past.

Costin Bafane: I am 21 years old and currently studying economics, specialized in management at The Bucharest University of Economic Studies. I have been working online since I was 18 and I have developed many successful projects. I was born in the internet era therefore I am passionate about technology, especially the evolution of mobile technology.

Unlimited means you can use our platform without any limitations, including updates, push-notifications, in-app purchases. It doesn’t matter if you have 1 or 1000 apps, or if your app reached 100,000 downloads or more. You can send unlimited push-notifications to your users, but make sure you don’t spam them. Apple/Google/Amazon might pull your app off their store if you spam push-notifications.
You only need one if you plan to build  paid apps or use in-app purchases. You need a developer account to receive the money. ($99/Year for AppStore
If you plan to create just free apps or ad-monetized ones, we will publish them with our business developer accounts.
• What happens with my app if I stop paying the monthly fee?

You won’t be able to update and send push-notifications unless you activate your plan again. Your app will still be available for download in AppStore/Google Play/Amazon Store, but when people open it they will receive a pop-up message letting them know your current plan is inactive.
• Can I build apps for companies, businesses, organizations, individuals and sell them?
Yes! We encourage freelancers to create new revenue streams for themselves using appsner!
• How fast can I make an app?

Using one of our templates, you can finish it in less than 60 minutes. Creating a custom app, from scratch, using a blank template could take you between 1 and 3 hours depending on how much you want to work on the design.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us using the comment system or directly from our indiegogo profile.

column2: >Please support us and spread the word about our project!

column1: ","Appsner - The world’s first, truly affordable, native mobile app builder platform.
Appsner is a mobile application builder platform that allows you to create your own native and HTML5 mobile apps for iOS, Android and Kindle devices without coding.

Using Appsner is really easy. You don't need to be an Xcode expert or a  developer to build your own iPhone/iPad/Android/Kindle application. Appsner allows you to simultaneously create, edit, and manage native iPhone, iPad, Android, Kindle and HTML5 mobile apps online.

You can start creating your app by choosing a template and adding content, pictures, music, sounds, videos. No worries about coding, algorithms, performance, data structures, memory management, memory leaks, multithreading, bugs, fixes, compatibility, SDKs, API and so on.

Appsner provides a set of online tools that empowers you to build and design mobile applications using HTML and CSS. It's a WYSIWYG html editor which simplifies design and development of mobile applications.
Using Appsner doesn’t require any programming skills. We guarantee that anyone with zero knowledge of programming will be able to push all features provided to the max.

- Simply start by choosing a template for your application and edit it the way you want. - Add content, artwork, media — all in intuitive and interactive way making app design an absolute joy.  - Experience feature-rich content editing system and instant live previews on devices.

- Once you're finished, we will review, test and submit  your app to the respective store. - Businessmen, marketeers, designers, freelancers individuals — everyone is now able to develop mobile applications by themselves.

Appsner's goal is to help businesses and individuals succeed by taking advantage of cutting edge technologies. We believe iOS/Android devices are opening new opportunities for everyone. Mobile applications allow customers to interact with businesses in a whole new way. We are here to help you create professional mobile applications at affordable prices.

Having an app is kind of the ultimate in pull marketing. We are talking about the most intimate device in consumers’ lives. It’s always on. They carry it with them. When consumers put a branded app on their phone, they’re inviting you into an ongoing conversation and to have a presence on a device that’s so intimate. That’s one of the things that makes it attractive for any company, business and individual. It’s a great way to stay connected with the audience and to carry on a longer conversation.
According to Morgan Stanley Research, mobile users will surpass desktop users by 2014.
Push Notifications -  In a nutshell, push notifications allow you to send pop-up messages directly to users who have previously installed one of your apps, even when the app is closed.
Push notifications are the biggest driver of engagement in apps. Keep your users engaged with new content, news, offers and increase your awareness and app usage.
Sync - New content and updates are automatically sent through the cloud to every device that has your app.
In-app Purchases - Sell a variety of items directly within your free or paid app, including premium content, virtual goods, and subscriptions.
GPS & PoIs– Display your business' location(s) and offer directions for your users. You can also display points of interest near your user’s current location.
RSS Feed Reader - Deliver feeds to your users inside the app. Provide the information they need right at their fingertips.
PDF Reader & Editor – Multimedia PDF tools embedded into your app. Allow your users to open and edit PDF files.
EPUB Reader - Native EPUB Reader for one of the most popular open e-books formats. Let your users read books using smart navigation and pleasant animation.
Document Scanner - Multipage scanner for documents, recipes, notes and text. Scan documents with camera and convert them to PDF file.
Barcode Scanner - Scan barcodes on products.
QR Code Creator & Scanner - Create and scan QR codes inside your app. You can also organize them and share with Facebook or by email.
App Share - Let users promote your app on their Social Network channels and by email inside your app.
Newsstand – Create and publish your magazine for Newsstand.
Login Page – Restrict access to certain app pages for dedicated users.
Image overlays – Create a funny app where users can  take pictures with camera and overlay custom images and artwork. They can share them on Facebook  or by email.
Search – Building an encyclopedia? Your users can find what they are looking for using the search tool.
Blog – Have a web page or a blog that you constantly update and want it bundled into your app? It’s done! The page will load from your server.
Ad-Networks – Monetize your app with admob, RevMob or iAd. We work hard to integrate more ad-networks with our platform.

Custom Menus – Build your app the way you want it. More than 10 menu layouts, including Image Menu, Button Menu, Magazine Menu, Side Bar Menu, Stripes Menu, Round Corner Menu. Whether you want to include thumbnails, description or just the title you can be sure your app will look professional. Style, font, color, icon - everything is customizable.

Custom Tabs – Whether you want a modern look and feel or a minimalistic one we’ve got you covered. You can have no tabs, standard tabs or design your own ones with custom icons, background and even custom click sound. You can also choose to use our Wheel Navigation instead of tabs.
Audio/Radio Stream – Let your users enjoy your music/radio within your app.
GPS Coupon – Prompt users to scan QR codes at your sales point and offer discounts.
Check-In – Allow users to check-in at your sales point and offer discounts based on their actions.
Loyalty – Offer a virtual stamp card to reward your customers for their loyalty when a certain number of stamps are aquired.
Video – Embed Youtube videos in to your app or allow users to download available videos.
Greeting Cards  - Allow users to fill in a custom message and overlay it on preset images to create greeting cards. They can send them by email or post on Facebook.
360 ° View – Create awesome panoramas for your users to enjoy.
Feedback Form – Accept detailed feedback from your users with location, date, time, message, email, phone number. Everything is sent directly to your email.

Calculator – Let your users solve predefined mathematical problems. There are many situations when you might want to use a predefined formula calculator. Some of the most popular are body fat percentage calculation, ingredient amount calculation for recipes and loan calculation.
Poll  – Keep users engaged with polls and research  new ideas you might implement.
Order & Shopping Cart – Allow users to place an order using your app. They can use the shopping cart if they plan to order more items.
Notes – Allow users to write and save notes inside your app.
Objective-C – You can implement custom Objective-C code features inside your app.
Magazine – Add, organize and sell your magazines.
Voice Record – Let users share voice messages.
Wavefront Object  – Import 3d  .obj models into your app.
Photo Effects – Allow users to take photos inside your app and add effects like sepia, grey, b&w and many more to them.
Camera Cover – Allow users to apply a magazine cover effect to pictures taken with camera. You can also create your own magazine covers.
Slideshow  – Create a beautiful slideshow for your users.
3D Layers – Display 3D Layers inside your app. Users can switch through all of them, zoom and even paint them.
Facebook Fan Page – Integrate your Facebook feeds into your app. Users can like and interact with your fan page.
Podcast – Allow users to listen and watch podcasts from a specific podcast feed.
Karaoke  – Add lyrics and songs then sync them together. Let your users have fun.
Memo – Upload your artwork and let users play a memory game.
Quiz – Create awesome quiz games . You can use our template and just add questions and answers or you can edit the layout aswell.
Puzzle  – Upload your artwork and let users solve a puzzle out of it.

You can always make an app from scratch, using a blank template. This is a sample app created with our platform, from scratch. It's composed of a header, containing the logo, an image menu and our standard 4 tabs with custom icons from our gallery.

We have lots of templates you can use to build your mobile application. Every template is customizable, so you can create your app the way you want it. You can also start from scratch, using a blank template and create a unique app. Our primary focus is to bring new templates based on your requirements and feedback. We are confident we can release atleast 2 new templates every month. You will be able to vote what new templates want to see in Appsner.
Our platform is almost ready, and everything we’ve presented until now is already developed.
We’ve put a lot of effort and passion into this so we look forward to finish what we’ve started!

$7000 is the amount we estimated we need in order to have a proper launch, provide a quality service and support. Most of the money will be spent on a powerful server to host the platform online and the apps. The rest will be used to finish our website integration that is currently under development.
We hope we can reach our goal!
UPDATE: We've managed to secure $3,000 in funds from local businesses, so our new goal is $4,000.

Application with its own vision of the World! 
Everything can be unlocked, you just need the right key!
A picklock to the World!

1. Choose Your Destination

You - only You - get to choose your freedom. Skeyv can provide a way to fulfil your day. Go anywhere you want and get rewards for this. See new places, discover new sites and explore the world. Where will You go and how will You spend your free time? You choose!

2. Use Anytime, Anywhere

You can take this app key anywhere, anytime. You are limited only by where you take your smartphone. Enjoy the game everywhere!

3. Information

In your pocket you will have information about all the cultural places around your location. 

4. Spend Your Key Points

You can spend the points you gathered from visiting different places. Use them to get cool promotions or take rewards like T-shirts, backpacks, keyholders and other. Otherwise you can upgrade your account, unlock new features for it or buy temporary beneficial potions to boost your daily progress.

   

5. Easy Grouping with People

Create a rendezvous point at your favorite place by creating a group, set the date, the hour and invite your friends in.

6. Track Your Friends

You can see your friends gathered points, where they went and what they visited the most. 

7. Share Your Emotions 

Share emotion, pictures, comments or even create your own location and post it at the map. 

8. Change Your Life

You have everything you need to create an adventure that is directly personalized to your needs, and thus is optimized to create the kind of experience you wish to have in your life. 

Skeyv app - the world is a resource for a game of exploration - we are building a mobile application, that takes the adventuring spirit out of the movies and books and brings it into people’s lives so You and others around the world can experience more joy, inspiration, satisfaction or whatever you feel you need in your lives. 

We've built a prototype of the app, and now we need your help to fund the creation of a production version that can scale to support you and millions of people around the world.

We are a team with a vision that has experience in developing apps, but this is our first time aiming high and with your support our idea will change people's perception of the World.

 

The idea of Skeyv was born at a startup event back in 2013 in Bulgaria, Plovdiv with one simple directive: to make people all over the world to go outside and to see how big their ""home"" is, and to inspire people to travel more, explore, and evolve in their lives!

Skeyv, our website can show you more about the project. 

Now it is time to turn our Skeyv App prototype into a Skeyv application that can change the lives of millions of people around the world.

 

It is really simple, you need to create your own account and start visiting different places. The application will see where you are located, then Skeyv will load all the key places around. When you choose where to go first just click the key. The system will show you information about the place at the bottom of the display, what it is and how many points you will receive by visiting it. When you get there just open the application again, Skeyv will check your location and will give you the deserved points.

 

1. Make A Pledge

Make a pledge by clicking the GET THIS PERK button above, and choose whatever reward fits you. Feel the magnitude of your pledge. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you, you are helping people all over the world to change their lifestyle.

Take one or all of the great items of Skeyv!

2. Share Our Story

Share our IndieGogo Campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through the best way - conversations. Skeyv will come to life because the community wanted and created its emergence!

3. Leave Your Mark 

Share your opinion, what kind of Skeyv you want to use in your life or in the world. Please do this! We want to implement our community´s feedback as an important pointer as we build the production version of the app!

 

All funds will be spent on the development of the Skeyv App, and on costs surrounding that development. Those costs include personnel costs, travel costs, hosting and design costs. 

10,000$ gets us an app for Bulgaria, 30,000$ raised gets an app for Eastern Europe, 50,000$ raised gets us an app for Europe. 

Funds above 50,000$ will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback and preparing the app for millions of people around the world.

Typically a project of this magnitude would fit well into a six-figure range. For a world version we will need not only money, and a strategic partnership, a good marketing division and a lot more.

 

Anton Mladenov - Creator, he ignated the spark of the Skeyv idea!

                                     

 

Dimo​ Mladenov - product manager, helped with his sharp mind!

                              

 

Hristo Lesev - mobile developer, his skills created the app!

                                    

 

Daniela Popova - designer, her creative look helped Skeyv a lot!

                               

 

Zvezdy Djokova - front-end developer, websites are her passion!

                                     

 

Ivan Kolev - photographer, he gave eyes to Skeyv application!

Meet our newest family member! FlashQ Q20

Q20 ~ a full featured GN20 flash with radio control, LED lighting, flash head tilting, built-in gel holder 

Expand your on-hand FlashQ to a complete flash system. Check it out, http://igg.me/at/q20


About Shipment

Dear contributors, if you still have not received your FlashQ, please submit a ticket to us on http://lightpixlabs.com/pages/about-us. Or direct email us at info@lightpixlabs.com. We will follow up your case promptly. Thank you.

FlashQ Online Store Opened

FlashQ is publicly available on our online store now. Get yours at http://lightpixlabs.com/

FlashQ is successfully funded on indiegogo in May 2014. Our team has started an amazing journey in making this product. Now FlashQ gets into reality and the first shipment has started. Thanks to all our supporters.

FlashQ is a 2.4GHz Wireless Flash Trigger. It is the smallest wireless flash trigger ever and the perfect companion to Mirrorless and Prosumer Cameras. It works well with big SLR camera. Make the off-camera flash lighting possible at any angles and unleash the creativity in photographers.

Attach FlashQ transmitter to your camera hot shoe on top, FlashQ receiver to a remote flash via hot shoe or sync cord, pair-up FlashQ device and start taking photos with endless possibilities of flash lighting.

Interesting things inspire me to take photos whenever travelling or walking around in my city. Using my light-weight compact system camera makes everything possible. Have you even face a problem in finding a suitable wireless flash trigger? Most of them are large in size or not a good looking one. That's why my team starts to work this out.
""The FlashQ Is a Stylish Wireless Radio Flash Trigger"", The Phoblographer
""FlashQ lights the way to approachable use of the off-camera flash"", Backerjack
""The Little FlashQ For Wireless Flash Photography!"", TechMASH
""FlashQ is a small trigger for small cameras"", LightingRumours
""FlashQ – the Smallest Wireless Flash Trigger Ever"", planet5D
""FlashQ Is Crowdfunding For A Tiny Wireless Flash Trigger System"", POP PHOTO
""FlashQ, un diminuto disparador inalámbrico para flashes"", fotografia
""FlashQ, un disparador inalámbrico para flashes diminuto y muy económico"", xatakafoto
""FLASHQ: Entfesselt blitzen mit Crowd-Unterstützung"", golem.de
""The FlashQ System Shrinks Wireless Flash Triggering Tech for Mirrorless Cameras"", PetaPixel

column2: title=%E3%80%8CFlashQ%E3%80%8D%E8%BC%95%E5%B7%A7%E5%BC%95%E9%96%83%E8%A3%9D%E7%BD%AE"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">photonews | techtudo | DPREVIEW | MirrorLessons | hypi.st

column1: This little cube design makes FlashQ fit in any cameras with standard ISO hot shoe. Its stylish outlook perfectly matches with your camera.
Both FlashQ transmitter and receiver get the same user interface: 2 buttons and 1 tri-color LED indicator.
Thanks to our software folks, make it smart and simple.
With a bulk of channels for selection, system can help to choose a clean channel. At the same time, we can avoid collision with other wireless system in the same frequency band.

FlashQ system can support up to 8 receivers simultaneously, provided that those receivers had been paired up with the transmitter. This gives the scalability of multiple wireless flashes and makes your photography more creative.

A cold shoe adopter is available for FlashQ receiver. This adopter makes the remote flash gets setup or positioning easily. The 1/4“ screw threads underneath adopter provides another option for tripod mount.
FlashQ receiver has a sync cord output via Func. Port (micro-USB form factor). The sync cord allows connection to the sync port of studio strobes or external flashes.
Additional sync cords are available now, including 1/4"" (6.35mm) / 2.5mm / 3.5mm phone plugs. These sync cord options make FlashQ easy to connect most studio strobes and flashes.

FlashQ supports remote triggering flashes at sync speeds up to 1/250 sec*. The trigger signal is barely on the central contact of standard ISO hot shoe. No TTL information is transmitted by FlashQ. This makes FlashQ compatible with most camera and Flash brands.
FlashQ is the result of research and development by our leading engineering team in Hong Kong. We all share the mind: pushing the boundaries of innovation to create revolutionary products.

Miniaturized internal antenna design puts FlashQ to be the first Wireless Flash Trigger product of its size in the world. The size is small, and the signal is strong. FlashQ can provide reliable wireless flash triggering, at any angles.

Proprietary energy-efficient protocol enables FlashQ to be the device with low power and low latency radio. Therefore, FlashQ transmitter / receiver is just powered by a CR2302 coin battery with 180 days standby time.
• Tolerate Max. 300V port sync voltage (on FlashQ receiver)
• 3V voltage present on male hot shoe centre pin (on FlashQ transmitter)
• PC Sync cable (via Func. port) for studio strobes
• More than 100K fires for a battery life
One remote flash makes a big difference in your creative photo shooting.
(CR2032 coin battery NOT included. Because Air Mail has restriction in lithium battery item and may cause shipment delay.)
Two remote flashes brings more flexibility in lighting to you.
(CR2032 coin battery NOT included. Because Air Mail has restriction in lithium battery item and may cause shipment delay.)
Photo is about colors. Photography gears should provide choices of color that reflect your personality. Not only in black.
Higher price for Snow White / Macaron Pink Kit counts for special handling and higher yield loss in production.

We already finished the design, testing and mold tooling. Production and shipment of FlashQ is going on, in order to fulfill all 1500 contributors in previous campaign. Now we would raise second round of funds via pre-order and collect the money this moment, this significantly strengthens our cash flow and expedites the second batch FlashQ production.
If you like our work and love our product FlashQ, please contribute us. We will get FlashQ to your hands at first availability.
Support us and make flexible lighting effect everywhere. Thank you!

The FlashQ System Shrinks Wireless Flash Triggering Tech for Mirrorless Cameras"", PetaPixel
DIGI PHOTO | photonews | techtudo | DPREVIEW | MirrorLessons | hypi.st
This little cube design makes FlashQ fit in any cameras with standard ISO hot shoe. Its stylish outlook perfectly matches with your camera.
Both FlashQ transmitter and receiver get the same user interface: 2 buttons and 1 tri-color LED indicator.
Automatic Clear Channel Selection & Simple Pair-up
Thanks to our software folks, make it smart and simple.
With a bulk of channels for selection, system can help to choose a clean channel. At the same time, we can avoid collision with other wireless system in the same frequency band.

FlashQ system can support up to 8 receivers simultaneously, provided that those receivers had been paired up with the transmitter. This gives the scalability of multiple wireless flashes and makes your photography more creative.
Cold Shoe Adopter for FlashQ Receiver

A cold shoe adopter is available for FlashQ receiver. This adopter makes the remote flash gets setup or positioning easily. The 1/4“ screw threads underneath adopter provides another option for tripod mount.
FlashQ receiver has a sync cord output via Func. Port (micro-USB form factor). The sync cord allows connection to the sync port of studio strobes or external flashes.
Additional sync cords are available now, including 1/4"" (6.35mm) / 2.5mm / 3.5mm phone plugs. These sync cord options make FlashQ easy to connect most studio strobes and flashes.

FlashQ supports remote triggering flashes at sync speeds up to 1/250 sec*. The trigger signal is barely on the central contact of standard ISO hot shoe. No TTL information is transmitted by FlashQ. This makes FlashQ compatible with most camera and Flash brands.
FlashQ is the result of research and development by our leading engineering team in Hong Kong. We all share the mind: pushing the boundaries of innovation to create revolutionary products.

Miniaturized internal antenna design puts FlashQ to be the first Wireless Flash Trigger product of its size in the world. The size is small, and the signal is strong. FlashQ can provide reliable wireless flash triggering, at any angles.

Proprietary energy-efficient protocol enables FlashQ to be the device with low power and low latency radio. Therefore, FlashQ transmitter / receiver is just powered by a CR2302 coin battery with 180 days standby time.
No TTL, up to 1/250 sync speed*
Tolerate Max. 300V port sync voltage (on FlashQ receiver)
3V voltage present on male hot shoe centre pin (on FlashQ transmitter)
PC Sync cable (via Func. port) for studio strobes
More than 100K fires for a battery life
One remote flash makes a big difference in your creative photo shooting.
(CR2032 coin battery NOT included. Because Air Mail has restriction in lithium battery item and may cause shipment delay.)
Two remote flashes brings more flexibility in lighting to you.
(CR2032 coin battery NOT included. Because Air Mail has restriction in lithium battery item and may cause shipment delay.)
Photo is about colors. Photography gears should provide choices of color that reflect your personality. Not only in black.
Higher price for Snow White / Macaron Pink Kit counts for special handling and higher yield loss in production.

We already finished the design, testing and mold tooling. Production and shipment of FlashQ is going on, in order to fulfill all 1500 contributors in previous campaign. Now we would raise second round of funds via pre-order and collect the money this moment, this significantly strengthens our cash flow and expedites the second batch FlashQ production.
If you like our work and love our product FlashQ, please contribute us. We will get FlashQ to your hands at first availability.
Support us and make flexible lighting effect everywhere. Thank you!",22.0,0,"3 Campaigns

Apple Watch will be available in early 2015 and we've designed a charging solution that compliments your watch and provides flexibility in how you display it.

WatchDock can be placed on a desk, nightstand, or any counter surface.  The WatchDock rotates to allow viewing of Apple Watch at any angle.  Remove the pedestal base and plug the WatchDock directly into a wall outlet.
WatchDock uses the existing Apple USB plug to provide power to the inductive  recharging disc that magnetically connects to the Apple Watch.

In desktop usage, the cord exits the base and
allows you to run the USB plug to the desired outlet.

For wall mount charging, remove the pedestal
base from the WatchDock
Any excess USB cord is stored in the housing.
The USB plug securely snaps into the pivot arm.
WatchDock can now be plugged into any wall outlet.
WatchDock is now charging your Apple Watch!
• Available in Gloss White or Gloss Black

We are the WatchDock team. David Hernandez, Jim Ferguson and David Jackson are Industrial Designers with a combined 45 years of experience designing, developing and productizing ideas.  Each of us work with companies that take product concepts from a loose sketch all the way through manufacturing.  We each have different areas where we excel and when we work together, there really couldn't be a better team of creative and experienced product design professions to make WatchDock a reality.  Read below to learn a little more about us. Check out www.WatchDock.Rocks to get the latest!

Project Schedule
We have provide a realistic timeline to ensure WatchDock is available shorty after the release of Apple Watch in early 2015.

With every product development effort there are unforeseen issues to circumnavigate along the way.  We are speculating that Apple Watch will need accessories like WatchDock and we want it to arrive when Apple Watch does.

The WatchDock Team has over 45 combined years in product design, development and manufacturing.  We have tried and true relationships with manufactures around the globe.
For this project, we will be working with a manufacturer that has been a
partner on many projects over the last 5 years. Together we have
produced hundreds of thousands of parts and assembled these into actual
consumer products that are sold in some of the nations largest
retailers.  Our manufacturer will be injection molding all of the plastic
parts, providing final assembly and packaging of the finished product.  Our manufacturing partner
has a great track record of managing the QA/QC process to ensure you
receive high quality finished goods.  We also have a great partner in
Atlanta, GA who manages all of the
warehousing, distribution and logistics for the products that we
currently manufacture.  We plan to use our local partner to help with the fulfillment of the WatchDock once production is complete.

In order to do this, we need your help.  We would like to raise enough funds to help us procure production tooling.  While Apple has yet to confirm their ship dates, the Apple Watch will no doubt debut in a BIG way.  When Apple gambles on a new product they produce an immense volume of inventory. We can't be certain of the accessories Apple is planning, nor can we accurately determine their dimensional specifications, but we have made adaptations and allowances to make quick changes as we learn more.

How You Can Help

Simply chose a WatchDock Perk...  We don't want to offer stickers or shout-outs, we want to send you a useful product at a reasonable price point.  When we hit our funding goal, we can start production and verify a window for delivery. Apple expects Apple Watch to sell an initial 25 Million or more units in 2015, we just need a little more than a 1,000 Backers to get us going. THANKS IN ADVANCE!

Stay up to date by checking out our ""Apple Watch News"" page on our website:
www.WatchDock.Rocks/apple-watch-news

The slimmest iPhone 5/5S case ever.

iPhone has always been on the cutting edge of technology with beautiful design.  And most people use this iPhone with a case in order to protect it. They sacrifice its beauty for protection. Since iPhone is the object you use the most in your life, it is important to keep it safe and beautiful at the same time. 

Having this in mind, we took designing a case seriously. Rather hurting its aesthetics we tried to manifest the attributes of the iPhone. 

And as a result, we came up with Outfit Bumpers that is perfectly fit and shockproof. Covering just the area that gets shocked, Outfit Bumpers protects your phone without hiding the surface.



To achieve a design unified with the iPhone,

column4: >we chose the one used for Apple products.
column6: >to make it thinner and lighter than any other products made of aluminum.
column8: >We measured each component of the iPhone in microns
column9: >to attain the perfect fit with the case.
column12: >Outfit Bumpers can protect the phone from any angle.
column14: >your phone will gain no damage.

With Outfit Bumpers

Look at the video.

","The slimmest iPhone 5/5S case ever.Perfect Fit, Perfect Grip.

column1: iPhone has always been on the cutting edge of technology with beautiful design.  And most people use this iPhone with a case in order to protect it. They sacrifice its beauty for protection. Since iPhone is the object you use the most in your life, it is important to keep it safe and beautiful at the same time. Having this in mind, we took designing a case seriously. Rather hurting its aesthetics we tried to manifest the attributes of the iPhone. And as a result, we came up with Outfit Bumpers that is perfectly fit and shockproof. Covering just the area that gets shocked, Outfit Bumpers protects your phone without hiding the surface.To achieve a design unified with the iPhone, we first had to find the right material. Among various types of aluminum, we chose the one used for Apple products. Then we took great effort to make it thinner and lighter than any other products made of aluminum. We measured each component of the iPhone in microns to attain the perfect fit with the case. Closely attached to chamfers, Outfit Bumpers can protect the phone from any angle. No matter how it’s dropped, your phone will gain no damage. With Outfit Bumpers you can manipulate your phone with no difficulty. Even with other accessaries you can use it as if nothing’s on.We performed OUTFIT BUMPERS crash test, and iPhone was very safe. Look at the video.We’ve put so much thought to keep the iPhone fair and secure.Invest on us and you’ll have the coolest case in your hand.",13.0,2,"1 Campaign

My name is  Mark nILES and I am a young upcoming graphics and website designer from South America looking to develop my skills in the area a bit more. Unfortunately i am unable to afford the equipment and necessary resources I need in order to pursue my dream as a professional web and graphics designer. Currently I'm using portable programs installed on a portable hard at various internet cafes or any on any friends laptop that I can borrow for a short time..

This campaign is very simple and specific - I will use the funds to purchase high capacity new laptop: a MAC Book Air with 8GB  1600MHz of SDRAM and a 256GB Flash Storage with a 1.7 Dual -Core Intel Core i7,Turbo Boost up to 3.3Ghz.  In addition to knowing you've helped someone in need, I am offering advertisement perks.

I am an upcoming graphics designers and I will be more than happy to add your names or logo of your business/blog  at the foot of my personal  website. In addition to the website advertising perk I will also put laser etched advertisement on the laptop and have your ad shown everywhere at every public place I visit.
Your contributions will make a very big impact on my dream to becoming a professional website and graphics designer, an opportunity that is very rare where i'm from and in my country.
Can't afford to make a contribution, please spread the word by hitting that like/Share button on social media websites. signal boosting is greatly appreciated!
Please email logos to go on advertisement perks after making donations.

Hello. I am Kiyomi Tagawa from the samurai.jp Association.

Japan is brimming with amazing artisans, artists, engineers, and researchers busying themselves day after day in a great diversity of pursuits including traditional culture, the arts, technology, and subculture. We need the support of the international community to bring their creative works and goods to life and to realize the fruits of their research. samurai.jp has just started the samurai.jp Project to rally widespread support in communicating Japan’s traditional values of hospitality and entertainment and the samurai spirit to the world.

column2: >For centuries, Japan has cultivated its own unique culture in such diverse areas as traditional dress, cuisine and architecture through to craftsmanship, the arts and performance. This culture continues to live and breathe within us. Yet in recent times, such values, and indeed recognition of the true value of this culture, are gradually being lost amid the inexorable tide of globalization.

column1: By widely communicating the true value of Japan’s culture to people worldwide, we hope to facilitate more intense cultural, economic and international exchange through Japanese culture. We also hope to spark a rediscovery of Japan’s traditional cultural values among us, the people of Japan, as individuals.

The samurai.jp Project kicks off by profiling the completed prototype of a small-scale ring-shaped wind turbine built by Peace Frontier, a new company set to launch in October. We are seeking support via this Indiegogo campaign to enable conversion of the die-cast rotors used in the prototype into plastic, as a step toward commercializing the turbine. Through this installment of the project, in particular, we hope to use the development of this new product to help create employment and develop related businesses in the Tohoku region, which has suffered great hardship since the 2011 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami.
We humbly ask for your support to help turn this revolutionary wind turbine into the future global standard in new natural energy technology.
name is Tokio Fukui, and I’m a representative from Peace Frontier. For some
time, I was concerned about the drawbacks of conventional large propeller
generators, so I considered the development of a new type of wind power
generator that is environmentally friendly and can be installed with relative
machines currently use die-cast rotors, but the current request for assistance
is to develop plastic rotors. To make the rotors lighter and increase their
power output, the wind power generators will use plastic rotors when they are
released as commercial products. This will make their transport simpler and
enable many people to use easy to operate wind power generators in various
environments. We hope you will support our efforts to spread wind power
generators that fully utilize the gifts of nature.
Wind, an inexhaustible source of energy that comes with no worries about depletion

There is significant potential for the effective use of wind power, but there are also many problems. With horizontal shaft (propeller) power generation, as the surface area that receives wind power is enlarged, concerns arise from the perspective of strength, and when the rotational speed is increased, accidents with birds become a problem. On the other hand, if the speed is decreased, the problem of low frequency noise also occurs. With vertical shaft (gyromill) power generation, there are problems with safety and countermeasures to deal with strong winds, and compared to the scale, the power generation efficiency is low. In addition, power is not generated when the wind speed is slow, and the rated wind speed of small and medium size wind power generators is around 12m/second.

column2:
>Features of Ring Type Wind Turbine Generators

Ring type wind turbines are a type of wind power generator that narrows the path through which the wind passes to thereby increase the wind speed and improve power generation efficiency. Basically, this technology takes technology that is used in areas such as pumped-storage dams and applies it to wind. The most impressive feature is that power can be generated from a weak wind. In fact, ample power can be generated with a wind speed of 3-5m/second in urban areas. In addition, the equipment outputs almost no sound. Lastly, the structure is such that the blades are not exposed on the outside, so the equipment poses no danger to birds or humans.
/>

column1: * With a weak wind force, the ring wind turbine can generate 5-10 times as much power compared to a wind turbine with the same bore diameter.
* The generator has no shafts or exterior parts, and it is lightweight.
* The dimensions allow installation in a 2-square-meter area, and therefore all the components can fit in an elevator.
* The vanes do not stick out, so it is safe for wildlife and humans.
* The battery is housed in a stand, so the equipment can function as an uninterruptable power supply as well.
* The goal is to generate 10MW/h yearly (when 1.2kW/h is generated with an average wind speed of 6m/second).
Betz’s Law: The amount of power that can be generated from the wind is proportional to
the square of the rotor diameter and to the third power of the wind speed. <span style=""font-size: 15px
can be accelerated by reducing the cross-sectional area of the wind turbine so
that it is smaller than the wind inlet port, and as a result, power can be
generated even with a weak wind.
strength is increased by adopting a ring format for the wind turbine, and the
entire unit is made more lightweight including the drive area.
attached to the blades of the wind turbine to improve wind gust countermeasures
promoting blades are installed on the exhaust port side to improve exhaust
blades are attached in the wind collecting port to draw in the wind.
rectifying blades serve as a guard to keep out wildlife.
* The newest life extending device is attached to the battery so that battery does not need to be replaced.
* Betz’s Law and the Law of Continuity are applied.

* When the cross sectional area is reduced to 1/5, the fluid speed is increased 5 times, and the amount of power that is generated is increased 25 times. Wind is accelerated 5 times by adopting a cross sectional area of 0.15-square-meter for the ring wind turbine relative to the 0.78-square-meter cross sectional area of the outer circumferential dome.

* The energy when wind blows at a speed of 10m/second over an area of 1 square meter is approximately 1kW/h. According to the Betz limit, a maximum of 600W of energy can be converted, but when the mechanical efficiency is 50%, the energy becomes 300W.
the prototype this time, an output of 47W is expected with a wind speed of
2m/second. With a wind speed of 4m/second, the expected output increases to
376W, at 6m/second, it increases to 1,269W, at 8m/second, it increases to
3,008W, and at a wind speed of 10m/second, the expected output is 5,875W.

column2: >Lift is generated by counteraction for which the wind direction changes due to the blades. The change in direction of the wind between the top and bottom of the blades results in a powerful counteraction. When the upper wind diverges due to the angle, lift is lost. The ideal shape is called a Zhukovsky blade, and dimples like those on golf balls are believed to be effective at preventing divergence.

column1: at the location where wind accelerates, and increases at the location where

Lift is obtained from counteraction that changes the wind direction. In other words, the direction of the wind changes behind the blades. According to the Law of Continuity, if the amount of exhaust does not change in the same cross-sectional area but the direction changes, the wind speed increases in a triangular area direction. The wind speed is increased by further changing this direction using the rectifying blades, and a trailing vortex is thereby created.
the energy when the wind blows at 10m/second over an area of 1 square meter be
1kW/h, the Betz limit be 60%, and the machine efficiency be 50%. (Ordinarily,
machine efficiency is 60~80%.) A 2m/second wind will accelerate 5 times inside
the dome, and the blade speed will become 10m/second.
* Blade cross-sectional area x 1,000W x 0.6 x 0.5 = power generation capacity with wind speed of 2m/second
According to Betz’s Law, the amount of power generated is proportional to the third power of the wind speed.
* The third power of the quotient of wind speed divided by two x 2m power generation capacity = power generation capacity
* Preliminary performance calculation of 5 times the cross-sectional area ratio with a diameter of 1m (blade cross-sectional area of 0.157 square meter)

column2: >“Miyabi” is a soap containing a traditional Japanese design that remains visible even after many uses. It is a vegetable-based soap that is safe and environmentally friendly.

column1: Silver Package: Wind Power Generator with Sales Rights

With this package, you have a greater degree of freedom to make adjustments in your trip schedule. Feel free to discuss them.

* The goal is to generate 10MW/h yearly (when 1.2kW/h is generated with an average wind speed of 6m/second).
Betz’s Law: The amount of power that can be generated from the wind is proportional to
the square of the rotor diameter and to the third power of the wind speed.
can be accelerated by reducing the cross-sectional area of the wind turbine so
that it is smaller than the wind inlet port, and as a result, power can be
generated even with a weak wind.
strength is increased by adopting a ring format for the wind turbine, and the
entire unit is made more lightweight including the drive area.
attached to the blades of the wind turbine to improve wind gust countermeasures
promoting blades are installed on the exhaust port side to improve exhaust
blades are attached in the wind collecting port to draw in the wind.
rectifying blades serve as a guard to keep out wildlife.
* The newest life extending device is attached to the battery so that battery does not need to be replaced.
* Betz’s Law and the Law of Continuity are applied.

* When the cross sectional area is reduced to 1/5, the fluid speed is increased 5 times, and the amount of power that is generated is increased 25 times. Wind is accelerated 5 times by adopting a cross sectional area of 0.15-square-meter for the ring wind turbine relative to the 0.78-square-meter cross sectional area of the outer circumferential dome.

* The energy when wind blows at a speed of 10m/second over an area of 1 square meter is approximately 1kW/h. According to the Betz limit, a maximum of 600W of energy can be converted, but when the mechanical efficiency is 50%, the energy becomes 300W.
the prototype this time, an output of 47W is expected with a wind speed of
2m/second. With a wind speed of 4m/second, the expected output increases to
376W, at 6m/second, it increases to 1,269W, at 8m/second, it increases to
3,008W, and at a wind speed of 10m/second, the expected output is 5,875W.

Lift is generated by counteraction for which the wind direction changes due to the blades. The change in direction of the wind between the top and bottom of the blades results in a powerful counteraction. When the upper wind diverges due to the angle, lift is lost. The ideal shape is called a Zhukovsky blade, and dimples like those on golf balls are believed to be effective at preventing divergence.
at the location where wind accelerates, and increases at the location where

Lift is obtained from counteraction that changes the wind direction. In other words, the direction of the wind changes behind the blades. According to the Law of Continuity, if the amount of exhaust does not change in the same cross-sectional area but the direction changes, the wind speed increases in a triangular area direction. The wind speed is increased by further changing this direction using the rectifying blades, and a trailing vortex is thereby created.
the energy when the wind blows at 10m/second over an area of 1 square meter be
1kW/h, the Betz limit be 60%, and the machine efficiency be 50%. (Ordinarily,
machine efficiency is 60~80%.) A 2m/second wind will accelerate 5 times inside
the dome, and the blade speed will become 10m/second.
* Blade cross-sectional area x 1,000W x 0.6 x 0.5 = power generation capacity with wind speed of 2m/second
According to Betz’s Law, the amount of power generated is proportional to the third power of the wind speed.
* The third power of the quotient of wind speed divided by two x 2m power generation capacity = power generation capacity
* Preliminary performance calculation of 5 times the cross-sectional area ratio with a diameter of 1m (blade cross-sectional area of 0.157 square meter)

Presented at Eurobike we developed the first ever auto recharging E-bike by the sun, integrating a stylish solar panel into the bike.

We make it more independent from traditional power supplies and even cool looking.



LEAOS is different, it is high tech and design totally unified.
We want to change urban mobility which is only possible with innovations and thinking outside standards and breaking rules.
Unisex, light, stylish and made for everyday use. that 's what LEAOS is.

We developed the bike over the last years, brought it to production and success.

To bring the solar bike with the high tech panel to serial production and distribution we need you!


Help and share
If you like the project and can not support us please copy the link above and send it to your friends.
What you get? Please see bottom of the page.


LEAOS has the advantage to have a body instead of tubes. That allowes us not to use only much more designs on the bike but also to integrate technical elements such as the solar panel.

Because of the design of the bike we are able to use a surface to generate enough power. Behind all that there is a innovative way of production, implementing of the panel and hardware electronics to make it work.


            Why it is so great


You do not have to do any effort to recharge the bike. It is just there.

It is cool from the design and highly efficient.



LEAOS is the first E-Bike with a consequent unbroken designline including handlebar and fork. Furthermore the challange was to pack all the technical elements into the body, which is totally new in the bicycle industry.

We work as car designer do, the design is not affected negatively by the technical components.
Zerocarbonfootprint with LEAOS gets to other target groups and out of the ugly style.

Clean carbon fibre monocoque with central motor and NuVinci automatic gear hub.
Integrated Light system, Carbon fibre cockpit with integrated digital display.d

Designed and handmade in Italy
Others about LEAOS
column3:
/>

Until now solar integration in bikes done in that way:
Wings of panels on the bike which never had the potential of becoming a serial production because of the ugly style and not made for everyday use.

We change that! 


With our design solar becomes an integrated part and a design element. 


Many people never would even think in buying an E-Bike because it is uncool, not hipp and many special bikes are not for everyday use.

LEAOS is different. We attract people that love objects with style. And as a collateral effect they also do something good for the enviornment. 

Leaos is made for everyday use. It is constructed very intelligently:

column1: comfortable: automatic gear hub. Nice accessoires: design rack for bags, fully integrated mud guards, bag holder.
Very safe driving: we tested a lot to find a geometry and components which allowes to drive very safely.

LEAOS was developed with a great deal of loving attention to detail. All of the elements have been designed expressly, and harmoniously incorporated into the whole. High-quality materials, such as the leather and the aluminum parts that have been integrated into the body in a visually appealing way, have been artfully combined with the carbon. The carbon handlebar melds seamlessly into the aesthetics of the body. The lights, display and cables are fully integrated into the handlebars and complete the clear and timeless lines.

The bike parts are not only first rate from a visual point of view, but also from a technical standpoint. The shifting is noiseless and automatic, and the sensitive clutch makes for gentle acceleration. You’ll always get as much engine power as you need. The top-notch aluminum parts on the suspension and brake mounting speak to the bike’s technical and aesthetic refinement.




The Cockpit


The Battery



All accessoires are designed specially for LEAOS. We are working all the time on new accessoires to make it even more complete in design and function.

Mud Guards                                                       Carbon rack


The solar panel integration

We work with the panel integration on both sides to get to a reasonable surface. Inside it will have a highly developed electronics board to get out the most and make it work with the whole bikes electronics. The user will not have to turn on or off anything. It is all auto functioning. And you will see the level of solar power coming in.

The bike technology

Carbon Monocoque
The entire E-Bike is build of carbon fibre, also mud guards and rack.
the highlight is the carbon monocoque frame. We are using formula 1 tecnology to make it work. A highly developed body with huge functions and special materials beside the carbon to make it light, flexible and good to ride. Nevertheless there is no aluminum or similiar inside. The body is self-carrying.

Make LEAOS your own. LEAOS bikes can be adjusted to your personal
preferences. Speedy almost to the point of aggressive, without fenders.
Or with mudguards so that you’re sure to be prepared for all weather
conditions. A minimalist carbon rack offers room for a briefcase or
shopping basket. Different handlebar heights and handlebar variants,
like Sport or Comfort, and material options such as wook look, facilitate making it your own.

column3:
/>

We have a fully integrated concept and the first E-Bike with solar panel integration which is a real integration.  Which means that our E- bike is the first and only to integrate seriously all technical components without compromise in design but even better with a totally clean design concept.

In case we do not reach the entire goal you can be sure that we invest the money in the most intelligent way to bring the project to success.

We are a young company that believes in a necessary revolution on the e - bike market regarding design, technology and function. Based in Bolzano, north of Italy. I personally  am expert in marketing, sales and product development. We have got a very good network of engineers, Italian designers and a competent partner of the  industry for the solar panel integration.

info@leaos.com

 Company website



We are now in the second sales year of the LEAOS and build up a relevant sales network. We want to get further and make the revolution on the market even bigger than we already did.

We are in the developement process of the solar integration since one year and have got already fully working prototypes.  We will bring it to serial production in 2015.
column4:
/>

We are developing since 2012 and did already huge investments on our side to to create a very cool unique E-Bike. We already set up a serial production. So we are not using your money just to try something out. But we seriously invest in innovations and out company which is already a serious part of the bicycle industry.

To continue beeing innovative, outstanding and to bring to success the solar bike, that is why we need the money.

column1:
The campain to us is very important because we can become a serious player in our specific segment of lifestyle and new urban mobility.

With the money we will be able to guarantee a highly developed technical feature, and intelligent positioning in the market.
We are used to spend money very strategically, and are able to take out the most possible of any dollar.

So for anyone that decides to help us I can promise that we know the market, have a very good product, not just an idea, and do it with passion because we believe in it.



The value

The project will make you part of a beginning revolution on the e- bike market. You will be one of the people which are part from the beginning.

People generally are looking always more for products they can identify with. And bicycles are much more than just for transportation or following the green energy idea. They can be emotional objects and lead to a future with a totally different mobility concept and be technologically highly innovative in the same time.

You can trust us that we have got a strategic thinking.  We are working on the bike project for three years and the solar project for one year and have done a very clear planning to bring it to success.



free shipping in EU
Please add shipping costs to USA, and other
490 USD for Bikes
10 USD for other



Help and share- what you get
If you like the project and you can not help financially please share us

with the Indiegogo tools. It is a bigger help that you might think.

For 5 refferals that support the campain you will get a LEAOS Key Chain +T-Shirt
• Copy unique sharing link on the top of the campain( round grey symbol )

column1: It's a fact that children burn themselves from the microwave! ""Microwave ovens are perceived by many families as “safer” than conventional ovens and stoves, but they heat foods and liquids to very high temperatures, resulting in burns from spills, splashes and release of steam. In many families, children are permitted to use the microwave but not other heating appliances. The face and upper body are the most common areas burned on children. Hands, arms, abdomens and legs are more frequently injured with adults...
Steam, reaching temperatures greater than 200 degrees, builds rapidly in covered containers and can easily result in burns to the face, arms and hands.

Please use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

","Everyone who uses a microwave!  Hot food tastes best when served on a hot plate, but you don’t have to burn yourself in the process! The Hot Holder is an innovative and practical solution to safeguard microwave users from getting burned while pulling hot dishes from the microwave. THE HOT HOLDER device securely wraps around the bowl/plate you are putting in the microwave. Set the microwave to your desired time and setting. THE HOT HOLDER stays cool while your food and food container in the microwave get hot. After it is done heating, remove the THE HOT HOLDER with your hot plate of food without getting burned.

Designed by product designer Greg L’Heureux who has been instrumental in bringing many products to market for large multinational companies in different industries including medical, consumer goods, manufacturing, design consultancies and aerospace. While working for one design company he received a patent for a consumer work table sold at Sears. At aerospace companies he worked on projects for MIT Lincoln Labs, NASA,
Jet Propulsion Lab, Lawrence Livermore National Ignition Facility, and the James
Webb Space Telescope. He is presently working for Walt Disney Imagineering.

The idea of the Hot Holder project was born out of necessity. Greg was tired of burning his fingers, having to fumble with clumsy oven mitts or spilling his food all over the place. After brainstorming, sketching, and making various handmade as well as 3d printed prototypes he came up with the solution. The Hot Holder’s clam-shell design and locking mechanism, along with the tapered inner surface allows you to place different size bowls and plates in it. The wide overhanging lip is easy to grip and lift your bowl out of the microwave and on to your table or counter. It separates in to 2 pieces to allow placement in the top rack of your dishwasher for cleaning. It can also be left in the microwave for storage and use.

It's a fact that children burn themselves from the microwave! ""Microwave ovens are perceived by many families as “safer” than conventional ovens and stoves, but they heat foods and liquids to very high temperatures, resulting in burns from spills, splashes and release of steam. In many families, children are permitted to use the microwave but not other heating appliances. The face and upper body are the most common areas burned on children. Hands, arms, abdomens and legs are more frequently injured with adults...
Steam, reaching temperatures greater than 200 degrees, builds rapidly in covered containers and can easily result in burns to the face, arms and hands.""

To make the Hot Holder available to customers and stores, at least $30,000 is required initially.  $100,000 is ideal to get off the ground with inventory and advertising and distribution. This amount will go towards the following:

We want to thank you in advance for your support to help Greg's product become reality and to bring convenience and safety to your microwave foods in your own bowls and dishes and avoid heating in plastic containers that can leach unwanted chemicals in to your foods.
If you cannot contribute at this time but believe in this product, please spread the word to everyone you know!
Please use Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.",15.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >Whether you are at home or away,

column1: Blackcatbox is a device designed for smart phone fun. When the device is turned on and a friend logs on to the website they can, with your password, control the device. The device itself connects to your home's WiFi and it sends the feed to your mobile devices over WiFi, 3G and 4G cellular networks.

Blackcatbox

 

is a state of the art device LIKE NO OTHER on the planet! Weighing about as much as a hard cover novel.. you might say wow... that's light... and we said that too after finding out on a normal full charge the device will bring over a half hour of pleasure and memories. Ok... maybe not memories, but the colors we offer are quite vivid! Take a look at the renditions below to see how the device extends and contracts along with its awesome ticklers making your daily checklist... feed the dog, take out the trash, go to work... damn... and enjoy some stimulation...aaahhhhhhh.

Blackcatbox is designed for the most fun and enduring sensations you can have with ...or without a friend! We spent a lot of time to make sure the dimensions and shapes were accurate as well as comfortable. Take a look at the size and the care that went into all aspects of the device.

Blackcatbox is a great solution for bringing people together around the world.   Since the device connects to WiFi, it's compatible in your home no matter where
you are located as long as you have a wireless router and internet connection.

Blackcatbox  designed for fun kit comes with a neat key chain for collectors, a  beautiful lined in foam black linen covered box, a black velvet bag lined in red satin to store your device discreetly away from prying eyes, and your choice of either a US ac plug charge or European plug charger to recharge your device. When you've had too much fun, just plug it in and relax...

Last but not least a tube of ID Lube Glide lubricant for moist smooth  and sensual functionality. We recommend ID Lube brand's lubricants for usage with our device as it should always be used with silicone safe lubricants...ALWAYS use a lubricant to increase the devices function and sensation.
We completed the hardware design and produced FINAL working prototypes. We have the mold costing

column1: Progress along the way... Step one was for us to get the right motors and batteries, and from there we could make sure the fun was going to always be dependable
Our next step was to make sure the electronics and the motors could keep up with the user's imagination... good thing our engineers are pretty slick individuals... they even amaze us sometimes!

Then, after all that, we could figure out how to make the device look good and feel even better... We used the most state of the art SLA 3D printers on the market and we're always making changes to build the best toy available!

This is actually a photo of our very first PCB and the USI/Broadcom Wi-Fi chip alongside. We didn't skimp on anything... our PCB designers and Electrical Engineers insisted they wanted our logo on the PCB Circuitry 'cause they were proud to say its all our own custom design! We use a USI Broadcom Wi-Fi chip: the very same as you might find in your apple or android smart device.

We are beyond proud of the complete package, from the matte Black linen covered box with a custom cut foam inside to protect and to keep safe from prying eyes to the subtly embossed logo on the cover that gives a rich appeal... to the soft velvet bag that lets your device sleep in style or the key chain that's going be the talk of your friends! Blackcatbox is not just a product, a device, or just your run of the mill vibrator.... it's technology... it's the next wave in cyber sensuality....Blackcatbox is a way of enjoying life the way it's meant to be enjoyed!
Our awesome Blackcatbox embossed Matte Black Linen covered box will protect the device in shipping and if you want to make it a safe home for the device it will do that too!
Of course our Black Linen box will be shipped inside a discrete brown box from Sikwrx, Inc. that will help keep prying eyes away.

We are proud that over the last year we have made HUGE steps in progress and though it may seem we sparred no expense, we have been extremely thrifty since it's the teams money that we have had the honor of using! We will carry on that frugal and thrifty mentality, insuring you as our VALUED customer get a valuable and worthwhile product.

We're looking to raise these funds to fast-track production. Wouldn't it be nice to be able to give the Blackcatbox device as a gift for Valentines Day? The funds raised will be used for finalization of the silicone molds, purchase of the plastic molds and begin the manufacturing process. Your support will go directly to cover the cost of manufacturing the actual device you ordered.

Any additional funds will be allocated to additional products, as well as advancing user friendly mobile app development. We have invested $100,000 of our own funds for design, patent filing, prototyping, software validation and programming.

column2: $295Int'l contributors to Blackcatbox. After the first 1000 are gone, everyone else who contributes over $250 will receive Blackcatbox before the normal retail sales on Blackcatbox.com and in retail stores. column1: For the supporter who wants to celebrate this milestone, we are offering the very first Blackcatbox device off the production line for $1000.  If you'd like, we'll sign the device. We will also send you one additional device for regular use so that you can keep the very first Blackcatbox signed device as a souvenir/collectors item.

Blackcatbox means more to us than just the next sex gadget. We believe
Blackcatbox can help couples to grow closer and stay connected in their lives. We believe Blackcatbox to be an enriching and enhancing relationship technology. We are passionate about creating useful technologies that are user friendly, and we work hard to do it. We believe in creating reliable and quality products that are built all over the world with the world's best materials and components, and designed here in the USA! It's economically brought to you with the highest level of quality and minimal design for a fun, personal and friendly user experience.

The Blackcatbox /Sikwrx, Inc. team's passion is to create groundbreaking technologies that fit right into our digital lifestyles.  Our team has previously designed, developed and manufactured some of the world's leading consumer personal computer devices. Our team consists of 2 designers and 3 engineers who have mechanical, bio-mechanical and electrical degrees with decades of experience providing an in-depth knowledge of solutions that have NEVER been seen before.

We are fortunate for the past experience which has greatly reduced the learning curve for this project. Our team of engineers and production designers are experienced in developing and manufacturing consumer technology. This includes the design and development of hardware, software, mobile apps and retail packaging, as well as the manufacturing, distribution and marketing.

We know that every project has it's challenges.  We're confident that our
experience helps us to understand what to expect and how to handle the
unexpected!
Blackcatbox is designed to work off your router in your home, or any wifi device that your computer or smart phone may have access to with proper security codes.
All PC, hand held and smart phone devices are supported as long as they are able to access internet service. It will run on all 3 major platforms found on smart phones, tablets and PCs.

No. All you need to do is take the device out of the box! It will have a small charge. It comes with a charger, so plug it into the wall outlet (your choice US or European) and it will automatically charge
Blackcatbox has built in 6 volts of power NiMh rechargeable BATTERIES.

Will I be able to use the device
without a phone?
Yes, Blackcatbox has a manual mode where it can record motions that you like, or use the simple commands that come preset on the device from the factory.
With many options you can use your laptop to have a video interface with a friend while using the app/internet connection to control the device.

email us at: sales@blackcatbox.com

Website: http://www.blackcatbox.com/
