","Sikwrx, Inc. is a technology company creating groundbreaking technologies that fit right into our digital lifestyles. Sikwrx, Inc. has created a new wave of pleasure product called Blackcatbox™. Blackcatbox™ is revolutionizing smart phone fun by giving users the ability to control the Blackcatbox™ stroking device from around the world or from a single touch of the device.
Whether you are at home or away, Blackcatbox™ provides virtual reality for the enhancement of the intimate side of life.

Blackcatbox is a device designed for smart phone fun. When the device is turned on and a friend logs on to the website they can, with your password, control the device. The device itself connects to your home's WiFi and it sends the feed to your mobile devices over WiFi, 3G and 4G cellular networks.

Blackcatbox  is a state of the art device LIKE NO OTHER on the planet! Weighing about as much as a hard cover novel.. you might say wow... that's light... and we said that too after finding out on a normal full charge the device will bring over a half hour of pleasure and memories. Ok... maybe not memories, but the colors we offer are quite vivid! Take a look at the renditions below to see how the device extends and contracts along with its awesome ticklers making your daily checklist... feed the dog, take out the trash, go to work... damn... and enjoy some stimulation...aaahhhhhhh.

Blackcatbox is designed for the most fun and enduring sensations you can have with ...or without a friend! We spent a lot of time to make sure the dimensions and shapes were accurate as well as comfortable. Take a look at the size and the care that went into all aspects of the device.
Global functioning device via wireless router & internet connection

Blackcatbox is a great solution for bringing people together around the world.   Since the device connects to WiFi, it's compatible in your home no matter whereyou are located as long as you have a wireless router and internet connection.

When you've had too much fun, just plug it in and relax...

The Problem - a common one
Tangled cords and lost headsets are constantly growing problems
column2: an iPod without headphones is useless, and an iPhone without a handsfree device is a dangerous distraction when driving, not to mention illegal in 10 U.S.states. Because current solutions are either device specific, bulky and ugly, or are separate from the device, these problems have persisted. Until now.

column1: A Bakjax is a patent pending attachable pocket to hold your bluetooth or headphones and keep it where you need it, with your device! The Bakjax is designed to work on a wide variety of devices such as the iPhone (all models including the iPhone 5), Android or Windows smartphones, larger iPods, etc.  We've tested it with nearly 50 different devices successfully. Because a Bakjax is made from very thin but durable materials, it adds no bulk to your device when it is empty, and it works on devices with or without cases.

If you need to remove the Bakjax from your device, in 2 seconds it becomes a self contained carrying case. Whether you drop it in your purse, your cup holder, or your pocket, it is easily found. Then, simply reattach the Bakjax to your device (in about 5 seconds), and your stuff is right where you need it.
What else could you use a Bakjax for?

Made of two joined solid pieces of durable fabric, the Bakjax uses the opposing tension from the corners of the device to secure itself. Using a pull-tab velcro closure, your Bakjax becomes an enclosed carrying case, keeping your headphones tangle free and any other items secure.

We've been developing and refining the design of the Bakjax for almost 4 years, to arrive at what we feel is the perfect solution. Bakjaxes are made in our very own production facility in Vancouver, Washington. Headed up by Roberta (with nearly 20 years of manufacturing experience), a small team of expert seamstresses hand craft each piece with attention to detail and a sharp eye for quality. Bakjaxes are shipped in eco-friendly, minimalist packaging to reduce environmental impact.

When we meet our funding goal here on indiegogo, we will ramp up production volume as well as turn around time by growing our own facility capacity and/or targeting new production facilities around the world.
We'd like to make the world a little bit more organized
column2:
with your help, we can do just that.

How does Indiegogo work?

Indiegogo is a funding platform for creative projects.  We have personally set up everything on this page including our project funding goal and deadline.  If you think Mobile-Mags is as fantastic as we do and would like to try it sooner than later, then all you have to do is click on one of our great rewards on the right side of the page.  If you would like to help the Mobile-Mags venture, please jump on board and please spread the word!

Imagine a driver receiving a phone call and the phone has slipped out of the dash cubbyhole onto the floorboards black hole.   Noticing the fumbling driver a police officer pulls over the driver and issues a ticket.  Essentially, this is a daily occurrence all over the world and with the evolving laws for hand-free devices we introduce to you Mobile-Mags.
Mobile-Mags is a simple accessory that uses magnetic attraction to hold any mobile device on the market.
For details visit www.mobile-mags.com or shoot us an email

Mobile-Mags has been re-engineered to be wonderfully simple to use and incredibly robust. Using Mobile-Mags exclusive magnetic structure, the magnetics’ now act like a ""Socket and a Plug"" that work perfectly together and looks amazing when in place. Which give this product line is ""Magnetic Attraction"" name as display on our website and packaging www.Mobile-Mags.com.

A Mobile-Mags unit is the perfect way to hold your mobile device while driving or simply wanting a secure place for storage while in class or working out at the gym.  Depending on the Mobile-Mag you choose, a small magnetic cradle attaches most anywhere (such as dashboard, inside locker, office, home) using a 3M high performance adhesive or simply attach to air vent.   Once the Mobile-Disc has been adhered by the 3M adhesive to the back of your mobile device you are ready for your hands-free experience.

Especially for the larger mobile devices such as Readers or Tablets we designed the Base-Mag or the Base-Mag with a gripper. The special rotating cradle allows you to rotate from portrait to landscape positions with a simple turn of the wrist.

Mobile-Discs are the round button like discs that are put on the back of your mobile device with a 3M adhesive then will enable you to snap your mobile device onto the Mobile-Mag product as shown here:

The First device is called the “Button-Mag"". The Button-Mags attaches mobile devices magnetically to a fixed location. Simply attach the Button-Mag in a fixed position inside your home or office, automobile, school or gym locker, boat, a garage wall or any location you would like to have your mobile device. This enables a hands-free to enjoy listening to music or talking on the cell phone.

The Second device is called the “Gripper-Mag"". This gripper device has been specially designed to grip onto your automobile’s air vent without damaging the air vent. We have developed this grip device with special rivets so that the gripper remains in place when lifting mobile device from the cradle. In addition, this Mobile-Mag device can be easily removed so that it may be used from one vehicle to another. This device works with all MP3/4 players, and all Cell Phones. This device is very small and discreet unlike other mobile cradles in the marketplace that are very bulky or obstructive.

The Third product is the “Base-Mag"" with a gripper. This device is very similar to product the Gripper-Mag however, we have designed a exclusive rubber cradle that is capable to be used with all mobile devices such as MP3/4 Players, All Cell Phone brands, all Mobile GPS devices, and all sizes of Tablet Computers. In addition this Mobile-Mag device can be used in the landscape or portrait positions with a simple twist of the wrist.

The fourth product is called the “Base-Mag”. This product has been specially designed for all mobile devices. It works with MP3/4 Players, all Cell Phones (even the very largest units), Mobile GPS units and Tablet Computers, such as the IPad or IPad Mini. This unit special application can be used in the landscape or portrait positions therefore you can rotate the mobile device to your preferred viewing position. You can also remove this device from car to car, or attach the product from you car to your home, office area, garage, school/gym locker, Boat or RV just by pulling the device from its magnetic base and reattaching it at the next location by the use of multiple bases we will be providing in the packaging.
Once we are funded here is what our packaging will look like!  Look for us in places such as your local convenient store.
• It works with any mobile design or brand (MP3/4, GPS, Cell Phone, Reader, or Tablet)
• It is simple and robust (mount the Mobile-Mag of choice and you are ready to be hands-free!)
• It is removable form one location to another
• It is useful in your Automobile, RV, Boat, School or Gym locker, Home, Office, or any place you want to secure your mobile device.
• It does not clutter your dashboard or windshield
• It is preventative measure in preventing a citation for using your mobile device while driving
• Recruited the support of 3M Adhesive company which has assured us the best adhesive for all extreme weather conditions,
• Recruited the local branch of Opportunity Village which will help us assemble and package Mobile-Mags.
• Three of the seven molds have been developed
First we need to raise enough money for production and manufacturing.  If you would like a Mobile-Mag or have a friend/family member that would like one, please back us.
Second we need you to spread the word.  Please pass on our campaign via Email, Tweets, Facebook, or visit our website at WWW.Mobile-Mags.com.
• Tooling and Production of the first 10,000 units of each Mobile-Mag design
• Packaging and instruction material using recycled materials

Once we reach the $60,000 goal, PLEASE CONTINUE WITH YOUR DONATIONS.  The sky is the limit and with your generous donations we will make history together by being the only universal mobile device holder supported by this grassroots manner.  Your additional financial support will allow us to implement a broader marketing campaign and accelerate our ability to ensure Mobile-Mags is your favorite hands-free device on the market.
Q: Will a magnet damage your mobile device?

A: No magnets have no effect on solid state electronics such as phones, gps units, or tablets.  Mobile-Mags does use a strong magnet so we suggest using caution around magnetically sensitive items such as credit cards, pacemakers, and hard drives.  Mobile-Mags assumes no liability for damage to such devices.
Tablet and phone cases have been made using magnets without harm to the device http://www.macworld.com/article/1164814/the_week_in_ios_accessories_wrap_it_up.html%20%20
According to PC World “There’s nothing magnetic in flash memory, so [a magnet] won’t do anything”.
Q: What if I want to remove the cradle from its location or the button from my mobile device?  Is it permanent?
A: No.  While the 3M adhesive is very strong, it can be removed without damage.  Do Not Reuse the 3M adhesive.  We will be happy to mail you a new adhesive.

Our names are Terry and Carolyn Golliher.  We are a husband and wife team that lives in Henderson, Nevada. Our three children keep us very busy and we are constantly looking for new ways to get ahead. Especially Terry.  Countless times Terry has found new ideas that will be the “next-best-thing” that inevitably ends up becoming the newest artifact added to the museum of pastime creations of the garage.  He has always been looking for something simple and sellable to help improve the quality of life for his family, friends and others.  So our story begins.

One day as the Golliher family was driving to their favorite restaurant he had turned the corner and his cell phone flew out of a small cubbyhole onto the floorboard (we call this the vehicles black whole because most of the time when something falls, it is never again found). When this happens all of the passengers were scrambling in trying to figure out where the device ultimately ended up. So, once retrieved, Terry had realized that there was a great need for all mobile users to have a secure holding device for his or her mobile device of choice.

So, Terry went shopping for the different holders on the market and found that many where too intrusive or product brand specific (such as Apple). He also discovered that many products were very expensive, or complicated to install besides usage and not readily available for the common consumer to buy. Moreover, much of the mobile holders are made in a foreign country.

Ultimately, Terry was so frustrated with the whole process he decided to manufacture a magnet holding device that would be user friendly for all age groups, priced affordably, convenient for purchasing, and most of all manufactured in the United States.

After months of research and hard work we agreed to design several models to accommodate different applications for the common consumer.  Our goal is to manufacture a product that would be user friendly and affordable.  In addition to providing a useful product for the consumer it was extremely important to employ locals and to help bring back manufacturing to the United States.  In a small way we would be able to employ several people along the way.  So, with your kind donations from Indiegogo we will be able to collaborate with the 3M adhesive, a CAD Drawer, a Tooling and manufacturing company, a Art and Video Graphics company, a box company, and assembly plus packing by the local Opportunity Village employees.

Learning from previous projects, we know what it takes to make a product like this.  Tooling, production, and fulfillment are all lined up, so now we only need deposits in order to start manufacturing.  That said, things don’t always go as expected, and delays sometimes occur.  It is for this reason
column2: we have built in a buffer period into our delivery expectations.  More importantly, we have created a very clear schedule so if things do arise, you will be the first to know.  We are all in this together.  We want to make sure that everyone is well informed as things progress.

column1: A Special Thank you in helping us so far!

Rebecca Collett, Steven George, Stephanie George, Peggy Golliher, Robert Wood, Craig MacNeil, Coco Shi, Jackie Liang, Mr. Wallen, Joe Biaz, Kelly Ter Avest, Tom and Diane Ray, Bill Simington, Lottie Hildebrand, Cay Tait, Indiegogo, and our supportive children Kara, Chris, and Patrick.

Indiegogo is a funding platform for creative projects.  We have personally set up everything on this page including our project funding goal and deadline.  If you think Mobile-Mags is as fantastic as we do and would like to try it sooner than later, then all you have to do is click on one of our great rewards on the right side of the page.  If you would like to help the Mobile-Mags venture, please jump on board and please spread the word!

Imagine a driver receiving a phone call and the phone has slipped out of the dash cubbyhole onto the floorboards black hole.   Noticing the fumbling driver a police officer pulls over the driver and issues a ticket.  Essentially, this is a daily occurrence all over the world and with the evolving laws for hand-free devices we introduce to you Mobile-Mags.
Mobile-Mags is a simple accessory that uses magnetic attraction to hold any mobile device on the market.
For details visit www.mobile-mags.com or shoot us an email

Mobile-Mags has been re-engineered to be wonderfully simple to use and incredibly robust. Using Mobile-Mags exclusive magnetic structure, the magnetics’ now act like a ""Socket and a Plug"" that work perfectly together and looks amazing when in place. Which give this product line is ""Magnetic Attraction"" name as display on our website and packaging www.Mobile-Mags.com.

A Mobile-Mags unit is the perfect way to hold your mobile device while driving or simply wanting a secure place for storage while in class or working out at the gym.  Depending on the Mobile-Mag you choose, a small magnetic cradle attaches most anywhere (such as dashboard, inside locker, office, home) using a 3M high performance adhesive or simply attach to air vent.   Once the Mobile-Disc has been adhered by the 3M adhesive to the back of your mobile device you are ready for your hands-free experience.

Especially for the larger mobile devices such as Readers or Tablets we designed the Base-Mag or the Base-Mag with a gripper. The special rotating cradle allows you to rotate from portrait to landscape positions with a simple turn of the wrist.

Mobile-Discs are the round button like discs that are put on the back of your mobile device with a 3M adhesive then will enable you to snap your mobile device onto the Mobile-Mag product as shown here:

The First device is called the “Button-Mag"". The Button-Mags attaches mobile devices magnetically to a fixed location. Simply attach the Button-Mag in a fixed position inside your home or office, automobile, school or gym locker, boat, a garage wall or any location you would like to have your mobile device. This enables a hands-free to enjoy listening to music or talking on the cell phone.

The Second device is called the “Gripper-Mag"". This gripper device has been specially designed to grip onto your automobile’s air vent without damaging the air vent. We have developed this grip device with special rivets so that the gripper remains in place when lifting mobile device from the cradle. In addition, this Mobile-Mag device can be easily removed so that it may be used from one vehicle to another. This device works with all MP3/4 players, and all Cell Phones. This device is very small and discreet unlike other mobile cradles in the marketplace that are very bulky or obstructive.

The Third product is the “Base-Mag"" with a gripper. This device is very similar to product the Gripper-Mag however, we have designed a exclusive rubber cradle that is capable to be used with all mobile devices such as MP3/4 Players, All Cell Phone brands, all Mobile GPS devices, and all sizes of Tablet Computers. In addition this Mobile-Mag device can be used in the landscape or portrait positions with a simple twist of the wrist.

The fourth product is called the “Base-Mag”. This product has been specially designed for all mobile devices. It works with MP3/4 Players, all Cell Phones (even the very largest units), Mobile GPS units and Tablet Computers, such as the IPad or IPad Mini. This unit special application can be used in the landscape or portrait positions therefore you can rotate the mobile device to your preferred viewing position. You can also remove this device from car to car, or attach the product from you car to your home, office area, garage, school/gym locker, Boat or RV just by pulling the device from its magnetic base and reattaching it at the next location by the use of multiple bases we will be providing in the packaging.
Once we are funded here is what our packaging will look like!  Look for us in places such as your local convenient store.
It works with any mobile design or brand (MP3/4, GPS, Cell Phone, Reader, or Tablet)
It is simple and robust (mount the Mobile-Mag of choice and you are ready to be hands-free!)
It is removable form one location to another
It is useful in your Automobile, RV, Boat, School or Gym locker, Home, Office, or any place you want to secure your mobile device.
It does not clutter your dashboard or windshield
It is preventative measure in preventing a citation for using your mobile device while driving
What We Have Accomplished So Far
Recruited the support of 3M Adhesive company which has assured us the best adhesive for all extreme weather conditions,
Recruited the local branch of Opportunity Village which will help us assemble and package Mobile-Mags.
Three of the seven molds have been developed
Extensive relationships with mobile device retailers
First we need to raise enough money for production and manufacturing.  If you would like a Mobile-Mag or have a friend/family member that would like one, please back us.
Second we need you to spread the word.  Please pass on our campaign via Email, Tweets, Facebook, or visit our website at WWW.Mobile-Mags.com.
Tooling and Production of the first 10,000 units of each Mobile-Mag design
Packaging and instruction material using recycled materials

Once we reach the $60,000 goal, PLEASE CONTINUE WITH YOUR DONATIONS.  The sky is the limit and with your generous donations we will make history together by being the only universal mobile device holder supported by this grassroots manner.  Your additional financial support will allow us to implement a broader marketing campaign and accelerate our ability to ensure Mobile-Mags is your favorite hands-free device on the market.
Q: Will a magnet damage your mobile device?

A: No magnets have no effect on solid state electronics such as phones, gps units, or tablets.  Mobile-Mags does use a strong magnet so we suggest using caution around magnetically sensitive items such as credit cards, pacemakers, and hard drives.  Mobile-Mags assumes no liability for damage to such devices.
Tablet and phone cases have been made using magnets without harm to the device http://www.macworld.com/article/1164814/the_week_in_ios_accessories_wrap_it_up.html%20%20
According to PC World “There’s nothing magnetic in flash memory, so [a magnet] won’t do anything”.
Q: What if I want to remove the cradle from its location or the button from my mobile device?  Is it permanent?
A: No.  While the 3M adhesive is very strong, it can be removed without damage.  Do Not Reuse the 3M adhesive.  We will be happy to mail you a new adhesive.

Our names are Terry and Carolyn Golliher.  We are a husband and wife team that lives in Henderson, Nevada. Our three children keep us very busy and we are constantly looking for new ways to get ahead. Especially Terry.  Countless times Terry has found new ideas that will be the “next-best-thing” that inevitably ends up becoming the newest artifact added to the museum of pastime creations of the garage.  He has always been looking for something simple and sellable to help improve the quality of life for his family, friends and others.  So our story begins.

One day as the Golliher family was driving to their favorite restaurant he had turned the corner and his cell phone flew out of a small cubbyhole onto the floorboard (we call this the vehicles black whole because most of the time when something falls, it is never again found). When this happens all of the passengers were scrambling in trying to figure out where the device ultimately ended up. So, once retrieved, Terry had realized that there was a great need for all mobile users to have a secure holding device for his or her mobile device of choice.

So, Terry went shopping for the different holders on the market and found that many where too intrusive or product brand specific (such as Apple). He also discovered that many products were very expensive, or complicated to install besides usage and not readily available for the common consumer to buy. Moreover, much of the mobile holders are made in a foreign country.

Ultimately, Terry was so frustrated with the whole process he decided to manufacture a magnet holding device that would be user friendly for all age groups, priced affordably, convenient for purchasing, and most of all manufactured in the United States.

After months of research and hard work we agreed to design several models to accommodate different applications for the common consumer.  Our goal is to manufacture a product that would be user friendly and affordable.  In addition to providing a useful product for the consumer it was extremely important to employ locals and to help bring back manufacturing to the United States.  In a small way we would be able to employ several people along the way.  So, with your kind donations from Indiegogo we will be able to collaborate with the 3M adhesive, a CAD Drawer, a Tooling and manufacturing company, a Art and Video Graphics company, a box company, and assembly plus packing by the local Opportunity Village employees.

Learning from previous projects, we know what it takes to make a product like this.  Tooling, production, and fulfillment are all lined up, so now we only need deposits in order to start manufacturing.  That said, things don’t always go as expected, and delays sometimes occur.  It is for this reason
column2: we have built in a buffer period into our delivery expectations.  More importantly, we have created a very clear schedule so if things do arise, you will be the first to know.  We are all in this together.  We want to make sure that everyone is well informed as things progress.

MemoriesCable combines lots of additional storage space for your iPhone/iPad so you can charge and backup at the same time.

Most of us have 2 issues with our iPhones and iPads:

column1: • We run out of space because we have too much ‘stuff’ on them
• We regularly need to charge our smartphones

column2: >MemoriesCable solves these problems… and much more!

column1: A flash drive that connects to your iPhone/iPad but also acts as a charging cable so you can stream, backup and juice-up at the same time

column2: >MemoriesCable lets you store and manage data

column1: • Automatically backs up and charges your iOS device
• Carry all your movies, music, photos and documents on the MemoriesCable wherever you go
• Stream your music or movies to your iPhone/iPad without taking up space on your phone or tablet
• Backup your photos and videos to MemoriesCable and clear up space on your iPhone
• Access and manage files in your cloud storage, such as Dropbox and Google Drive
• Backup all the photos, albums and movies from your social media accounts, such as Facebook, Instagram and Flickr
• Secure your files and folders with passwords

column2: >Use Touch ID to secure unauthorised access to the i-FlashDrive ONE app and also lock the MemoriesCable so it cant be accessed without your personal secure passcode

column1: • AirPlay your movies straight to your big-screen TV easily
• Record, transfer or share your voice recordings easily
• Free i-FlashDrive ONE app is available on the AppStore and is packed full of amazing features and solutions.
Every update brings something new and exciting.

column2: >The compact size and portability means you don't need clunky hard drives with you any more. And maybe your iPhone can replace even needing to carry your laptop with you.

column1: PhotoFast created the first i-FlashDrive’s in 2009. So for our latest hardware release of the MemoriesCable we want to achieve the following:
• Let tech lovers be the first to get easy access to the MemoriesCable.
• Offer an advantage on the retail price to Indiegogo followers.
• Get feedback on the MemoriesCable and our app from an important customer base…you guys!
• Tell your friends about it and Like our page.
• Hear back from potential distributors around the World.

PhotoFast designed the first i-FlashDrive back in 2009. The founder of PhotoFast, Warren Wang, came up with the concept after feeling frustrated of the limitations on his new iPhone 2G of handling data. Warren's storage and data background influenced the idea to have a flash drive for iPhones, which seemed like the natural solution.

Hardware that communicated with the iOS was the biggest challenge but not impossible. After finalising the prototype and receiving Apple's MFi certification the first generation hit the market in 2011.
Ever since then PhotoFast have continued to make the drives more powerful, smaller and supported by the i-FlashDrive ONE app that allows data handling to be smooth and natural for Apple fans.
MemoriesCable was designed to solve the problems of data backup, added storage and charging all in one for iPhone and iPad users everywhere.

""MemoriesCable is our 13th generation of product and we are proud to offer it on the Indiegogo platform where we believe most of the followers are as crazy about technology as we are"", commented CEO Warren Wang.

PhotoFast have chosen to use the Indiegogo platform because there has never been an iOS storage device in the form of a cable. Getting the MemoriesCable into the hands of such an important peer group quickly was the main advantage as well as to have a very dynamic way of receiving fast feedback.
""We hope the Indiegogo followers love the MemoriesCable as much as we do and we highly anticipate their comments and opinions to our launch"", stated Wang.
• Here are some of the technical specs
We have been very fortunate to have outstanding reviews from the Global media. Thank you for your kind support...

FAQs:
- What devices is the MemoriesCable compatible with?
MemoriesCable works with all Apple Lightning devices, such as :
- iPhone 5, 5C, 5S, 6 and 6 Plus
- iPad Air and Air 2
- iPad mini, mini 2 and mini 3
- iPad 4th generation
- iPod Touch 5th generation
- PC or Mac with USB port
- Will MemoriesCable be compatible with the new iOS 9?
Yes, MemoriesCable has already been tested with the iOS 9 beta release and functions perfectly.
- Is the i-FlashDrive ONE APP free and where can I find it?
i-FlashDrive ONE APP is free and full of features. It is available in the App Store to download for free. https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/i-flashdrive-one/id912314964?mt=8

- Is i-FlashDrive ONE app compatible with all iOS versions?
i-FlashDrive ONE app is compatible with iOS 7.0 or later.
- Is the i-FlashDrive ONE app available in different languages?
i-FlashDrive ONE app is available in 23-languagaes. Based on the default language of your iPhone/iPad the i-FlashDrive ONE app will automatically adjust to that language.
- Can I copy files from &
column2:
to the MemoriesCable and my iPhone or iPad?
Yes, files can be copied either from the MemoriesCable to the iPhone/iPad and also the other way.
Think of it as a USB where you can copy, delete, move or even play directly from the MemoriesCable.
- Can I watch movies from the MemoriesCable without copying the movie to my iPhone or iPad?
Yes, all files can be read directly from the MemoriesCable so you don't need to take up space on your iPhone/iPad with your movies or favourite TV shows. This also applies to music, photos and documents.
- What files types are compatible between my MemoriesCable and iPhone/iPad?
Video: .mp4, .m4v, .mpv, .mov, .avi, .mpg, .mkv, .wmv, .flv, .3gp, .gif
Audio: .wav, .aac, .aif, .aiff, .caf, .m4a, .mp3
Images: .jpg, .tiff, .gif, .png
Documents: .doc and .docx (Microsoft Word)
column14:
.ics
- Does the MemoriesCable need to be charged?
No, the MemoriesCable has no battery and does not need charged. It just works!
- Does the MemoriesCable require a connection like WiFi or 3G/4G?
No, the MemoriesCable and the i-FlashDrive ONE app main features can work together without any data signal such as WiFi or 3G/4G.
Access to your cloud storage functions or data that is not stored on MemoriesCable or your iPhone/iPad would require a network connection.
- Where are the MemoriesCable manufactured?
MemoriesCable is designed and manufactured in Taipei, Taiwan.

hicon smart wristband is all your social networks, made wearable.

Hi - We are Tomaso, Gilles, Johnny, Marco and Vittorio from Milan (Italy) and Lugano (Swiss) and we want to tell you about a product we really believe in. It's called hicon - The social Bangle, and it can simplify your life, keeping you  always updated  only about smartphone notifications and social network events that are really important for You.
In the internet of things and wearable technologies market, wearable devices and smart wristbands lack a true “social display” that enable them to:
• Communicate our personality and affiliation to particular social spheres.
• Encourage visual recognition and physical interaction between other members of the same social networks:

• Updates to keep us connected to our social networks in all situations where we cannot have our Smartphone close to us: at school in business meetings, on the beach, while doing sports, while driving, etc.

column2: >hicon is a groundbreaking, wearable communicator that helps you effortlessly share and organize all your social media.  Tether this fashion smart wristband wirelessly to any smartphone via its intuitive app and go!   Now all your social accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linked In, Pinterest, Viber, WhatsApp and Google Plus are represented by customized icons displayed right on your wrist.  When an alert goes to your smartphone, hicon gently vibrates and lights up in real-time, displaying your specified social network.  hicon also makes meeting new people a breeze.  When users with matching preset interests come in contact, the band will blink to help you make a connection.  hicon brilliantly brings on-line social networking to the physical space.  When it's time to transfer information between devices, do it with a simple hand shake ... it's that easy!  hicon even locates your misplaced phone.  It's 100% waterproof, sand and shock proof, so you can wear it ANYWHERE.

column1:
Meet hicon:

hicon wristband is a hi-tech, silicone material shatterproof,  shockproof and waterproof, avaible in many colors and textures, with interchangeable  social network and smartphone notification icons, it is connected via Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to your  smartphone through its application. Whenever you receive a notification from social  networks or by smartphone applications (mail messages, phone calls, battery life), the corresponding icon lights up and vibrates with discretion. Thanks to the feature “social matching”, you can exchange contacts and references of the social network through the bracelets with  predefined gesture, so we can easily find ourselves in the “virtual” world, share common  interests and passions on the various social network sites, used to generate community  that multiply the spread of the bracelet.

column1:
How it works:

Plug the icons  you prefer!
column2: >The icons will illuminate and the bracelet vibrates every time your smartphone receives a notification. Might be an incoming call, calendar alert, text message, email  or events of your social networks. You can dismiss every notification with a  simple shake of your wrist.

column1: Always connected through Bluetooth 4.0 !

column5: > You can add contacts to your phone and  exchange social media profiles  with just a high-five with  or a simple handshake. By tagging digital functions to this friendly gesture that comes naturally to us, hicon gives more meaning to your social interactions. Share your contacts and let your network grow!

column2: >Thanks to the feature “social matching”, hicon lights itself and discreetly warns you when you meet special people really related to you, your world and your passions and interests

>Thanks to the feature “radar"" you can find through a geo-referenced map the profiles of other bangle bracelet users around you. You can exchange and  share contacts, references, common interests and passions and generate new communities.

>The hicon bangle acts like a tether to your phone, letting you know if you’ve left it behind. hicon wristband will notify you immediately lighting all the icons simultaneously when you go out of range. The 30/50ft separation alert will make sure your smartphone is always safe and secure.
>Textures, colors and interchangeable icons to make your bracelet unique and capable of expressing the most of your social profile.

column1: Notification calls, SMS, instant messaging and social pages: the hicon smart wristband vibrates and specific  icons light up.

column2: >The wide range of colours, the elegant design and hypoallergenic materials make hicon the ideal accessory in every context.
>hicon Bangle, is made of shatter-proof silicone material, it is waterproof and shockproof.
>Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to be always connected with your smart phone and never miss a notification.
>You can meet each other in the real world and share business and social network contacts with a simple handshake.

column1: Which feature/function do you want hicon to add the most?
Many of you have given us AWESOME IDEAS! However, we want to make sure we bring you the features and functions that YOU most want for hicon.
Vote for the feature or function you want most for hicon below and we'll get to work on bringing the most popular choices to you!

column3: >

column1: The Black hicon tone on tone  based on the new and improved design  is now available as new perk:
These are just some of the features:
• Choice and subsequent custom configuration of smartphone notifications you want to activate on the hicon wristband: call, email, sms, low phone battery life, calendar.
• Choice and  configuration with icons of social networks and activation of related notifications: follow, likes, messages, friend requests and comments.
• Stop receiving a notification with a simple shake of the wrist

• Search and display geo-referenced “radar” of the profiles of other hicon users with the same affinity as ours (level of affinity, which generates a notification on the bracelet customizable by each user) and installed with the same icons of our social networks.
<li>Gesture recognition: Exchange and storing business contacts and social networks through personalized gesture (clap, handshake, give me five) or via app if we are physically far

column2: >The first challenge we will face is mass production. As a company, our goal is to bring our customers the utmost satisfaction with everything we make. The combined experience of our team members offers an extensive background in product development and mass production. Yet, in reality, there is always uncertainty in large-scale production and scheduling of shipments. In order to mitigate these risks, we are partnering with some of the most experienced manufacturers and suppliers in the industry who are specialized in high-end consumer electronics. Timing is the other challenge we will be facing. Before we can sell our product to the market, we need to obtain certifications such as FCC and CE to meet industry legal requirements. Usually, certification takes about four weeks and we would apply for it two months before our first shipment. We have high hopes that we will pass all certifications . However, if the product fails due to a reason that is not accounted for, we will be looking at a one- to three-months delay. Despite the risks and challenges ahead of us, we promise to continuously update you all on our progress and any other important news.

20 September 2014 - Dear Friends and Supporters,in the last month following your feedback, suggestions and ideas, we have worked hard on a very important implementation of hicon. Now, we are proud  to announce  that  we have  successfully achieved this  goal.

This very important implementation is almost completed. Next week we will receive the final  prototypes and we will share with all of you the images of the first models of hicon with OLED display on the new hicon Indiegogo Campaign, so stay tuned with us!

We are advancing well toward the finalized product even if this important implementation was not scheduled into our production time line. According to the new plan we will be able to ship to early adopters already in late June. Mass production will follow shortly and relative shipment will start by end of September 2016

hicon smart wristband is all your social networks, made wearable.

Hi - We are Tomaso, Gilles, Johnny, Marco and Vittorio from Milan (Italy) and Lugano (Swiss) and we want to tell you about a product we really believe in. It's called hicon - The social Bangle, and it can simplify your life, keeping you  always updated  only about smartphone notifications and social network events that are really important for You.
In the internet of things and wearable technologies market, wearable devices and smart wristbands lack a true “social display” that enable them to:
Communicate our personality and affiliation to particular social spheres.
Encourage visual recognition and physical interaction between other members of the same social networks:

Updates to keep us connected to our social networks in all situations where we cannot have our Smartphone close to us: at school in business meetings, on the beach, while doing sports, while driving, etc.

hicon is a groundbreaking, wearable communicator that helps you effortlessly share and organize all your social media.  Tether this fashion smart wristband wirelessly to any smartphone via its intuitive app and go!   Now all your social accounts like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linked In, Pinterest, Viber, WhatsApp and Google Plus are represented by customized icons displayed right on your wrist.  When an alert goes to your smartphone, hicon gently vibrates and lights up in real-time, displaying your specified social network.  hicon also makes meeting new people a breeze.  When users with matching preset interests come in contact, the band will blink to help you make a connection.  hicon brilliantly brings on-line social networking to the physical space.  When it's time to transfer information between devices, do it with a simple hand shake ... it's that easy!  hicon even locates your misplaced phone.  It's 100% waterproof, sand and shock proof, so you can wear it ANYWHERE.

Meet hicon: hicon wristband is a hi-tech, silicone material shatterproof,  shockproof and waterproof, avaible in many colors and textures, with interchangeable  social network and smartphone notification icons, it is connected via Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to your  smartphone through its application. Whenever you receive a notification from social  networks or by smartphone applications (mail messages, phone calls, battery life), the corresponding icon lights up and vibrates with discretion. Thanks to the feature “social matching”, you can exchange contacts and references of the social network through the bracelets with  predefined gesture, so we can easily find ourselves in the “virtual” world, share common  interests and passions on the various social network sites, used to generate community  that multiply the spread of the bracelet.

How it works:Plug the icons  you prefer! The icons will illuminate and the bracelet vibrates every time your smartphone receives a notification. Might be an incoming call, calendar alert, text message, email  or events of your social networks. You can dismiss every notification with a  simple shake of your wrist.

You can add contacts to your phone and  exchange social media profiles  with just a high-five with  or a simple handshake. By tagging digital functions to this friendly gesture that comes naturally to us, hicon gives more meaning to your social interactions. Share your contacts and let your network grow!
Thanks to the feature “social matching”, hicon lights itself and discreetly warns you when you meet special people really related to you, your world and your passions and interests

Thanks to the feature “radar"" you can find through a geo-referenced map the profiles of other bangle bracelet users around you. You can exchange and  share contacts, references, common interests and passions and generate new communities.

The hicon bangle acts like a tether to your phone, letting you know if you’ve left it behind. hicon wristband will notify you immediately lighting all the icons simultaneously when you go out of range. The 30/50ft separation alert will make sure your smartphone is always safe and secure.
Textures, colors and interchangeable icons to make your bracelet unique and capable of expressing the most of your social profile.
Notification calls, SMS, instant messaging and social pages: the hicon smart wristband vibrates and specific  icons light up.
The wide range of colours, the elegant design and hypoallergenic materials make hicon the ideal accessory in every context.
hicon Bangle, is made of shatter-proof silicone material, it is waterproof and shockproof.
Bluetooth 4.0 L.E. to be always connected with your smart phone and never miss a notification.
You can meet each other in the real world and share business and social network contacts with a simple handshake.
Which feature/function do you want hicon to add the most?
Many of you have given us AWESOME IDEAS! However, we want to make sure we bring you the features and functions that YOU most want for hicon.
Vote for the feature or function you want most for hicon below and we'll get to work on bringing the most popular choices to you!
The Black hicon tone on tone  based on the new and improved design  is now available as new perk:

Choice and subsequent custom configuration of smartphone notifications you want to activate on the hicon wristband: call, email, sms, low phone battery life, calendar.
Choice and  configuration with icons of social networks and activation of related notifications: follow, likes, messages, friend requests and comments.
Stop receiving a notification with a simple shake of the wrist

Search and display geo-referenced “radar” of the profiles of other hicon users with the same affinity as ours (level of affinity, which generates a notification on the bracelet customizable by each user) and installed with the same icons of our social networks.
Gesture recognition: Exchange and storing business contacts and social networks through personalized gesture (clap, handshake, give me five) or via app if we are physically far

hicon is also an App dedicated and free, which together with the bracelet allows you to make new acquaintances and to “socialize“. Thanks to the feature “social matching”, you can exchange contacts and references of the social networks, you can easily find yourselves in the “virtual” world, share common interests and passions on the various social network platforms, used to generate community that multiply the spread of the hicon bracelet. Up to you to set the privacy level of your profile. You can decide what to share and what to look for. You set the maximal frequency of alerts and the priorities.

With hicon App you can record your favorite social networks and then associate them with the interchangeable icons: Just a few simple steps to enter the world of hicon and you begin to receive notifications via Bluetooth from your smartphone to your hicon bangle.
Height: 3-8 mm Width: 13 mm  Diameter: 50-74 mm Weight: ~30 gr.
Bluetooth® 4.0 BLE: hicon connects with modern smartphones and tablets thanks to the establishing Bluetooth 4 protocol.
Lighting up icons with flashing lights.
3D accelerometer that measures your motion patterns to determine your   gesture, your activity and tap commands (like double tap with a finger on the  bracelet).
hicon smart wristband also contains a vibration motor, which allows it to vibrate everytime hicon receives notifications.
The hicon Lithium-polymer battery lasts approximately 14 days when fully charged. You can see your battery level on your mobile application.
Charging is done simply by plugging hicon in any standard USB port.
Modern Apple Devices: iPhone 4s and newer iPod Touch 5th Gen and newer iPad 3rd Gen and newer iPad mini and newer
Modern Android Devices Android 4.3 and later
hicon is waterproof. It should be able to brave all the elements of your everyday life whether you're in the shower or out in the rain.

The first challenge we will face is mass production. As a company, our goal is to bring our customers the utmost satisfaction with everything we make. The combined experience of our team members offers an extensive background in product development and mass production. Yet, in reality, there is always uncertainty in large-scale production and scheduling of shipments. In order to mitigate these risks, we are partnering with some of the most experienced manufacturers and suppliers in the industry who are specialized in high-end consumer electronics. Timing is the other challenge we will be facing. Before we can sell our product to the market, we need to obtain certifications such as FCC and CE to meet industry legal requirements. Usually, certification takes about four weeks and we would apply for it two months before our first shipment. We have high hopes that we will pass all certifications . However, if the product fails due to a reason that is not accounted for, we will be looking at a one- to three-months delay. Despite the risks and challenges ahead of us, we promise to continuously update you all on our progress and any other important news.

Q: What sizes are available for hicon social smart wristband?  A: hicon fits to your wrist thanks to the adjustable wristband for wrist circumference from 160 mm to 232 mm. Q: How long does the battery last?  A: With a fully charged battery the hicon bangle will work for 14 days based on an average of 47 notifications per day.Q: How to recharge the hicon bangle? A: You can recharge the battery of the hicon bangle simply connecting the waterproof USB integrated in the bracelet to a laptop or any generic charging adapter with USB port. The charging time for a fully charged battery is only 40 minutes via a laptop!
Q: Does the hicon bangle work with my phone? A: The hicon bangle and its App work with any mobile phone that uses Android4.3 and up, and iOS 6 and up such as iPhone 4s and successives.

Q: What are the dimensions of the hicon bangle ? A: The thickness of the band is 4mm mm and the thickness of the part that houses the electronics is only9 mm. The band width is 16mm all along its circumference.
Q: How to connect the hicon wristband to my phone? A: Turn on Bluetooth on your smartphone, look for hicon wristband  BLE device and once you see it, pair the device and launch the App. And let’s go!
Q: What is the connectivity range? A: In theory the range is 100 meters but in practice it's usually around 50 meters depending on geographic, atmospheric, and urban conditions.

Q: Does hicon bangle support Windows Phone 8? A: We focus on Android and iPhone now because we have only a limited budget. We hope to add it in the future though! You can follow us on Facebook and website for the latest updates!

Q: Is hicon bangle compatible with all the social networks? A: Not all the social Networks officially support the necessary Bluetooth profiles for compatibility with the hicon but We will try some workarounds after the core development has been finalized and will update all backers by then about the complete list of the social networks that we will connect to the hicon bangle.
Q: Is the hicon bangle waterproof? A: Yes, the hicon bangle is waterproof.

Q: Wich colors are available? A: hicon is available in dark or light  plus the following fashion colours: (P)Placid Blu, (V)Violet Tulip, (F)Freesia and (C)Celosia orange. Only for indiegogo supporters we have created a limited edition color (Hemlock).
Q: What kind of warranty will you offer for hicon smart bracelet? A: We offer one year replacement for any damages to internal parts or batteries, and all you need to pay for is shipping.
Thank you for supporting our project!
For any questions, feel free to email us at: info@things-lab.com
I'm Kevin Sweeney, a passionate audiophile with over twenty years
experience in the high end consumer electronics industry. I founded
my first company, KAS Audio while studying physics at Pitt. Our
coffin sized subwoofer produced well defined bass down to 14 Hz.
After a brief stint in high end audio retailing, I got involved in the
recording industry, designing studio monitors used to mix Spyro Gyra,
El DeBarge and many others. I became National Warranty Manager for
Mitsubishi Electronics in the 90's and later worked for Nakamichi
America. My dream has always been to bring the unmistakable dynamic
sound of a live performance into the home. The new high resolution
audio formats and my new Kromecaster make that  dream a reality.
Chromecast device into your Kromecaster, connect it  to your
home stereo and in minutes you
will be enjoying master tape quality 192k/24 bit recordings, all
controlled by your smart phone or tablet. You will need internet
access, wifi and a computer to make it work, but once the simple
setup has been completed, operation is as easy as turning on your
stereo and selecting music from your phone or tablet. You can even
use your phone or tablet to control the volume if you wish.
if I want music in more than one room?
$35 Google Chromecast) for each room! Multiple Kromecasters are a
great way to build a multiroom distributed audio system. You simply
name each Chromecast for the room or area it's in, and select that
area from your phone or tablet. It's much easier to operate than
conventional distributed audio systems, and the sound is much better. You
can use a Kromecaster Pro in your main system and Basics for the rest

of the house. If you can get Netflix working on your TV, you can set up your own super high quality distributed audio system yourself. Need help? Free technical support is just a phone call away. We'll get you up and running in minutes!
makes the Kromecaster better than other streaming options?
It's easier to use and it sounds
better. Along with sound quality, ease of setup and use were primary
concerns during the development process. Listening to music should
not be a chore, and you shouldn't have to pay a custom installer to
get everything working. Setup and listening are downright easy with
the Kromecaster. In addition to being able to stream your high
resolution files from the cloud or your computer's hard disk, the
Kromecaster works with any Chromecast supported audio app, such as
Pandora or Google's Play Music subscription service. Google
made sure the Chromecast was reliable and easy to use, and we made
sure the end result was uncompromised studio quality sound. The vast
majority of streamers are optical based and suffer from a huge

I'm Kevin Sweeney, a passionate audiophile with over twenty years
experience in the high end consumer electronics industry. I founded
my first company, KAS Audio while studying physics at Pitt. Our
coffin sized subwoofer produced well defined bass down to 14 Hz.
After a brief stint in high end audio retailing, I got involved in the
recording industry, designing studio monitors used to mix Spyro Gyra,
El DeBarge and many others. I became National Warranty Manager for
Mitsubishi Electronics in the 90's and later worked for Nakamichi
America. My dream has always been to bring the unmistakable dynamic
sound of a live performance into the home. The new high resolution
audio formats and my new Kromecaster make that  dream a reality.

not be a chore, and you shouldn't have to pay a custom installer to

the Kromecaster. In addition to being able to stream your high

Kromecaster works with any Chromecast supported audio app, such as
Pandora or Google's Play Music subscription service. Google

Clockety is the world's first smartphone projection clock. Clockety is portable, smart, easy to use and comes with a complimentary iPhone app which you can use to control Clockety the way you want.  Patent Pending.

Let's talk about the projection clocks available in market today.
• They are bulky and they aren't portable, so it's hard to carry them around.
• They need to be plugged into a wall outlet.
• They are not smart. Some of them only have an alarm.
Clockety solves all of these problems. And it’s a whole lot smarter than other projection clocks, thanks to the unique features you get via the Clockety app.

column8:
locale=EN"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Click here to locate us on the 2015 CES Sands Expo Map

Clockety is designed to be hassle free! No need to plug it into a wall outlet, charge it, pair it using bluetooth or use Wi-Fi.

Just snap Clockety onto your phone, fire up the Clockety app, and go to sleep!

column1: • No charging required, single replaceable watch battery lasts over a year!
• Small, portable, easy to carry when traveling.
• Use the free app to turn Clockety on by tapping the back of your phone or automatically with an alarm.

We spent hundreds of hours trying to perfect Clockety. We wanted to give you a product that is really simple to use, small and portable, and useful in daily life.

We spent a considerable amount of time designing Clockety to make it easy to use, rugged, durable and something that becomes your daily habit. Our design team came up with several concepts and prototypes before we decided on the final version.

Clockety's different components were carefully selected after trying out various specifications and variations.

The lens used in Clockety was chosen after we went through several different types that varied in diameter and focal length. We wanted to make sure that Clockety projects time clearly on all standard ceiling heights. 

We calculated the distance between different nightstands and ceilings to make sure that Clockety is able to project the time clearly with almost all combinations.




The free accompanying iPhone app makes Clockety really smart and easy to use. Here are some of the features.
• Option to turn Clockety on/off on physical tap or with an alarm. Or both!
• Tap/Knock sensitivity is user adjustable. Hypersensitive mode makes Clockety react to a gentle tap. Works even when you knock on the furniture!
• Automatic turn off feature lets you configure a delay after which Clockety turns off by itself.
• Alarm feature offers option to make Clockety flash time when the alarm goes off.
• Option to turn Clockety off after alarm goes off (delay) and select repeat options (daily, weekdays, weekends, custom)
Our team is composed of engineers and designers with extensive track records. Each member has successfully delivered products and services that are currently being used by thousands of customers.

Gaurav is a serial entrepreneur and he is always looking for new ideas. He has over 15 years of experience in the tech business and has worked with both startups and some of the biggest names in Silicon Valley. In his free time, he speaks at public events around the nation and conducts Arduino/hardware workshops in the Bay Area.

Terry (TDI) brings valuable industrial design expertise to the Clockety team. He runs an engineering firm in central California and has a successful history of delivering complex designs to customers.
Lyle is a seasoned engineer with 14 years of embedded design experience. He spent 27 years working at HP and is the most senior member of our team.
Svetlana was born in Europe and has a keen eye for design. With over 7 years of UX/Design experience, she’s the go-to design guru at Clockety.
Currently iPhone 5, 5s, 6. If we are funded successfully
column2: we will add support for iPhone 6 Plus. We do not currently support Android phones.

column1: Currently black. We will add stretch goals for more colors if we are funded over what we have initially targeted.
Do you have experience in manufacturing consumer products?
Yes, our team comprises of professional industrial designers, software and hardware engineers who have decades of experience in delivering hardware/software products.
Clockety uses your smartphone’s flashlight as a light source to project time. As far as we know, our product is the first in the market to use a smartphone’s flashlight in such an ingenious way.
How long does the battery last and can i replace it myself?
Clockety is designed to be hassle free. The included watch battery lasts over a year and is easily replaceable. We use a standard SR44 battery that is commonly sold in stores.
I wear glasses, won't the time appear blurred to me on the ceiling when i wake up ?
We thought of that when designing Clockety. You can actually focus the time projected on the ceiling so that it appears clear to you even if your vision is not 20/20.
How actively would you update project progress upon funding?

Weekly! This is one of our top priorities. We really appreciate support of our backers and want to keep our backers updated on the progress on a regular basis after successful funding. Even if it's a short update at times
column2: we will still keep you posted.

column1: We will post pictures of the assembly line, mold, packaging and our test rig as we make progress towards final delivery of your reward. We also plan to conduct a poll for the packaging design once we get to that point.
Yes, the iPhone app will be available for free in the App Store.
What happens if my phone rings while Clockety is attached to it?
Pick up and answer the phone just the way you'd normally do. Clockety and the accompanying iPhone app does not affect any functionality of your phone or other features.
Once you are done with your call
column2: place your phone screen side down and Clockety will continue to function as intended. As simple as that !

column1: Dragon Innovation has done a review of our project and has pre-qualified that we appear to be educated team with a buildable product.
Press kit can be found HERE

ZeroLemon 135W PD Extreme Charge Station is equipped with dual USB-C PD &
column2:
dual USB-A ports allowing for ultra-fast charging of MacBook Pro, Samsung, iPhone, Google devices, LG, Motorola, Huawei, Alcatel, ASUS, Kyocera, Palm, and RED.

 

 

 

 

Resources for Press and Media 

""The new ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station is the most powerful multidevice USB charger I’ve ever used. "" -The Verge

""ZeroLemon’s Extreme Charge Station is the on-the-go power dream."" -9To5Toys

""The ZeroLemon Charging Station – Notable crowdfunding campaign."" -The-gadgeteer

 

 

The total maximum output of the six ports is 135W, placing ZeroLemon in a class of its own. Thanks to its twin PD-enabled USB-C ports, dual USB-A ports, and two wireless chargers, ZeroLemon allows you to charge six devices simultaneously. Charge capable devices include laptops, tablets, cameras, cell phones, Apple Watches, and other mobile devices.

 

 

With such powerful output, ZeroLemon can provide rapid charging for two laptops or tablets, three mobile devices and one Apple Watch all at once. 

 

 

 

Most portable chargers on the market are underpowered with low USB-C power output. When charging MacBook’s specifically they require a higher USB-C output. As a result, it will take much longer than you expect. ZeroLemon can charge your MacBook Pro (15 inches) at 87W full speed, only taking 2 hours to charge from 0% to 100%. 

 

 

ZeroLemon can also charge iPhones and iPads as fast as 18W and 30W respectively via Type C to Lightning connection.

 

 

 

Is your workspace cluttered with multiple charger bricks and adapters? ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station provides six standard output ports for your selection in one convenient unit.

 

 

Take ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station with you to meetings and continue your presentations without concerns over your device's power.

 

 

 

ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station extends its charging capabilities to other devices such as Amazon Kindle and Nintendo Switch. 

 

 

 

With its 87W maximum USB-C power port,  ZeroLemon Charger Station can charge the latest  USB-C devices at optimal speed, including MacBook Pro and other Apple models, iPad Pro,  iPhone XS, Nintendo Switch and more. It can also charge Samsung Galaxy Note 10 and Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Plus at 25W and 45W respectively.

 

 

 

 

ZeroLemon boasts 2 USB-A ports with a 15W fast charging solution that is compatible with most new model smartphones, including Samsung, iPhone, Huawei, LG, and Google Pixel.

 

 

 

The top portion of the ZeroLemon Charger serves as a convenient wireless charging pad for your newer model devices. Simply place the device on ZeroLemon to begin your wireless charging experience. Based on the Qi standard 10W output, ZeroLemon charger can provide 7.5W of output for iPhones that are wirelessly charging and 10W for Android devices that are wirelessly charging.

 

 

 

ZeroLemon Charger Station also incorporates a built-in wireless charger for your Apple Watch. No more extra cables! Just rest your Apple Watch in the convenient dip allocated just for your watch and get charging!  

 

 

Most wireless charging units on the market will become disconnected when the temperature becomes too high. However, ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station ensures the temperature remains under 105.8℉ (41℃)  thanks to its built-in thermal management system.

 

 

 

ZeroLemon Extreme Charge Station has taken comprehensive safety measures, ensuring that there is no risk or worry for users when charging their devices.

 

 

 

 

 

4 USB ports and 2 wireless chargers allow you to charge up to six devices simultaneously with a maximum combined output of 135W. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ZeroLemon's inspiration is to simply provide minimalism. Designed for the power user on the go. ZeroLemon offers portable charging for up to six devices simultaneously, while designed in a compact yet elegantly modern station.  ZeroLemon aspires to eliminate clutter and stress and always keep you connected.

 

In the R&
column3: D process, ZeroLemon underwent strict tests: including drop testing, thermal shock tests, high &amp
column4:
low temperature testing, vibrational tests, plug in and out tests, flexure tests, and ball pressure testing.

 

 

 

 

ZeroLemon was created by a handful of mobile enthusiasts who wanted more power from their devices. We are the forerunner in high wattage mobile chargers, powerbanks, extended batteries, and high capacity power solutions.  
We believe in giving our customers the best design and the most bleeding edge charging technology at the most economical pricepoint.  Product quality is also our top priority as it is shown in our name. We hope that every product our customer use can bring more convenience in their lives.  One less lemon is one giant step for everyone.

column1: Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition is a super-sized version of Sphero that you control from your smartphone or tablet. Measuring in at a whopping 3 feet in diameter, weighing over 150 pounds, and reaching speeds still unknown, Peacekeeper ain’t your average robotic ball.

Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition has all of the same features we know and love from the original Sphero, except they’re bigger. And we all know bigger is better. This limited edition robot is encased in a custom painted, high-impact polycarbonate shell for ultimate durability. You can drive the ball, play multiplayer games, entertain your pets, and more.

We're raising funds to offset the initial cost of parts and production. If we reach our goal, we plan to start selling Sphero – Peacekeeper Edition through our online store (store.gosphero.com) in Fall 2013.
For a manageable $10,000 pledge, Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition can even be yours as soon as August, 2013. It’s the perfect gift for the whole family or the serious tech enthusiast.
Because bigger is better…and because we could.

Mechanically, Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition is essentially a scaled up Sphero. It has two motors that are controlled by a Sphero board and communicate to the smart device via Bluetooth. Each Peacekeeper will have a separate ""dead man remote switch,"" which another operator can use to shut down the Peacekeeper if it loses it's connection to the smart device or becomes unsafe. Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition is designed to stop if it loses control, but this is an added safety measure. Additionally, Peacekeeper requires the user to separate the two halves to charge the marine grade batteries – the batteries will last for over two hours of driving.

Since Peacekeeper is a Sphero, it is fully programmable via one of our numerous APIs and control languages including Objective C and Java – making the Peacekeeper an ideal robotic device for the classroom environment. While all the apps for Sphero will work with the Peacekeeper Edition, some are simply not practical. For an additional charge we can replace the Bluetooth phone control and use a longer-range hobby R/C link. It will be slightly more difficult to drive with this setup but will increase the range threefold.

Each Peacekeeper will be hand assembled in Boulder, CO and we can customize the graphics to your liking (depending on the complexity, there may be an additional fee). Driving the Peacekeeper takes a bit of practice. We will provide instructional videos or you may come to Boulder to pick up your Peacekeeper and receive training from our engineering team.

Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition is heavy and large. Caution should be exercised when operating Peacekeeper. It is not intended for use by children or people under the influence of substances that affect motor skills. Due to its ability to crush, we highly discourage users from operating Peacekeeper near small children and pets. This is not a toy.  Peacekeeper is a sophisticated, computer-controlled robot and should only be purchased by skilled robotic enthusiasts or technicians. While the video may depict moments of exhilaration and enjoyment, all scenes of crushing and destruction are real, the Peacekeeper can generate a lot of momentum that may be hard to stop. Sphero - Peacekeeper Edition is rugged, but not waterproof. Since the shell must be opened to charge the batteries and access the on and off switches, users must insure the inside mechanism is free from debris prior to use. Interested buyers can contact us for images of the interior mechanism if there are questions before purchase.
