The RasPiComm+ makes connecting your Raspberry Pi to the real world easier than ever before

The RasPiComm+ is an open-source all-in-one modular platform that allows you to connect your Raspberry Pi to pretty much anything! No matter if you're just starting off with Linux or mechatronics, are working on a home automation project, in industrial automation or are an experienced engineer building a finished product around the Raspberry Pi - the RasPiComm+ has you covered.

Setting up your RasPiComm+ is quick and easy. All you need to do is chose the functionality you want for your project and plug in the according modules. The RasPiComm+ Mainboard installs the required firmware for each module so that you can conveniently access them as devices in Linux. It's that easy!

We have been working in automation for years now and have finished projects ranging from automated cash handling to car assembly lines. What has always bugged us is that prototyping is time-consuming and expensive. With the RasPiComm+ you can have a first working protoype up in no time.

IT-education in general and mechatronics in particular are becoming ever more important. We want to make the first steps as easy as possible while offering a wide range of project possibilities for very advanced users as well.

For mechatronic schools, mechanical robustness is an important topic. If you have a limited time available each day to teach kids, you simply can't afford to spend even 10 minutes to find the loose cable connection disrupting connection. That is why the RasPiComm+ does not require any wiring between the modules and the mainboard, just slide the modules into the edge connectors and tighten the screws. All set!
From the first steps to programming microcontrollers

Out of the box, the RasPiComm+ takes care of a lot of work for you. The setup automatically detects the connected modules and installs firmware and linux drivers. You can then directly access your modules as linux devices. Easy!

Advanced students can program the microcontroller themselves - it's all open source!
Advanced makers can design custom modules and dive into programming the CPLD, essentially telling the RasPiComm+ how to handle the wiring of the modules and even set up real-time appliances!
Eben Upton, founder of the Raspberry Pi Foundation, inspecting the RasPiComm+ at the RS-Components Booth at Electronica:
Modularity and flexibility are key. We have already developed a wide range of modules for RasPiComm+, and there are more to come!
We are currently working on a relay module, 433MHz, KNX, 6LowPAN and other exciting stuff! Got a module you'd like to see? Send us a message, input is always welcome!
Give me an example! I want to see some details!
After connecting your choice of modules to the RasPiComm+ (see below for available modules) you run the setup script ./rpc-setup.sh. Your RasPiComm+ and Raspberry Pi will be configured automatically.

All modules that use serial ports (like RS-232, RS-485, GSM, GPS, Profibus, 1-Wire) are accessible through the standard linux serial ports in the respective folder. A serial module in the RasPiComm+ module slot 1 would be available in the folder
Digital I/Os are mapped just like the GPIOs of the Raspberry Pi, in the folder
A quick example: To display an image on the LCD display module when it is connected to module slot 1, you can simply copy a bitmap file into
and it is displayed on your LCD! It's that easy!
Can I see the firmware / driver code?
Sure! The firmware and linux drivers are open source!

First of all: There is no ""one firmware / driver"" package for the RasPiComm+. It's more like a couple thousand. To be able to handle up to 4 of a lot of different modules the CPLD and microprocessor need to be programmed according to the exact combination of modules. And that is an awful lot of possibilities!

The setup-script handles all that, so no need to worry about it. For those wanting to tinker with the firmware and drivers themselves we have set up a server to allow you to manually build and download the required code for your specific RasPiComm+ setup. Check out build.amescon.com.
Note: To access the 3D Model of your RasPiComm+ configuration you will have to install the Unity web viewer Plug-in.
More details! I am an engineer, give me more!
So are we! That's why we have thought hard about how to combine out-of-the-box convenience with complete flexibilty. Let's take a look at how it works under the hood:

The ./rpc-setup.sh script requests two firmware packages for our server. One firmware is for the onboard STM32 Cortex-M4 ARM processor, the other one for the Altera MAX V CPLD. Our server calculates the needed I/Os on the ARM for the corresponding modules and the wiring in the CPLD. The CPLD takes care of the dynamic wiring between the modules and the microcontroller. In the next step our server compiles both firmware packages and sends a compressed tar.gz as a reply to the request. The script then unpacks the firmware and programs the microcontroller via the serial port on the Raspberry Pi. The CPLD is also programmed by the script (we use the I/O lines of the Raspberry Pi to bit-bang the JTAG commands for that).
When CPLD and microcontroller are set up the script configures and loads the required drivers for the modules.

If you want, you can modify every single bit and build it yourself: You can download the sourcecode for your configuration. In this case we do not compile it on the server but return the source to you. You can then compile the microcontroller code with a GCC based cross-compiler. You'll find instructions on our website on how to do that. You also get the generated Verilog code for the CPLD. To compile this code you need to download the free version of Quartus from Altera, available for Windows and Linux. You can then add functionality to the microcontroller and CPLD code if you want. Compile it and program the binaries you created using our setup script.

We are a team of software and hardware enthusiasts with more than 10 years of automation experience. Our developed products range from big cash handling systems to alarm systems for banks. We have also built the RasPiComm, one of the first extension boards for the Raspberry Pi, back in 2012. The feedback we have received for the RasPiComm has shown us that designing a modular platform instead of another extension module would best fit the needs of the Raspberry Pi maker community. This is how the idea to design RasPiComm+ was initally born.
Now we need your support to make this project come to life!

column2: >""I've been working in the industry for over fifteen years now and I've gone through many development processes. As an inventor I like to work with the Raspberry Pi but sometimes you come to the point where things get complicated because you only have one GPIO Header on the Raspberry Pi. And two years ago I decided to fix that.I believe that this product enables you to built almost anything you want.""

>""The RasPiComm+ is a product with huge potential in so many different automation processes. Designing a software that does the work for you was sometimes challenging but also enriching. I am very glad to be part of this project. ""

column1: I’m taking care of our supply chain, distributors, communication and testing. Although having some IT-background, I am not an engineer. In other words: I am the perfect test dummy to make sure you don't need an engineering degree to use our products.""

column2: >""I've been working together with Daniel and Martin for quite a time now and what I can say about this is: if there is a problem to be solved, it will be solved! No matter what.""

column1: ""I am a trained photographer and IT specialist. I've already had the chance to test and work with the RasPiComm+. It is easy to set up and convenient in use so when Daniel asked me to use my expertise in delivering video production for his campaign I was more than pleased to do so.""

""I've been following the development process of the RasPiComm+ during the last months and am really excited to join the team now to get this product into the real world. What I like most about the product is that it will absolutely help people to realize what they have in mind.""

For us, this Indiegogo-campaign is not just a way to raise money. We appreciate your feedback and input and will read all your messages carefully. So please share your experience and questions with us! Together we can build a whole new world of automation! Thank you for your support.

We have worked on the RasPiComm+ for more than 2 years and have made dozens of prototypes. The RasPiComm+ is ready for series production with our contract manufacturer. To decrease the production costs to affordable levels we need to produce at least 1.000 units of the RasPiComm+ and each module. Since this is very expensive, we need your help! The money you pledge will go directly into sourcing, production and shipment.

We are confident in our technology and have worked hard to organize our supply chain. We have already produced hardware and PCB boards on a large scale with our first Raspberry Pi extension board, the RasPiComm which was launched in 2012.
We appreciate your help in spreading the word!
We know that you are the ones that help us make this project come to life.
As a big “THANK YOU” we are rewarding our top referrers. 1st
place is our 'Unique and first' Top Perk! Get the complete RasPiComm+
Package including the RasPiComm+ and the first 8 modules (GPS, GSM, 8
Input, 8 Output, 8 Analog, RS-485, RS-232, Profibus) in a specially
designed box signed by all team members. You will also receive your RasPiComm+ a lot earlier than everybody else:
You can take part in this contest for the whole campaign length. All you have to do is the following:
2. Share our Indiegogo page using the links below the video to refer others.
3. Click on your user name beside the Search Box at the top right of the page.

column2: click on the tab that says ""Referrals"".

column1: The Amp Hour (podcast), starting at approx. 37min25sec
Hackaday (the comment section on this page is generally regarded as a free for all trollzone. Feel free to throw some fuel or start your own flamewar!)
Know of a press mention that is not listed here? Clue us in, write a comment or leave a note on twitter! @amescon
Flexible funding? What happens if you don’t reach your goal?
You will get your perk anyway! One of the reasons why we chose flexible funding was that paying with credit-card is not possible with fixed funding (fixed funding only supports PayPal).
I want to order several modules - how much is shipping then?
All your perks are shipped in one package, so shipping costs only apply once, $25 for European and $35 for International Shipping.
If multiple serial modules are used, what is the maximum total throughput

You can have up to 4 serial ports on the RasPiComm+. We tested the system with all the four modules running at 115.200 baud simultanously. Higher transfer rates may be possible but have not been tested as of yet.
The RasPiComm+ mainboard already has a real-time-clock with backup battery onboard! We even included a RTC driver. You can run the hwclock command after our drivers are loaded.
Will Python example code be made available?

We will provide a lot of sample code in the next weeks for all major languages. You don't need a special API, you can use existing examples that use serial communication (/dev/tty...) for the serial modules.

SunTunes™ is a new product invented and developed by our family owned company - MeTime LLC. We have over 25 years of experience inventing and developing advanced technologies, building start-up companies, creating strategic patent portfolios, and have established solid manufacturing relationships. Our company specializes in developing products that help you maximize your “MeTime.”

What is SunTunes?

SunTunes™ is a patent pending wireless speaker system that mounts behind your head on the backrest of a chair.  Since SunTunes speakers are positioned near the ears, SunTunes is able to provide private, high quality audio like headphones or ear buds without the need to handle or wear them.
At low volume levels, the audio sounds loud enough to you, but is not heard by others a couple feet away unless you turn it up!
SunTunes works with any of your mobile devices via Bluetooth technology.  It is a new and innovative way to listen to music while you tan or relax on any beach, poolside, or yard chair.
Simply Lean Back Into Your SunTunes And Enjoy Your MeTime!

When you’re at the beach or pool, headphones and ear buds don’t mix well with suntan lotion, sand or going in and out of the water.  You also have to remove these devices every time someone talks to you.  

SunTunes solves these problems by COMPLETELY eliminating the hassle of having to use headphones or ear buds when listening to music.

Designed to mount to the backrest of chairs with a simple strap, SunTunes flexible, silicone rubber housing is water resistant and perfect for waterside settings.  SunTunes is also ideal for fishing trips, cruise ship vacations, and outdoor sporting events!
Enjoy music privately without bothering others, or turn up the volume to share your tunes in a group setting.
Water resistant.....ideal for the pool or beach!

Still need more features? No problem!  SunTunes silicone rubber will not get hot from the sun on scorching days.  Also, when enjoying music, you can still hear surrounding ambient sounds allowing you to have a conversation with the person near you, and if that’s not enough, SunTunes™ will keep your towel attached to your chair on windy days, making it ideal for cruise ship vacations.

When the volume on your SunTunes is set to a low level, the music sounds loud enough to you but not to others near you. We leverage the fact that sound is directional and that the level of volume you hear can be controlled by simple proximity to the ears.  The speakers are angled strategically toward the ear so that music can be enjoyed by you alone.

Mount it to any chair with the adjustable strap.  When you lean back in your chair, the volume is loud enough for personal enjoyment, but others near you are not disturbed.  If you choose, you can also share the music with others by turning up the volume.
SunTunes operates on a rechargeable battery that can last up to 16 hours when the system is operating at 1/3 of its maximum volume level.
What did you say?  SunTunes eliminates the hassle of having to wear hot, sticky, wet ear buds or headphones, and you can still have a conversation with the person sitting next to you!

Last year during a family vacation, we were at the beach and realized there had to be a better way to listen to music while relaxing in our beach chair.  Portable radios bothered others near us, and headphones or ear buds were a hassle either due to heat, getting covered with sand or lotion each time we returned from a swim.  We also had to take the ear buds on and off each time we wanted to have a conversation.  Annoyances you don’t really want while trying to relax!
We searched for an option on the market that would eliminate these problems and to our surprise, could not find one.  So out of necessity, we saw an opportunity that led to the creation of SunTunes™!

After filing patents and developing the pre-production prototype of SunTunes, we thought what better way to see if it was a viable product then to hit the beach, and put the prototype to use.  So we did!  We asked for real world feedback from ALL ages and the results were impressive!  Everyone that tried SunTunes LOVED it!  They all wanted to know when and where they could buy one.  There was, however, one grandmother that said she wouldn’t buy it because she doesn’t like listening to music, but she knew for a fact that her grandkids would definitely have interest.  As an afterthought, we realized this is a product that should not be marketed for music alone, but also for news shows, documentaries, or other audio broadcasts.  The options are limitless with SunTunes!
The MeTime Team has developed and tested a series of prototypes.  Design changes were implemented to optimize the look and performance, and with your support, we can move to final production.
Soak up the Sun and let the music begin!

We need your support to help with tooling and other development costs associated with getting SunTunes to a broader market.  After the Perks are delivered, we’ll start with online sales, and then move into beach retail locations and cruise ship gift shops.

SunTunes™ is a brilliant product that seems like it should already exist in the marketplace. We believe the uses of the product can extend far beyond what we envision, and look forward to hearing customer feedback on new ways to use SunTunes.
Once you own SunTunes, you will love it and wonder how you ever lived without it!
Please take part in our crowd funding project.  The MeTime Team really appreciates your involvement and support!

Our perks are very exciting! For our backers, we offer a range of
cool ""Thank You based items"" as well as ways to help us expand,
the market reach for SunTunes.

Each SunTunes comes with a carrying pouch for the beach or pool.  Our early supporters will receive their SunTunes with an exclusive customized ""Go-Go SunTunes™"" carrying pouch signifying you were a SunTunes development supporter.
Our perks have been designed to be exciting to a wide audience of early supporters offering a range of cool ""thank you based items"" as well as ways to expand the reach of SunTunes.
The Impact Your Support Can Make
As a family company, we're teaching our kids the value of sharing success, inspiring them to develop entrepreneurial skills, and exposing them to the value and impact of giving back.
SunTunes will be a ""pay it forward"" product.  If we're successful, we will donate a portion of all sales to a charity.  We believe that if we succeed, it is our obligation to give back.

If you can't contribute, you can still help us by sharing this campaign with anyone you know.  Please help us spread the word via Twitter, Facebook or any way you can.  Use the convenient share tools on this campaign page, just below our video.  Thank you for your support!!

After filing patents and developing the pre-production prototype of SunTunes, we thought what better way to see if it was a viable product then to hit the beach, and put the prototype to use.  So we did!  We asked for real world feedback from ALL ages and the results were impressive!  Everyone that tried SunTunes LOVED it!  They all wanted to know when and where they could buy one.  There was, however, one grandmother that said she wouldn’t buy it because she doesn’t like listening to music, but she knew for a fact that her grandkids would definitely have interest.  As an afterthought, we realized this is a product that should not be marketed for music alone, but also for news shows, documentaries, or other audio broadcasts.  The options are limitless with SunTunes!
The MeTime Team has developed and tested a series of prototypes.  Design changes were implemented to optimize the look and performance, and with your support, we can move to final production.
Soak up the Sun and let the music begin!

We need your support to help with tooling and other development costs associated with getting SunTunes to a broader market.  After the Perks are delivered, we’ll start with online sales, and then move into beach retail locations and cruise ship gift shops.

SunTunes™ is a brilliant product that seems like it should already exist in the marketplace. We believe the uses of the product can extend far beyond what we envision, and look forward to hearing customer feedback on new ways to use SunTunes.
Once you own SunTunes, you will love it and wonder how you ever lived without it!
Please take part in our crowd funding project.  The MeTime Team really appreciates your involvement and support!
Our perks are very exciting! For our backers, we offer a range ofcool ""Thank You based items"" as well as ways to help us expand, the market reach for SunTunes.

Each SunTunes comes with a carrying pouch for the beach or pool.  Our early supporters will receive their SunTunes with an exclusive customized ""Go-Go SunTunes™"" carrying pouch signifying you were a SunTunes development supporter.
Our perks have been designed to be exciting to a wide audience of early supporters offering a range of cool ""thank you based items"" as well as ways to expand the reach of SunTunes.
The Impact Your Support Can Make
As a family company, we're teaching our kids the value of sharing success, inspiring them to develop entrepreneurial skills, and exposing them to the value and impact of giving back.
SunTunes will be a ""pay it forward"" product.  If we're successful, we will donate a portion of all sales to a charity.  We believe that if we succeed, it is our obligation to give back.

If you can't contribute, you can still help us by sharing this campaign with anyone you know.  Please help us spread the word via Twitter, Facebook or any way you can.  Use the convenient share tools on this campaign page, just below our video.  Thank you for your support!!",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

What is and how does it work?

Tesla SG phone is a phone designed with a new technology(we call AXS) that enables you to call or text message another Tesla SG phone user without sim card or wifi connection (of course without any fees) anywhere in the world at any time, and to surf the web of course. That means you can call, txt and surf the web for ever free. All you need is our Telsa SG phone.
• Display capacitive touch screen, 256K colors, 240 x 320 pixels, 3.0 inches with multi touch
**Please keep in mind this is a prototype so we had to cut the expenses as much as we could, so we went for a small size phone.

We’ve been working on Tesla SG design and the new technology that enables us to do all this  for a little less than a year now and now its time to start the work full speed ahead. We will start working on two demonstration prototypes and we plan to get them done by the last day of fall this year. But in order to do that we need your help.

Since we are making a totally new technology (which can be VERY expensive), we need special “tools and materials” to build the first two prototypes, and it will cost us around 15.000$ to 30.000$ With your support, we can bring free telecommunications into people life’s worldwide, but we can’t do it without you! While we're getting close to enter the production of the first two TSG, your contribution will help fund:

- Building tools specially designed for this project building
- Base component order for first two TSG

Phone design is still not chosen! We have a couple ideas including the sketch above, about the design itself but we are more focused on the function of the phone then the look. If you can help us with design please write at teslaphone@studnetmedia.com we would appreciate it and we are offering you to join our team. Also if you have suggestions or for anyone interested in being a part of our “world changing” team write to us and we will be more than happy to talk about the work that needs to be done.

We are a team of young people that came together about a year ago, from all around the world (USA, SERBIA and GERMANY). Aleksandar Stibilj was the guy who first came across this idea of making a mobile phone that can call, text or even surf the web without mobile provider (sim card) or any type of internet connection, and founded the project called TESLA PHONE. The biggest thing about this “phone project” idea he had is the new technology that we are currently developing. It is called AXS (all-ACCESS-SUPREME). At this moment we cannot talk details about this technology and how it works, because of possibility for any big company to take our idea and make it quick due their huge investment fond. We hope that you like our idea and that you can imagine what can be done with this technology we are making, anything from a photo frame on your desk or digital watch on your wall to your car and a plane flying above us can be connected and provide us FREE TELECOMMUNICATIONS.

$1 – World Changer! Your name will appear on or web site under the donator section. Thank you!
$25 – Blueprint of new AXS technology and Telsa SG phone. Also your name will appear on or web site under the “donators” section. Thank you!
$30 – T shirt I TESLA PHONE. Also your name will appear on or web site under the “donators” section. Thank you!
$130 - Early Bird: One Tesla SG phone. Also your name will appear on or web site under the “who owned it first” section. Thank you!
$140 – Early Bird with initials on the back of the phone. Also your name will appear on or web site under the “who owned it first” section. Thank you!
$250 - Two Pac. Two Tesla SG phone’s with your initials on the back. Also your name will appear on or web site under the ”who owned it first” section. Thank you!
$410 – Family talk. You will receive 4 Tesla SG phones with initials of your family names on the back of the phone. Also your name will appear on or web site under the “who owned it first” section. Thank you!
$1000  - Sponsor.
$3000 – Premium sponsor.
Q. How does the Telsa SG phone work?    A. We are currently waiting for the patent file confirmation, as soon as we receive it we will post a full detail about AXS technology and Tesla SG phone.

Q. Calls are free forever?    A. Yes. The phone works on a special technology we invented called AXS. Once you get your TSG phone you will also receive a number (like a regular number(for free)) and then you can call forever free, without sim card or internet/wifi connection.
Q. What’s the operating system?    A. Currently, we are developing the phone to be based on Android platform.
Q. When will it be done?    A.    We're about to start the production of first two prototypes and we plan to get them done by the last day of fall this year!
Beside of fund contribution, you can join our team or you can just help us spread the word.
We would like to thank you all very much for reading this. We appreciate that you now know about our project. Help us spread the word.

Let’s change the world together!

The Indiegogo campaign has ended, and  XC Tracer is now available at www.xctracer.com, shipping usually within 1-2 business days. There is also more information on the new website, including the newest firmware and instructions how to update the firmware.

XC Tracer is an advanced flight instrument for paragliders, using data from an 9-DOF IMU, from a pressure sensor and from a GPS to compute the real time climb rate and altitude, avoiding the undesired time lag that conventional variometers have due to data filtering.

Prototype of XC Tracer with 3D printed enclosure, same size as production version

The GPS provides also real time flight speed and direction. All the relevant information is then packed together in a custom NMEA like data string and sent over a Bluetooth Low Energy module to an iOS or Android tablet or phone. And of course the variometer indicates the climb / sink rate with beeping tones. It is very easy to fly in thermals with XC Tracer, since what you feel and what the variometer indicates do perfectly match.

column4: > about XC Tracer, including a first beta test review.

column5: >Des informations en français sur XC Tracer se trouvent dans le forum de parapentiste.info.

column1: Test flight with XC Tracer prototype (white box) over the Swiss Alps
Additional to that the flight path is recorded on a micro SD card as a Google Earth KML file, or later on also an IGC file will be recorded instead of the KML file.
Google KML file, created with XC Tracer, 5Hz update rate

But it get's even better. XC Tracer is Arduino compatible, and once the campaign has been successfully funded then the code will be made open source. If you want to program a better data fusion algorithm, or if you want to log different data on the SD card, or if you have another idea than to use XC Tracer for flying, then just adapt the software according to your needs, upload the code to your XC Tracer and go ahead. And last but not least is XC Tracer Swiss Made!
Rendering of XC Tracer enclosure produced using injection moulding
XC Tracer in the production version will look as in the picture above, with the dimensions 57.5 x 57.5 x 19.25mm, and a weight of only 65g.

column5: >It is planned to make XC Tracer compatible with the following apps:
>XCSoar (compatible using LXWP0 sentence)

column1: As a paraglider pilot and designer since more than 25 years (right now working for Gin Gliders) I was always stunned that the principle how a hang glider variometer works has not changed since I learnt to fly paragliders. Variometers measure the rate of change of altitude by detecting the change in air pressure (static pressure) as altitude changes, and a filter “smoothes” the signal in order produce a usable beeping tone that indicates the climb and sink rate. But this filtering leads to an undesired time lag. While flying in thermals the variometer may still indicate a good climb rate, but in fact this may no longer be the case, it’s just because of the time lag that the variometer still beeps, indicating a false climb rate. You can feel this when flying, there is sometimes a discrepancy between what you feel and what the variometer indicates.

My idea was then to make just a variometer that also uses the vertical acceleration in order to calculate and indicate the vertical climb rate in real time, with no time lag. A first prototype device was flown in Winter 2014, in the video made below you can see how sensitive the variometer is.

column5: >First prototype of XC Tracer in January 2014

column1: An attitude and heading reference system AHRS consist of microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) gyroscopes, accelerometers and magnetometers on all three axes. Using all the information from these sensors it is possible to calculate the orientation of the device in space, and therefore calculate the gravity compensated vertical acceleration. A Kalman filter then estimates the altitude and climb rate, using the vertical acceleration from the AHRS and the pressure from the pressure sensor.

That worked very well, the variometer had no time lag, but then when talking with friends they had the idea to integrate a GPS, then an SD card, then a BLE module for that the fligth information can be sent to a phone or a tablet...
This is how the idea of XC Tracer was born.
The design of XC Traver went through many iterations. Below is a picture of an early, but already functional prototype.
Many prototypes have been built and tested, and quite a few different PCB design iterations have been realized.
Some of the prototype PCB's used during development
The hardware and software are now ready for a serial production of XC Tracer. Below is the latest version of the hardware, based on an embedded Teensy 3.1.
Up to now the enclosured for the XC Tracer prototypes have been 3D printed, below are several examples of that.
3D printed enclosures, the blue version is identical in size to serial version

Next step, where your support is needed

The next step is now to prepare a series production of XC Tracer. The electronics will be Swiss Made and manufactured by
column9: lang=en.html"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Hybrid SA,
column10: >certified according to ISO 9001. And the enclosure will be produced using injection moulding, and of course also be Swiss Made. But injection moulding is expensive, and it only makes sense to to that when enough customers want to have an XC Tracer. This is where your help will be needed. The funding campaign will help with 3 different tasks:

column1: If the crowdfunding campaign is successful, that means if at least 100 customers or more make a pledge for one XC Tracer, then the production of these instruments in professional quality will start immediately. Once the first instruments are sent to customers the source code will be made public. Please help to make XC Tracer a success, and tell your friends about. If there are less then 100 XC Tracer presold on Indiegogo then nothing will happen, and your money will be sent back to your bank account.

column5: >PA6H GPS with custom firmware, SBAS enabled at 5Hz
>HM-11 BLE module, iOS and Android compatible
>1200mAh LiPo battery with low discharge protection circuit
>Easy solution for non-programmers to update firmware over USB

column1: A second option is to use generic GPGGA and GPRMC NMEA sentences with 1Hz, and LXWP0 or LK8EX1 sentence with 10Hz.
Since XC Tracer is open source it will be easy to output other data, you can configure the data that will be sent over BLE according to your wishes.

What you will get

For one perk you will get a fully functional and Swiss Made XC Tracer with an enclosure made by injection moulding, a micro USB cable and a micro SD card with 8GB.

Plug your XC Tracer into an USB charger or an USB plug, charge until the green LED lights up, and then go fly with you new instrument. As soon as you take off the logging of a KML file will start, recording your position and altitude with a frequency of 5Hz. And of course data will be sent over BLE to your Android or iOS device for that you have all the flight information that you need. After landing simply switch off the device, the log file will be written to the SD card before the device will actually be switched off. Once at home take out the SD card and transfer the log file to a computer, and you will see the flight on Google Earth that you recorded.
Since XC Tracer is open source it will be easy to output other data, you can configure the data that will be sent over BLE according to your wishes.
Please talk about this Indiegogo campaign and talk to your friends, make a post on Facebook, send your local paragliding club the link of the campaign. This may help to make this campaign a success.

column2:
Challenges

This is not a product from a company that produces flight instruments for hang gliders since a long time: It started as a hobby and took more than 18 months of development until the project was mature enough for the start of the Indiegogo campaign. Many hardware and software iterations have been made, many flaws have been detect and corrected. Nevertheless it might still might be possible that there are some minor bugs in the hard or the software. But the good news is that the software is open source, the users will be able to modify, adapt or fix the code to their needs.

column1: As always in projects there can anything happen to cause delays: production delays, parts delivery, carrier delays, holidays, technical problems etc. But I will do my best for that the perks will be delivered in time.

Use of XC Tracer is at your own risk. Koni Schafroth disclaims all responsibility for any resulting damage, injury, or expense. It is your responsibility to make sure that your activities comply with applicable laws, including copyright.

It is planned to make XC Tracer compatible with the following apps:

As a paraglider pilot and designer since more than 25 years (right now working for Gin Gliders) I was always stunned that the principle how a hang glider variometer works has not changed since I learnt to fly paragliders. Variometers measure the rate of change of altitude by detecting the change in air pressure (static pressure) as altitude changes, and a filter “smoothes” the signal in order produce a usable beeping tone that indicates the climb and sink rate. But this filtering leads to an undesired time lag. While flying in thermals the variometer may still indicate a good climb rate, but in fact this may no longer be the case, it’s just because of the time lag that the variometer still beeps, indicating a false climb rate. You can feel this when flying, there is sometimes a discrepancy between what you feel and what the variometer indicates.

My idea was then to make just a variometer that also uses the vertical acceleration in order to calculate and indicate the vertical climb rate in real time, with no time lag. A first prototype device was flown in Winter 2014, in the video made below you can see how sensitive the variometer is.
First prototype of XC Tracer in January 2014

An attitude and heading reference system AHRS consist of microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) gyroscopes, accelerometers and magnetometers on all three axes. Using all the information from these sensors it is possible to calculate the orientation of the device in space, and therefore calculate the gravity compensated vertical acceleration. A Kalman filter then estimates the altitude and climb rate, using the vertical acceleration from the AHRS and the pressure from the pressure sensor.

That worked very well, the variometer had no time lag, but then when talking with friends they had the idea to integrate a GPS, then an SD card, then a BLE module for that the fligth information can be sent to a phone or a tablet...
This is how the idea of XC Tracer was born.
What has been done so far
The design of XC Traver went through many iterations. Below is a picture of an early, but already functional prototype.
Many prototypes have been built and tested, and quite a few different PCB design iterations have been realized.
Some of the prototype PCB's used during development
The hardware and software are now ready for a serial production of XC Tracer. Below is the latest version of the hardware, based on an embedded Teensy 3.1.
Up to now the enclosured for the XC Tracer prototypes have been 3D printed, below are several examples of that.
3D printed enclosures, the blue version is identical in size to serial version

Next step, where your support is neededThe next step is now to prepare a series production of XC Tracer. The electronics will be Swiss Made and manufactured by Hybrid SA, certified according to ISO 9001. And the enclosure will be produced using injection moulding, and of course also be Swiss Made. But injection moulding is expensive, and it only makes sense to to that when enough customers want to have an XC Tracer. This is where your help will be needed. The funding campaign will help with 3 different tasks:

If the crowdfunding campaign is successful, that means if at least 100 customers or more make a pledge for one XC Tracer, then the production of these instruments in professional quality will start immediately. Once the first instruments are sent to customers the source code will be made public. Please help to make XC Tracer a success, and tell your friends about. If there are less then 100 XC Tracer presold on Indiegogo then nothing will happen, and your money will be sent back to your bank account.
PA6H GPS with custom firmware, SBAS enabled at 5Hz
HM-11 BLE module, iOS and Android compatible
1200mAh LiPo battery with low discharge protection circuit
Arduino compatible, open source and hackable
Users can develop their own code
Easy solution for non-programmers to update firmware over USB
A second option is to use generic GPGGA and GPRMC NMEA sentences with 1Hz, and LXWP0 or LK8EX1 sentence with 10Hz.
Since XC Tracer is open source it will be easy to output other data, you can configure the data that will be sent over BLE according to your wishes.
What you will get For one perk you will get a fully functional and Swiss Made XC Tracer with an enclosure made by injection moulding, a micro USB cable and a micro SD card with 8GB.

Plug your XC Tracer into an USB charger or an USB plug, charge until the green LED lights up, and then go fly with you new instrument. As soon as you take off the logging of a KML file will start, recording your position and altitude with a frequency of 5Hz. And of course data will be sent over BLE to your Android or iOS device for that you have all the flight information that you need. After landing simply switch off the device, the log file will be written to the SD card before the device will actually be switched off. Once at home take out the SD card and transfer the log file to a computer, and you will see the flight on Google Earth that you recorded.
Since XC Tracer is open source it will be easy to output other data, you can configure the data that will be sent over BLE according to your wishes.
Please talk about this Indiegogo campaign and talk to your friends, make a post on Facebook, send your local paragliding club the link of the campaign. This may help to make this campaign a success.

Risks & Challenges This is not a product from a company that produces flight instruments for hang gliders since a long time: It started as a hobby and took more than 18 months of development until the project was mature enough for the start of the Indiegogo campaign. Many hardware and software iterations have been made, many flaws have been detect and corrected. Nevertheless it might still might be possible that there are some minor bugs in the hard or the software. But the good news is that the software is open source, the users will be able to modify, adapt or fix the code to their needs.

As always in projects there can anything happen to cause delays: production delays, parts delivery, carrier delays, holidays, technical problems etc. But I will do my best for that the perks will be delivered in time.

Use of XC Tracer is at your own risk. Koni Schafroth disclaims all responsibility for any resulting damage, injury, or expense. It is your responsibility to make sure that your activities comply with applicable laws, including copyright.",7.0,2,"1 Campaign

The Privoo Web Cam Cover

 

 

We are proud to present you our Privoo Web Cam Cover. Here are the facts:
• one of the thinnest web cam covers on the market (1.00 mm)
• easy to install within a few seconds
• contemporary design in the colors black or white
• covers the webcam of your laptop or mobile device at your convenience
• material does not affect the performance of your camera and does not leave any scratches on your devices
• competitively priced and comes with Worldwide Free Shipping

What is the ""Privoo webcam cover"" and why do I need it?

Our Privoo webcam cover is a practical hardware solution that guarantees that no one is able to spy on you.  As more and more reports are being published on the dangers of webcam hacking, the urgency of covering your webcam is potentially at an all time high!

Most people are using a simple tape to cover their webcams. But is using that unattractive sticker really the optimal way to cover your webcam and secure your digital privacy?

We dont think so, thats why we created our Privoo Webcam Cover.

Look, even Mark Z. from the Silicon Valley needs one:
column2:
IR=T"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">http://www.businessinsider.de/facebook-ceo-mark...

 

Why is our Privoo Wecam Cover better then others?

column1: • our webcam cover is thinner then most of the others
• our design fits perfectly your fashionable devices
• our product consists of one part only, never loose parts anymore
• we are using material that don´t leave scratches on your devices or affect your webcam performance
• our Privoo isn´t as expensive as others + FREE worldwide shipping
• our webcam cover is installed in less then 5 seconds
• our Product is designed and made in Germany

column3:
>and any other mobile device!!

Why the hell are we doing that?

After our son was born three years ago, we became aware of the danger of all the webcams around us. We didn´t want anyone to irrupt our privacy with our little kid or at work, where I am working with classified documents. After taping all webcams with ugly stickers we started to think about another, more elegant solution. At that point our project started, we wanted to design an elegant, easy to use and fair priced webcam cover!
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Listen to Glenn Green ""why privacy matters""

Please check our limited WikiLeaks Supporting Perk!

Privacy is a right all of us deserve. With buying this perk we will donate 20.- USD directly to WikiLeaks to support their work. You will get as a big thank you our XXL Family Package of 10 Privoo + one official WikiLeaks Supporting T-Shirt available in same colors as our Privoo.


 

Where we are, where we want to get

After the idea didn´t let us go for over a year, we started back in 2016 to work on a functional and elegant design. Even some failures couldn´t get us from the path of creating a cool designed, functional and affordable webcam cover. As our final prototypes passed the test of our family and friends in early 2017, we decided to order tools for mass production. We are going to start in July 2017 with production and worldwide delivery. Help us over this capital intensive period and get one of our perks.

 

 

About us

 

First of all we want to say thank you, to all our friends and family that supported us so far. As you read our campaign to this point we are thankful for your interest as well.

We are Antonie and Mihael, parents of our three year old son David.
After the birth of our son we started to think about the danger of webcams around us. Taping webcams with stickers or post-its didn´t satisfy us. So we startet to think about an elegant and fair priced webcam cover. 

After testing and redesigning our product over the last months we are confident that we offer an elegant, high practical and fair priced product. Designed and made in our hometown Munich.

Please help us make our dream come true and support us here on Indiegogo. Security of privacy matters to everyone of us.

Mihael &
column6:
Antonie Sabeder    Founders of Privoo!

Supported by:

Meet Super Cable

Charging cable is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but it's far from perfect!

Most cables are prone to wear &
column2:
tear, charge slowly, have confusing orientations, and don't work over time. We are here to change that! Introducing the Super Cable.

Tech Brief

1. Patented Blind Plug Design. Easy to plug in and out. Say goodbye to the pain of plug failures.

2. Ultra High Strength. 

3. Express Charge. Faster than original Apple cable.

4. Lifetime Warranty ( only for backers) . Super Cable will be the last cable you need to order for your iPhone.

5. MFi Certified.

6. USB-A to Lightning, 3M/10ft.

Update: We will probably provide one more option: 0.5M/1.66FT Super Cable. It will be great for charging in a car, connecting to CarPlay, traveling, etc.

Customer Testimonial

 

Ultra-Strength

 

 We improved technology and design to strengthen our cable.

We use special technical processes and materials to make the super cable stronger and more conductive.
column9:
s=7444791ae86df03b124ab7260b4dbba0"" src=""""/>

You can pull a car with Super Cable to prove that this cable is strong enough.

Anti-Bending Design

This design can better protect your cable.

It took us a few months to complete a design that was very stylish and practical. We are proud of our design.

The cable works reliably after 100,000 multi-directional flexes. Lasts 30× longer than other cables

Express Charge

We use better copper cores and will have a better charging experience than other similar products.

Much thicker than Apple original USB-C to Lightning cable

Patented Blind Plug Design

 

Based on ergonomic research results, the upper side of USB plug is designed to fit the thumb tip perfectly. User-friendly design makes it super easy for users to determine the correct orientation of USB plug of Super Cable even in the dark.

Also, a much better touch experience makes users more willing to hold Super Cable in the correct orientation.
column16:
s=a485f1a77c968f91a3524ed12c51582c"" src=""""/>

 

Apple MFi Certified

 

We are an Apple MFi certified brand. MFi certified for compatibility and quality you can count on.

What is Apple MFi certified?

MFi Certified is short for ‘made for iPhone/iPad/iPod’ Certified, which is the official certification from Apple. Accessories that owns MFi certification will not damage your Apple devices or cause any danger such as electric leakage.

Added Length

You can use it in bed without keeping the same posture.

Feedback

Specs

 

 

 

Learn more about USB-C to USB-C  Super Cable &
column17:
USB-C to Lightning Super Cable.

 

Stretch Goal

 

High-quality mini adapters. Compatible with USB-C usage scenarios.

Timeline

About us

Our product vision: simple, durable, worry-free. We seek the strongest and best materials to develop products with ergonomic designs.

Our team is based in San Francisco, Shenzhen and Osaka. Craftsmanship is what we pursue. We have excellent product development engineers, and we have a mature production and manufacturing supply chain to ensure that our products are of high quality from design to output. Our first generation Super Cable have received a great response since they were put into the market. Now we are developing a new generation products, which we believe will bring surprises to our users.

 

Design Concept and Why here

The cables is one of the most commonly used products in our daily life, but is usually of simple and poor quality. We hope to create some products that are more exciting.

We made our first designs focused on the appearance. We require the joints be very smooth and also be durable. After some brainstorming, we were able to come up with the design we wanted.

After many instances of mold-opening, we finally got what we wanted.

We are proud of it. We chose here for two reasons, one is to verify our ideas, and the other is to promote the mass production of products to get better quality and cost. If you are interested in our products, or would like to bring our products to your market, please feel free to contact us.

 

Risks and challenges

As a hardware project, there are natural risks and challenges in engineering and manufacturing. Due to supply chain issues and other reasons, the final manufacturing schedule may be delayed. However, we will be as transparent as possible to keep you informed and work to resolve any issues that may arise. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us.

column1:
0,"

We, Tommy and Jon, are inventors and artists who have built careers in science and fashion. Idle doesn't work for folks like us and we wanted to create something that could have a positive impact on those we are able to reach. 

We created CopperBac. When the sweat in your fingers comes in contact with copper and silver it creates ions that are transferred to your skin. Copper and silver ions are toxic to bacteria and germs and gives you one more layer of protection in your daily life. 

Each CopperBac is made by Tommy and Jon between their two workshops in the Washington DC area. Each CopperBac is created and polished individually and uses a 3M VHB tape to secure it to your devices. 

CopperBac is as simple as it appears. We have already done the cost and time analysis for production and have validated our shipment goals with a test production run. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

This is not a personal style accessory to keep to yourself. This is a cost conscious measure with an artistic twist that we hope you will share with your loved ones. 

 

Perks: 

- Single CopperBac- You will receive a single CopperBac

- CopperBac (qty-2) for tablet- You will receive quantity 2 CopperBac.  They can be used on a single tablet or for 2 phones

-Family pack (qty-6) CopperBac- You will receive quantity 6 CopperBac.  

 

CopperBac may help add an extra level of protection to your regular hygiene practices. You should still wash your hands regularly with soap, use hand sanitizer, cover your mouth when you sneeze, wear a mask in public, practice social distancing, clean your phone and other electronic devices regularly and all other health practices that the CDC recommends.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:
• Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
• Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?
Break it down for folks in more detail:
• Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
• Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
• Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.
Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:
• Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
• Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
• Make it real for people and build trust.
People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.
• Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
• Describe your plan for solving these challenges.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

I want to introduce a new product, to you guys. We have been working very hard to bring this product to your guys. This product is so great, you can transfer your data off from your smart phone devices in to micro USB, It also work on your computers so you can make a backup of your data. This product will work with all the smart devices, mobiles, tablets, computers and laptops. 

Do you just hate, when your phones does not have enough memory to take more pictures or limitation for you downloading more apps or cannot transfer data to your computer. Now day most of the smartphones does not have expandable micro SD card build in. We know one company very well, it Apple. This plus card reader will help you transfer data from your iPhone, to micro SD and now you can transfer to your computer or your other smart device. For example you want to transfer from iPhone to android phone, now you can without using the computer or cloud. 

The best part of this plus card reader, it can be your personal flash driver. You can save documents, videos, pictures, PDF, and project. This device so small that you can put in your pocket. Other best part of this plus card reader, it works with all smart devices, computers, laptops and tablets. When you get this plus card reader, apps is free to download from Apple apps store and same with google apps. This device can save you time and money and headache, just with one device.  This Plus card reader will be your best friend. You going to use this everyday because it like a personal flash drive. So you can transfer data on this plus card reader.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

Plus card reader - will allow you to download free apps on your mobile devices. Yes it is free, you don't have have to pay for the apps. You can get from apple store and google play store. It also work with your Windows, Linux, and Mac. Just plug and play, it will automatic install the driver on your computer.

Features

Fastest way to transfer file between iOS devices and computers. No need for iTunes, Internet, Cloud or wireless network.
Support FAT32 and exFAT (support for files larger than 256GB

 

Showing how plus card reader works, what is the benefit having 4in1 one card reader.  It will become your personal flash drive and you can use on any devices. So you don't have to carry many cables and adapters. It make life very simple and you going to use this every day.

We going to use this money to buy big inventory, so we can bring down the cost of this products. This money will also help us with marketing and advertisement and website design   

As we know with any campaign there are unexpected road bumps.  With our experience completing previous successful campaigns we are only more wise and know what to expect.  The good thing is that the Plus Card Reader is 100% done, we have tested hundreds and thousands of times across multiple devices and we are confident of its quality, build and design.

Our factory can produce mass production once we receive your orders, i.e. we have all the materials ready for mass production.  We anticipate the survey process, mass production and 100% fulfillment within a couples of months period so that backers will receive their Plus Card reader early first of February  2017.

Why should I pledge for the Plus Card Reader?

To pledge for a Plus Card Reader simply pick your favorite perk based on what you need.  Our perks are listed on the right hand column of our page.

How will my order be shipped?

We will ship your orders using standard post unless you are a distributor/wholesaler.

We plan to begin shipping at the being of first quarter being February and have all backers received their orders by early quarter 2017. 

How much is shipping?  Shipping from USA $3 your perk.  

For international shipping - I will ship international but the cost will be average $30 to ship all over the world with USPS. United State Postal Office, it will take about 10-15 business days to get your product. 

How can I select the color of my Plus Card Reader? Right now we only have black and white to pick from.

An email survey will be sent once we have collected your orders from Indiegogo.  This typically gets sent out 7-10 days after the end of the campaign date.

How do I contact you?

Feel free to contact us via email at 4in1cables@gmail.com

With any project, there are risks and challenges that must be considered before going forward. These can include:

● Supply Chain: Manufacturing Delay 
A delay in the supply chain would cause us to miss our promised shipping deadlines. We don’t anticipate that this will become a problem, as we have developed really close relationships with our suppliers and have worked out a generous timeline that we intend to beat.

● Fulfillment Capacity 
If we generate a lot of interest and we get swamped with orders, it is possible that fulfillment and shipping will be delayed. However, we have worked out a schedule for our project to ensure that we allow plenty of time to ship our orders in a timely fashion. We will be devoting our full-time efforts to this project.

Above all, we want our potential backers to know that we plan to be very upfront and honest about any delays or challenges that we run into along the way. If we happen to run into delays during production or distribution, we will let you know about it as soon as we know about it!

 

Thank you for your support on Indiegogo!

Introducing Comet, the world’s first super smartphone that floats in water. Comet is an Android powered BrilliantPhone with the latest technology, high speed processor, and elegant design. 

 

With Comet, you will never lose your smartphone or data stored in it simply because you dropped it in water. Live the moment, enjoy the beauty of water without the panic of losing your smartphone.

82.5 million Smartphones have been damaged by water and more are lost in restrooms, pools, beaches and oceans. Comet is destined to end this problem for the water savvy lifestyles. Comet floats on water and is IPx7 water-resistant. It floats on water and will resist water like no other smartphone. In fact, you can take Comet with you while you swim, surf or enjoy the beach.

column1: Our current working model can be seen floating in water (This is a prototype and our final product design will not be the same

Please be advised this is simply the prototype and a testing of the hardware. The Body design will be improved to look like the renders in the video and there will be many more applications in the phone once completed.
This video simply shows we are a work in progress and thanks to all your support we will eventually be a finished product for you all to enjoy!

Comet is a next generation smartphone. We designed Comet for the fashion forwards. A smartphone that truly transcends time and style with its unique design and features. Comet is dust proof, water proof, has dual 16 MP cameras and has dual LED notification lights. Dive into a world of exciting features with Comet!
First of it's kind, Comet features big quality lens, wide angle optics, 16 mega pixel front &
column2: rear camera with optical image stabilization for smooth video recording. Now take high-quality pictures and smooth HD videos from any of your camera!

column1: Comet features an LED notification light which adds a new personal style to your smartphone. Mood recognizer is designed on a biometric platform that detects body temperature and gauges user emotion by displaying various colours, each colour describes a specific emotion like happiness, excitement, love, enthusiasm,  etc.

Love all these features? Get excited, because Comet also packs the latest in specs that match or outperform any other smartphone on the market. Dive below for a full list of specs and comparison with the latest generation smartphones.

Comet features the latest in technology. It is powered by an ultra-fast Qualcomm Snapdragon 810, 2 GHZ Octa-Core Processor. It is loaded with 4 GB of RAM and stock android for a butter smooth user experience. The screen is a 4.7"" HD AMOLED display. Comet also has a dual 16 MP camera that allows you to take high-quality selfies, shoot in landscapes, panoramas, bursts and many other modes. Comet has a 2800 mAh battery that lasts through your full day of work, party and excitement.
Don’t settle for mediocre budget smartphones when you can have the best at an affordable price.

Comet features a breakthrough in personal privacy for smartphones - Q-LOCK. It uses a military grade encryption to protect your privacy when you call or text your friends who also uses a Comet smartphone. It also uses a strong encryption that shields your calls and texts to other smartphones making it nearly impossible for anyone to spy on you and breach your privacy. Here are a few of its capabilities.
• Military Grade 256 bit AES to encrypt voice communications

In today's technology age, we believe secure privacy should be one of the top priorities when it comes to smartphone choices. It is almost scary, the level of ease at which hackers and other spies to tap into your smartphone's network to access your communications. With Comet, we are taking a major step towards complete protection against these malicious activities.

Our team has worked on bringing a buoyant smartphone into the market for over two years. Comet is our dream and we are presenting you our final vision on IndieGoGo. You can become one of the first to experience it while availing an exclusive discount.

Our team is composed of industry leaders and experts who have worked with complicated projects and businesses and had hands-on experience working with organizations like NASA. Together with our engineering and design team, Comet was developed with over 2 years in R&
We have gone through many variations to reach a final working prototype that we have now. Below are a few snaps of the work put into the making of Comet.
Thoughts from Experts at Comet.
(The following image shows our current stage 2 prototype. Our final product design will not be the same. The final design will reflect the product shown in the main video and images)

We have the technology and manufacturing partners around the world who will enable us to ship Comet to you by Fall 2017.

• Nixie LAB - Ultimate Nixie Project
• Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi

WHAT IS THIS

Useless Nixie Device ""is a device which has a function but no direct purpose"". The device allows you to connect 16 different sockets for several dozen nixie tubes and enjoy to watch your tubes in action. It's perfect devices for your desk. The sockets (no.1 - 17) presented below are also compatible with Nixie Shield for Arduino, Nixie Hat for Raspberry Pi and Universal Nixie Tube Tester.
The main function is ""good looking"".  If you are a nixie tube enthusiast, this project will be the perfect complement for your desk.

""A Nixie tube or cold cathode display is an electronic device for displaying numerals or other information using glow discharge. The glass tube contains a wire-mesh anode and multiple cathodes, shaped like numerals or other symbols. Applying power to one cathode surrounds it with an orange glow discharge.""

Useless Nixie Device is a simple tube controller with high voltage 170V power supply on board. All digits or characters of the nixie tube are displayed with a constant speed. The device requires 12V power supply
• The nixie tube is included with the socket no.17
• You can choose which tube you want to receive
• Red coated tube Z567M or transparent tube Z5670M
• Socket no.17 is also compatible with tubes: ZM1041, ZM1043 - but in this case operates only with two tube cathodes + -
• 16 sockets available for dozen different tubes

ShiftCam

The ShiftCam journey began over 2 years ago with our first Kickstarter campaign: a 6-in-1 Traveler lens phonecase. Now shipping to over 80 countries, this pioneering product was just the beginning in compact, convenient and comprehensive mobile phone lenses designed to enhance mobile phone photography. 

Since then, ShiftCam’s growing team of photography enthusiasts have gone on to develop ShiftCam’s removable ProLens series and mounting system. Combining high quality performance and user-friendly experience, today ShiftCam proudly introduces the latest addition to our Phonetographer collection of detachable lenses.

 

Are you a Phonetographer?

Whether professional or savvy enthusiasts, photographers today are increasingly switching between their trusty DSLR cameras and mobile phone photography. With ever-improving technology, mobile photography is quickly catching up. But whether using a digital camera or your mobile device, your photographs are only as good as your lens. 

By developing professional grade detachable lenses for your mobile phone, ShiftCam is blurring the lines between DSLR and phone camera performance. Combining the pocket-sized portability of your mobile phone and the high-quality capability of a DSLR camera, ShiftCam Phonetography is on the rise. Yes, that’s PHONETOGRAPHY, a new word for a new era.       

See more... way more than ever before

Thanks to the pioneering use of specialist DSLR lens manufacturing techniques on a much smaller scale, the first-of-its-kind aspherical lens allows for zero distortion of lines even with the impressive 122º Ultra Wide angle of view. A unique optical design, coupled with nano-coated lens minimizes chromatic abberations and unwanted flares for a sharper image. Close-ups or long shots, indoors or outdoors - the edge to edge clarity makes this innovative detachable lens perfect for precision photography. 

This is one small lens for your phone - one giant leap for PHONETOGRAPHY.      

Awards &
column2:
Reviews of ShiftCam

Seeing an opportunity to expand on the existing ProLens collection (60mm Telephoto, 18mm Wide Angle, 230º Fisheye, 25mm 10X Macro, 75mm 3X Long Range Macro), ShiftCam introduces the first of its kind: an impossibly small aspherical 12mm ultra-wide angle detachable lens for your mobile phone. 

Features 

Because ultra wide angle is suitable for so many occasions, we are launching 3 accessories to go with your new 12mm Ultra Wide Angle, so that you can make the most out of this lens.

Maximize your video content with the perfect stabilization assistant. Use this fully adjustable universal counterweight to balance any ShiftCam lens in conjunction with your gimbal for perfectly smooth, judder-free footage.

 

Before you ask – it was glaringly obvious - so yes, we thought of that too. A ShiftCam 62mm filter with corresponding adapter. Moreover, this adapter is designed for any CPL and universal filters, so you can even use your own filters with the ShiftCam 12mm Aspherical Lens. 

 

There’s something for everyone here! Don’t use an iPhone? Not to worry. The ShiftCam team has produced a small but strong Universal Lens Mount that supports ALL ShiftCam existing Lenses.  There is also a Cold Shoe Mount built in with this universal Lens Mount for accessories expansion.

The 122º ultra wide angle allows you to capture 3x more content in one frame. Tell the whole story without missing any important details of your surroundings.

Our world is vast with so much to see. Make the most of breathtaking landscapes with your ultra wide angle lens.

Capture majestic architecture preserving original content just as you see it. Thanks to the groundbreaking aspherical lens, you can avoid warping of lines and that all-important proportion.

When space is limited, you no longer need to bend over backwards to see the big picture in confined indoor environments.

With a winning combination of the aspherical lens, optical design and precision nano coating, benefit from edge to edge clarity, capturing impressive images in incredible detail.

With multilayers of customised nano-coating, unwanted flares and ghosting is minimised.
column16:

This is where mobile photography comes in to its own. With this new lens and the right app, you can easily auto-calibrate, fixing perspective with the tap of a button. You’ve essentially got your whole studio in your pocket for quick and easy editing on the go.

Discover new and exciting perspective with the 12mm focal length.

See more than first meets the eye, with 0.35x mini wide angle macro close-ups revealing unexpected little details.

Weighing less than 100g, this pocket-friendly detachable lens houses an impressive 6 element 4 group structure - perfect for capturing those unexpected moments.

 View all sample photos here: http://bit.ly/2R9esG7

So you think you know your lenses? Well then you will know that ultra wide aspherical lenses are industry gold standard. They make a world of difference, with cheaper spherical lenses often the cause of major distortion and aberration. The wider the lens, the more difficult it is to achieve zero distortion. 

 

No Distortion vs Distorted Image
column23:
s=6265abe0065ff66d4b94fed737595634"" src=""""/>

Why the price difference? It’s all to do with the glass finish based on how the lens is manufactured. Most large-scale manufacturers sand and grind theses spherical lenses in to shape, which can cause minute, but vital imperfections. By melting the glass first, the purity and finish of an aspherical lens can be guaranteed. 

 

The Solution: A New Technique for Zero Distortion
column30:
s=e3c913ade281d389e40a3064036f18fd"" src=""""/>

With a bit of innovative thinking, the ShiftCam team have come up with a new precision technique to produce the smallest ever aspherical lens for your phone. 

Combining 15 years of optical engineering experience and 9 months of dedicated product development in partnership with industry leading manufacturers from Korea, Japan and China, the Design and Development team has created one-of a-kind tooling capable of sustaining thousands of degrees heat whilst maintaining precision and accuracy. 

These custom-made discs of glass will enable perfectly concentrated light sources to be piped into your phone, maintaining zero distortion and replicating all that you see with the naked eye.
column37:
s=f1facc51b4797017142b98da43d35c55"" src=""""/>

Lens Structure Design

Of course the ShiftCam Team never do anything by halves. So to be absolutely sure that chromatic aberration does not occur, we’ve taken things one step further, rearranging our lens structure into a unique 6 Element 4 Group structure. We even created new tooling to make sure the final step of nano-coating covers the entire surface of the aspherical lens for edge-to-edge flare-free clarity.
column44:

The easy alignment system with a slide and shift channel makes changing lenses so easy you can do it with your eyes closed.

column57:
Indiegogo as we launched our very first campaign exactly 2 years ago. To celebrate, we are offering the ShiftCam 12mm Brass Edition backers only.

In early 2017 ShiftCam was founded with a mission to reinvent mobile photography, making it even more convenient, compact and comprehensive. Our aim is to enable the most seamless transition from smartphone to a professional camera.

We believe the best part of memories is making them. That’s why we strive to create the best possible tools to do just that. The ShiftCam team is made up of a group of like-minded photographers, designers, and engineers from around the world who all share a vision of taking PHONETOGRAPHY to a whole new level. 

 

","ShiftCamThe ShiftCam journey began over 2 years ago with our first Kickstarter campaign: a 6-in-1 Traveler lens phonecase. Now shipping to over 80 countries, this pioneering product was just the beginning in compact, convenient and comprehensive mobile phone lenses designed to enhance mobile phone photography. Since then, ShiftCam’s growing team of photography enthusiasts have gone on to develop ShiftCam’s removable ProLens series and mounting system. Combining high quality performance and user-friendly experience, today ShiftCam proudly introduces the latest addition to our Phonetographer collection of detachable lenses. Are you a Phonetographer?Whether professional or savvy enthusiasts, photographers today are increasingly switching between their trusty DSLR cameras and mobile phone photography. With ever-improving technology, mobile photography is quickly catching up. But whether using a digital camera or your mobile device, your photographs are only as good as your lens. By developing professional grade detachable lenses for your mobile phone, ShiftCam is blurring the lines between DSLR and phone camera performance. Combining the pocket-sized portability of your mobile phone and the high-quality capability of a DSLR camera, ShiftCam Phonetography is on the rise. Yes, that’s PHONETOGRAPHY, a new word for a new era.       See more... way more than ever beforeThanks to the pioneering use of specialist DSLR lens manufacturing techniques on a much smaller scale, the first-of-its-kind aspherical lens allows for zero distortion of lines even with the impressive 122º Ultra Wide angle of view. A unique optical design, coupled with nano-coated lens minimizes chromatic abberations and unwanted flares for a sharper image. Close-ups or long shots, indoors or outdoors - the edge to edge clarity makes this innovative detachable lens perfect for precision photography. This is one small lens for your phone - one giant leap for PHONETOGRAPHY.      Awards & Reviews of ShiftCamSeeing an opportunity to expand on the existing ProLens collection (60mm Telephoto, 18mm Wide Angle, 230º Fisheye, 25mm 10X Macro, 75mm 3X Long Range Macro), ShiftCam introduces the first of its kind: an impossibly small aspherical 12mm ultra-wide angle detachable lens for your mobile phone. Features Because ultra wide angle is suitable for so many occasions, we are launching 3 accessories to go with your new 12mm Ultra Wide Angle, so that you can make the most out of this lens.Maximize your video content with the perfect stabilization assistant. ",,23.0,1,"1 Campaign

To recap: Jen was at the SF Pride Parade when an evil-doer nabbed her iPhone. So let's pitch in to help her get another one! In the process, hopefully we can restore her faith in humanity, or at least remind her how many people care about her.

Your contribution can be as big or small as you want. Consider: if you would happily buy Jen a drink, or take her to a movie, or buy her some tasty baked good, why not pitch in that amount? $1, 5, 10... whatever is comfortable. If you can't contribute, share the campaign with someone who knows Jen who might.

UHS co-classmate

","To recap: Jen was at the SF Pride Parade when an evil-doer nabbed her iPhone. So let's pitch in to help her get another one! In the process, hopefully we can restore her faith in humanity, or at least remind her how many people care about her.
