If you can't contribute, share the campaign with someone who knows Jen who might.

We love Facebook. We think it’s one of the best ways to keep in touch with friends and family that most of us might not see otherwise. Facebook’s timeline is great. It enables you to organize your posts chronologically and make your own timeline…. sort of.

What we don’t understand is why we can’t place posts exactly where we want to on the Timeline.  Shouldn’t someone be able to post pictures of their fifth birthday party, well, when they were five years old? Shouldn’t pictures from a person’s high school graduation, which they would love to share with my old friends, appear on my Timeline when they graduated high school? Simple, right?

The Timeliner is a simple app that helps you organize your Facebook page chronologically by placing your posts exactly where they belong on the timeline. Now pictures, videos, links and posts appear on the exact date in which they occurred essentially turning your Facebook timeline into a virtual scrapbook.

Now, all you have to do is take a post from your smart phone or tablet and with one click place it where you want on your Timeline, and it’ll stay there. Now you can organize and share your memories from the past with the people that matter. And maybe connect with that kid that always picked on you when you were in third grade.

The Timeliner is an app that integrates with Facebook’s Timeline in a new and exciting way.  It allows you to post pretty much anything you want —pictures, images, videos, whatever — exactly where they belong on your Facebook Timeline.

It’s simple. You create a memory, and then choose the date where it will appear on your Facebook Timeline. Got a picture from your 1999 high school graduation? The Timeliner allows you to put that picture on the exact day where you made your parents so proud. Now you can share your life with family and friends, even the memories that occurred before you discovered Facebook.
How did you come up with idea for The Timeliner?
We all use Facebook. We think it’s a great way to connect with family and friends, but think something’s missing. We can’t figure out how to put a post where it really belongs on our Timeline
column2: we have all this empty space below the date we first registered as a Facebook user. What a waste.

column1: What platforms are compatible with The Timeliner?
The Timeliner will be compatible with iOS and Android phones and tablets.
The app will be available in the App Store and Google Play (for Android devices.)
The Timeliner will be completely free to download.
So, here’s what we need. We’re asking for $20,000 in order to take this app from concept to market. We’re estimating that this is how the money will be allocated:
Here are some of the cool things we’re offering if you help us reach our funding goal:
Get an exclusive invitation to “Alpha Test” the app.  (Invite only, before we even make it to beta testing. This means you’ll be one of our user experience testers.)
You’ll get a “Timeliner” t-shirt and a special shout-out on our Facebook and Twitter pages. We can Tweet about your biz or maybe there’s a favorite moment in your history you’d like to share.

Get a copy of the out-of-print DYR coffee table book with a personalized drawing (cartoon, of course) of you in your favorite decade. The book will also be signed by the author, Michael Gitter and include a message from the ever-so-grateful DoYourRemember.com team.

We’ll fly you and a friend down from anywhere in the continental US to come to our launch party in Miami Beach, Florida. This includes air fair for two, hotel accommodations for the night, as well as transportation to and from the airport. You’ll meet the founders and the team and enjoy everything that Miami has to offer

DoYouRemember? (www.doyouremember.com) is a social site dedicated to all things nostalgia. We’re creating a place for people to connect with each other and share their memories in a fun and engaging way.

Contributing to our project isn’t the only way you can help see this concept come to life. You can help us by spreading the word! Tell your friends about it, tell your family, tell anyone you think might be interested. Post a link to our project on your Facebook page, send out a Tweet on Twitter, or share a post on Google +.
We really appreciate you taking the time to look at our page and helping make this project a reality!
Also, don’t forget to sign up to beta test the DoYouRemember? site when it goes live. www.doyouremember.com

My name is Jimmy Crangle from Glasgow, Scotland. One thing that has really concerned me for years is
column2: why is email still such an incredibly, unreliable form of communication?

column1: Why does email have to be so un-reliable and un-stable despite all of our modern technology? Why can we not send a simple email message with complete certainly that the message will be delivered? and that criminals and competitors will not intercept it? Why do we have to put up with spam mail from people we just don't want to hear from?
This is all completely wrong, and it seems that no-one wants to do anything about it…..but i do!

I don't know if you'll remember what a Telex machine was but I was actually one of the UK's last ever Telex consultants. I sold, installed and maintained over 200 old, cranky Telex machines. I was also one of the pioneers in 1995 to develop an iTelex software program to allow users to send Telex messages from their PC via the Telex network.
The old Telex system we used from the 1930's to the 1990's was actually far more reliable &
column2: secure than our modern-day email service. Those Telex machines were very slow, but they did have some extreme benefits that the present e-mail system is seriously lacking.

column1: People who used the old Telex machines were absolutely sure their messages got delivered without being intercepted by anyone. It's time we had this certainty back!
I have a solution and it's called eTelex. eTelex is a unique application that gives users 100% guaranteed delivery, reliability, privacy &
column2: security. It's spam free, phishing proof and it uses high level encryption. It's easy to use and it protects users from thieves, competitors and governments. eTelex is a free application with a premium level for high end users.

column1: So what I've really done is i've taken the fundamental principals of the once trusted, Telex network, such as guaranteed delivery, security &
column2: privacy - and i've incorporated them into a secure, user friendly messaging application.

column1: • My goal is to raise USD$20,000 and I will also invest $20,000 of my own savings.
• Your funding and support will help develop the fully functional eTelex application to level 1.0
• It will take 8 weeks to complete the project.
• eTelex can put an end to hackers, criminals and even oppressive governments.
• eTelex can help protect freedom of speech, privacy and human rights, especially in developing countries.
• Let's put an end to unsecured email and junk mail once and for all.
I have some great perks for you:
• If you pledge $10 you will be the first to use the eTelex app and you also get 2GB of free online storage for life.
• Pledge $25 or more and you get 4GB free storage.
• Pledge $50 and you get all of the above plus you will be invited to our launch party in the UK.
• Pledge $100 and you get (all of the above) plus 200BG free for two years.
• Pledge $1,000 or more and you get 1TB storage for life.

<li>Pledge $5,000 + Plus, and you get all of the above plus we'll fly you to our Glasgow office to participate in a 2-day brainstorming workshop with our entire team on what life-changing apps eTelex should develop next. Your flights &amp
• Get the word out and make some noise about our eTelex campaign.
• Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
• Watch the eTelex demo on the video and share it!
• Post it to your facebook page. Thank You

If you pledge $10 you will be the first to use the eTelex app and you also get 2GB of free online storage for life.
Pledge $25 or more and you get 4GB free storage.
Pledge $50 and you get all of the above plus you will be invited to our launch party in the UK.
Pledge $100 and you get (all of the above) plus 200BG free for two years.
Pledge $1,000 or more and you get 1TB storage for life.

Pledge $5,000 + Plus, and you get all of the above plus we'll fly you to our Glasgow office to participate in a 2-day brainstorming workshop with our entire team on what life-changing apps eTelex should develop next. Your flights & hotel are all included.
Get the word out and make some noise about our eTelex campaign.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Watch the eTelex demo on the video and share it!
Post it to your facebook page. Thank You

column1: Q4) What projects can I use
The list is literally endless, because IR can be used to control almost any device on the planet. Here is a small sample:
Low cost Teaching aid as part of your Lab - everyone can have their own decoder
Indoor ‘Toy Car’ control (Don’t try it with a real car, particularly indoors!)
Get your iPhone, Android, Tablet, MCU, PC or Server to control your devices using IR.
A practical way to teach students about Electronics &
Wireless serial communications between Arduino and computer
Control any Arduino type project (Also Raspberry Pi or any MCU)
Access the service menu of your TV. (Some TVs can be upgraded for free. NB: Warranty)
Replace your Air Conditioning remote and control remotely
Not to mention, where we began, you can dream up any number of projects to do with TV remote control. (we have our own unique project underway in this area)
IR can provide optical isolation between an Arduino and relay circuit.
Camera control, time-lapse, movement detection, flash synchronisation or just remote snapping

In summary, IR is the cheapest indoor method to control a device located within the same room and is extremely reliable, at a small fraction of the cost of wired, Wi-Fi, LAN, ZigBee or other RF systems. And guess what - you probably have several spare controllers already available.
We will release all of the MCU code (Arduino, Raspberry Pi etc) to backers without restrictions as to use, which is more liberal than OS. We hope this will encourage the release of 3rd party kits &

column1: ","Advanced IR Analyzer & Decoder for TV remote controls and more....

A big thanks to everyone for supporting AnalysIR. Check out our latest updates via the TAB above. We have received quite a few emails since the campaign ended, from people looking to support AnalysIR. So we are happy to say that if you missed the opportunity to support AnalysIR during the campaign, we still have a limited number of perks available on the same terms as in this Campaign  until we launch v1.0 on our main website. You can click here to 'Get AnalysIR' now at the same reduced rate via our website.Note: The Kit perks will only be made available to people who have contributed to another perk which includes AnalysIR. Bonus: AnalysIR now includes support for a number of IR Sources including Arduino, Raspberry Pi, USB IR Toy and TI MSP430 Launchpad.

( We have made lots of updates and added more features to AnalysIR...see the Updates Tab above for all the latest News and BONUS FEATURES! )New KIT Perk added for existing backers. For details click on the GALLERY TAB above and scroll to the bottom of the Gallery page & open the 'IR Starter Kit' document in the Files Section. The kit perk contains a selection of quality IR components, which does not include AnalysIR.
For more updates on this project please visit our Blog

AnalysIR was born as part of another leading-edge IR(infra red) project we are working on - Think mega Universal Remote Control meets Arduino & saves the Planet (But don’t tell anyone - it's still a secret).  For this we needed to decode every TV remote control we could find and found the existing products available out there to be either limited or too expensive. The truth is we didn’t find one that met our needs at any price. The good news is that we are making good progress on this project and that as we enhanced our own ‘homebrew’ decoder tool we realised how useful and unique it was and decided to devote resources into launching it as AnalysIR.

As we are big fans of Arduino (and Raspberry Pi) we implemented a Windows application which connected to an Arduino with the addition of a just ‘one’ component, an IR receiver. Voilá, we now have what we believe to be the most feature rich IR analyzer & decoder available. It's so good we can decode new IR signals in a fraction of the time before AnalysIR. No need for expensive Logic Analyzers or Oscilloscopes.

AnalysIR already decodes 13 of the most popular IR protocols on the market (up from the 10 mentioned in our Video) which we estimate represents circa 80% of the hundreds of millions of TV type remote controls in homes, hotels, offices, Auditoriums around the world. So today more than 500 million remote controls can be decoded by AnalysIR - not bad eh!. We would welcome our backer’s help in increasing this 80% coverage to 90% and beyond!.

The rationale for our efforts with IR technology is to find ways of reusing the millions of discarded TV remotes controls on the planet. AnalysIR is our first baby step and we look forward to even bigger steps with the help of your backing.
AnalysIR is made up of 3 components:
An Arduino (or other MCU type platform such as Raspberry Pi, Pic, MSP, AVR etc) with an inbuilt serial over USB, connected to the PC.(Not included)
An 3-pin IR receiver (circa $1) which uses one digital input pin and works off 5V or 3.3V power supply and GND. (Not included, See Guide for more details.)

To give you an idea of the functionality we have provided a copy of the pre-release version of the Getting Started Guide and Video, in the gallery (click the Gallery tab near the top of this screen for the Guide & the video link is below). The Guide also includes a Fritzing schematic. Please refer to the Video and Guide for a deeper understanding of the features of AnalysIR. Also see the FAQ below for simple setup instructions.
What We Need & What You Get
We will use your contributions to:
Fund development of enhancements to AnalysIR,
Purchase a Raspberry Pi and similar platforms and publishing the associated on-board software.
Complete & launch our website for community interaction.
In return for your much needed support, you will receive:
A copy of the latest version of AnalysIR via internet download & Licence Key
A copy of the AnalysIR Getting Started guide (20 pages so far).

A copy of the Arduino source code for your use without any restrictions, plus a copy of the source code for any new platforms supported such as Raspberry Pi etc. You can easily port this Arduino code to any MCU platform (Raspberry Pi, Pic, MSP, AVR) as most of the functionality is in the Windows application.
A vote for the next features to be included in AnalysIR (each $ = 1 vote)
All updates to the product for at least 24 months and maybe longer.
A link to an online guide to help in the selection of IR receivers for specific projects, which is briefly covered in the User Guide.

So if we raise our minimum target of $1,000 - AnalysIR will be released. When we hit $2,000 we will add support for Raspberry Pi. If we make $3,000->10,000 we will add features, protocols and more platforms based on the feedback & votes of you - our backers.

We have decided to set a low minimum target to ensure there is at least some interest & demand for our project. If we don't reach this minimum threshold we will focus our resources on other exciting IR projects we have in the pipeline.

Before we get to the perks, we would like to highlight that for the cost of your perk, and using your existing Arduino (Raspberry Pi etc) with a simple IR receiver (~US$1) hooked up to your PC, you will get the best IR Analyzer & Decoder available - outperforming the best professional Oscilloscopes and Logic Analyzers we have seen, without having to part with hundreds or even thousands of dollars. Remember a single use of AnalysIR could save you many times the cost of your perk alone.

We have outlined your perks over on the right. We truly want as many backers as possible to engage with AnalysIR. So we have introduced a discounted perk for Educational use, Hacker clubs, MakerSpaces, Students & any type of Electronics club. To avail of these special rates you will need to use an identifiable email address for product registration. (e.g. me@schoolx.xxx or headmaker@hackespaceNYC.xxx or similar) Registration and support is linked to this email address. Similarly, if you have published your IR project online before the start of this campaign, you may also avail of this rate. (Just include a link in your registration email).
As a further gesture we have also included a limited number of special perks for those who cannot afford more, which will be operated without restriction on a trust basis.
For Professionals, Manufacturers & Kit distributors we have also presented a Full source code perk & Mega packs.
For our heroes who have inspired us, we have created a $1 perk, which is as close as possible to a gift.

You may have guessed it, that we are a software only team and haven't included any kits (Arduino, Raspberry Pi or IR receivers). However, rest assured if you need to source any of the components we will arrange this for you after the campaign either via our web site or partners. (Our web site www.AnalysIR.com will be launched after the campaign). We hope to work with kit suppliers to bundle AnalysIR as an of-the-shelf kit, including MCU & IR receiver.

We will continue to work on AnalysIR throughout the campaign and plan to make deliveries in 2 stages commencing within one week of the campaign end. The first set will be to earliest 10% of  backers and largest 10% of backers. We will then spend circa 2-3 weeks ironing out any glitches before releasing to all other backers and expect to issue regular updates until the end of 2013. From next year we will adjust to a standard product release cycle. So if you want to experience and help with the early stage roll-out then either back early or contribute an extra $ or two for your perk or do both!. Participation in the stage 1 rollout is optional.
These early adopters will receive special mention in the initial release of AnalysIR.

There are hundreds of millions of discarded TV type remote controls in the world. We found a total of 17 in our own home. Our involvement with IR was inspired by the Arduino community and began with an idea to reduce the waste associated with remote controls. We hope that your support for our campaign will help in reducing this waste in the future.

We also believe that AnalysIR will prove to be a great tool for electronics labs within the Education sector, a must have accessory for MakerSpaces, Robotics & Electronics clubs and will also save countless hours for professionals configuring & troubleshooting complex TV & media installations.

Remember, if you can't back us directly, you can still help by referencing AnalysIR on your social media, blog or website. Using the share tools on Indiegogo is another excellent way of helping us out. You can also follow us on twitter via @AnalysIR.
We will also include a special credit to our top ‘Noise Makers’ in the initial release of AnalysIR.
Thanks in advance.....from the AnalysIR team.
If we exceed our minimum target as outlined above, we will organise a vote among backers on a selection of new features to include in AnalysIR, for example a subset of:
Adding basic Logic Analyzer support (MCU dependent)
To mark the occasion, we have created a short video entitled ‘March of the Motes’ for you. Share this too to help or campaign.
Q1) What is the current Status of AnalysIR?
We have been using AnalysIR in-house for a couple of months now, but it is still classified as Beta. We plan to make a full release as part of this campaign with your support.
Q2) What IR protocols are currently supported by AnalysIR?

We support most of the common protocols out there and hope to increase this with the help of our backers. We estimate that these protocols cover circa 80% of the remote controls in use today and some older ones. The list of IR protocols supported today includes:
Note: The names above refer to the IR Protocol and not necessarily a device name, as many manufacturers rebrand devices made by 3rd party companies, even the big ones.
Q3) Why not just use an Oscilloscope or Logic Analyzer?

Ask any of our team, we have a good Oscilloscope to help us out on certain electrical or analogue challenges, but the first choice is always AnalysIR when it comes to IR decoding, analysis and troubleshooting.

We have priced the perks which compare favourably to the cost of entry level Oscilloscopes ($300+) or Logic Analyzers ($150+). Oh and did we mention that AnalysIR is far superior at a fraction of the cost for our backers. We would be happy to put AnalysIR head-to-head against the most expensive Oscilloscopes or Logic Analyzers on the market, for IR protocol analysis & decoding.
Q4) What projects can I use AnalysIR with?
The list is literally endless, because IR can be used to control almost any device on the planet. Here is a small sample:
Low cost Teaching aid as part of your Lab - everyone can have their own decoder
Indoor ‘Toy Car’ control (Don’t try it with a real car, particularly indoors!)
Get your iPhone, Android, Tablet, MCU, PC or Server to control your devices using IR.
Control your 3D printer or CNC machine
A practical way to teach students about Electronics & Binary/Hex notation.
Wireless serial communications between Arduino and computer
Control any Arduino type project (Also Raspberry Pi or any MCU)
Access the service menu of your TV. (Some TVs can be upgraded for free. NB: Warranty)
Replace your Air Conditioning remote and control remotely
Not to mention, where we began, you can dream up any number of projects to do with TV remote control. (we have our own unique project underway in this area)
IR can provide optical isolation between an Arduino and relay circuit.
Camera control, time-lapse, movement detection, flash synchronisation or just remote snapping

In summary, IR is the cheapest indoor method to control a device located within the same room and is extremely reliable, at a small fraction of the cost of wired, Wi-Fi, LAN, ZigBee or other RF systems. And guess what - you probably have several spare controllers already available.

We will release all of the MCU code (Arduino, Raspberry Pi etc) to backers without restrictions as to use, which is more liberal than OS. We hope this will encourage the release of 3rd party kits & devices for AnalysIR. However, we are not in a position to release the windows based code at this time. We will revisit this again in the future. We do publish the protocol timings & parameters for each supported protocol within the application itself.

When the campaign completes we will issue registration keys in 2 phases, as described above. You will receive a registration key, via email, which will be tied to a single PC and the registration email.

Everything you need for a working AnalysIR, Software for PC and MCU, Getting Started Guide & Video, backed up by online support. You need to provide the MCU (e.g. Arduino or Raspberry Pi etc) and the IR receiver yourself. We can help with arranging kits after the campaign ends, as necessary. AnalysIR is designed to work with a minimum screen resolution of 1366x768 along with the latest windows updates.
Q8) How much will AnalysIR cost after the campaign ends?
We have not decided yet, but we expect it will sell for at least 50-100% more than the perks.
Q9) How do I set up AnalysIR?

Setting up is simple, with just 3 connections. Connect the yellow wire to pin 2 on the Arduino, Red to 5V, Green to GND. Check the connections and confirm the pin-out of your IR receiver from the datasheet. Then just simply connect the MCU to your PC, start the AnalysIR application and follow the instructions in the Getting Started Guide. (Note: you will be able to set up other Arduino Models, Raspberry Pi, Pic, MSP, AVR etc by just copying the code provided for your platform. We plan to publish code for these platforms as part of this campaign, as discussed above.) A breadboard is not required, as the IR receiver can be wired directly to the Arduino.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign

column5:
>What is iLoveIndieGogo?

iLoveIndieGogo is an Android app developed with a clear purpose, which is to bring you closer to the amazing platform of IndieGOGO on your Android Smartphone.

Here are some of the features already included on the BETA version:

column1: • All categories displayed on a good looking side menu.
• A link of every campaign to the actual IndieGOGO website for more information/funding.
• A Refresh button to load all campaigns randomly.

Its a nice way of looking at the amazing projects that are out there waiting for your kind support.

If you are a campaign owner, this app will help you spread the voice of your current project and share what you're bringing to this world.




What We Need &
column2:

So as, to dedicate full time to the management of Social networks, compile a weekly campaign collections for our popular tab and to give an excellent 24/7 support service.

Actual Status


We have been working day and night on iLoveIndieGogo and now you are able to download the BETA version.

Please choose your favorite perk and help shape iLoveIndieGogo's future.


Why helping?

Your contribution will be important to create the first Android app dedicated to show fundable projects, allowing you to be part of innovation.

Alternatively, if you are not able to help us funding the app, please help us spread the word by sharing our campaign to your Facebook and Twitter.

Thank you for visiting our campaign.

SkyBell™ features a day and night vision video camera, speaker, microphone and motion sensor. It connects with your home's WiFi network and alerts you when someone rings your doorbell or is standing in your doorway.  You can chose to ignore the call or answer it. If you answer, you can see, hear and speak with your visitor.   You can receive the live video feed on your smartphone over Wi-Fi  or 4G on compatible Android and iOS smartphones.

Whether your at home or on the go, SkyBell provides a higher level of convenience, control and awareness that will make your everyday life just a little bit easier and help you feel a great sense of safety.

column3: target=""_blank"">bless this stuff -
column4: target=""_blank"">Good Gear Guide -

column2: target=""_blank"">Hack Things  -

column1: SkyBell is the smartest video doorbell and the ""eyes and ears"" of the SmartHome.  By letting you see who is at your door, you can answer the door on your terms and enjoy a whole new level of convenience and awareness.

The most powerful feature is our motion sensor.  We're making it possible for SkyBell to start a video feed even without the visitor pressing the button.  This is perfect for when a user knocks, or when someone is loitering on your doorstep for whatever reason.  You can turn the motion sensor on or off, depending on your needs.

SkyBell is designed to replace your current doorbell and it uses your current doorbell's power lines for direct power.  When a visitor presses the button, SkyBell sends you a push notification alert.  If you decide to answer it, you'll see, hear and speak to your visitor from your mobile devices.  The visitor at your door can hear you and speak back to you with SkyBell's speaker and microphone. The device itself connects to your home's WiFi network and it sends the live video to your mobile devices over WiFi and 4G cellular networks.
More than just a doorbell with a video camera

SkyBell is the smart video doorbell with a motion sensor. This means you can receive alerts and video feeds whether or not your visitor presses the button.   Because SkyBell has full time power, it can stay in ""alert"" mode and start a video feed quickly.

SkyBell also has an exclusive On-Demand feature.  This allows you to open the SkyBell video camera directly from the app and see live video, whether or not someone presses the button. This is perfect for when you're away and you want to check on your home, if someone knocks or if you hear something.
SkyBell is the smart video doorbell for the smart home.

Mobile devices give us the freedom to stay connected while on the go. We're taking that to a new level by designing a beautiful and easy to use app that lets you answer your door no matter where you are or what you're doing.  The app allows you to sea, hear and speak to your visitor. You can also capture a ""screenshot"" of the video feed and end the call.

The SkyBell app is free and will be available for compatible iOS and Android devices. We designed the app with the end user in mind. After all, we are the end user.  We've designed features that we want and we know you'll like.  One example is the ""Silent Mode.""  This allow you to turn off your home's doorbell chime from the app, so you are not disturbed. This is perfect for sleeping babies, responsive dogs and for naps.
SkyBell was named as a prestigious ""CES Innovations Award"" Nominee in 2014. This is only given to the most innovative and well-designed devices at CES.

SkyBell was designed with a minimal design aesthetic and a small form factor.  It's deliberately designed to have a minimal visual impact and to look like a normal doorbell.  The brushed aluminum finish matches most wall and home furnishings and we have a new ""Oil Rubbed Bronze"" finish.

SkyBell means more to us than the next great tech gadget.  We believe SkyBell will help parents, families, caregivers and businesses stay connected with big parts of their lives.  We hope SkyBell is another way for technology to make one part of everyday life just a little easier.

We are passionate about creating useful technologies that are easy to use...and we work hard to do it.  We believe in creating reliable and quality products that are built with the world's best materials and components...right here in the USA!  We have an unyielding commitment to quality, minimal design and a friendly user experience.

The SkyBell team is passionate about creating groundbreaking technologies that fit right into our digital lifestyles.  We have a proven track record.  Our team has previously designed, developed and manufactured the world's leading consumer and commercial GPS tracking devices.  These devices have been distributed by some of the largest retailers in the world, including Apple®.  We were told it was impossible to build the first single-board GPS device and found a way. Those devices are now either on shelves or being used by some of the most well know companies around the world.

We are fortunate for these past experience which have now reduced the learning curve for this project.  Our team of engineers and production designers are experienced in developing and manufacturing consumer technology.  This includes the design and development of hardware, software, mobile apps and retail packaging.  It also includes manufacturing and distribution.
We know that every project has it's challenges.  We're confident that our experience helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected!
SkyBell is designed to replace your current doorbell.  SkyBell needs three things to be able to work for your door: power, space and WiFi connection.

1) Direct Power - SkyBell requires direct power for consistent power for the advanced features.  Please check to make sure your current doorbell has power. If your current doorbell does not have power, you can run power to the spot on the wall where you'd like SkyBell.
2) A Little Space - SkyBell is small but it still needs a little space.  SkyBell works best with 3"" (7.2cm) of circular space to fit.
3) WiFi Connection - SkyBell requires full time internet access via a B/G/N wireless network with 2.4GHz network, 20 MHz bandwidth and WPA security.
Yes, SkyBell works on select Android devices.
Yes, SkyBell will only work with direct power to your home's transformer.
Can I use two devices on my house?
Yes, you can have more than one device on the same house, on the same network and in the same account.  They can all alert the same smartphones.  You can also have them on different houses as well.
What power standards does SkyBell work with?

SkyBell works with your current doorbell’s voltage transformer. The Primary power in is 120/130 VAC or 220/230/240 VAC.  SkyBell can receive secondary power from the transformer to the device at 10 – 36 VAC 10 VAC.  SkyBell works with a mechanical doorbell chime ""as-is"" and with a digital doorbell chime with the adapter.
Will my regular doorbell chime still work?

Yes, SkyBell will allow a doorbell chime to make the traditional ""ding-dong"" sound in your home.  You can even turn your doorbell sound on or off from the app. This is great for sleeping babies, working from home and the night shift. You can chose if you want the app alerts, home chime, neither or both.  SkyBell is the only video doorbell that is compatible with mechanical and digital doorbell chimes.  SkyBell is not compatible with wireless doorbells.
For more frequently asked questions, visit: http://www.skybell.com/support/faqs/

Even if you can't contribute, we ask for your help in raising awareness. We're grateful to you for sharing this on social media with the IndieGoGo sharing tools below or emailing the page to someone you feel could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that SkyBell provides.

Website:  www.SkyBell.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/myskybell
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/myskybell
Perks include free ground shipping in the USA. We do not accept international orders at this time and will cancel any order made on Indiegogo that has an international shipping address.

ATTENTION INTERNATIONAL ORDERS: We are not fulfilling international orders at this time. If you are an international customer and you proceed, you agree and understand that we will only refund the total amount minus Paypal and Indiegogo fees.

THANKS A LOT TO EVERYONE WHO DONATED! WE HAVE NOW WELL REACHED OUR TARGET AND DAN WILL BE GOING TO FOSDEM WITH US. THANKS AGAIN!

Fab is driving to FOSDEM 2011 and we are trying to raise enough money to fly Dan in as well so we can produce some kick-ass Linux Outlaws content from there. All money raised will do directly towards paying Dan's flight and accommodation for the event.

If we succeed, we will be able to bring you loads of content from FOSDEM, possibly even a live show in a pub somewhere. If this fails, Dan won't be able to go and the best we can do will be some interviews that Fab records on his own.

Dan needs about £ 150 for his flight plus some money for his accommodation while staying in Brussels. $ 400 should be enough to cover this including all the fees, but $ 500 is the minimum goal for Indie GoGo (if we have some money left over, we will think of something cool that benefits all the listeners of the show like a donation to the EFF or ORG). You will get a very happy Dan and some very cool podcast content from FOSDEM 2011 which should be amazing.
Get the word out via microblogs, social networks and however else you can!

column7:
>Convert your fear to freedom! Use Protection!

Help us spread the important message of practicing safe cell by contributing now, or by just simply sharing this campaign page with others.  The Bra-ket is for ALL women, and the men who love them.

column1: My name is Sam Beck, creator of the Bra-ket.  As a real estate Broker I literally wear my phone on  my body at all times.  I can't even

open a home without my cell phone, but guess what? I had a problem that all woman share...Women's clothing has NO pockets!!!   So what did I do? Like many other women, I used my bra as a pocket for my phone, because it was the most
convenient and discreet place for storage! (and I wear a bra with every outfit)
But, carrying a cell phone in a bra creates another problem, which is the
potential danger of having an electronic device close to the skin, especially
tender breast tissue.  Both the Radio frequency and heat put off from a
phone are major concerns in recent findings.
<b>Does a cell phone in a bra cause breast

cancer?  Does it not?
We worry the answer could be...yes.
As the huge debate wages on in both the media and medical worlds, The Bra-ket proactively solves the problems of convenience AND safety.
first reaction to ""The Bra-ket"" may be to laugh a little. That's
okay!  In fact, the idea of The Bra-ket started from friends and family
making fun of me for always carrying my phone  in my bra and calling it
my ""Bra-ket"" (short for Bra pocket)  Behind all the jokes
though, I was secretly terrified that perhaps using my bra as a pocket for my
phone was dangerous!  Like many of you, my life has been personally
affected by breast cancer.  My own mother is a survivor.  I don't know a
woman who isn't scared of this disease and yet I see women every day who carry
their phones in their bras, despite the possible danger. Why?.... Convenience
sake.  My business partner, Katie and I thought there must be a way to provide
both safety and convenience while allowing a phone signal,  and after much
research, design and testing, we now have BRA-KET LAUNCH!
The Bra-ket is a radio-frequency shielded, and heat resistant bra pocket/cell phone case providing safe AND convenient cell storage for all women. The Bra-ket attaches to a
woman's bra strap and can be tucked into her bra so she can ""wear""

her phone more safely. 


Check out these additional Bra-ket benefits:
protection does not interfere with phone signal
*Sweat  and water resistant for those workouts!
*Attaches to any bra strap, purse strap, backpack, etc.
*Sleek, sexy design made with comfortable materials
*Detachable jewelry style strap/can be worn on left or right
*No fussy attachments that will snag or ruin clothing or lingerie
*Separate outer pocket for cards, cash, ID, keys, etc.
*4 sizes to accommodate all phone styles
WOMEN WHO HAVE A PACEMAKER OR ANY OTHER HEART DEVICE SHOULD NOT

BRA-KETS MAKE SAFETY... SEXY!

You DON'T need to be a DOUBLE DIVA  to sport The Bra-ket!  It stays put in any size bra!

column2: >First, you choose which side, left or right, on which you want to wear your Bra-ket.  Then, insert the strap through the corresponding loop on the Bra-ket, wrap the strap around the bra strap and clasp. Position the Bra-ket in the bra cup for comfort, always making sure the LOGO FACES OUT, as the high performance shielding is in the back of the Bra-ket.  Place phone and cash, card, etc,  in your Bra-ket and enjoy!

column1:
*Attenuation: 49 dB at 839 MHz
*Results at 4 distances: 1/2 inch, 1 inch, 6 inch, and 12 inch 
*Instrument used: SA0314 RF Instruments Spectrum Analyzer serial #    01AA56
*Radio Frequency exposure was reduced by 49 dB with the Bra-ket.
*(See Independent testing statement in Gallery)

column5: >Bra-ket quick facts:

column1: • You don’t have to be a (DD) double diva!  A Bra-ket can be worn with any body type on any type of bra
• Choose the size Bra-ket that fits your phone, not your body size
• Can be adjusted in any bra cup or even wearing a camisole for comfort.
• The Bra-ket will not affect your phone signal
• High Performance Shielding fabric  is independently tested for shielding performance.  No grounding needed.
• The Bra-ket does not claim to prevent cancer, only to provide Radio Frequency shielding and heat protection when used as directed.
• The Bra-ket is currently manufactured in the USA

The Initial design and independent testing are complete and we have an amazing result in The Bra-ket!  Our first few limited production runs are complete and our market test has been very successful.  Our community of ""Bra-keteers"" is growing daily! To this point, we have paid for all the costs, but now, to really make a difference,  spread this message and get a Bra-ket into the hands of every woman that needs one, we need your help!
How your contribution will make a difference:

Your contribution will have a great impact on our ability to get a  Bra-ket into women's hands, even if it's just one woman at a time. Together we can get this message and this product out to the women of the world who tuck their phones into their only reliable storage pocket... their bra!  Whether your contribution is monetary or by just sharing our page with the indiegogo share tools, your contribution is extremely valuable. The magnitude of what we can achieve with your help could be astounding!  Be a part of this movement with us! Let's make some noise and be pro-active about practicing safe cell.  Thank you SO much!

If you don't have experience bringing a product to market, it's difficult to imagine how quickly the costs add up and the expense involved in every step.   While we are working our hardest to keep costs low, there are some that just can't be avoided.  Here are some of the primary ones:
* Improved Packaging for more efficient display and shipping
* Continued Research and Development to ensure high quality products and gain        traction ahead of the competition
* Larger production runs, manufacturing, and QA
* Offer a wider variety of colors and designs

column6: >One of the greatest risks we face right now is shortage of funds.  We are currently growing, and a successful campaign would allow us to knock this out of the park.  We have already had successful limited production runs and our supply chain and logistics are near perfect but, will change as we grow.  If we don't meet our funding goal, we will continue to manufacture and distribute The Bra-kets to the best of our financial ability.  We feel extremely committed to ""The Bra-ket movement""  and believe it is incredibly important to provide availability of The Bra-ket for all women who ""tuck and stash"" in their bra.

column2: >Even if you can't contribute now, please use the Indiegogo share buttons and help us spread the message of The Bra-ket movement.  Finally, there is a safer way to carry your cell phone.  Imagine the peace of mind you can share with your friends and family. Let's make some noise and make it socially unacceptable for a woman to have her phone in her bra without a Bra-ket!  Thank you sincerely, Your ""Breast Friends"" at the Bra-ket!

column1: ","Convert your fear to freedom! Use Protection! Help us spread the important message of practicing safe cell by contributing now, or by just simply sharing this campaign page with others.  The Bra-ket is for ALL women, and the men who love them.
My name is Sam Beck, creator of the Bra-ket.  As a real estate Broker I literally wear my phone on  my body at all times.  I can't even

open a home without my cell phone, but guess what? I had a problem that all woman share...Women's clothing has NO pockets!!!   So what did I do? Like many other women, I used my bra as a pocket for my phone, because it was the most
convenient and discreet place for storage! (and I wear a bra with every outfit)
But, carrying a cell phone in a bra creates another problem, which is the
potential danger of having an electronic device close to the skin, especially
tender breast tissue.  Both the Radio frequency and heat put off from a
phone are major concerns in recent findings.
Does a cell phone in a bra cause breast
cancer?  Does it not?We worry the answer could be...yes.
As the huge debate wages on in both the media and medical worlds, The Bra-ket proactively solves the problems of convenience AND safety.
first reaction to ""The Bra-ket"" may be to laugh a little. That's
okay!  In fact, the idea of The Bra-ket started from friends and family
making fun of me for always carrying my phone  in my bra and calling it
my ""Bra-ket"" (short for Bra pocket)  Behind all the jokes
though, I was secretly terrified that perhaps using my bra as a pocket for my
phone was dangerous!  Like many of you, my life has been personally
affected by breast cancer.  My own mother is a survivor.  I don't know a
woman who isn't scared of this disease and yet I see women every day who carry
their phones in their bras, despite the possible danger. Why?.... Convenience
sake.  My business partner, Katie and I thought there must be a way to provide
both safety and convenience while allowing a phone signal,  and after much
research, design and testing, we now have BRA-KET LAUNCH!
The Bra-ket is a radio-frequency shielded, and heat resistant bra pocket/cell phone case providing safe AND convenient cell storage for all women. The Bra-ket attaches to a
woman's bra strap and can be tucked into her bra so she can ""wear""
her phone more safely. Check out these additional Bra-ket benefits:
protection does not interfere with phone signal
*Sweat  and water resistant for those workouts!
*Attaches to any bra strap, purse strap, backpack, etc.
*Sleek, sexy design made with comfortable materials
*Detachable jewelry style strap/can be worn on left or right
*No fussy attachments that will snag or ruin clothing or lingerie
*Separate outer pocket for cards, cash, ID, keys, etc.
*4 sizes to accommodate all phone styles
WOMEN WHO HAVE A PACEMAKER OR ANY OTHER HEART DEVICE SHOULD NOT
BRA-KETS MAKE SAFETY... SEXY!You DON'T need to be a DOUBLE DIVA  to sport The Bra-ket!  It stays put in any size bra!

First, you choose which side, left or right, on which you want to wear your Bra-ket.  Then, insert the strap through the corresponding loop on the Bra-ket, wrap the strap around the bra strap and clasp. Position the Bra-ket in the bra cup for comfort, always making sure the LOGO FACES OUT, as the high performance shielding is in the back of the Bra-ket.  Place phone and cash, card, etc,  in your Bra-ket and enjoy!

*Attenuation: 49 dB at 839 MHz*Results at 4 distances: 1/2 inch, 1 inch, 6 inch, and 12 inch *Instrument used: SA0314 RF Instruments Spectrum Analyzer serial #    01AA56*Radio Frequency exposure was reduced by 49 dB with the Bra-ket.*(See Independent testing statement in Gallery)
You don’t have to be a (DD) double diva!  A Bra-ket can be worn with any body type on any type of bra
Choose the size Bra-ket that fits your phone, not your body size
Can be adjusted in any bra cup or even wearing a camisole for comfort.
The Bra-ket will not affect your phone signal
High Performance Shielding fabric  is independently tested for shielding performance.  No grounding needed.
The Bra-ket does not claim to prevent cancer, only to provide Radio Frequency shielding and heat protection when used as directed.
The Bra-ket is currently manufactured in the USA

The Initial design and independent testing are complete and we have an amazing result in The Bra-ket!  Our first few limited production runs are complete and our market test has been very successful.  Our community of ""Bra-keteers"" is growing daily! To this point, we have paid for all the costs, but now, to really make a difference,  spread this message and get a Bra-ket into the hands of every woman that needs one, we need your help!
How your contribution will make a difference:

Your contribution will have a great impact on our ability to get a  Bra-ket into women's hands, even if it's just one woman at a time. Together we can get this message and this product out to the women of the world who tuck their phones into their only reliable storage pocket... their bra!  Whether your contribution is monetary or by just sharing our page with the indiegogo share tools, your contribution is extremely valuable. The magnitude of what we can achieve with your help could be astounding!  Be a part of this movement with us! Let's make some noise and be pro-active about practicing safe cell.  Thank you SO much!

If you don't have experience bringing a product to market, it's difficult to imagine how quickly the costs add up and the expense involved in every step.   While we are working our hardest to keep costs low, there are some that just can't be avoided.  Here are some of the primary ones:
* Improved Packaging for more efficient display and shipping
* Continued Research and Development to ensure high quality products and gain        traction ahead of the competition
* Larger production runs, manufacturing, and QA
* Offer a wider variety of colors and designs

One of the greatest risks we face right now is shortage of funds.  We are currently growing, and a successful campaign would allow us to knock this out of the park.  We have already had successful limited production runs and our supply chain and logistics are near perfect but, will change as we grow.  If we don't meet our funding goal, we will continue to manufacture and distribute The Bra-kets to the best of our financial ability.  We feel extremely committed to ""The Bra-ket movement""  and believe it is incredibly important to provide availability of The Bra-ket for all women who ""tuck and stash"" in their bra.

Even if you can't contribute now, please use the Indiegogo share buttons and help us spread the message of The Bra-ket movement.  Finally, there is a safer way to carry your cell phone.  Imagine the peace of mind you can share with your friends and family. Let's make some noise and make it socially unacceptable for a woman to have her phone in her bra without a Bra-ket!  Thank you sincerely, Your ""Breast Friends"" at the Bra-ket!",16.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Why we need “snap” connect

The popularization of smartphone and car makes a car charger one of the daily necessities. But many products don’t have a considerate design and they often have problems like broken cable, tangling, bad contact, mismatching and inconvenient operation. Bency Sense was born to solve these problems.
column6:
>

Soft inside and rigid outside, truly “durable”

Bency Sense Car Charger uses superbly supple “noodle-like” cable, which can prevent the cable from knotting and tangling. And charging contact is hard to spill, which makes charging stable. PU material makes it stout and tenacious and can withstand over 5,000 tests on tensile strength without being deformed. So, this is a truly “durable” car charger.
column7:
/>

 

Smart and retractable cable

70cm-long cable is like a flexible rule and a hand brake: it can get out with a gentle pull, and can be fixated at a suitable length. Then pull gently, the cable will automatically retract. It is retractable and simple, you can decide the length and keep from tangling.
column8:
>

 

Singlehanded absorbing without lowering the head

Single-contact magnetic cable is sensitive and enables 360° absorption with round contact surface and “automatic aiming”. You can plug and unplug singlehandedly and easily. If contact is fixated on phone, you can get it done once and for good. And you don’t need to consider positive and negative nor bow your head when driving.
column9:
>

 

Forceful magnet that can hang the phone

The high-strength force of magnet can hang a phone. The magnet will not lose force and is covered in metal, safe, dustproof, and scratch-proof with superb touch.
column10:
/>

 

A cable for three charges and all applicable

Two USB ports with one Micro USB port (for traditional android), one Type-c (for new Android flagship) and one Lightning (for iPhone). One with three can charge “three devices with one cable”, charging any two mainstream phones with different ports at the same time.
column11:
/>

 

3.1A Fast Charge: Get your iPhone fully charged on your way to work

A superior combination of high-conductivity copper wire and max 1.5A output current allows you to charge quietly. If you live in a jammed city, you can get your phone resurrected on your way to work.
column12:
/>

 

Born colorful

Four colors-plain white, vivid red, verdant green and serene blue-are for you to choose from.
column13:
/>

 

12/24V Input for all cars

Input voltage is 12/24V, applicable to all cars.
column16:
>

About Us

We’re Shenzhen XinFuShunTong Electronics Co., Ltd. We have been specializing in the research &
column17: development, design and production of consumer electronics. With our own design, R&amp
column18: D and production teams, we focus on the development of software and hardware technology, various kinds of electronic controllers, Internet of Things &amp
column19: Cloud, smart home platform, consumer electronics, electrical appliances, and processing and customizing varied PCBA circuit boards and so on.
column21:
> 

Original Intention of design

Car chargers don’t have a uniform port. Frequent plugging and unplugging are prone to damage phone jacks and charging cable, and tangling and inconvenient is sometimes distracting. Just like you, we hope there is a safe and simple car charger could solve it all. After studious exploration and unremitting efforts, Bency Sence comes.

We hope to make more people know and use this snap charging product through this crowd funding platform and we look forward to your support and experience.
column22:
>FAQ

Will Bencysense support my device?

Yes, it is a USB-C magnetic cable and it supports normal devices. 

Does Bencysense support data transfer?

No, it doesn’t support data synchronization.

Will Bencysense support my phone case?
Most major branded cases made according to USB-C specs should be fully compatible with our cable. Given the vast amount of cases available in the market, we cannot possibly test every single case in the market. We are confident that our cable should be compatible with most of the mainstream cases.

What’s the shipping cost?
We provide worldwide freeshipping. 

When will you ship the item? 
We will ship the item in November, but the time of delivery depends on local delivery speed and customs clearance which we cannot fully control which means that you may not receive your parcel in November.

How will my order be shipped?
We will use different couriers or services to ship Bencysense to you depending on where you are. Each order will have a shipping notification and tracking information. Due to the changes in courier regulations on magnetic products, our shipping methods are subjected to change.

Do I have to pay VAT and duty?
For backers living in countries with import duties and taxes, these costs will have to be covered by the backers at delivery. We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty. 

What can I do if I have any other questions?

If you have any other questions, please send us message via ask a question.

The ShiftCam Multi-Lens Case is a compact, integrated multi-lens iPhone case, now available for the iPhone 11 &
column2: 11 Pro, that switches lenses in fractions of a second — adding unparalleled versatility and quality to your iPhone 11 &amp
column3:
11 Pro cameras.

Capture the perfect photos and angles instantly with different focal lengths, filters and focus distances all available in a single, simple shift on ShiftCam’s integrated all-in-one sliding lens case.

Don’t have the new iPhone 11 or 11 Pro? No problem. ShiftCam has been making and selling cases for every iPhone model back to the iPhone 7 with the same S-mount multi-lens sliding system. No matter your iPhone, we’ve got a case for you.

This isn’t just any lens system — it’s ShiftCam. Rated the best iPhone lens quality by Tom’s Guide, ShiftCam lenses boast incredible clarity, superior sharpness, and phenomenal accuracy. Your memories have never looked better.

Access all your lenses with a simple push of a finger. ShiftCam adds 5 high-quality, crystal-clear lenses for the iPhone 11 Pro and 3 lenses for the iPhone 11.

From telephoto to macro, you’ll have every lens you need within a finger’s reach. Always be ready for the perfect shot in an instant.

With epic wides, come epic glares. ShiftCam’s CPL (Circular Polarizer Lens) filter is specifically designed to decrease glare, eliminate reflections, and increase contrast for your ultra-wide shots on your new iPhone 11 or 11 Pro — keeping your photos absolutely stunning and glare-free.

Rotate it to increase or decrease the amount of polarization or slide it away when you don’t need it (when you want reflections, flares or more light). Bring the next level of versatility to your pro iPhone camera system.

Capture everything from the human eye to grains of sand. With the 10x and 20x macro lenses, you’ll unlock a whole new perspective invisible to the naked eye.

The intricate details of flora, fauna and microscopic textures are revealed with these phenomenally sharp lenses that boast incredibly close focus distances. Subjects that once seemed mundane and cliche will suddenly become utterly unique, never-before-seen shots.

Zoom optically, not digitally. The 4x telephoto lens for the iPhone 11 Pro and Pro Max doubles your 2x telephoto lens to bring what’s far even nearer, without sacrificing quality.

Plus, the extra compression will give you even more versatility with your shots. Pull in your backgrounds and get beautifully flat images normally reserved for DSLRs and mirrorless cameras.

How can the set be complete without a fisheye lens? Get fun perspectives that completely transform your shots. With a 180° field of view, you’ll be able to capture everything from end to end.

Your selfie game just got a whole lot more interesting. With a slide-in pro-series lens adapter, ShiftCam lets you take selfies with any of our ProLens series lenses.. Get more friends, more landscape, even macros in your selfies.

Pair it with the new slo-mo selfie feature, and you’ve got something super special.

The new iPhone 11, 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max boasts the toughest glass in any smartphone. ShiftCam’s new case for the iPhone 11, 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max will make them even tougher. The mil-spec drop-proof injection mold case ensures not even a scratch makes it to your new phone.

 

You can stop with the slipping, twisting, and dropping of past phone lenses. With ShiftCam multi-lense case, all your lenses are always ready on your phone. No bag, box, or case needed.

When you want to switch lenses, simply slide to shift. Toss all that dead weight in your pocket and don’t ever worry about missing a moment again.

Best of all, ShiftCam is surprisingly affordable and accessible for its premium quality. Get up to 5 or more lenses in a single system with ShiftCam for less than the price of one lens from the leading competitor.

Thanks to the pioneering use of DSLR lens technology on a mobile scale, ShiftCam has been able to produce exceptionally high quality professional lenses for mobile phones.

A unique optical design coupled with nano-coated lenses for crystal clear image gives you stunning colors and unparallelled sharpness on a mobile phone. Close-ups or long shots, indoors or outdoors — the edge to edge clarity makes our ProLens Deluxe Kit perfect for precision photography.

The ShiftCam case for iPhone 11 and 11 Pro supports all previous ShiftCam gear and accessories.

ShiftCam was founded in early 2017 with the mission of making mobile photography more compact, convenient, and comprehensive. Since then, we’ve successfully launched and delivered 3 crowdfunding campaigns and helped thousands of people craft beautiful images with their phones.

You don’t need a quality lens system to capture phenomenal photos, but you sure do deserve one. With ShiftCam, you’ll finally have an iPhone lens set and system worthy of your speed, skills, and talent.

We have a close partnership and equity stake in our manufacturer. This means we are not only able to cut cost on our production and pass the savings to you, but we can get our products produced significantly faster.

Not only that, but, as a premier iPhone accessory company, we have direct access to the newest iPhone specifications. In fact, we already fully designed and prototyped the new iPhone 11 , 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max case before the phones were even released!

We are ready for mass-scale manufacturing. All we need is you to help us place our first batch order. Manufacturing can start as early as a week after we hit our funding goal. Starting early means getting ShiftCam to you early.

Over the last two years, we’ve launched 4 successful crowdfunding campaigns and have delivered on all of them with raving reviews. We are dedicated to making quality products and phone accessories that are simple to use and accessible for all.

Our team of engineers, designers, photographers and creatives have all worked tirelessly to make ShiftCam the premium product it is today. We’ve toiled for long nights and countless hours to give the new iPhone 11 and 11 Pro case and system the same superior quality.

We hope you enjoy ShiftCam and use it to make amazing images for the world to see.

column2: >For any issue, please open a support ticket - https://plusberrypi.freshdesk.com

>Introducing the Fully-assembled Plusberry Pi Media Box

Don’t want to work hard and get extra parts to get your Plusberry Pi up and running? We’ve added two new perks -

column1: Fully assembled Media Box - A fully working Media box (includes Raspberry B+ and Plusberry card, pre-installed 8GB SD card, all wires connected) - just add a hard drive if you wish - only $155
Fully assembled Media Box PRO - A fully working Media box (includes Raspberry B+ and Plusberry card, pre-installed 8GB SD card, all wires connected) - with 1TB HDD and WiFi dongle! - only $245

UPDATE

Thank you all for your GREAT feedback and ideas – we have done our best to embed all of your ideas into the Plusberry  &
column2:
answer your questions.

AND NOW...Our Plusberry Pi redesign to support the Raspberry Pi B+ model is done!

We have made a design that will fit all models - A / B / B+.

You will get two replaceable back panels for the HDMI area, one for the A/B Raspberry Pi and the other for the B+ .

With the B+ you will have total of 7 external USB ports + 1 internal (perfect for a WiFi dongle).


Introducing the Plusberry Pi

We started working on the Plusberry when we realized what a mess it caused in the living room - a USB hub (with its own power adapter), external HDD - and all the cables that go with them.

We wanted it to look good, and have all that functionality built-in. We designed a PCB (hub and SATA adapter) and a case that offers many advantages :

In addition we thought you would love the following features as well:

- Front LED

- Front USB

- SD Card easy access

- Fan place holder in the enclosure + power connector on the PCB

Since we know most of you are electronics lovers we left you a space in the back for your GPIO cable and camera ribbon :-)
column7:
>

So we turn this...


Into that...


Design

One of the most important things to us is the design - we wanted the Plusberry to be as pretty as possible, so it would be ""living-room worthy"".

We went through many iterations - from a simple box-like prototype, through many different concepts till we settled to the final product.

column11: />

column1:
What will the funds be used for?

We need most of the money in order to pay for the tooling.

The remaining funds will be used for sourcing components such PCB &
column10:
>Schedule

Updated time line -

PCBs assembly - 5/5

Plastics first trial - 4/30

Plastics second trial - 5/11

Shipping - 5/25


The Rewards

When you pledge, you get a complete Plusberry Pi kit, containing:

column3: >3A power supply - compatible with EU / US / UK / AU

column1:
*The kit does not contain a Raspberry Pi.

The Plusberry Pi kit will retail for $55 once the campaign is over.



About Us

Now that you know all about the Plusberry, it's time to get to know the people behind it.

The Plusberry has been developed by Sasi Levi and Asher Elbaz, two engineers and makers from Israel. The two met while working for Sandisk, and have been working together ever since.

Asher has years of experience setting up manufacturing lines for HW companies, and Sasi is a HW/SW whiz - together, they're an unstoppable duo.
","For any issue, please open a support ticket - https://plusberrypi.freshdesk.com
Introducing the Fully-assembled Plusberry Pi Media BoxDon’t want to work hard and get extra parts to get your Plusberry Pi up and running? We’ve added two new perks -
Fully assembled Media Box - A fully working Media box (includes Raspberry B+ and Plusberry card, pre-installed 8GB SD card, all wires connected) - just add a hard drive if you wish - only $155
Fully assembled Media Box PRO - A fully working Media box (includes Raspberry B+ and Plusberry card, pre-installed 8GB SD card, all wires connected) - with 1TB HDD and WiFi dongle! - only $245

UPDATEThank you all for your GREAT feedback and ideas – we have done our best to embed all of your ideas into the Plusberry  & answer your questions.AND NOW...Our Plusberry Pi redesign to support the Raspberry Pi B+ model is done!We have made a design that will fit all models - A / B / B+.You will get two replaceable back panels for the HDMI area, one for the A/B Raspberry Pi and the other for the B+ .With the B+ you will have total of 7 external USB ports + 1 internal (perfect for a WiFi dongle).Introducing the Plusberry PiWe started working on the Plusberry when we realized what a mess it caused in the living room - a USB hub (with its own power adapter), external HDD - and all the cables that go with them.We wanted it to look good, and have all that functionality built-in. We designed a PCB (hub and SATA adapter) and a case that offers many advantages :In addition we thought you would love the following features as well:- Front LED- Front USB- SD Card easy access- Fan place holder in the enclosure + power connector on the PCBSince we know most of you are electronics lovers we left you a space in the back for your GPIO cable and camera ribbon :-) So we turn this...Into that...DesignOne of the most important things to us is the design - we wanted the Plusberry to be as pretty as possible, so it would be ""living-room worthy"".We went through many iterations - from a simple box-like prototype, through many different concepts till we settled to the final product.For a 3D model play this one:

What will the funds be used for?We need most of the money in order to pay for the tooling.The remaining funds will be used for sourcing components such PCB & electronics part, assembly &testing, packaging &shipping.ScheduleUpdated time line -PCBs assembly - 5/5Plastics first trial - 4/30Plastics second trial - 5/11Shipping - 5/25The RewardsWhen you pledge, you get a complete Plusberry Pi kit, containing:
Plusberry PCB - USB hub + SATA adapter
3A power supply - compatible with EU / US / UK / AU
Internal cables for connecting your Raspberry

*The kit does not contain a Raspberry Pi.The Plusberry Pi kit will retail for $55 once the campaign is over.About UsNow that you know all about the Plusberry, it's time to get to know the people behind it.The Plusberry has been developed by Sasi Levi and Asher Elbaz, two engineers and makers from Israel. The two met while working for Sandisk, and have been working together ever since.Asher has years of experience setting up manufacturing lines for HW companies, and Sasi is a HW/SW whiz - together, they're an unstoppable duo.",12.0,1,"1 Campaign

The mission is simple: Raise money to host our podcasts, and provide us with better tech! With 3 large casts of people from various backgrounds, we try and give you a good laugh, while talking about media we find fun and entertaining!
What We Need And Where It Goes

Lets cut to the chase. The main goal of this is to raise funds to cover the cost of hosting The ShatteredDome, The Shattered Podcast and Podtea'd. Any left over funds will first go to getting a new laptop so that The ShatteredDome can be edited better, and then further funds will go to getting higher-quality recording equipment.

Give us all your money! Ask friends and family! Spread the word!

column5:
>Stay Informed, Get Organized, and Influence Change

What is BHeard and How Does it Work?
column6: >Every person, at some point, has wished he or she could change something about the world around them. However, people aren't always sure what to do or where to start. We want to make taking action easy, so that each and every voice can be heard.
column7: >BHeard is specifically designed for social action and group advocacy. It gives individuals and organizations the tools they need to connect with each other and influence real change.
column8:
>Everything a person needs to engage in social action–information, collaboration, a clear message, and communication channels–is all available right at your fingertips.

Innovative Web Portal for Advocacy Groups

Advocacy groups subscribe to a private site-licensed web portal hosted by BHeard. Using the web portal, advocacy groups create specific calls-to-action, group news, and other campaigns that supporters access from their smartphones. Flexible, annual licenses are based on the size of the population the group wishes to reach.


Free Smartphone App for Advocates

The free BHeard app allows people to quickly and easily take action right from their smartphones to support the organizations and issues they care about. Things like custom news streams, talking points for call-in campaigns, pre-scripted emails, and one-tap access to elected officials make it easy to influence change. The BHeard app is

column1:
available for iPhone and Android.

Download the Free BHeard App Today!
column2: >
column6:
target=""_blank"">Android Users Click Here


How is BHeard Different?

column1: Advocacy groups and their supporters lack convenient, efficient solutions for social

action. BHeard’s primary advantage is its app-based platform. Other advocacy products are web and email based. BHeard brings extraordinary convenience to individuals and greater efficiency to organizations.

BHeard provides up to 3x better engagement than traditional forms of communication and modern social media platforms. These solutions don't provide streamlined actions, making it difficult for people to act. Also, due to the volume of these
communications, messages are often never even received. With a dedicated advocacy platform, BHeard maximizes participation in social action.
column3: >BHeard has launched the first version of the app. The
column4: > money we're raising will help us with a number of things to help make BHeard a success including

column1: • Hiring sales consultants to identify and support organizations interested in using the BHeard web portal for their supporters
<li>Hiring additional programmers to continue development on both the portal and app
column2: such as developing more robust analytics for organizations and additional actions for app users

column1: • Legal fees for additional patents and trademarks

Other Ways You Can Help

It's not all about money - you can also help by spreading the word! Here's 5 ways you can help:
• Share our campaign link using the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page
• Share our YouTube video - just click on the share button on the video
• Like the BHeard Facebook page
• Follow @BHeardApp on Twitter
• Download the free app and tell your friends to download it too!

Let Your Voice Be Heard with BHeard!

We have launched this fundraising campaign on crowdfunding platform Indiegogo to update and improve The Sound of Stars Website (soundofstars.org) and create a Mobile Apps on Android and IOS

column2: >We’re asking sound of stars members near and far -- everyone who believes in the power of Doc Stars Work, and the Efficacy of the SOS Frequencies -- to contribute what they are able.  There are heaps of unique incentives for Members at any level. Check out the rewards on the right.

column1:
Imagine The Sound of Stars of the future – What do you want to see next?  What is possible?  What do you envision?  Together, we can make it happen!

We have set our initial goal at $8,000 to cover the costs of Creating a totally brand new Sound Of Stars Website, including building a more user friendly interface, Web store, Membership platform and Android and IOS Apps for Mobile Phones so you can have your Frequencies on the go.

The Sound of Stars community support will dictate how much good work we can pursue.  It’s your site!

Benefits

First and foremost: A better, more diverse one-stop shop website that incorporates the features and design changes which are much needed by you the community.  In addition, great incentives are available that correspond to each contribution level, including exclusive access to the sound of stars Mobile App and Membership to our new and improved membership platform.

Let’s Do This Together!

Our Members have experienced amazing healing, achieved self actualization and created wealth and wellbeing with the aid of the Sound of Stars Frequencies.

From conversations with countless Sound of Stars Community members, We are awed at how the power of this great community has changed lives, in ways large and small.

We want to improve how Sound of Stars relates to all the big and small things that matter to you, keep our community inclusive, and continue to give you the great experience you already have and to further improve your access to the Sound Of Stars frequencies.  Working together, we can realize that vision.

column2:
>

Toasteroid is NOT just a toaster. An ordinary toaster turns bread brown and that’s the ONLY thing a toaster can do. Toasteroid can be your personal Weather Forecaster, Private Messenger, and Doodle Pad. It can do all of the above with simple commands from your smartphone and still make the most perfect piece of toast you’ve ever had.

It’s time to say adiós to your old toaster, and bring Toasteroid home!
column3:
>
Toasting superheroes on bread is nothing new. Anyone can do it with a single-logo stamping toaster as long as you’re willing to eat the same old superhero toast for the rest of eternity. Why limit ourselves to that? Toasteroid gives you the freedom to print any superhero or villain you want. Or you can use the Toasteroid companion app to design and print your very own.

column1: Making toast with Toasteroid is super easy. Just download the Toasteroid companion mobile app, connect your smart phone to Toasteroid via Bluetooth and toast away!
column3:
'/>
 
Toasteroid is equipped with awesome features that prepares you for every part of your day. Printing custom images on your toast is just the beginning. Toasteroid can give you the weather forecast, help you interact with your friends in a fun new way via toast messages, and controls the brownness of your toast like never before. To add a little bit more fun and to protect your privacy, all of the toast messages received can only be read on toast.

column1: A good “toast” should be short, sweet and meaningful! That’s how we make toasts with Toasteroid! Type in any text you want in the app to customize your toast! Tasty sandwiches with meaningful messages - what’s not to love?
We know you need better incentives to justify ditching your old toaster, so lets check out some fun ways to use Toasteroid!
Most of Toasteroid’s features are unique and one of a kind. Not only is Toasteroid fun, it does an amazing job at making toast too.
Make Awesome Breakfast!

Toasteroid, with its curved die-cast aluminum body and minimal design, can match with any counter top. From modern and futuristic to cozy and rustic kitchens, Toasteroid’s timeless design fits anywhere.
The perfect addition to your smart home collection

When we first started developing Toasteroid, we promised ourselves that no matter how the final product came out with however many fun and fancy features, the toasts it makes needed to be tasty with the perfect crunch. And we have done just that. Every piece of toast Toasteroid makes is a wonderful combination of external crunch and internal softness. Extra brownness is available for all bread types with its extra long and wide slot.

Toasteroid’s smart toasting system is powered by high density micro-filament heating technology (patent pending). This innovative heating system is responsible for 1) spreading heat evenly on the surface of the bread during toasting and 2) printing images on the actual toast.

Regular toasters have a very uneven heating distribution, which results in uneven doneness of the toast. Commonly, this affects the overall crunch of the toast, but in more serious cases, some parts of your toast can be burnt while other parts are still soft. Toasteroid completely eliminates this problem with its micro-filament heating technology, which spreads heat evenly. The graphic below shows the internal temperatures of the bread being toasted in Toasteroid and a regular toaster.
Making Custom images is just as easy. Select the Custom Image option from the main menu and start doodling! You can also use this option to write custom messages, reminders, and greetings too!

column3: '>We cannot do it without your participation! JOIN US on this Toaster Revolution today and enjoy a unique breakfast experience ahead of everyone else.

>
>

column2: >Blacksmith's innovative technology integrates 3D printing and 3D scanning capabilities into a single system. You save cost without buying two separate systems!  Plus, Blacksmith Genesis provides the ease of creating 3D models by scanning physical objects. The digitized objects can then be modified and combined via Blacksmith Sorcerer to form a new unique 3D object.

>While most 3D printers use an inflexible Cartesian platform, the Blacksmith Genesis uses a rotating platform, similar to how a record player plays. This efficient mechanical design halves the distance that the extruder needs to move, making Blacksmith Genesis more compact than traditional 3D printer designs while still being able to print large objects. This feature also makes it perfect for integrating 3D scanning.

> Blacksmith Genesis comes with an in-built camera that provides automatic error detection during printing as well as off-site monitoring via your smartphone. This means you have full control of your machine without being physically present. Should you wish to stop printing, you can do so at the click of a button—anytime, anywhere.

next to your desktop computer and other equipment or appliances.
