column1: hardware and software is designed for everyone to use, even without extensive
3D printing knowledge. There will be minimal installation procedures to get
your printer up and running, and controls are easy to operate.
Yup, free shipping to 70 countries. Please refer to FAQ for delivery duration.

Campaign Goal and Use of Contributions

Our goal is to raise sufficient funds for the manufacturing of Blacksmith Genesis.
• Blacksmith Kraken - a custom-designed fail-resistant print head
• SmithBoard V5 - An integrated printing, scanning, and network communication electronic module

A small part of the contribution will also be channelled to developing a modelling software that combines both 3D search engine and editing. We want users to enjoy an immersive experience in creating and printing their invention, made possible by a seamless partnership of our hardware and software.

giants behind our team. We are incubated by NTUitive, a subsidiary of Nanyang Technological University which ranks 7th in Asia. Our Advisor Professor Chua Chee Kai, has been in the field of rapid prototyping since 1990, and has been invited as a keynote speaker
to several international conferences to speak on the ""Trends of Rapid
Prototyping"" and “Rapid Prototyping in Tissue Engineering”. He has also sat
on the International Programme Committee for more than 14 International
Conferences devoted to RP and other manufacturing technologies.In addition, the
Blacksmith Team is led by Dr. Pui Tze Sian (Alex) and Fang Kok Boon (John)
committed to the vision of making 3D printing for everyone. We possess the
knowledge and resources to design for manufacturability, and are capable of
managing contract manufacturers in delivering high quality products. Most
important of all, we are passionate about this.

Yes! We realized shipping is always a hassle for many, and hence decided to ship for free to USA, Canada, Singapore as well as to the following countries—
Corsica (France), Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Fiji, France, Germany,
Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India,
Indonesia, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Kenya, Laos, Latvia, Lesotho, Liechtenstein, Lithuania,
Luxembourg, Macao, Mauritius, Mexico, Monaco, Myanmar, Nepal, Netherlands, New
Zealand, Norfolk Island, Norway, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, San Marino,
Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri
Lanka, Sweden, Switzerland, Syrian Arab Republic, Taiwan, Thailand, Tonga, Turkey,
United Arab Emirates, Vatican City State, and Vietnam.

What if my country is not on this list?
Please add USD 100 to your perk. If you forgot to do so, simply fund our ""Shipping"" perk and we will ship it to you accordingly.

How long will shipping take?
It will take about 6 to 16 weeks, depending on your location. Instructions will be given on how to track and trace your parcel.

Why is shipping so long? Am I able to opt for a faster delivery? 
As we are providing free international shipping to so many countries, we had to choose options that adhere to our budget. We understand your eagerness in receiving your Blacksmith Genesis—if you would prefer a faster option, you may purchase the ""Shipping"" perk (capped at USD 100). Do get in touch with us so we may inform you of delivery details.
When do you expect the perk ""Blacksmith Passport"" to ship?
It will be shipped after production of Batch 2, which means April - May 2015.

We at Blacksmith do not just want to produce products, namely 3D printers. Our vision is to make 3D printing for everyone, and the best way to achieve this is by making the Blacksmith Genesis a collaborative project that includes all of you. With contributors from all across the world, our project would be made so much more successful by the diverse feedback and input we receive.
Why did you choose to use flexible funding?

We chose flexible funding as we wanted more funding options for our contributors. Credit cards are not accepted with fixed funding, and this limits contributors with no paypal accounts. We wanted to make this campaign as accessible as possible.
do refunds after the campaign ends?
What happens if you do not meet your goal?
In the event that happens, we will refund your contributions.
Yes. We will contact you after the campaign ends.
Will the PLA Cartridges be proprietary and only available via Blacksmith or “industry standard” and readily available elsewhere?

You may use any 1.75mm diameter PLA filament, but it might not come in a roll-size/cartridge that fits the top compartment of the machine. In that case, you may either choose to place the roll outside of the machine, or refill the filament into the original cartridge by hand. Also, PLA filament from other sources might not ensure best quality prints.
What do you expect will be the retail price of one PLA Print Cartridge after your campaign ends?
The retail price will be USD20 per 500g EXCLUDING shipping.
Will there be a discount given on PLA Cartridges to Indiegogo backers?

For the Indiegogo campaign, the price will be USD20 per 500g INCLUDING shipping (for pre-existing backers who have contributed to a Blacksmith Genesis machine). We will put this up as one of the perks during the last week of the Indiegogo campaign.

long does it take to print something?

How large, solid, and detailed you want the object to be dictates the build time. Smaller objects can take as short as 15 minutes while larger objects with high percentage of filling can take a few hours.
long does it take to scan something?
scan speed is not dependent on the scanned object's size but
rather on the quality of the scan you require. It can vary from as fast as 3
minutes to 30 minutes for a better and higher resolution.
there anything that I cannot scan?

Genesis may not be able to scan objects with surfaces that are hidden from the camera. Translucent, reflective, or black/near-black objects do not scan well. However, there are procedures to overcome this! For example, users may apply a layer of talcum powder to the problematic surface to prime the surface for a good scan.
are the ways I can use the machine?
favorite way would be to start printing using either the software on the
computer or the LCD on the machine, and use our smartphone to take a peek of
the printing process when we are away.
platforms can I use Blacksmith Genesis on?
use it technically on any platform as our amazing software is Web-based!
file formats does Blacksmith Genesis support?
Blacksmith Genesis compatible with other 3D modeling software?
Blacksmith Genesis is compatible with any 3D modeling software that can produce

Scroll down to watch 3 more new videos, or click here for our YouTube channel.As seen on...3D Printers are awesome, but current machines in the market only
provide half the solution. Inventing a new object is difficult for the
non-professional who has little or no experience in design, let alone the
complicated software it requires to realize a sketch into a 3D file.
By combining the function of a 3D scanner and a 3D printer into
one compact machine, Blacksmith Genesis and our software Blacksmith Sorcerer allow you to scan your everyday
object, modify it to your liking, and create a new invention easily. With this feature, users may create and print 3D objects even without extensive 3D printing knowledge.
the rest, so that you can focus on inventing.

Blacksmith's innovative technology integrates 3D printing and 3D scanning capabilities into a single system. You save cost without buying two separate systems!  Plus, Blacksmith Genesis provides the ease of creating 3D models by scanning physical objects. The digitized objects can then be modified and combined via Blacksmith Sorcerer to form a new unique 3D object.

While most 3D printers use an inflexible Cartesian platform, the Blacksmith Genesis uses a rotating platform, similar to how a record player plays. This efficient mechanical design halves the distance that the extruder needs to move, making Blacksmith Genesis more compact than traditional 3D printer designs while still being able to print large objects. This feature also makes it perfect for integrating 3D scanning.

Blacksmith Genesis comes with an in-built camera that provides automatic error detection during printing as well as off-site monitoring via your smartphone. This means you have full control of your machine without being physically present. Should you wish to stop printing, you can do so at the click of a button—anytime, anywhere.
office use, our machine is sleek and space saving. With an effective print area of 57%, Blacksmith Genesis can easily fit
next to your desktop computer and other equipment or appliances.
While maintaining the small machine size, we are able to provide industrial standard build volume. This means no compromise on magnitude of large prototypes!
Through its LCD monitor, the machine is able to print files directly from SD cards without the use of an external computer.
hardware and software is designed for everyone to use, even without extensive

your printer up and running, and controls are easy to operate.

>

The CONNEX™-cable, is a smart cable that improves on the design of existing cables, being shorter (which prevents tangles), but not so short as to make it difficult to use. Thanks to the Silicone's elasticity and physical strength, it can stretch and gives you a great deal of flexibility to connect devices at a distance and awkward uneven port level, and immediately returns to its original form!

column1: A CARD-shaped Self-COLLAPSIBLE Data/Charging CABLE : Eliminate Clunky, Annoying Cords for Good!

column2:
>

It's broadly agreed nearly every cable for smart devices leaves a great deal to be desired. Most are too long, which leads to tangles and other headaches while others are simply too short. Our CONNEX™-cable boldly responds to this problem with the size of a credit card and effortlessly connects your digital devices for transferring data and charging. This new solution will eliminate the current annoyances of your tangling and bulky wire cables and those extra short length cables.

column1: Data Transfer (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Speaker, Navigation Device, Laptop, Mac, PC, etc.)
Device Charging (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Power Bank, Speaker, etc)
Mitigating Hassles (Tangles, Irritations, Frustrations, and so on)

Traditional charging and data cables are about 3 feet 5 inches (3'5""), which can cause you inconveniences that are just unnecessary. A cable of this length is prone to easy tangling with other cables like your earphones and peripheral’s cords. This can cause one big tangling mess!

column1: The CONNEX™-cable is the most creative universal cable providing an easy compact tangle-free solution that you can personalize. You can draw and put other forms of art on the cable. It's a great fun way to express yourself! Enhance with a logo or your own design! It is a fun way to have it filled with doodle, sketches and other flights of ink-filled fancy.

column1: Sometimes, conventional cables are too long and inconvenient to use on the move, where as some short length cables are just that little bit too short! This leaves you stuck on the middle with no real solution! Most stick type short length charging cables require extra effort to get an equal port level, facing angle and so on. With the CONNEX™-cable, you won’t experience these common issues for much longer – Easy use and no tangling gives you a much greater experience. This is a truly simple solution to an irritating problem most of us face each day!

column1: This cable was not only designed small and slim, but also performs the best for great stretch and complete collapse. Through our series of studies, we found a unique cutting pattern that gives us the best result for performance. We designed it with complete space efficiency in mind. The space for the cable and connector over mold has been precisely allocated for the entire volume to mitigate the total area.

column2: >

column1: CONNEX™-cable is made of Ultra-Durable Synthetic Silicone for great stretch and perfect collapse. Flexible to your every need!
• Low toxicity Thermal stability (constancy of properties over a wide temperature range of −100 to 250 °C).
• Does not stick to many substrates, but adheres very well to others, e.g. glass.
• Electrical insulation properties. Because silicone can be formulated to be electrically insulative or conductive, it is suitable for a wide range of electrical applications.
[SOURCE from: Hans-Heinrich Moretto, Manfred Schulze, Gebhard Wagner (2005) ""Silicones"" in Ullmann's Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry, Wiley-VCH, Weinheim.]

column4: >Package Condition: Individually Packaged  within clear PET Blister for Protection and Maximum Visibility
>* If one of the tiers doesn't fit your needs, we're happy to customize your orders of 20 or more. Please contact us at

column2:
>

Our goal is to ensure that the entire production line set up is completed by mid-June 2016. By the end of June 2016, we want to be in full production, and if everything is in order, we will immediately dispatch the CONNEX™-cable to our backers! We want to get this out to you as soon as possible, so that you can begin experiencing the benefits!

>

All level pledges will help us set up the initial production run. The budget includes the product development cost
column3: tooling, raw material prep, and all other necessary expenses including supplier visits, shipping &amp
column4: handling and so on. We will allocate our resources effectively to meet and complete the necessary goals on time. We want to serve you as soon as possible, with the highest of quality at all times.

column1: Our development team is very capable of managing issues associated with product development and production. However, if challenging circumstances occur that require an immediate reaction to get manufacturing back on track, we will immediately inform our backers of what has happened and what will be done, etc. We will still be able to fulfill our commitment and achieve the progress expected as we are completely solution orientated. If we encounter quality related issues, we will employ the most efficient solutions to avoid any major impact with regards to delivery of the device.

column2:
>

We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and in helping us to spread the word. This has created a huge impact that will result in our ability to serve the world with better products for convenience. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and it has been worth every minute, thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, haven’t gone unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your pledge helped us to achieve. You are part of our journey.

column1: If you cannot pledge but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You may even be able to earn a FREE 7 inch Stainless Steel Ball-Chain just by spreading the word!
Sharing is Super Easy!
Click the Share Button at the Top of the page and say something about CONNEX™-cable (ex: Check this cool cable!)
• Leave us messages or comments ""Shared"" (We will give you a FREE 7 inch Stainless Steel Ball-Chain with your claim""Shared"") * It is only eligible for CONNEX™-cable Indiegogo backers.

column4: >If you have any questions, comments, or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you! Please feel free to leave us message

column1: It took months for all of our designers and tooling engineers to collaborate and develop the CONNEX™-cable requiring significant contribution for refinement of the cable. The most comprehensive solution was accomplished after much iteration to get a final design.

The flexible flat type cable needs a complex Silicon/Plastic over-molding process. If the material condition is not appropriate for its functionality, we will immediately investigate and re-optimize the process for the best result adjusting tooling and material property. Our goal is to eliminate nearly of all the issues before starting production so that we can present you with the perfect device. Our aim is to give our customers the best possible product with the CONNEX™-cable, with no compromises.

Our team is very capable of managing issues associated with product development and production. However, if challenging circumstances occur that require an immediate reaction to get manufacturing back on track, we will immediately inform our backers of what has happened and what should be done, etc. We will still be able to fulfill our commitment and achieve the progress expected. If we encounter quality related issues, we will employ the most efficient solutions to avoid any major impact with regards to delivery of the device.

","The CONNEX™-cable, is a smart cable that improves on the design of existing cables, being shorter (which prevents tangles), but not so short as to make it difficult to use. Thanks to the Silicone's elasticity and physical strength, it can stretch and gives you a great deal of flexibility to connect devices at a distance and awkward uneven port level, and immediately returns to its original form!
A CARD-shaped Self-COLLAPSIBLE Data/Charging CABLE : Eliminate Clunky, Annoying Cords for Good!

It's broadly agreed nearly every cable for smart devices leaves a great deal to be desired. Most are too long, which leads to tangles and other headaches while others are simply too short. Our CONNEX™-cable boldly responds to this problem with the size of a credit card and effortlessly connects your digital devices for transferring data and charging. This new solution will eliminate the current annoyances of your tangling and bulky wire cables and those extra short length cables.
Data Transfer (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Speaker, Navigation Device, Laptop, Mac, PC, etc.)
Device Charging (Phone, Tablet, Camera, Power Bank, Speaker, etc)
Mitigating Hassles (Tangles, Irritations, Frustrations, and so on)

Traditional charging and data cables are about 3 feet 5 inches (3'5""), which can cause you inconveniences that are just unnecessary. A cable of this length is prone to easy tangling with other cables like your earphones and peripheral’s cords. This can cause one big tangling mess!
Thanks to the Ultra-Durable Silicone's elasticity and physical strength, the cable immediately returns to its original form!
We offer both an Apple Lightning Connector version for all Apple product connectivity
column2: iMac, MacBook, iPhone, iPad, iPod AND a Micro USB connector version for most Android devices and PC.

column1: The CONNEX™-cable is the most creative universal cable providing an easy compact tangle-free solution that you can personalize. You can draw and put other forms of art on the cable. It's a great fun way to express yourself! Enhance with a logo or your own design! It is a fun way to have it filled with doodle, sketches and other flights of ink-filled fancy.
There is a wide array of colors to suit your preferences and match all of your devices. This is ultimate convenience with style.Each product will be individually packaged for the proper protection.

No more worries about tangling cables! Its slim and small form-factor will fit in the smallest of places nicely like your wallet, trouser pocket, and anywhere else you want to carry it around in. It is a truly small and nifty!
...and it even holds your place in a book!

It can stretch for your convenience and gives you a great deal of flexibility to connect devices within 18 inches, at any angle and even those awkward uneven surfaces. This product works with you, not against you!
This cable is all about the connectivity between digital devices with USB-A and Micro USB OR USB-A and Lightning Connector.

Sometimes, conventional cables are too long and inconvenient to use on the move, where as some short length cables are just that little bit too short! This leaves you stuck on the middle with no real solution! Most stick type short length charging cables require extra effort to get an equal port level, facing angle and so on. With the CONNEX™-cable, you won’t experience these common issues for much longer – Easy use and no tangling gives you a much greater experience. This is a truly simple solution to an irritating problem most of us face each day!
Most stick type (a.k.a Key chain) short length charging cables are limited to connecting devices at a distance and uneven port levels OR to charge devices from the wall outlet.

This cable was not only designed small and slim, but also performs the best for great stretch and complete collapse. Through our series of studies, we found a unique cutting pattern that gives us the best result for performance. We designed it with complete space efficiency in mind. The space for the cable and connector over mold has been precisely allocated for the entire volume to mitigate the total area.
Along with its elasticity and physical strength, our design solution also helps it to prevent rips and tears.
CONNEX™-cable is made of Ultra-Durable Synthetic Silicone for great stretch and perfect collapse. Flexible to your every need!
Silicone exhibits many useful characteristics, including:
Low toxicity Thermal stability (constancy of properties over a wide temperature range of −100 to 250 °C).
Does not stick to many substrates, but adheres very well to others, e.g. glass.
Electrical insulation properties. Because silicone can be formulated to be electrically insulative or conductive, it is suitable for a wide range of electrical applications.
[SOURCE from: Hans-Heinrich Moretto, Manfred Schulze, Gebhard Wagner (2005) ""Silicones"" in Ullmann's Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry, Wiley-VCH, Weinheim.]
Materials of Cable: Ultra-Durable Synthetic Silicone
Package Condition: Individually Packaged  within clear PET Blister for Protection and Maximum Visibility
* If one of the tiers doesn't fit your needs, we're happy to customize your orders of 20 or more. Please contact us at info@mobileaccessoryproject.com

Our goal is to ensure that the entire production line set up is completed by mid-June 2016. By the end of June 2016, we want to be in full production, and if everything is in order, we will immediately dispatch the CONNEX™-cable to our backers! We want to get this out to you as soon as possible, so that you can begin experiencing the benefits!
All level pledges will help us set up the initial production run. The budget includes the product development cost
column2: tooling, raw material prep, and all other necessary expenses including supplier visits, shipping & handling and so on. We will allocate our resources effectively to meet and complete the necessary goals on time. We want to serve you as soon as possible, with the highest of quality at all times.

column1: Our development team is very capable of managing issues associated with product development and production. However, if challenging circumstances occur that require an immediate reaction to get manufacturing back on track, we will immediately inform our backers of what has happened and what will be done, etc. We will still be able to fulfill our commitment and achieve the progress expected as we are completely solution orientated. If we encounter quality related issues, we will employ the most efficient solutions to avoid any major impact with regards to delivery of the device.

We are so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and in helping us to spread the word. This has created a huge impact that will result in our ability to serve the world with better products for convenience. We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and it has been worth every minute, thanks to all our generous supporters. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, haven’t gone unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your pledge helped us to achieve. You are part of our journey.

If you cannot pledge but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You may even be able to earn a FREE 7 inch Stainless Steel Ball-Chain just by spreading the word!
Click the Share Button at the Top of the page and say something about CONNEX™-cable (ex: Check this cool cable!)
Leave us messages or comments ""Shared"" (We will give you a FREE 7 inch Stainless Steel Ball-Chain with your claim""Shared"") * It is only eligible for CONNEX™-cable Indiegogo backers.
If you have any questions, comments, or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you! Please feel free to leave us message.

It took months for all of our designers and tooling engineers to collaborate and develop the CONNEX™-cable requiring significant contribution for refinement of the cable. The most comprehensive solution was accomplished after much iteration to get a final design.

The flexible flat type cable needs a complex Silicon/Plastic over-molding process. If the material condition is not appropriate for its functionality, we will immediately investigate and re-optimize the process for the best result adjusting tooling and material property. Our goal is to eliminate nearly of all the issues before starting production so that we can present you with the perfect device. Our aim is to give our customers the best possible product with the CONNEX™-cable, with no compromises.

Our team is very capable of managing issues associated with product development and production. However, if challenging circumstances occur that require an immediate reaction to get manufacturing back on track, we will immediately inform our backers of what has happened and what should be done, etc. We will still be able to fulfill our commitment and achieve the progress expected. If we encounter quality related issues, we will employ the most efficient solutions to avoid any major impact with regards to delivery of the device.",47.0,0,"1 Campaign

Our idea is to create a story for iPad and iPhone that is not only pretty, but also carries old popular wisdom. We chose the The Big Beet tale because it is a simple story with a great message. It features a variety of characters and teaches children about the importance of helping each other
column2: even the smallest one can contribute to the Greater Good.

column1: In addition, we also create fairy tale games. They help kids to develop their skills and abilities. In play, children can remember the story better. Our fairy tales will be recorded in several languages so that it can be read and listened to by as many children as possible.
We see, there is a lot of modern fairy tales nowadays, many of which, unlike the classic fairy tales, are missing something important
column2: The classic fairy tale provides a child with a certain kind of knowledge and helps him or her orient in the real world and better understand it. Within the fairy tales scenes and images there is a true fortune in common sense , moral values, interpersonal relationships, social convention, experiences and human touch. The fairy tale is able to pass this naturally to a child in a language that s/he understands.

column1: The Big Beet fairy tale is an old-time Slavic story about an old man who planted a beet. This beet grew but, in the end, it was so big that he could not pull it out. He then called his wife, granddaughter, a dog and a cat to help him. But they still were not able to pull the beet out. Finally, a little mouse gave them a hand and together they managed to pull it out successfully.
We have chosen this story for several reasons:

column2: therefore even the smallest children can understand it. Cute pictures and cheerful music enhance the experience from the story and children will be keen on getting back to it.

column1: • This tale features several different characters, enriching the story with diversity which gives us an opportunity for creating various games the children can have a lot of fun with, and, at the same time, it gives the children a chance to learn something.

• The story also advises the children that it is important to help each other no matter how big or small the person or act is (the old man and the mouse) or how different their world views or believes are (the dog, cat and the mouse). When there is a problem, they all come together and get the problem solved.

The application will be suitable with all iOS devices - iPod Touch, iPhone and iPad, including the new iPad with Retina display. The AppStore will have it available for free. Our intention is for the application to be accessible for instant downloading to anyone who likes it. Only games within the application will be chargeable. The application will support several languages.
• Children can read the story themselves or listen to it.
• The Fairy Tale will translated and narrated in 14 languages.
• Parents will be able to narrate and record it the story multiple times. A child then can choose whether he or she prefers to listen to mom, dad, grandfather or grandmother at each play.
• Our Fairy Tale will include animation and interactive components which will entertain children and hold their attention. .

• The application will feature several games based on the fairy tale given. These Games are to help the kids to develop their skills, abilities and stimulate their imagination. In addition, these games will also help them to remember the story.

Currently, pictures for the fairy tale are ready and we are now creating the application for iPad. We have finished the whole story but still do not have all animations. We would also need to have it translated and narrated in many languages as we want all children in the world to be able to read or listen to the story.
We need your financial support so that we can continue to work on the project fulltime. We still need to develop the following:
• Finish hand-drawn pictures for games and program those. In the first version of the application, we would like to present five games

• At this point, we have the story in the Czech language. We want to have it translated and narrated in the following languages: English, Russian, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Polish, Japanese, Chinese, and Korean
• To program iPhone version of the application
A code to unlock games in the fairy tale application and the eBook.
A set of magnets painted with characters from the fairy tale which your children can play with.

Printed book with an original hand-drawn inscription to your children! This can be done based on your photo provided by you. Your name will appear in the application and on our website on the list of sponsors as a Gold Sponsor.

A special gift for your nearest and dearest and sweet „memoirs“ of a childhood for your kids. The characters of The Big Beet fairy tale will be re-drawn based on the photos you will provide us with including you in the characters of mother, father, your children and pets. All family members can enjoy playing a part in the story!
The price includes 10 copies of the book at the size of size of 25x20cm in a high quality design. Your name will appear in the application and on our website as a Platinum Sponsor.

The book and the application at the AppStore. This offer includes the same as the previous one, plus, we will program the fairy tale application with your family members or anyone else as per your request. You can then upload this original application to the AppStore from where it can be downloaded by all your family members, friends, or your kids’ mates. Your name will appear in the application and on our website on the list of sponsors as a Platinum Sponsor.

For the period of one year, your company logo with an active link to your website will be presented on the last page of the fairy tale. It will be seen by anyone who views the story. In addition, you will receive a code to access 300 games which could serve use as gifts for your customers. This form of sponsorship also includes 10 printed books and 10 sets of magnets, 3 posters with a picture from the fairy tale at the size of the A1 format. Your name will appear in the application and on our website as an Associated Producer. This offer is only intended for companies and individuals marketing children products.

For the period of one year, your company logo with an active link to your website will be displayed at every start of the application as well as on the last page of the fairy tale. In addition, you will receive a code for the access to 500 games which you can use as gifts for your customers. 20 printed books and 20 sets of magnets, 6 posters with a motive of the fairy tale at the size of  A1 format. Your name will appear in the application and on our website as a Producer. This offer is only intended for companies and individuals marketing children.

We will be more than happy if you help us also in other forms than the financial support. As we would like to translate the story into different languages and we need voluntaries, which would narrate and record the story for us in the following languages: German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Polish, Japan, Chinese, and Korean. If you are a native speaker in one of these languages and understand English as well, you can help us with the translation. And, if your voice is nice and sweet on hearing, you could become a narrator of the tale in your language. Your voice will be heard by thousands of children! Should you see this as a nice opportunity, or you just want to help, please contact us by e-mail: info@thebigbeet.com.

In case there is a company you know that sells good children products and needs advertising, please tell them or write them about us. Our application with the fairy tale will be available worldwide on the Apple‘s AppStore. It will be free of charge and thus it has a great potential to expand among many people. We offer advertising in our application. Check for our Perks.

We want to make our fairy tale widely known. Surely, you have friends who like fairy tales. We have launched a website where there is more information about the fairy tale and also a video.
Please, pass them our link: www.thebigbeet.com.

We also have a Facebook page, where you can watch the process of creating the story.
Visit us on Facebook and Share!

And follow us on Twitter too!
twitter.com/artofux

Please Follow us on Pinterest!
http://pinterest.com/pavelmikunda/the-big-beet-fairy-tale/

column4: />Drawing and painting, for me, is a way of showing to other people that some things are beautiful and worth attention even though they do not seem to be at the first sight and therefore stay unnoticed. I love the colors and have a strong belief that beauty is essential for quality life. I am an art school graduate so it came natural that I would do something art related for living as well I worked as an art director in advertising industry for a long time, but later I realized I was missing human interest and sincerity of artistic expression there. When I met Pavel, who showed me how iPad works, I was instantly drawn into it, and consequently, we both got excited about the the idea of making children stories together. This has now become our mission, and I am very happy for that. It meets all my child’s fantasies about what I want to do when I grow up. Well, I am grown up now, and I am all for it!

/>I have enjoyed working with computers since I was a child. I studied electronics, I learned how to program, then worked as a consultant and computer programmer in various companies. It was fascinating for me to design user interface and I always tried to create perfect programs. When I first saw iPhone, I was impressed by its perfection and simplicity. That’s when I decided to make applications for iPhone and iPad. Especially with an iPad, I felt this could be a great art medium. A new medium which could convey artistic experience. Later, when I met Veronica whose paintings and drawings I am a huge admirer of, we both have found our joint mission - making fairy tales for children.

Drawing and painting, for me, is a way of showing to other people that some things are beautiful and worth attention even though they do not seem to be at the first sight and therefore stay unnoticed. I love the colors and have a strong belief that beauty is essential for quality life. I am an art school graduate so it came natural that I would do something art related for living as well I worked as an art director in advertising industry for a long time, but later I realized I was missing human interest and sincerity of artistic expression there. When I met Pavel, who showed me how iPad works, I was instantly drawn into it, and consequently, we both got excited about the the idea of making children stories together. This has now become our mission, and I am very happy for that. It meets all my child’s fantasies about what I want to do when I grow up. Well, I am grown up now, and I am all for it!
Pavel Mikunda – UX designer & iOS developer

I have enjoyed working with computers since I was a child. I studied electronics, I learned how to program, then worked as a consultant and computer programmer in various companies. It was fascinating for me to design user interface and I always tried to create perfect programs. When I first saw iPhone, I was impressed by its perfection and simplicity. That’s when I decided to make applications for iPhone and iPad. Especially with an iPad, I felt this could be a great art medium. A new medium which could convey artistic experience. Later, when I met Veronica whose paintings and drawings I am a huge admirer of, we both have found our joint mission - making fairy tales for children.",8.0,0,"1 Campaign
This campaign has ended. If you are interested in pre-ordering, please visit our new campaign here.
sizes? When do backers get to choose their ring size?
ThumbTrack™ fits small and large fingers alike due to the detachable back-section
of ThumbTrack™ being made from a flexible rubber-like material.
We provide all backers with 3 differently sized back-flaps (S, M, L) to

guarantee a 100% snug fit.


Is ThumbTrack™ available for left-handers?
The device can be worn either on your left or right hand without restrictions

in usability.


What material is ThumbTrack™ made of?
The surface part and some inner structural parts of the thick section are made
from ABS plastic. The thinner section is made from a rubber-like material and

the whole inner lining as well as the sides are rubberized.


Is ThumbTrack™ waterproof?

The device is resistant to sweat and the occasional splash.


What colors does the ThumbTrack™ come in?

The device is available in Pitch Black and Pure White.


What kind of warranty do you offer?
We offer a one year limited international warranty against manufacturing
defects for the main unit, the Nano USB
international warranty against manufacturing defects for the inbuilt battery
and a 1-month exchange warranty for the charging cable.
In all warranty cases, you will need to
pay for shipping to the nearest service center.
Service center partners who provide repair or exchange services will be based

in the United States, Europe and Hong Kong.


How long does the battery last?
The End-of-Life span of the Li-ion battery will occur in approximately three
On a daily basis the device works for approximately 15 continuous hours without
needing to recharge, depending on your usage and charging scenario.

Battery re-charge time from empty to full will take approximately 2 hours.


Can I replace the battery myself?
We advice against replacing the battery yourself. The custom manufactured Li-on
battery is not commercially available and is encased in the ring.
Once the battery is worn down, you can send us your ThumbTrack™ and we’ll

replace the battery for a small fee.


Is ThumbTrack™ an HID Device?

Yes, ThumbTrack™ and the RF receiver are HID compliant.


Do I have to install the provided software to make ThumbTrack™ work?
No, the software only adds extended features. As soon as you plug in the tiny
wireless USB receiver / dongle into your Windows, Linux PC or Mac -  your

ThumbTrack™ is instantly functional.


Which devices and Operating Systems will ThumbTrack™ work on?
ThumbTrack™ devices and software is compatible with OSX 10.6.8 and upwards as

well as Windows XP, Win 7, Win 8 upwards and Linux.


Does ThumbTrack™ work on Android and iOS?

ThumbTrack™ is not supported on Android and iOS.


Is ThumbTrack™ based on Bluetooth Technology?
ThumbTrack™ operates on a 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency similar to Bluetooth and runs
a custom-written protocol for communication between the wireless USB
We have opted for this alternative hardware and software solution because:
- Our protocol is more device specific than the general Bluetooth protocol
- It provides better connectivity (less disconnect issues and no pairing
- It allows us to offer ThumbTrack™ at a more affordable rate to you as we
won't need to license Bluetooth technology
For the same reasons, established computer peripheral manufacturers such as
Microsoft and Logitech use their own proprietary 2.4 GHz protocols instead of

Bluetooth, for most of their computer mice.


Who can order?
ThumbTrack™ is available worldwide to all countries excluding residents of
countries that fall under US embargo and residents of Belize due to local laws.
Sure, you may choose as many perks as you like.
If you would like to make a bulk order, please contact us at bulkorder [at]

mindstreaminc [dot] com


Where do I enter my preferred color choice?

Once we are ready to ship the perks out, we will send all backers a survey in
which they can choose their preferred color(s) and verify or change their
I do not have a credit card? How else can I purchase a perk?
Unfortunately, we can only accept credit card purchases at this time. All
transactions are securely processed by Indiegogo and MindStream Inc. does not
To be notified if and when an alternative payment option becomes available,
please fill in this brief form.
We have set the goal at a symbolic $500.
We are thrilled that our last campaign
raised a little more than $30,000. However, to be able to visit potential
manufacturing partners in Asia and to bring ThumbTrack™ into production,
Delivery date of the rewards/perks listed on this page are
subject to the best efforts of the team and similar to other crowd funding
campaigns are not guaranteed. This disclaimer has been added to set reasonable
Please note that all crowd funding contributions are considered

information published herein is provided “as is” and is subject to change

without prior notice.


Please feel free to contact us in the comments section or at thumbtrack [at]
mindstreaminc [dot] com should you have any questions, concerns or feedback.

Thank you!

WHO ARE WE?

Cloudcarte is a game changer when it comes to providing you with a consolidated view of all of your Apps, Cloud and Web services – not to mention using one sign-on to gain insight into all of these.  Imagine using any connected device that allows you to manage all of your services whether you’re on the go or not.  Similarly, Cloudcarte intends to be a consumer App as well.  It can be used to manage all of your social media, wireless, shopping and banking accounts, all from your browser of choice and from whichever device you choose to use. That’s the convenience that Cloudcarte offers.

To make this service widely available however, Cloudcarte will rely on the support of folks like you, and with your help, Cloudcarte is seeking to raise $60,000 so as to get this App to you.

Specifically, Cloudcarte will use the funds to:

Develop our Cloudcarte application for consumers

Extend our business App

Enhance our security capabilities for both the  consumer and business App

That’s Cloudcarte – focused on providing the convenience to manage all of your services while ensuring the best and latest security mechanisms are being utilized to protect your information.

Want to be a “Carter?” That’s right, that’s our way of saying  Thank-you (!) and expressing our appreciation because of your contribution.  That makes you a
“Carter.”  Get it!  “carte-r!”

3 MONTHS FREE ON THE BUSINESS VERSION! CLICK HERE!!

 

CLOUD CARTE STICKER

 

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU??

Being a Carter has its perks.  Our perks were developed to show our appreciation but more importantly, to utilize all funding proceeds to help us get you the App sooner.  Our perks range from a huge “Thank you” to enabling you to utilize our business App to provide that converged view and insight into all of your services.  Go ahead
column2:
take a
gander at the perks at the right of your browser.

Being a Carter also means we’ll value your input or feedback on our App so that it makes your life easier and provides a wonderful and lasting experience.  When was the last time you heard an App offer that?  That’s Cloudcarte, committed to ensuring your experience with our App by providing you the convenience you expect.

When Cloudcarte took a look at the growing use of services on the Internet, we realized that there is a problem- there are just too many accounts with too many services that we constantly have to sign in to and remember passwords for.  Cloudcarte gives you the perfect solution by offering you the convenience of consolidating all of these services onto a single dashboard in order to assist you in decision making and more importantly gaining insight in to all of the services you leverage and how much they are costing you.  As you continue to leverage more services and use our App to present that consolidated view, you’ll quickly grasp what your costs are and where you’ve been spending your hard-earned cash, allowing you to make more informative and precise decisions.

Did we mention your feedback was valuable? Cloudcarte will evolve with your use of additional services and we’ll look to you to provide us insight into your online experiences so that we can continue to enhance our App to suit your needs.  We’re open, we listen and we’re no different to you when it comes to the online community, so by sharing our collective thoughts, we can continue evolving our App to collectively have a common and beneficial user experience.

 Help us make convenience the de facto user experience!  


CARTER ' T '

column4: >To our international friends, we're sorry but initially CloudPhone will only work in the above regions. We're 'coming soon' everywhere else. Become a Supporter to let us know we should come to your country!

column1: Use natural speech to call family or call for help. Just press the button and say who you want to call. It’s easy to talk to anyone in seconds!

column2: >‘Call my daughter’  ‘Call a taxi’  ‘I need help!’

column1: Create your own commands based on relationship, name, nickname, or keyword to suit your loved ones preferences. It’s how smarter families connect.
More than just voice calls: Coming Soon!

We're also working on a range of other voice commands that we'll announce in the coming months. We're experimenting with things like voice notifications, automatic callbacks, or voice to text message and text message to voice. As a Supporter, your feedback will help determine what features make the cut.

Unqiue to CloudPhone, voice translation is done in the cloud. Unlike the most popular voice assistant (by a company that rhymes with snapple), CloudPhone's voice control still works in areas with little or no data coverage.
And if the system doesn't understand who the wearer wants to call, they're instantly connected to another nominated number.

The cloud platform ensures your loved one will ALWAYS get through to a human. It's 10x faster than a regular phone, and will keep calling everyone until it reaches a real person (not voicemail!). If no one in your family is available, you can choose it to divert to emergency services (e.g. 911)  or a service provider of your choice.
You have complete control of who it calls and when, via the companion application.
All of your contacts and call groups are managed from the companion app, and saved to the cloud. Update details from anywhere, anytime, and the changes take effect instantly.
CloudPhone also works without Voice Control. Press and Hold the button to call 5 contacts and share location simultaneously (Family Call).
Checkout the VOICE CONTROL FAQ at the bottom of this page for details.
Discover illness before disaster strikes! CloudPhone 3G monitors your loved ones physical activity and provides powerful insight into their health.
With Lifestyle Analytics, you'll have never before seen insight into the impact of changes in care, medication, or behavior on your loved ones health.

A multi-axis accelerometer tracks physical activity throughout the day. This information is combined with a range of information including travel, time outdoors and health information, and displayed on an easy to use dashboard on your phone or tablet.
With Lifestyle Analytics, you'll see the smallest changes in activity and know to ask the right questions.

column2: >""You haven't been getting out much lately mom. Are you feeling ok?""

column1: Communicate better. Prevent small health problems from growing into big ones.
Checkout the LIFESTYLE ANALYTICS FAQ at the bottom of this page for details.
Safe path automatically monitors regular transit activity – like going to and from school, or other regular appointments. You set the route and schedule, CloudPhone lets you know if things go wrong.
Geolocation works indoors (WiFi) and outdoors (WiFi/GPS). CloudPhone can find your loved one even in large shopping centers or other dense urban environments where traditional GPS fails.

column2: >You can’t be everywhere all the time, but CloudPhone can. Features include:

column5: > “Sally has left School” or “Dad has arrived home”

column1: Notifications are sent to your phone via SMS or via email. A secure link shows you where your loved one is in real time, even indoors.
Checkout the SAFE PATH FAQ at the bottom of this page for details.
Bad things happen fast. Timely intervention is critical, but what if Mom can’t reach her phone?
CloudPhone 3G phone is worn all the time, even in the shower. If it detects a fall or a lack of motion, it asks the wearer ‘Are you ok?’

column3: >If they’re not ok, it calls for help and shares its location.

column1: Not Just Falls, Lack of Motion too!
Create regular motion alerts based on time of day. For example:

column2: >Mom is always up by 9am, so let me know if she isn’t.

column3: >CloudPhone can constantly monitor activity and alert you to an unusual lack of movement. For example:

column4: >If dad doesn't move for 10 hours, let me know.

column3: >If an alert is triggered, you'll receive it on your phone and/or via email, and can see the real-time location of the wearer.

column1: CloudPhone is discrete and clever too. Your loved one might have just slept in, or forgot to wear the device. So, before creating a fuss, the device asks 'Are you OK?'. If they respond that they’re fine, we do not alert you.

column3: MOTION FAQ at the bottom of this page for details.

column1: Now everyone can talk to grandma... at the same time!
CloudPhone 3G can create an instant conference call with your whole family. It’s as easy as pressing a button.
Use Family Calls to talk and share as a family, or to coordinate a response in an emergency.There is no faster way to call for help.
Create your own 'panic words' that trigger instant emergency calls and share the wearer's location.

If you're helping a family member with medical emergency, just 'swipe' to add 911 or emergency services. They're added to the conference call with just one touch, so you can stay on the line the whole time.

column2: MOTION FAQ at the bottom of this page for details.

column1: CloudPhone lives in a charge dock when it's not being used.
It lasts for 10 days+ of normal operation without charge, so it's no problem if the wearer forgets to charge it occasionally.
column3: >If the battery is low, you will receive a warning notification on your smartphone via the companion app.

column1: No configuration, works right out of the box
It's the perfect gift for distant relatives, as the device needs no configuration. All your loved one needs to do is take it out of the box and put it on.
You can manage the service from anywhere in the world!
The following is a description of rewards available to our awesome supporters. Check out the FAQs at the bottom of the page for more info.
We have some very cool stretch goals in the pipes that we'll unveil once our initial target is achieved. Colors? Machine Learning? Arm bands? Flying Monkeys? Watch this space!
In 2011 we started in a basement with just a desire to improve the quality of life for an older member of our family.

Since then, dozens have joined our cause. We're extremely grateful for the the tremendous support and recognition we've received from the community. After exiting 'stealth mode' 8 months ago, we have won or been a finalist in nearly a dozen innovation and technology awards. Google us and see, everyone is talking.
Finalist Tech23 Innovation Awards: Tech23 celebrates Australia’s finest early stage technology companies.

Winner: Rackspace Australia Small Teams, Big Impact (STBI). At this event we competed with 10 of Australia's best start-ups, all trying to change the world. We were privileged to be voted no.1 by an experienced panel lead by Robert Scoble and Australian entrepreneur Ruslan Kogan.
International Nomination to Represent Australia at APICTA (Startup Category). The Asia Pacific ICT Alliance (APICTA) Awards is an international Awards Program recognizing innovation throughout Asia.
iAwards National Finalist: Research and Development. We were named a category finalist (R&
column2: D) in the 2013 National iAwards. Our 3 person team ranked alongside billion dollar research firms.

column1: iAwards National Finalist: Startup. We were named a category finalist (Startup) in the 2013 National iAwards. This nomination recognized us as one of Australia’s top startups.
TiE 'Go Asia' Event Winner. Selected by an international panel of investors and entrepreneurs from Hong Kong, Malaysia, India, and Singapore, for innovation and our life changing technology.
2013 CeBit Australia Startup Winner. The ollo mobile team edged out 19 awesome finalists to win the first ever CeBit Australia Startup Competition.
<b>iAwards Winner: QLD Merit Recipient for R&amp
column2: D. iAwards are the leading technology industry awards, recognizing Australian innovation and technology. This award recognized our R&
column3: D as amongst the most innovative in the State of Queensland in 2013.

column1: Anthill Smart 100 Innovation Award. ollo mobile was selected by a panel of judges and industry experts as one of the Top 100 Australian innovations in 2013.
We're well known in Australia and we love our home, but we've come to San Francisco because there's no better place to change the world with great technology.

We’re developing a high quality product, using fully licensed and certified components. The following section has the general technical parameters of the CloudPhone 3G hardware, software, and cloud platform.
NOTE ON LTE / 4G: We aren't supporting 4G / LTE at this stage. Coverage is terrible, it's more expensive, battery life is shorter, and the extra bandwidth is not needed.
The CloudPhone is a fully functional cellular phone. It requires a SIM card (supplied) and 3G or 2G cellular network access to function.
There is no lock-in contract. Included with every CloudPhone 3G is a SIM card which gives you access to the Cloud Platform and services we've described.
• 20mins free talk from the device to cell phones and domestic land lines (not international). Includes family and conference calls.
• 2G/3G data sufficient to deliver location and activity monitoring services
You can call the device like a regular cell phone.

Cloud Cover also includes automatic fall and lack of motion monitoring, Safe Path monitoring, complete access to the Lifestyle Analytics healthy insights platform, and unlimited installs of the companion application for the whole family.

Additional talk time will be billed at an estimated 0.70c per minute, and you can disable extra time billing in your account. This is subject to change, we're working with carriers and datacentre providers to drive this cost down. Support this campaign, get your friends onboard. With more pre-orders, we can get better supply deals and we'll pass the savings on to you.
The following is a brief overview of how the CloudPhone has evolved.
It started with an exciting idea, and some sketches way back in 2011 after a family member was injured in a fall. What would it look like? How would it work?

Then we started building. This first one worked great, but had some issues. It wasn't super portable. It fit nicely in a suitcase, not so well in your pocket :) It may also permanently entangle household pets or young children. We became fearful of a tangled cat meme involving our CloudPhone. So we kept working…

With a little help from our friends, we iterated several electrical designs. First batch had yield issues. The issue was that production didn't yield any working prototypes. Muppets or gremlins poorly placed the GSM module. Busted PCBs are cool for nerd cred &
column2: make great conversation pieces… But we kept working.

column1: The ugly protuberance is the programming header, this is only present on the prototypes. It makes Ken’s life a little easier, uploading new firmware, testing new components, and running diagnostics.

Happy with the prototype board, Ken designed a 3D model, and then later a shell. For the first time it started looking like a real device. This confirmed our dimension expectations, and allowed us to put it into the hands of real users. 3D printed shells are quite fragile, and definitely not waterproof. But they’re fast, cheap and great for testing.

We’ve conducted thousands of calls in different network conditions and conducted around 100 000 location tests in all kinds of situations (malls, houses, cars, buses, trains, office towers). We’re confident that our platform is robust and stable, even as a prototype.

Our crowdfunding campaign is to support delivery of the commercial version. The following are computer rendered drawings of the device we are currently developing. These are proportionally correct drawings, based on the next design iteration. We’ve included these to give you an understanding of where the design is going.
If you've got some great ideas to share, support the project and let us know. Your input can make real changes.
What are we doing with your money?
The ollo mobile team aren’t eating your money. We are self-sustaining organisms that thrive on hopes, dreams, and cloud puns! We tried to think of more cloud jokes but we mist.
But 'cirrus-iously' (cloud pun), you’re not funding our hobby. You’re not paying our rent. 100% of your contribution is going towards the development of the CloudPhone 3G.
We’re doing this because we want to work with you to fix a very real, very important problem. Your support is great, your feedback is awesome.

We all believe very passionately that this project will change lives. Our long suffering wives, partners, and friends, support our dream, and are very graciously keeping the lights on at home and food on the table. We couldn’t have gotten this far without their ongoing support over the past 2 years.
Can you really build the CloudPhone for $50K? (The short answer)
Short answer is ‘no’, but the longer answer is ‘yes’. Read on.
It takes millions of dollars to launch a cutting edge piece of tech like CloudPhone with the build quality you expect and deserve.
Your pledge helps us secure the funding needed to deliver your CloudPhone.
Why we NEED your support (The longer answer)
Those of you that think their family deserves the best possible care.
Those of you in the vanguard of cool tech, the mavericks of innovation.
Those of you that love the newest and the greatest, and shun Best Buy... except if the deal is really sweet...
Those of you that have the gumption to click the pledge button...

You, our early adopters are proof that the CloudPhone 3G is useful and cool. Your engagement proves to our investors that this is an investment worth making. They don't want us to tell them it's awesome, they want you to hear it from you!
For sharing our dream and joining us on this journey, you’ll have the coolest piece of family tech first, and at cost price.
You'll also know that you helped create something special that would not have existed without you.
Your support is absolutely critical. With you behind us, we’ve got the other stuff covered.
Together, we’ll launch a system that might save the life of someone you love.

The major costs come from more hardware design iterations (Beta, Pre-Production, and Production) and then government certification. We also need to finalize housing design. The prototype shown in the videos is using a 3D printed shell, the commercial version will be smaller, water and impact resistant.

Then we need to create tooling for mass production of the plastics, create test jigs for quality checking the units, secure bulk lots of components, and conduct a test production run. All of this costs many thousands of dollars.
During this time we’re also paying tens of thousands in fees associated with government certification and emissions testing (FCC, PTCRB, SAR, etc.). See Risks below for deeper explanation.
Lots of hoops to jump through, but we believe this is a life changing device and a journey worth taking!

We've worked hard for 2 years to de-risk this project. We've built a great team with exceptional experience, and we've worked together for a long time. It’s taken 7000+ man hours and many thousands of dollars to get this far.

In various roles, our team has built numerous software systems and cellular devices in the past (stalk us on Linkedin!). We understand how to manage scope, how to keep projects under control, and how to provide meaningful updates and advice to you, our stakeholders. We are all technology professionals, with years of experience.

We're committed to keeping you informed every step of the way. Below we've outlined the key risks in delivering the CloudPhone 3G on time to your door. This is provided to give you insight into where we see the challenges ahead.

Ship Date: 
We have selected high availability components and have kept the hardware spec. simple. We aren’t reinventing wheels or doing anything a polite engineer would term ‘technically adventurous’,

Product Changes: 
We have a very high level of confidence in delivering the CloudPhone as described. We’re confident because we’ve already built it a few times, and have been testing the live platform for 12 months. We have a few things we want to add (if schedule permits) and we’ll be asking our backers what extra functions they’d like most as we progress through the project. Keep an eye on the stretch goals, there's some fun stuff coming that we'll add if budget permits!

Commercialization of the prototype: 
We need a few more revisions of the electrical design. Based on the testing we've done, we want to add things like haptic (vibration) and voice feedback that will make the user experience truly amazing. We plan our design work thoroughly and keep things simple. So far, things have been very smooth, but gremlins can get in despite our best efforts. Gremlins cause budgets to bleed and timelines to creep.

Supplier / Component Difficulty: 
There is always a risk that a supplier will let us down or that there is a spontaneous global shortage of a much needed widget. We’ve avoided custom made components, and are using widely available parts that can be readily switched to a different equivalent brand wherever possible to lower this risk. If we encounter a component shortage, delivery could be delayed if we cannot find a viable alternative quickly.

Certification and Compliance: 
Turnaround times on some certifications can be 10+ weeks. We’ve factored this into our schedule, but if we fail to comply on first attempt, we’ll have to make changes and re-submit. Yep, ouch. Fortunately, we have our own test facilities and our component supplier is offering us free ‘pre-compliance’ testing. This means that when it comes time to submit to Uncle Sam, we’ll be very confident of getting over the line the first time. The major compliance regimes we are pursuing are PTCRB, FCC, SAR, CE, and A-Tick. Your CloudPhone will be fully compliant with government regulations and safe to use.
And as we said before, you'll be kept in the loop the whole time. Good or bad, you'll know what we're up to.

Our voice control doesn’t need a data connection, and you

Pushing calls to the cloud means a call from CloudPhone is
never missed. It’s also 5-10x faster than normal phone dialling because we
contact many people simultaneously (based on your preferences). It detects
humans too, we won’t hand your loved one to voice mail.
The CloudPhone design also keeps the device simple and
stable, extends battery life (services are turned on and off as needed). It
lets you control any aspect of your loved one’s service remotely via your
Call handling from the device is done in real time via our
cloud platform. We make sure a call from a CloudPhone is ALWAYS connected to a
human. If you miss a call, our system keeps trying different numbers (you’ve
nominated) until someone else answers. We recommend you set a 911 / 999 / 000
or a managed service provider as your contact of last resort.
Cloud based call handling also means you can do cool stuff
like ‘swipe to add’ people to existing calls (up to 5), and create rules based
on time and location, like ‘between 1am and 5am, call 911 not me!’

column1: We’ve imposed this limitation to make the launch more
manageable. We need to deploy and support cloud software in each region and we
need to comply with local government regulations.
As a startup, 3 countries is extremely ambitious, we can’t
stretch any further without seriously risking the quality of the service we
provide to you. To tell us to hurry up and come to your country, pledge $5 and
we’ll make sure you’re first to know. If we get enough pledges from a new
region, we’ll add it as a stretch goal.
Yes. The blue LED pulses constantly when it’s sharing
Yes. The account holder can partially or totally disable
location sharing. For example, you may set the CloudPhone to only share its
location during an emergency event, or you might elect to have it share its
location periodically throughout the day. Or you might disable location
sharing entirely. It’s up to you.
We’re using 512bit encryption to secure your information.
No. The service works just fine without it.
We’ve made it possible to securely save this information
because in our own families, we have real problems remembering and keeping
track of our grandparent’s medications, allergies, ailments and the like.
In an emergency, the companion application lets you share it
instantly and securely with paramedics or other first responders. The link it
generates automatically expires after 3 hours, so you don’t have to share login
information or worry about people snooping later.
The only information required to use the service is names,
email addresses, and contact numbers of the people you want to have the
Yes. This is managed within the companion app. The device
pulses blue when it is reporting it’s location.
We know protecting the privacy of your information is
critical. Here is an outline of how we’re managing it. A complete disclosure
statement will be provided prior to you activating your service. It will be in
plain English, and comply completely with the laws in your country.
This is all the information you provide us that personally
describes you. Phone numbers, names, date of birth etc. Anything that can be
used to work out who you are. We use this information to deliver and manage the
service. We will not sell it to third parties, or use it for any other reason
than to provide you with great service. You can delete it at anytime. This is
just a summary of our privacy policy, we take it very seriously.
in your country of origin. If you register from the US, your data will remain
in the US, likewise if you’re an Aussie, it stays down-under. Each region has
its own instance of our software, hosted in local datacentres. Personal data
will not be shared or moved between regions.
We use a reputable US based email
provider to manage external communications, such as automated ‘alert’
notifications. Name, email address and your notification preferences will be
physically stored in datacentres in the US.

or a child. You decide when and to whom your information is shared, the
application gives you complete control. That’s it, nothing tricky. As mentioned
before, we will not sell your personal information to third parties.

Our device and software may collect location information
from GPS, Cell tower, and WiFi hotspots. This can be disabled and managed via
your account preferences. We only ever collect location information to support
your use of the service, we do not collect it without your explicit permission.
The device DOES NOT constantly share its’ location with you. It shares only
when you set it to do so. The following describes how we handle your location
information reported by the device in your country of origin. It’s kept for a
maximum of 72hrs. We use a highly reputable US based 3<sup>rd</sup> party
service to assist in working out where the device is. They do not retain the
information, they process it and send it back to us.
