","Have you ever been lost in a foreign city or country?

column1: Have you ever been undecided about where to eat or shop?
Are you or do you know any disabled person who cannot have access to a place because there are no facilities?
Are you a small business that cannot afford doing its own communication and marketing?
Cadeyo is the answer to all those questions. It is the application that will make your life easier!

Cadeyo is a free geolocation mobile and web application that allows users to locate businesses and services near to their location. It can be shops, restaurants or coffee shops.Users can also rate, review and comment the businesses and therefore help future or potential customers in their choices.

It has a social dimension!The objective behind the creation of this application is to empower small local businesses that cannot afford paying for their own marketing and communication mainly because they don’t have the required budget for it.The innovation of Cadeyo is a new feature that helps disabled people locate places that are totally or partially accessible for them.Cadeyo’s functionalities
This application is available for both Android and iOS and soon for Windows phone
As a user, you can create your own account or access it via your Facebook and add a business, rate it, review it and share it
In addition to Morocco, Cadeyo will be operating at an international level, meaning that users can add shops from all over the world
For a better serving quality, Cadeyo keeps updating and refreshing its businesses database
Through this mobile application, you can access the deals and benefit from the special offers around you.
Do check-ins in order to share your location with your friends
Users can rate a place's accessibility based on different criterias (entrance, elevator, restroom, parking, dorway, room)

Cadeyo's ImpactFacilitate and provide users with a simple and effective application that allows them to locate good adresses through reviews and rates of other usersMake the stay easier, more pleasant and unforgettable for tourists who are visiting a foreign city or countryPromote and help small local businesses or newly created businesses to be known and recognized  and therefore having an economic impactImpact business discoverability by customersIncrease online visibility for businesses that don’t have websites and allow them to promote their brand internationallyHere is why we need your help:1. Advertising
Google adWords and other search engines
The development of this application is in process (60% already completed) but we definitely need your contributions to make it happen.

In addition to the social and economic impact you are going to make on businesses and users through your contribution, you will receive, depending on the perks you choose,  Moroccan traditional gifts and/or Cadeyo designed gifts that you can keep as a souvenir from your contribution to the success of this project.",4.0,0,"1 Campaign

Do you know someone that always tells you, “I’ll be over in a few”, but doesn’t show up for another hour? WhereU?! is a private way to track, only displaying how many miles your friend has left until arrival, without showing what street they are on. This method of private tracking protects your friends personal whereabouts, and yours while being in the know.

The Problem

There's a lot of people who show up to events or simple gatherings many minutes or hours later than expected, keeping their friends waiting or their families worried. In the course of these people being late, 9 times out of 10 when they are called to be asked for their location, they give misleading updates of their arrival. Here's a few that you might find familiar:
""Im around the corner"", means ""I'm just now leaving the front door.""
""Be there in a few"", means ""I'm not dressed yet or I havent even showered.""
""I'll let you know when I'm on the way"", means ""I dont really plan on coming anytime soon or at all.

One of the things that we can't always trust in life is someone's word. Anyone could carelessly say ""I will be there"", or ""I will do it"" and we will probably believe them, until we start noticing a pattern.  This app will keep users ahead of the patterns. 

""How can you stay ahead of the pattern? By tracking their location? Thats a little scary...""

The Solution 

Aside from the other tracking apps in the App Store that raise privacy concerns, WhereU?! is the only tracking app that aims to protect users personal whereabouts from being seen by others, while keeping users informed of accurate arrivals. Keeping people in the know this way gives peace at mind while waiting, and keeps users safe. 

""How can you track someone without showing their precise location?"" 

Simple, only display how many miles the users have left until arrival. Doesn't it feel better and more time convenient to have this information?

Another useful feature of WhereU?! is called Meet Me Tracking. With this feature, you can set a location on a map to where you are meeting your friends and be able to see how many miles they have left until they arrive at that location. 

Never arrive at a meeting place too early again, sitting and waiting for them to show. Now you can be on your way when you see that they are on their way. 

The Roadblock

Since September 2013, I've put in $3,400+ of hard earned money towards getting my idea developed by developers and patented by lawyers, and I am burnt out of spending to get this idea to soar. Luckily enough, the app was approved January 10th 2014 by the App Store.

Based on 5 star ratings for the first version, and being featured on the front of an app review site (www.appdictions.com), I take it as a sign that this method of Private Tracking can really make a break-through in how we communicate! I want this idea to expand to all mobile platforms, all types of communication where applicable, and eventually to where this project has earned enough to create a platform of its own.

Unfortunately with 900,000+ apps in the App Store, there is no way my app will automatically be visible without the help of an App Marketing Firm. I am currently working with a marketing firm that is recommending a budget of $20,000 for a successful campaign. That is significantly out of my reach! With your help of achieving this goal, you can say that you played a part in helping grow a new method of communication.

Because of this new idea, there is now a spark in my drive to not just stop at the iphone. I want to get this new method across multiple platforms and hopefully be able to generate a platform of its own because there is a demand for people wanting to be in the know.

Will you lend me a helping hand with this new venture?

Thank you for reading.

Short Summary

Solar-X is a simple photovoltaic device which can be used for charging Cell Phone,
or powering up Arduino type boards , Etc
Solar-X should face the Sun, and mobile should be kept in a bag , so that direct heat from sun should not spoil the Mobile phone.
Power Pack contains battery and it can be charged using Solar-X
photovoltaic panel, Power Pack can charge the phone as well as it can be
used to Turn on High brightness LED .
The fund usage will be as below

Every time when we sell 20 number of Solar-X ,  1 solar-X + Mini battery pack +LED will be Donated to Poor Children who do not have access for electricity

Photos  while Prototype Testing
Few photos while testing Reliability
Users can use Solar-X when they go for Trekking, and when they don't have access for Wall adapter , they can Use Solar -X For charging mobile Phone.

column2:
Challenges

 Always there are  challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product at a larger number.

column1: there are still risks associated with producing the Solar-X.
Unexpected changes in component lead times, availability of components, and cost variation are some  of factors which are not in our control that could affect our
delivery timeline, but we are working to minimize these risks and deliver the product in time.
There are also risks while shipping, like Solar-X should reach you in a very good condition,it  should not get damaged while transporting,
We are in a process of continuous improvement, The Final look of Solar-X and Power Pack is subject to Change,
We expect our supporters and users of Solar-X , using it for a good purpose,

We will provide the Designs , and the orders will be fulfilled by our American 
 manufacturers or manufacturers from China.
 
1. Vinay Kumar     :   CEO
2. Yash                    :   Designer
3. Prashanth          :   Marketing

Help Us Reach Our Ultimate Goal to Exceed $2,000,000 in Funding
You want to make a fire to warm yourself, but you have no matches.
You want to cook some food, but you have no pots or pans.

You want to build a house but you have no hammer or nails.

Having the Right Tools Matters.

Now imagine you are a child in a disadvantage family. Your family can barely afford a very old computer and some internet access but can't afford software pivotal to success such as Microsoft's Word, Excel, Power Point, or other such software most schools require to submit work, like essays and the like. This scenario exists throughout the country and around the world. I have worked with many people thru various business ventures who are exactly in this predicament. They can't afford the latest and greatest system money can buy because they have no spare money. If they don't have money to buy the latest systems, you can be sure they have no money to buy expensive software that is vital in todays technologically savvy environment. These people are increasingly being left behind. The children will be the ones to suffer the most.

We know that technology that we are developing will change the lives of so many people, but for that to happen we really need your help. Your gifts will help countless millions of needy people who might otherwise not be able to afford current technologies, for instance, Microsoft's suit of Word, Excel, Powerpoint, etc. plus so many other products. We provide alternative solutions to meet their needs, as well as a host of other valuable tools hosted within the World's FIRST, TRUE Web-Based Operating System.
Making Those Tools Available for Free is Our Goal.
Technology is the Great Divider in our Society today.

Introducing the Worlds FIRST, Universally Accessible, Cross-Platform, TRUE Web-Based Operating System. Using predominantly Open Source technologies, we will delivery the desktop experience from within your web browser.

A window-like interface allows you to work in a familiar Desktop environment that requires little in the way of a learning curve. There will be plenty of useful applications delivered free to you with your account. Web Applications such as Word Processing, Spreadsheets, Presentations, IM, Chat, Collaboration tools, Mail Tools, Our Own Video Streaming service, Easy-to-Use Web Publishing Tools, and so much more will be available with a basic amount of storage space in our own secure cloud storage for FREE! Any time! Anywhere!

Access our Web OS from any system whether it be Tablet, Laptop, Desktop, mobile or otherwise. Windows? Linux? MAC? Android? It doesn't matter. As long as you have a W3C, standards-compliant Web-Browser, you are Golden. Not sure if your browser will be supported. We check for you. If not, we will have a direct download link and instructions for installing the latest and best in Open-Source, Standards-Compliant Web Browsing technology. Free up space on your systems, whether mobile, or desktop, so that you have more room available for the things that matter such as Pictures and Video. Your system will run faster.

Got Kids? We are working hard to make an environment that is Kid-Safe for them and can be linked to a parental account for under-aged users so parents can have better visibility into what a child is doing while at the same time respecting their need for privacy. We have kids too, so we understand your worries. Kids can access the system from home to create presentations, documents, etc, then go to school, polish things up a bit and do their presentation to the class from a Web-Enabled computer or submit their essay to the teacher in the format required by the class(*.doc, *.docx, *.xls, etc) to help ace their class. Same goes for everyone else accessing our technology.
Schools can realize huge savings by installing
a free Linux OS and accessing all the Word Processing, Spreadsheet and
Presentation tools at school,as well as all the other tools that we will
avail to them, and use the same Web-Based OS from home. With most
schools still stuck with older systems, having a base Linux system can
improve performance over the Windows XP based systems that are installed
on most older systems found in most schools.

The access-anywhere aspect of this technology and support for file-types goes beyond the capabilities of most other systems and uses Open Source technology to achieve a high level of support for a variety of formats too numerous to list.

Want to create a small website but have felt daunted by the task? We have you covered. If you can type in a Word Processor, you have the skills needed to get started. We handle the complicated stuff so you end up looking cool on the web.

You have the WANT and the aspiration to do this, but may not the technical capability, and we want to put the technical capability into your hands, as well as millions of others who have the creative spark within them, but no outlet to express that creativity in a brilliant way. Our technology will be the enabler for all of your creative aspirations.
A great example of what can be accomplished can be found at:

The Adventure Challenge website and what we are doing with it is our gift to everyone who is helping us raise funds, both for Frabjulous and the Children's Pediatric Brain Tumour Foundation, which you can learn more about at The Adventure Challenge website.

Want to stay in touch with others? Share Memories? You have full access to everything, to do anything your imagination will allow. With access to our technologies, combined with your imagination, you can soar. Nothing will be beyond your reach.
We Aim to be the Desktop Killer
always so ready to talk about the death of the Windows desktop. With
the advent of the mobile revolution,we have taken further steps in that
direction, and as the video above alludes, the Windows Desktop is dying.
Our technology will be a decisive blow to the windows desktop. We are
going to drag that Memory hungry monster out behind the woodshed and put it out of its
There are still so many old systems out their
that are single core CPU's and are being used because people don't have

the ability to purchase newer systems. Schools still use older PC's because budgetary constraints have limited their ability to upgrade. Often times, the systems used in schools are refurbished from systems that might otherwise have gone into the landfill. Let's not forget our schools!
Our technology will rejuvenate their systems. We will show them the
path.  Our technology will rule their systems.
Windows to become a dumb terminal thru which users will use the
web-browser to access our technology. All the bloat can be removed from
the system. Windows would become a host for Local hardware and for the
browser. Not only Windows, but also Linux, Apple and any OS that can run
a fully compliant W3C Web-browser. Our technology will work independent of the Operating System.
This is the first stage in our
roadmap for which we are raising these funds. Your gifts can make this
happen for the world, and it will benefit so many. The poor and the
middle class make up a huge portion of our society, not to mention all
those students in high school and college. Everyone will have access, and our software will be made simple to use for all levels of user from beginners, to intermdiates to professionals alike.

The great divide betwen the rich and the poor is growing every day. Do you think I am being overly dramatic about the chasm between the rich and the poor? Though the current Administration tries to paint a rosy picture of the economic situation, because of the agenda's being pushed thru our goverment, the business environment is becoming a less friendly place for job growth. Read the article in the following link on the Fox News website which reports on data from the Associate Press.
Four in Five in US face near-poverty, no work

My name is Steven Hall. I was born and bred in NC. I kinda like to think of myself as an educated red-neck. I may have mad skills these days, but I never forget that I grew up poor. I don't look down on anyone, no matter your walk of life. In fact, this project has been inspired somewhat by my experience of growing up less fortunate than others. I have realized over the years, that the great divide between the rich and the poor is due in no small part to access to technology, which is the gateway to a better life. We are creating a technology that will empower everyone with tools to unleash their creativity and imagination, and we are giving it to you for FREE.

Trust is very important to me. I want you to understand and Trust that I am leveraging my skills to touch the lives of everyone and hopefully change people's lives by giving them easy access to Technology they wouldn't otherwise have access to or don't have the skills or finances necessary to achieve their dreams otherwise.

Open Source Technologies
As mentioned, whenever possible, we want to use Open Source alternatives to achieve our goals.
Obvious things would be stuff such as jQuery, and a ton of open source plugins plus I will use jQuery to create my own plugins to support custom functionality not already available.
To support all the Word Processing, Spread Sheet and Presentation
Formats, we will use either Open Source Libraries that support our chosen file
formats and conversions to other formats, or Open Source applications that expose
this functionality as objects that we can make use of in our Technology.

Our technology has massive implications on the future of technology and society. It would be almost impossible to cover it all here. Therefore, I have created a Web Meeting space that I will host daily to answer any and all questions.
The Schedule for our upcoming Web Meetings can be found at the link below:
Invitations to the WebMeetings can be had by emailing me at:
For more information about anything else Frabjulous, email me at:
Frabjulous is also on twitter, so add me so you can keep up with my daily thoughts and ideas and maybe reach out to me with yours.

Our Ultimate Goal is to raise over $2,000,000+. This will allow us to do so many great things that will ultimately make this a long term success. If we meet certain milestones in our fund-raising campaign towards the $2,000,000 mark, some really cool things are going to happen.

We have started a separate website, called The Adventure Challenge that will show things we will do if we hit certain milestones in our fund-raising campaign. Long Story short, we have a few milestones for our campaign:

When we pass each of the milestones, we pledge to do what we call Adventure Challenges. This is something we are introducing that is totally new to any CrowdFunding Platform, and is hugely exciting to me.

An Adventure Challenge involves me, Steven Hall, performing Wild Adventures that challenge my skills in the outdoors, which are relatively few, being as, for the last 14-15 years I have been mostly busy riding a desk chair and pounding the keyboard, using my ample mental capabilities to enhance products for other companies, while at the same time, starting a family. Now these Adventure Challenges will take me out of my comfort zone and thrust me into new Adventures that will pump up my adrenaline and test my will to survive, literally. Best of all, for Milestones #5 and #6, we are involving you, the Contributors in our Adventure Challenges. You will have a chance to help shape how these particular Adventure Challenges will unfold. This will only happen though, if we reach our milestones. Make sure and check out the TheAdventureChallenge.com website for full details.

Why are we doing this? These Adventure Challenges aren't just for fun. Behind the Challenges, is a great cause that we are helping to raise money and awareness about. TheAdventureChallenge.com, our company TechSys America, LLP and I, Steven Hall, have partnered with the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation to help them raise money and awareness for the horrible disease that is afflicting countless children across this country and around the world. We will be raising funds for the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation thru our Adventure Challenges which are tied to our IndieGoGo Goals. You can find more information at TheAdventureChallenge.com, as well as get contact information for the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation so you can check it out and make sure we are legit.

Remember we will only be able to do the challenges from the TheAdventureChallenge.com website if we meet our funding milestones outlined above and on TheAdventureChallenge.com website. So by contributing to this campaign, you are not only funding a really cool technology that could change the world, but you will push me to raise money and awareness for a very worthwhile organization thru the Adventure Challenges. When we reach the $2,000,000 Goal, we will contribute $250,000 to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation, one of the largest single donations they have ever received.

How will we use the Funds?

Our Ultimate Goal is $2,000,000. We will use these fund as follows:

1) Storage Capacity: For each TB of Cloud Storage, we require a minimum of 3TB for redundancy to keep your data safe and accessible 100% of the time.

2) Server Hardware: We will need a massive amount of Server space. A minumium of 20 Fail-Over Server just for the main site at a minnimum, plus Cloud Storage Server, plus Bandwidth and server space. We plan to use a majority of the funds for this purpose. Capacity Planning is a major strategic goal for these funds.

3) Reasearch, Development and Testing: We plan to have this Web-Based Operating System Accessible and Operational within 6 to 8 months, with tons of features for you to take advantage of.

4) $250,000 will be Donated to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation. Individuals donating $100 or more will be given honorable mention on the website and a list will be made available to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation listing those giving $100 or more. Honorable mention will be given on our website for those giving $50 or more as well.


Perks

For each $1 you gift to us, we will give you 1GB of cloud storage on the Frabjulous Platform for 2 years. Compare the savings to Google Drive (15 GB Free then $4.99/Month for 100GB). 115GB for 2 Years on Google Drive = $120 is ~$1.05/GB. You'd save ~$2.50/Year plus have all the extra benefits our Web-Based Operating System has to offer. If you only want to the Cloud Storage, donate the amount you want, even if it is more than $1, then choose the $1 Perk. We already understand that 1GB for every dollar you are donating. So if you donate $125, still select the $1 Perk if cloud storage is the only thing you desire, and we will give you 125GB of Cloud Storage.

Personal Thank You

For those giving $15, $25, or more we want to personally Thank You, but we can't travel around the coutry and the world to everyone's home to do it so we will do it with Technology. At $15 and above we will send a personal email Thanking You for your gift. At $25 and above, we will not only email a personal Thank You, but we will also send send you a link to a personalized video addressing you personally and giving you a heart felt and personalized Thank You as if we were face-to-face.

The Adventure Challenges

The Adventure Challenge is a series of increasingly difficult challenges that I will partake in as we meet milestones in our Crowd Funding. For each Adventure Challenge, we will film the Challenge in All-Digital Full-HD video, and we will publish the series exclusively on our Streaming Video Service which will be part of the Frabjulous Platform. For those giving a Gift of $50 or more but below $100, in addition to everything else mention, you will also get the Adventure Challenge Series on DVD, though, the Challenges where I will survive on an uninhabited, undeveloped tropical Island for either 21 or 48 days, complete Naked, you won't get to see the naughty parts. That will be blurred out. The Series on DVD will contain bonus footage not seen in the online version.

If you contribute $100 or more you will get the Adventure Challenge Series on DVD, but now this is the fully uncensored version, showing all the naughty bits, with even more additional footage you won't see on the censored version of the DVD Series.

For those who give $500 or more you get all the previous perks, plus your name will be listed as a honary donor when we donate $250,00 to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation. This list will be handed to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation and your name will be listed on our site as an honorary contributor to the Frabjulous WebOS.

browser. Not only Windows, but also Linux, Apple and any OS that can run
a fully compliant W3C  Web-browser. Our technology will work independent of the Operating System.
This is the first stage in our
roadmap for which we are raising these funds. Your gifts can make this
happen for the world, and it will benefit so many. The poor and the
middle class make up a huge portion of our society, not to mention all
those students in high school and college. Everyone will have access, and our software will be made simple to use for all levels of user from beginners, to intermdiates to professionals alike.

The great divide betwen the rich and the poor is growing every day. Do you think I am being overly dramatic about the chasm between the rich and the poor? Though the current Administration tries to paint a rosy picture of the economic situation, because of the agenda's being pushed thru our goverment, the business environment is becoming a less friendly place for job growth. Read the article in the following link on the Fox News website which reports on data from the Associate Press.
Four in Five in US face near-poverty, no work

My name is Steven Hall. I was born and bred in NC. I kinda like to think of myself as an educated red-neck. I may have mad skills these days, but I never forget that I grew up poor. I don't look down on anyone, no matter your walk of life. In fact, this project has been inspired somewhat by my experience of growing up less fortunate than others. I have realized over the years, that the great divide between the rich and the poor is due in no small part to access to technology, which is the gateway to a better life. We are creating a technology that will empower everyone with tools to unleash their creativity and imagination, and we are giving it to you for FREE.

Trust is very important to me. I want you to understand and Trust that I am leveraging my skills to touch the lives of everyone and hopefully change people's lives by giving them easy access to Technology they wouldn't otherwise have access to or don't have the skills or finances necessary to achieve their dreams otherwise.Open Source Technologies
As mentioned, whenever possible, we want to use Open Source alternatives to achieve our goals.
Obvious things would be stuff such as jQuery, and a ton of open source plugins plus I will use jQuery to create my own plugins to support custom functionality not already available.
To support all the Word Processing, Spread Sheet and Presentation
Formats, we will use either Open Source Libraries that support our chosen file
formats and conversions to other formats, or Open Source applications that expose
this functionality as objects that we can make use of in our Technology.

Our technology has massive implications on the future of technology and society. It would be almost impossible to cover it all here. Therefore, I have created a Web Meeting space that I will host daily to answer any and all questions.
The Schedule for our upcoming Web Meetings can be found at the link below:
Invitations to the WebMeetings can be had by emailing me at:
For more information about anything else Frabjulous, email me at:
Of course, replace (at) with @ and <dot> with a period.
Frabjulous is also on twitter, so add me so you can keep up with my daily thoughts and ideas and maybe reach out to me with yours.
We aspire to do great things.

Our Ultimate Goal is to raise over $2,000,000+. This will allow us to do so many great things that will ultimately make this a long term success. If we meet certain milestones in our fund-raising campaign towards the $2,000,000 mark, some really cool things are going to happen. We have started a separate website, called The Adventure Challenge that will show things we will do if we hit certain milestones in our fund-raising campaign. Long Story short, we have a few milestones for our campaign:

When we pass each of the milestones, we pledge to do what we call Adventure Challenges. This is something we are introducing that is totally new to any CrowdFunding Platform, and is hugely exciting to me.

An Adventure Challenge involves me, Steven Hall, performing Wild Adventures that challenge my skills in the outdoors, which are relatively few, being as, for the last 14-15 years I have been mostly busy riding a desk chair and pounding the keyboard, using my ample mental capabilities to enhance products for other companies, while at the same time, starting a family. Now these Adventure Challenges will take me out of my comfort zone and thrust me into new Adventures that will pump up my adrenaline and test my will to survive, literally. Best of all, for Milestones #5 and #6, we are involving you, the Contributors in our Adventure Challenges. You will have a chance to help shape how these particular Adventure Challenges will unfold. This will only happen though, if we reach our milestones. Make sure and check out the TheAdventureChallenge.com website for full details.

Why are we doing this? These Adventure Challenges aren't just for fun. Behind the Challenges, is a great cause that we are helping to raise money and awareness about. TheAdventureChallenge.com, our company TechSys America, LLP and I, Steven Hall, have partnered with the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation to help them raise money and awareness for the horrible disease that is afflicting countless children across this country and around the world. We will be raising funds for the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation thru our Adventure Challenges which are tied to our IndieGoGo Goals. You can find more information at TheAdventureChallenge.com, as well as get contact information for the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation so you can check it out and make sure we are legit.

Remember we will only be able to do the challenges from the TheAdventureChallenge.com website if we meet our funding milestones outlined above and on TheAdventureChallenge.com website. So by contributing to this campaign, you are not only funding a really cool technology that could change the world, but you will push me to raise money and awareness for a very worthwhile organization thru the Adventure Challenges. When we reach the $2,000,000 Goal, we will contribute $250,000 to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation, one of the largest single donations they have ever received.How will we use the Funds?Our Ultimate Goal is $2,000,000. We will use these fund as follows:1) Storage Capacity: For each TB of Cloud Storage, we require a minimum of 3TB for redundancy to keep your data safe and accessible 100% of the time.2) Server Hardware: We will need a massive amount of Server space. A minumium of 20 Fail-Over Server just for the main site at a minnimum, plus Cloud Storage Server, plus Bandwidth and server space. We plan to use a majority of the funds for this purpose. Capacity Planning is a major strategic goal for these funds.3) Reasearch, Development and Testing: We plan to have this Web-Based Operating System Accessible and Operational within 6 to 8 months, with tons of features for you to take advantage of.4) $250,000 will be Donated to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation. Individuals donating $100 or more will be given honorable mention on the website and a list will be made available to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation listing those giving $100 or more. Honorable mention will be given on our website for those giving $50 or more as well.PerksFor each $1 you gift to us, we will give you 1GB of cloud storage on the Frabjulous Platform for 2 years. Compare the savings to Google Drive (15 GB Free then $4.99/Month for 100GB). 115GB for 2 Years on Google Drive = $120 is ~$1.05/GB. You'd save ~$2.50/Year plus have all the extra benefits our Web-Based Operating System has to offer. If you only want to the Cloud Storage, donate the amount you want, even if it is more than $1, then choose the $1 Perk. We already understand that 1GB for every dollar you are donating. So if you donate $125, still select the $1 Perk if cloud storage is the only thing you desire, and we will give you 125GB of Cloud Storage.Personal Thank YouFor those giving $15, $25, or more we want to personally Thank You, but we can't travel around the coutry and the world to everyone's home to do it so we will do it with Technology. At $15 and above we will send a personal email Thanking You for your gift. At $25 and above, we will not only email a personal Thank You, but we will also send send you a link to a personalized video addressing you personally and giving you a heart felt and personalized Thank You as if we were face-to-face.The Adventure ChallengesThe Adventure Challenge is a series of increasingly difficult challenges that I will partake in as we meet milestones in our Crowd Funding. For each Adventure Challenge, we will film the Challenge in All-Digital Full-HD video, and we will publish the series exclusively on our Streaming Video Service which will be part of the Frabjulous Platform. For those giving a Gift of $50 or more but below $100, in addition to everything else mention, you will also get the Adventure Challenge Series on DVD, though, the Challenges where I will survive on an uninhabited, undeveloped tropical Island for either 21 or 48 days, complete Naked, you won't get to see the naughty parts. That will be blurred out. The Series on DVD will contain bonus footage not seen in the online version. If you contribute $100 or more you will get the Adventure Challenge Series on DVD, but now this is the fully uncensored version, showing all the naughty bits, with even more additional footage you won't see on the censored version of the DVD Series.For those who give $500 or more you get all the previous perks, plus your name will be listed as a honary donor when we donate $250,00 to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation. This list will be handed to the Pediatric Brain Tumor Foundation and your name will be listed on our site as an honorary contributor to the Frabjulous WebOS.",0.0,3,"2 Campaigns

0,"

This campaign is an attempt to get funding for a project
myself and my team has been working on for the past 15 years. We are now
referring to this as Goggle-Brain, however there is no definite name for our
invention. This project implements a contact lens computer, with beta waves
from the brain, in an attempt to create an optical contact lens computer
experience that will run auto, or manual.

Auto function will use beta waves programmed via the
learning stage to recognize the thought process, and pull information to visual
as the brain is processing it.

Example: Say someone is thinking of ‘cats’ when on
autopilot, google brain will begin to run information on cats and bring all
relevant information to the forefront, which will be visually seen on the optical
computer screen.

Manual mode will of course process information manually
entered into the program. Bringing it to been seen on the inserted optical
screen.

Of course there is allot more that goes into this than can
be summed up, but Id like to keep something’s secret until this project is
perfected, so the above is the jest of the project.

Our team has been working on this project with our own
funds, loans, etc for the past 15 years.


We are very confident in our ability to succeed in our goal,
however financially we need a boost. Many other companies like Samsung are
getting ahead of us due to their financial backing.

We have the brains (pun intended) but require some
assistance from where ever we can get it.

That’s where you come in.

This is our last effort to attain financial contributions
for our project
column2:
as we have exhausted all means of support for our once small endeavor, turned monster.

We need supplies, and the ability to keep our lab up
and running. This was just fun and games in the beginning to a few collage kids
with a dream. But now we have invested so much time and money that we would
love to see our goal come to fruition.

Please if anyone out there would like to see us carry
forward in our attempt to perfect this project and make it available to the
public, donate to our cause. We could use your help now more than ever.

This is so exciting to us! Each new accomplishment is exhilarating,
and we never know what tomorrow will bring.

Please help us see tomorrow...

 

 

The following is some information on what's happening around the world with this project and other teams of researchers...

Over in Belgium, scientists have finally taken a crucial step toward building  screens into contact lenses.

Jelle De Smet and a team of researchers at Ghent University built an LCD screen in a curved contact lens.

To do it, they had to come up withnew kinds of  ""conductive polymers"" – and mold them into ""a very thin,  spherically-curved substrate [surface] with active layers.""

The Ghent contact lense is a primitive prototype of what's to  come. 

Ghent researchers imagine that in the near future, lenses like they one  they've built will be able to change the color of the wearer's eye, work as  sunglasses, or serve a medical purpose like protecting a damaged iris from  bright light.

Farther out in time, De Smet and his team believe the lenses could function  as a head-up  display, ""superimposing an image onto the user’s normal view.""

Eventually this kind of screen-on-the-eye technology could displace the  smartphone as as the dominant way people access the Internet and  connect to each other.

Computers have been getting smaller and closer to our eyeballs since their  beginning. First they took up whole rooms. Then they moved to desks. Then  they were in our laps. Now, they're in our palms. 

Why would they stop there?

They won't.

Google,  Microsoft,  and Apple are currently developing computer screens that can be built into a pair of glasses.

You can already buy a pair from Google and have it early next year.

Just as there are millions of smartphone apps now, you can  imagine millions of applications for a computer as close to our brains as a  contact lens …

… on the road, providing turn-by-turn directions with unobtrusive  coloration.

… stats hovering over the quarterback at a football game.

… virtual name tags affixed to everyone's shirt at a business networking  event.

… lyrics floating above the stage at a concert.

… subtitles to a live conversation with the foreigner in front of you.

… voice-powered, hands free Google search and note-taking that expands your  memory and information recall.

column1: Our Perks | Our Plan

We make party planning research simple...In a snap! Our site and service saves users 4 - 8 hours of search time each time they need to look for an event venue or planner, by offering every option in one city, with one search in less than one minute. Now our mobile service will offer increased useability while on the go.  With key new features, the site will provide cutting-edge research power at our users' fingertips.
column3:
/>

What's special about this project?

Snappening.com

column1: come has listings for more than 40 types of event venues in one city – more
than any other tool on the market and those listings are standardized to provide the information people need when planning parties. It's the

best list in town for planning your party -- not our words, our clients' and users' words!

Snappening.com
has listings for any type of event in one place whether it’s wedding, social

event or corporate meeting. Our users have come to rely on Snappening for all their event planning needs, all year long, every year.

Helping people reach more event planning data faster than ever

before – seamlessly has always been at the core of our mission, but doing this well takes time, dedication and most of all cold hard cash.

Where's your contribution going?

Our app development costs will support the following core functionality and designs:

- Creating a new visual experience for our mobile app users with custom sizing, graphics and functionality (a new visual navigation system that is more mobile friendly)

- Ensuring our rich database continues to provide our mobile users with tailor-made search results for any type of party they are planning

- Allowing mobile app users to find venues and vendors they want to contact, and do so simultaneously should they desire the efficiency of that tool - mark the venues you want to reach as favorites and ask

- Allowing users to stand anywhere within a city and see what venues are nearby to make choices about walkability or drivability for their guests - no more guessing or trying to figure it out on your own

- Allowing our mobile experience to provide user account authentication and integration with our existing desktop version

- Allowing our mobile experience to integrate with Facebook and Twitter more readily

column2:
>

Your contribution for app

column1: development helps us reach our national growth strategy to add new

cities and new vendor categories to bring Snappening.com to your town!

Presently, Snappening.com is in these cities:

- Indianapolis, IN
- Louisville, KY
- Bloomington, IN
- Lafayette, IN
- South Bend, IN
- Fort Wayne, IN

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Please ask us questions you
may have about the app! As we receive your questions, we'll update our

listing here for all Indiegogo users.

campaign via word of mouth, press and your own social media feed! Every impression

counts!

Can't wait to see you at the party!

All my best,

Crystal Grave

Wireless GSM telephony is expensive with high smartphone prices, long term mobile plans and accruing calling costs. Calls are prone to be recorded and monitored. Voice quality is poor due high compression ratios. Not to forget the contract that is signed containing personal info.

Introducing the WiFi Crypto Phone

Now there is a choice. A low cost GSM alternative phone. The answer to privacy deficient smartphones. A new method of wireless telephony that is innovative.

Confidentiality through voice encryption is a standard feature.
It has the stylish looks of a smartphone, the mic/speaker marks of a good old land line

phone and is the lightest of mobile phones. Assembled are only essential components. Glass screen and keyboard were not needed. Elegant operation with two buttons on the left for navigating the phone book and another one on the right to call.

8000 Hz 8-bit PCM 64 kbps sampled raw voice data is reduced to 32 kbps
via 4-bit ADPCM compression, which accounts for good voice quality.
Finally triple DES encryption is applied to have a stream of P2P

encrypted voice data packets that are sent through the internet.

Contacts and WiFi network credentials are managed with the PC application through USB. Up to 8 networks and 16 contacts can be added.

WiFi to coexist with GSM

Mobile phones are tending towards WiFi and encryption (see here and here). Yet these attempts don't really feel right. It's like trying to blend oil with water.

Crypto GSM phones for several thousand dollars (see here and here), smartphones at up to a thousand dollar, VOIP phone adapters with hidden recurring costs (link)...


Not so with the Decibit WiFi Crypto Phone. Dealers invest only in the hardware manufacturing cost. It can't go lower than that. Hence customers get to own this crypto phone at lowest price in the market. [Note: Dealer inquiries are welcome. Direct shipping from assembly line in China.]

This phone contains a U.S. manufactured Wi-Fi module from Inventek Systems (www.inventeksys.com), which utilizes a Broadcom MAC / baseband / radio chipset with FCC, IC and CE compliance certification.

Integrated is a secure chip AT90SC1818CT (obtainable only by signing a NDA) that is the core component for key generation and real time voice encryption. Session key is exchanged using 2048 bit RSA asymmetric key encryption. Voice data is encrypted with triple DES and transmitted as CBC stream between WiFi phones.

The secure chip is input with both internal raw voice data of 64 kbps and the encrypted data of 32 kbps received from other phone. It compresses and encrypts the raw data and decrypts and decompresses the encrypted data. It then outputs decoded raw 64 kbps data for listening and encrypted 32 kbps data to be sent to other phone. This cycle repeats every 8ms. Overall data rate to/from secure chip is about 100 Mbyte/h. 1000 triple DES operations are performed every second. Cipher Block Chaining is utilized where a cycle counter is being used as IV and also XOR'ed onto the session key. UDP packets carry a bunch of data of 13 cycles for 104ms length to ensure low latency.

2048-bit RSA key generation and storage happens within secure chip. The phone number is derived from this RSA key. Both RSA key and triple DES session key are managed inside the secure chip. All voice encryption and ADPCM compression are performed within the secure chip. No other cryptophone on the market does this. They use the CPU of the mobile phone for cryptographic tasks. A sophisticated lab can easily extract the keys from such unprotected chips. This phone was therefore designed in hardware and software from scratch for it's main function to provide absolute confidential phone conversations by using a specialty secure chip that is built to prevent and withstand any such extraction attempts.

Any logged past internet traffic is worthless data and can not be played
back a second time, even if one or both of the phones are in possession
with the attacker. A two stage RSA encapsulated session key creation,
exchange and assembly method assures this:
Furthermore, the RSA modulus is not in plain
column2:
not due security reasons, but to assure good randomness while deriving the phone number and the UDP socket port number from the RSA key.

Active and user friendly support is provided with AES-128 encrypted automatic firmware updates.

column1:
WiFi operates on local short range with fastest connection speeds and emitting at low output power thus causing minimal radiation exposure. GSM is exposing the user with increased radiation levels to penetrate walls while connecting with a far located cell tower.

It is reported that the World Health Organization considers cell phone radiation

as ""possibly carcinogenic"". 3G connections are already bad for health, where 4G is worse, causing more exposure to radiation due higher data rates.

This WiFi phone with 63 mWatt has 97% less output power than a GSM phone with 2000 mWatt output power. 63mW/2000mW = 3%.

What does WiFi Telecom mean?

Every WiFi Phone, after switching on and connecting to a Wi-Fi network, registers itself with the server at www.WiFi-Tele.com. The server stores the RSA public key and current IP address and thus functions as a dynamic DNS service provider.

After initiating a call, a direct UDP link is established between phones to exchange encrypted voice data.

Outgoing calls can be initiated from anywhere in the world just by
knowing the other phone's number. To receive calls however, the internet modem/router NAT has to be setup for port forwarding, to allow a caller to

reach the phone behind the firewall on the local area network.

Only calls between WiFi Phones of this brand are possible. Regular phones can not be called. This WiFi Crypto Phone establishes confidential P2P calls.

WiFi range extenders (
column5:
keywords=Wi-Fi+Range+Extender+-+Wall+Plug"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">link) can be used to amplify any weak spots.


How does it operate?

A phonebook entry is selected by two buttons on the left, navigating through up to 16 phone numbers. Each location is sound encoded in Roman numerals. Empty and unchecked entries are skipped.

Roman numerals from 1 to 16 are:
I, II, III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII, XIII, XIV, XV, XVI

Once a contact is chosen, the call can be initiated by the right side single button, which is also used to end the call. Those left side buttons adjust the volume of the speaker during a call.

Incoming call is signaled by playing a melody or by vibration, which is configured using the PC application.

Coverage

column1: is no issue. Plugging in a cheap WiFi repeater to a wall plug ensures

good connectivity at all times in a house or office.

Ringing time while a melody is playing is 30s. If one phone ends the call, the other phone will almost immediately mute and end, too. If there is connection loss for longer than 20s, the phone will abort the call.

LED Indicators

Upper red light:  No network.
Green light: Connected to network. The phone is ready to make or receive a call.
Yellow light: Call is in progress.
Lower red light:  Battery charging status.

Specification

Battery: 1200mAh Li-Po for 5 days standby and up to 8 hrs talk time
Size: 125mm long, 50mm wide, 10.4mm high
Volume: 65 cm³
Weight: 69 g (incl. battery)
Confidential:  Yes
True voice encryption: Yes (*)
Network: Wi-Fi, IEEE 802.11b/g/n, 72 Mbps

(*) True voice encryption means that raw voice data itself is processed through the encryption algorithm in real time to get en-/decrypted. This is not XOR method which simply scrambles the voice data by patching onto a pseudo random byte sequence.

Conclusion

In almost all categories, a Decibit WiFi Crypto Phone is an outstanding choice. Be it health related or initial and running costs or legally binding contracts or privacy related issues or the huge value that stands behind the whole project.

Donations will help to recover back the expenses made for
secure chip purchase, casing mold and production of the product.
Expenses are currently at the 50K$ mark, not including any form of

salary or equipment cost.

It is a great feeling to have an encrypted conversation. It must feel weak to be unable to shake off the parasite on your back breathing down your neck that is violating your privacy. For less than 50$/year it is now possible to own and use a crypto phone of great value and exterminate the term ""phone bill"" at once.

Cheers, ...and have a nice day!

WIFI-Phone.net
WIFI-Tele.com

encrypted voice data packets that are sent through the internet.Contacts and WiFi network credentials are managed with the PC application through USB. Up to 8 networks and 16 contacts can be added.

WiFi to coexist with GSMMobile phones are tending towards WiFi and encryption (see here and here). Yet these attempts don't really feel right. It's like trying to blend oil with water.Crypto GSM phones for several thousand dollars (see here and here), smartphones at up to a thousand dollar, VOIP phone adapters with hidden recurring costs (link)...Not so with the Decibit WiFi Crypto Phone. Dealers invest only in the hardware manufacturing cost. It can't go lower than that. Hence customers get to own this crypto phone at lowest price in the market. [Note: Dealer inquiries are welcome. Direct shipping from assembly line in China.]

This phone contains a U.S. manufactured Wi-Fi module from Inventek Systems (www.inventeksys.com), which utilizes a Broadcom MAC / baseband / radio chipset with FCC, IC and CE compliance certification.

Integrated is a secure chip AT90SC1818CT (obtainable only by signing a NDA) that is the core component for key generation and real time voice encryption. Session key is exchanged using 2048 bit RSA asymmetric key encryption. Voice data is encrypted with triple DES and transmitted as CBC stream between WiFi phones.

The secure chip is input with both internal raw voice data of 64 kbps and the encrypted data of 32 kbps received from other phone. It compresses and encrypts the raw data and decrypts and decompresses the encrypted data. It then outputs decoded raw 64 kbps data for listening and encrypted 32 kbps data to be sent to other phone. This cycle repeats every 8ms. Overall data rate to/from secure chip is about 100 Mbyte/h. 1000 triple DES operations are performed every second. Cipher Block Chaining is utilized where a cycle counter is being used as IV and also XOR'ed onto the session key. UDP packets carry a bunch of data of 13 cycles for 104ms length to ensure low latency.2048-bit RSA key generation and storage happens within secure chip. The phone number is derived from this RSA key. Both RSA key and triple DES session key are managed inside the secure chip. All voice encryption and ADPCM compression are performed within the secure chip. No other cryptophone on the market does this. They use the CPU of the mobile phone for cryptographic tasks. A sophisticated lab can easily extract the keys from such unprotected chips. This phone was therefore designed in hardware and software from scratch for it's main function to provide absolute confidential phone conversations by using a specialty secure chip that is built to prevent and withstand any such extraction attempts.Any logged past internet traffic is worthless data and can not be played
back a second time, even if one or both of the phones are in possession
with the attacker. A two stage RSA encapsulated session key creation,
exchange and assembly method assures this:
Furthermore, the RSA modulus is not in plain
column2: not due security reasons, but to assure good randomness while deriving the phone number and the UDP socket port number from the RSA key.Active and user friendly support is provided with AES-128 encrypted automatic firmware updates.

column1: WiFi operates on local short range with fastest connection speeds and emitting at low output power thus causing minimal radiation exposure. GSM is exposing the user with increased radiation levels to penetrate walls while connecting with a far located cell tower.It is reported that the World Health Organization considers cell phone radiation

as ""possibly carcinogenic"". 3G connections are already bad for health, where 4G is worse, causing more exposure to radiation due higher data rates.This WiFi phone with 63 mWatt has 97% less output power than a GSM phone with 2000 mWatt output power.  63mW/2000mW = 3%.What does WiFi Telecom mean?

Every WiFi Phone, after switching on and connecting to a Wi-Fi network, registers itself with the server at www.WiFi-Tele.com. The server stores the RSA public key and current IP address and thus functions as a dynamic DNS service provider.After initiating a call, a direct UDP link is established between phones to exchange encrypted voice data.Outgoing calls can be initiated from anywhere in the world  just by
knowing the other phone's number. To receive calls however, the internet modem/router NAT has to be setup for port forwarding, to allow a caller to

reach the phone behind the firewall on the local area network.Only calls between WiFi Phones of this brand are possible. Regular phones can not be called. This WiFi Crypto Phone establishes confidential P2P calls.WiFi range extenders (link) can be used to amplify any weak spots.How does it operate?A phonebook entry is selected by two buttons on the left, navigating through up to 16 phone numbers. Each location is sound encoded in Roman numerals. Empty and unchecked entries are skipped.Roman numerals from 1 to 16 are:I, II, III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII, XIII, XIV, XV, XVIOnce a contact is chosen, the call can be initiated by the right side single button, which is also used to end the call. Those left side buttons adjust the volume of the speaker during a call.Incoming call is signaled by playing a melody or by vibration, which is configured using the PC application.Coverage
is no issue. Plugging in a cheap WiFi repeater to a wall plug ensures

good connectivity at all times in a house or office.Ringing time while a melody is playing is 30s. If one phone ends the call, the other phone will almost immediately mute and end, too. If there is connection loss for longer than 20s, the phone will abort the call.LED IndicatorsUpper red light:  No network.Green light: Connected to network. The phone is ready to make or receive a call.Yellow light: Call is in progress.Lower red light:  Battery charging status.SpecificationBattery: 1200mAh Li-Po for 5 days standby and up to 8 hrs talk timeSize: 125mm long, 50mm wide, 10.4mm highVolume: 65 cm³Weight: 69 g (incl. battery)Confidential:  YesTrue voice encryption: Yes (*)Network: Wi-Fi, IEEE 802.11b/g/n, 72 Mbps(*) True voice encryption means that raw voice data itself is processed through the encryption algorithm in real time to get en-/decrypted. This is not XOR method which simply scrambles the voice data by patching onto a pseudo random byte sequence.ConclusionIn almost all categories, a Decibit WiFi Crypto Phone is an outstanding choice. Be it health related or initial and running costs or legally binding contracts or privacy related issues or the huge value that stands behind the whole project.Donations will help to recover back the expenses made for
secure chip purchase, casing mold and production of the product.
Expenses are currently at the 50K$ mark, not including any form of

salary or equipment cost.It is a great feeling to have an encrypted conversation. It must feel weak to be unable to shake off the parasite on your back breathing down your neck that is violating your privacy. For less than 50$/year it is now possible to own and use a crypto phone of great value and exterminate the term ""phone bill"" at once.Cheers, ...and have a nice day!WIFI-Phone.netWIFI-Tele.com",13.0,0,"1 Campaign

Each asap X-Connect cable features 2x N52 grade neodymium magnets which are the world's strongest commercial grade magnets. For all you oldies who still think magnets will affect your phones function, mobile phones use SSD (solid state drives) which aren't affected by small magnets like ours. In fact your phone itself has over half a dozen magnets inside it to power features such as your speakers. The magnets will also have no impact on your GPS. We've clocked over 100 hours both driving and playing Pokemon Go (not whilst driving of course) and can verify this with personal experience.
>When we mean 1 cable for all your phones, we mean it. We've designed 3 connectors to fit all 3 types of main connectors today for all mobile phones, tablets and USB devices.
>Our cables feature a reversible magnetic connection which means instant connection every single time. Please note this is the asap connect original cable featured in the GIF below.

column3: >Sick and tired of flipping your cables back and forth to connect it on the right side? We were too, so we engineered asap X-Connect to have a reversible Type A (which is the side that inserts into your wall charger, laptop or power bank). We've evolved it from the older reversible Type A connector which moves back and forth and tends to break over time rather than stay stationary. This means first connection every time, no more fiddling around to connect your cable!

column2: >asap X-Connect features a reversible Type A connector that we hope to see become a standard for all USB devices one day. Check it out in action below.

column1: An often overlooked feature of magnetic cables is that it will protect your phone port from dust and dirt entering. By leaving the tip in there, it will also extend the life of your phone port from the normal wear and tear of cables being inserted and pulled out on a daily basis.

asap X-Connect's major design improvement over the original version is the stronger magnet. We've increased the magnet size from 1.9mm (0.07"") to 3mm (1.2"") for a magnetic connection that holds 33% more weight.

The Alpha tip (for Apple devices) design has also been upgraded. With the first version we tested an incompatibility rate of 1 in 100. We've now reduced that to 4 in 1000 which is a far lower default rate than consumer electronics industry standards.

column2: >What truly sets ASAP Connect apart from other magnetic connectors is its unique bevelled and concave magnetic connector design on both the tip end and cable head end.

>Through this careful 360° exterior positioning of 2 strong N52 grade neodymium magnets on both ends, the tip only needs to be within 38mm of the magnetic field of the cable tip to be quickly attracted and connect seamlessly.

column1: Competitor designs require the tips to be correctly aligned inside the cable head which requires guidance to be connected correctly if missed. Competitor designs also use weaker magnets and require a very perfect alignment of the cable and tip for a correct connection. See if you can guess which is ASAP Connect (original version) below.

Don't be fooled by the similar external look of competitor magnetic cables, asap connect original version (on the right) will connect correctly even if the tip is flipped 180°, due to both the strong neodymium magnets having their polarity perfectly positioned and the unique outward and concave magnetic connector design.

column2: >asap X-Connect has upgraded the magnetic connection to be 33% stronger with the ability to connect from a distance of 38mm (1.5""), up from the original asap connect's 28mm (1.1"").  See the comparison below.

column1: asap X-Connect features the world's strongest commercially available magnets known as N52 grade magnets. When we say we're using the world's strongest magnets, we mean it! Enough with the technical blah blah, how strong you might ask?

column1: You will be emailed a survey from Backerkit 14 days after your purchase, asking you to choose your options, purchase additional add-ons including tips, adapters, cables, sets and update your shipping address. Any new purchases from the Backerkit survey will not have an extra shipping charge and you will be offered the discounted rate per add on if you purchased a special or volume perk. You will have 14 business days to complete your survey from the day you receive it. If you have any questions after the survey has arrived please email hello@chargeasap.com.

column2: >We've tested our cables on dozens of Apple and Android phone and tablet devices with no compatibility issues. As long as you have any device that requires a Lightning connector (such as iPhone 6, iPhone 6 plus, iPad, iPad Mini etc.) a Micro USB connector (such as Android phones, mini speakers, headphones etc.) or a USB-C connector (such as Galaxy Note 7, Nexus 6P or OnePlus 2), asap X-Connect will work every time.

column1: asap X-Connect supports data transfer, however due to the LED light creating a max voltage barrier, fast charge technology including QualComm 2.0, QualComm 3.0 and Samsung Adaptive Fast Charge will charge about 5 - 10% slower from our initial testing. This is something we are looking to overcome in our development phase. Please note that as with all cables that are longer, there is more resistance in the wires and the charge speed will decrease as the length of the cable increases.
The best feature of asap X-Connect is it's cross-device compatibility. This means you'll only need 1 cable for all phones and USB devices.

column2: >Through years of design and material testing, we've reduced the size of the ASAP Connect tip to only 10mm (0.39"") wide which fits perfectly into all your Apple and Android devices. We've tested the tips on over 100 phone cases and found it fit on all of them. The only exception is for some phone cases which have a protective flap on the charging port which may not be able to close properly with the tip in place. This also the case for the Samsung S5 phone due to its inbuilt protective flap.

column1: We've tested asap X-Connect to work on a variety of popular cases. The most popular question we received is if our cables are compatible with the Lifeproof Fre case for iPhone 6/6s. Here's a video below showing the compatibility.
We have evolved the traditional Lightning tip for Apple devices to create what we call the ""Alpha"" tip for 2 important reasons:

REASON 1: Have you ever had your Lightning tip start wobbling and eventually break off? This happens because the tip and base are made of 2 different components which break apart over repeated use. The Alpha tip solves this problem by integrating both the tip and base into 1 piece.

column2: >REASON 2: As Apple has not currently released their own magnetic Lightning tips, anyone seeking MFi (""Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad"") certification from Apple will be refused as they will need to purchase the tips from an Apple MFi certified magnetic Lightning tip manufacturer which does not currently exist as of September 2016.

column1: Without MFi certification most major retailers will not sell a USB cable for Apple devices and leaves the brand potentially open to law suits from Apple. The integration of the Alpha tip bypasses this certification process by not using the Lightning tip and allowing ASAP Connect to be manufactured and sold in major retailers worldwide.

asap Technologies has recently been granted government funding that will ensure the development and production of what we hope to be the world's first USB-C magnetic tip. There have been significant challenges in this process as USB-C cables carry a higher electrical current (3.1Amps vs 2.4Amps) which also presents an array of safety concerns.
*UPDATE* USB-C tips have already been manufactured and started shipping as of March 2017.

column3: >lease note: We do not know the maximum output current achievable due to technological limitations. The true potential of USB-C is 5 Amps whilst the most advanced USB-C phones in the market currently only charge at a max of 3.1 Amps. A Type A to USB-C cable (Type A is the power input end of your regular wall adapter or laptop) may only be able to reach the max range of 2 - 2.4 Amps. We are currently researching into developing a USB-C to USB-C cable capable of reaching the full 5 Amps potential of USB-C which we will try to make backwards compatible with the current USB-C tip. We do not know if we are able to overcome the current limitations of magnetic technology which currently prevent charge speeds above 2.4Amps.

column2: >Over the past 2 years we have been working closely with our manufacturer and possess both a registered design and utility patent-pending to protect our unique technology and its potential future applications. For further information regarding this please contact us via email on hello@chargeasap.com.

column1: asap X-Connect has also been granted the following international certifications:

column2: >Beware of imitations, fake and low quality magnetic cables on the Internet.
column3: > We have purchased samples directly off dozens of suppliers who claim to produce premium magnetic USB cables and performed both extensive laboratory and daily-use testing.

column1: -  We have found many to not work as claimed, not be reversible, not transfer data nor charge your phone as it's maximum speed. We have even found some to create smoke and even damage your phone

- Many of these companies offer cables that do not have the following international certifications: FCC, CE, ROHS and hence may not be approved for sale in your country. You should always ask the seller first if they have these international certifications before making a purchase

- Any company which claims to have Apple MFi certified lightning magnetic tips is completely false as of 8th September 2016. Apple has not currently produced nor approved any magnetic Lightning tips commercially and hence will not provide a MFi licenced magnetic Lighting connector to any company attempting to selling magnetic connectors as of 8th
- We have found many companies to use poor quality magnets that have weak magnetism or lose their connectivity over time due to no magnetic plating
- We have found many companies produce tip designs that are too bulky to fit most phone cases

column1: Our 1st crowdfunding campaign was asap dash: the world's fastest pocket-sized portable phone charger which successfully raised over $212,538 since January 2016 via Indiegogo found here.

Our 2nd crowdfunding campaign was asap connect: The original version of this magnetic USB cable which successfully raised over $408,828 since May 2016 via Indiegogo. You can purchase it for an October 2016 delivery found here.

asap X-Connect is the 3rd crowd funded product from asap Technologies. Thank you to the entire crowd funding community for your support in bringing a user-driver technology startup, asap Technologies to life.

column1: We've partnered up with Backerkit for a smooth, streamline experience for the fulfillment process. This is also where you will be given the options to choose the colors, connector types and also purchase addons.
How do I choose my colour and connector type?
column2:
>You will be emailed a survey to your inbox via Backerkit at the end of the campaign within 10 days of the campaign ending.

 
Can I choose a different asap X-Connect connector type and colour for each cable I order, even if I order them together as 1 perk?
column3:
>Yes, you can choose a different connector type and colour for every cable purchased. For example if you purchase a TWIN PACK, you can choose 1 Apple and 1 Android cable in 2 different colours.

 
How will my order be shipped?
column4:
>All orders will be shipping with tracking, out of our fulfilment centre in Hong Kong and will be delivered in most cases by your local national postal service.

   
Which countries do you ship to?
column5: >We ship to all countries excluding the following which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria &amp
column6:
Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we can't guarantee the shipment's arrival.

 
Your campaign seems similar to these other crowdfunding campaigns ""ZAPTIP"" and ""ZNAPS"" which both are way past their delivery date and also have poor communication with backers so we're very concerned that they are ""scams"" and this campaign is too.
column7:
>This question has been added as we feel it's important that we are 100% transparent about our project and to establish trust with our backers. We have during our last campaign (asap Connect) reports from the Indiegogo Trust and Safety Team in regards to concerns about these campaigns. Neither our product nor any member of our team is in any way associated with those 2 campaigns. Our technology is proprietary to asap Technologies and we have a utility patent-pending with patent filing number P103013.AU. This is our third campaign on Indiegogo with the first campaign already delivered to customers.

 
So did your company actually invent the original magnetic USB technology?
column8:
>It is very important that all backers understand that this technology has been available in Asia since 2014. No company has claimed to have invented the original magnetic USB technology in the form of a patent so we will never truly know who originally invented it as magnetic power connection has been around for over 20 years and predates even the invention of ""Magsafe."" We can use the analogy of car brands to best explain this. Even though BMW, Ferrari or Lamborghini did not invent the original car, they each have their own unique engine, materials and design. Similarly, Asap Connect uses our own patent-pending magnetic technology with 18K gold plated connector design. We've solved significant issues found in the existing competitor designs and have created a more advanced technology for magnetic USB cables.

     
Is there likely to be any manufacturing delays like all the other crowdfunded magnetic cables and adaptors which have all failed to deliver?
column9: >Unlike all those other campaigns, we have already paid up front from our own pockets for the tooling cost and produced samples for testing. With the positive response of the final samples we will be able to begin production right after the campaign closes with no manufacturing complications. We've accounted for potential delays with our expected delivery date and are confident we will deliver on time.
column12:
>FEATURES  
What makes asap X-Connect better than other magnetic cables/adaptors in the market?
column13:
>There are many features, though the most important is that we are the first to incorporate our patent-pending magnetic connector technology and as our magnets are positioned at the exterior of both the cable and connector tip it will always connect easily. We also have a fully functional cross-device compatible cable that works with all Apple and Android devices for both charging and data transfer.

 
Will the magnet interfere with the phones function?
column14:
>For all you oldies who still thinks magnets will affect your phones function, mobile phones use SSD (solid state drives) which aren't affected by small magnets like ours. In fact your phone itself has over half a dozen magnets inside it to power features such as your speakers. The magnets will also have no impact on your GPS, we've clocked over 100 hours both driving and playing Pokemon Go (not whilst driving of course) and can verify this with personal experience.

How strong is the magnetic connection?
column15:
>We've designed asap X-Connect to be strongest magnetic cable on the market, strong enough to lift 400g and even lift an iPad Air!

 
Is it easy to remove the tip from the phone?
column16:
>The tip will stay in place from any general daily use even if the phone is dropped, yet it can be easily removed with just your fingers when needed.

   
What is the length of the cable that comes with the cable set?
column17:
>The length of all asap X-Connect cables is 1.2m (3.94ft). You can purchase additional cables that are a longer 1.5m (4.92ft) for $15 on the Backerkit survey. Please note these cables may have a slightly slower charging speed due to increased resistance which is standard with all longer cables.

 
Does asap X-Connect support data transfer for Apple and Android devices?
column18:
>Yes, this also includes tethering.

 
Does asap X-Connect come with international warranty?
column19: >Yes, all asap X-Connect cables will come with an international 365 day warranty.
column22:
>COMPATIBILITY  
Is asap X-Connect backwards compatible with the original asap Connect cable?
column23:
>Though we advise not using them together, asap X-Connect is backwards compatible with the original asap Connect for micro USB only. However the connection may not be as stable.

 
Is asap X-Connect cable compatible with all USB devices?
column24:
>asap X-Connect is compatible with all USB devices for charge and data sync. However it is not compatible with any audio functions such as your Lightning headphones, speakers or Apple Play.

 
Will asap X-Connect affect the charging speed?
column25:
>asap X-Connect will not alter any device's charging speed and can handle the maximum charging speed for mobile phones.

 
Can I connect a Micro USB cable with an Alpha tip or vice versa?
column26:
>Yes, asap X-Connect most unique function is that it is cross-device compatible. This means a cable designed for Apple will work with an micro USB tip and vice versa.

 
Why have you not chosen to use the original lightning connector or have MFi certification?
column27:
>Apple has not released a magnetic lightning connector, hence it is not possible to apply for MFi certification and by producing a lightning connector that is not MFi certified, it leaves that company open to legal action by Apple. Any company claiming to have a MFi magnetic connector is not possible as of September 2016. You can ask the company for a PPID number from Apple as proof. However the great news is our cables are made from a factory that produces MFi cables so the chip inside is identical and we have had no compatibility issues after 2 years of testing.

 
Does asap X-Connect support QC2.0 or QC3.0?
column28: >asap X-Connect will support up to 5V/2.4Amps, which is more than most cables available, but it will not support the maximum speeds of Qualcomm Quick Charge technology due to the 5V limit of the LED light. We have tested our cable with a QC2.0 charger and charge speeds are 10% slower from 0 - 50% battery power, and exactly the same speed from 50% - 100% battery power.

column1: You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.

Please note all sales are final. Indiegogo is not able to guarantee that perks will be delivered or deemed satisfactory. The nature of crowdfunding is such that campaigns on Indiegogo are raising funds for work-in-progress projects, ideas, or causes. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. Whilst your contribution brings the campaign idea closer to becoming reality, there's always the chance that a project may end up falling through, and the campaign owner may not be able to offer their contributors the perks they'd originally advertised.

Please note that if an item has been discontinued, we are no longer able to provide warranty on that item.

If our shipping provider attempts to deliver to your address and the package is returned because of any of these reasons, there will be a reshipping fee: no-one is available to receive the package, the location is not accessible, you've provided the wrong address or you have moved without notifying us before the delivery dispatch.
